If I could give a zero I would believe me eeww this place gave me the creeps ... i went in the evening like around 7 it was pretty busy and super slow any who I really don't mind that but what me were the HUGE rats so gross like literally me and my husband counted  more than a dozen i bet an easy 20 rats were there in the grass area on the other side of the drive thru they were everywhere so freaking discussing I told the lady at the cashier and she said " yeah we know" r kidding eeeeww HEALTH INSPECTION IS well needed h

This McDonalds is right here behind Wal Mart and it is Always busy! It is not the cleaness one I've ever come into. There are always homeless people hanging out in front of the store, or should I say on the side of the building. So I decided to go through the drive thru today and boy was the line long. I don't know what it is, but it seems like every time I choose to do drive thru I get stuck. Never fails!   So while waiting in the drive thru a homeless person walks up to my window and tapped on it an scared me to death asking for some change. I wanted to jump out that car and {....}. So after being spooked an waiting in the drive thru for about 20 minutes now and I get to the pick up window and the young lady asked me what my order was, so I told her and she turned to look for my food and no chicken nuggets on deck. Why I'm not surprised.   So they have about three other orders up and ready to go, but I have to wait another 5 minutes or so before my order is ready. And the girl working the window says nothing too me regarding my food not being ready. She just walks away from the window. Where do they get theses people from? Now I know the other people waiting in line are wondering what's taking so long. Its not me! It's  just hard to find good help nowadays.   I just stopped here because I was right here at Wal Mart and figure {....}. And maybe that's the problem. One of the worse McDonald's that I had ever been. I ordered food in the drive thru and when I got home there wasn't complete my order and when I came back to complain, the employees gave me an attitude . For all that is Holy...  Cold food EVERYTIME! Except the shakes; they are drinkable with a sippy cup if you so desire. I would also like to add that texting on your cell is fine, speaking into your phone while you forgot to take your finger off the speaker while waiting on customers so they can hear about your displeasure with your bf hitting on your bff? Not so much.

I always dread coming to this McDonald's............ i don't come here unless I'm desperate ! The drive they takes foreverrrrr...& for what? Diet coke! I'm even helping you, NO ICE, 1 less step. I will give them this, if there's an issue with a order, they've handled it quite well---- thank you rashieda (sp?)
Zero stars.  Just too ghetto.  I strongly think from the hate-stares and super-slow service that they spit in the white people's food -- or worse.  Enter at your own risk.

We just happened to be in the area on the way home to Elk Grove after looking for bar stools for our new kitchen island to come up next year sometime. This is definitely not a McDonald's that we come too often, but we were over this way today and had my granddaughter and as I have shared time and time again, she loves these dang chicken nuggets. Lol  So we are sitting in McDonald's and I look around and there's not 1 or 2, but 3 dogs in here. Did I miss something? Don't get me wrong I love dogs too, but I don't want to eat in a food establishment with them!   When I had my poodles, they weren't even allowed in my kitchen! No matter where we lived. This just was the craziest thing I've seen in a long time. Outside was no better, there was a lady with a lil small dog and he was so hot and thirsty, his tongue was hanging out And no one even thought about him.   Okay Please forgive me, I'm not one to ignore people/pets or whatevers got some life in them to suffer if I can help it. Lawd help me! I asked her could she get that dog some water too! Poor dog don't stand a chance.... that just hurts me to my soul when I see suffering, if you know what I mean? Yea I think I'm cool with this 'Mickey D's'....#RealCool.

I can't believe this place is brave enough to have a place for reviews.  Look, the bottom line is that if you don't value your health, life or bowels, eat here. Rude employees always a tone of customers never enough staff always mess up on order never even apologize just horrible all around I just go once in a while cause it's 1 minute from my house

This by far has been the worst experience that me and my boyfriend has ever had. The cashier was taking forever counting our money then people after we came in getting their food first. Employees in the back goofing off instead of working.

Average McDonald's. My only gripe is that apparently, some of the workers at the drive-thru can't count up to six. I don't think six sugars and seven creams is too hard to remember when pumping their respective buttons into the liquid. I would cringe if these same folks got paid $15 an hour to botch a simple coffee order. The other workers are fine.

-CORPORATE PLEASE STEP IN.- Hearing complaints of employees and managers. I've been referred to the human resources already which i am talking to them next week. (Manager should really be sweatin now)  Manager talks down to the workers. A bunch of people has quit. He takes the phones of employees and locks it away (BIG NO NO) and refuses to give them back until the end of the day. These are personal belongings.   They lost a lot of managers and has this barely capable asian girl to do the schedules which whom by the way schdules herself off on the weekends and has the crew blindly covering shifts for one another.   ITS TIME FOR A NEW STORE MANAGER. Please help this mcdonalds out.

This would be ZERO stars, if possible.   I had just visited the farmer's market in the nearby parking lot with my toddler in tow. I had a dentist appointment coming up and realized I didn't have time to go home and make breakfast. I spotted the McDonald's which had literally not a single car in the drive-thru, so I decided I'd grab breakfast for us there. I pulled up, made my order, went to the first window to pay, had a short chat about how not busy they were, drove to the second window, and was immediately told that I would need to pull to the front of the building because I had asked for the muffin toasted well. I looked behind me to see not a single car and asked, "Even if I'm the only one in line?" He turned to a short woman behind him, who nodded her head, so he turned back to me and said, "Yes." So I pulled out to the front where 3 other cars were already waiting for the same kind of reason. Ridiculous! Not a single car in the drive-thru, but you've got, now 4 cars waiting out front on the red curb or blocking other cars because there's no designated wait area. I maneuver myself around and find a spot that I can be found by whomever comes out to bring me my food. I paid at 8:07am. I waited as I watched all three cars get their food and drive off. I waited as I saw people park, go inside, and come back out with their food in hand. I waited and waited, not wanting to pull my toddler out of the car just to run inside real quick - the whole reason why I picked the drive thru anyway.   Then, some homeless guy comes and starts walking around the area. He kept stopping and banging his fists on the ground as he yelled. I locked my doors, rolled up the windows, and moved a bit further up. At this point, I started watching the clock. At 8:15, I tried calling the store because I didn't want to leave my car (especially with my child in tow) with that man in front of the doors. It rang and rang and rang and then went to a message system. I waited some more. At 8:19, I had had enough waiting. I parked the car, pulled out my toddler, ran past the angry man, and inside. I asked if my drive thru order was ready yet. Everyone looked at me like they were confused and said, "What did you have?" SERIOUSLY?!?!?!? So I told them what it was and the little lady asks the "kitchen" workers if they had that order done. The girl back there goes, "Oh yeah, I'm working on that." As I see her grab cheese and JUST NOW start putting the sandwiches together (I had ordered 3 sausage muffins (no egg) with extra cheese & bun well toasted). So I say, "Are you kidding me? I've been waiting out there for over 10 minutes and you haven't even started my order? There wasn't even anyone in the drive thru! This is ridiculous." So the poor guy that was told he had to have me wait in front asked what happened quietly, so I told him and I asked who the manager was and he pointed to the little lady who kept her back to me this whoooooole time. RUDE!   So I wait for my food inside now and with attitude she turns, hands me my bag, won't make eye contact, and goes, "I threw in a hashbrown, sorry for the wait." She says that without any eye contact, with a monotone voice, and it was very clear it was being said begrudgingly. I was LIVID, so I just walked out. I'm now running late, so I start driving and at the stop lights, I start opening the food. Do you know what I find? COMPLETELY SOFT, BARELY WARM BUNS. THEY WERE NOT WELL DONE IN THE SLIGHTEST BIT - IN FACT, THEY SEEMED UNDERTOASTED. If I would've had the time, I would've marched back in there, demanded it to be fixed, and quite possibly a refund for that insane amount of shenanigans. And do you know what? They cleared my order before having made it, so it LOOKS like they do great with their drive thru times. Not when you have FOUR cars waiting out front and not a single one in the drive thru. I AM SO PISSED AT THIS EXPERIENCE, MAINLY BECAUSE OF THE LACK OF CARE I RECEIVED FROM THAT SNARKY LITTLE "MANAGER" FOR WHAT HAPPENED.   I get McDonald's is not where you should expect great customer service, but this was unacceptable for *any* business. The lack of concern or care is the worst!
Worst mcdonald I've ever been to, didnt even put ranch in my salad and got my drinks wrong. Never going to this mcdonald again

I just had a hard ass time at this location with the employees AND the manager. I went to the drive thru, had 2 separate orders - one paid with cash and one was card. My first order was 6 cheeseburgers, 2 mcchickens, 20pc nuggets, a snack wrap, one large fries and a drink. I got my order in 2 bags and I realized I was missing 2 mcchickens that I paid for! I told the chick at the window I was missing my two sandwiches from the order, first she said it wasn't even on the receipt which I presented to her afterwards. Then she closed the window and another employee came with the MOST attitude saying she packed the bags herself and put the sandwiches in there. Let me remind you, I have my 2 baby girls in the backseat just trying to get some damn food. The female at the window THREW the bag of food back into my car and shut the window. We paid for our food just like everybody else so we just wanted wtf we paid for! The manager came and was not tryna hear anybody out she simply said, "well the employee said she put it in there so you guys can either leave or we can refund you." So we pulled to the front to get our refund, the manager asked if we wanted it all back on my card and we said no we paid 2 ways and want it back the same way. She came back with our receipts and said she put it all back on the card and that she will not help us any further. Management is horrible, employees have no customer service skills, and nobody even gave the chance to hear what the hell we had to say. I didn't want to be the one to throw a scene over 2 damn mcchickens but I wasn't gonna have them accuse me or act like I lied about 2 sandwiches THAT I PAID FOR and did not get. The whole situation escalated when we got inside but all could've been avoided with better customer service skills. Especially that manager, I would've expected more from somebody at a higher rank! My cousin made a call to customer care to put this in the books. Something needs to get done about this location because this was not the first time I've seen or had issues at this location.

Over 30 mins in the drive thru, workers are always consistently rude. Ghetto location, with ghetto workers. Absolutely ridiculous.

This a good place to order food for cheap. I've only been through the drive thru so I have no idea how it looks in the inside. this store does not deserve one star but this site makes you choose at least one, rude, disrespectful even all the way up to the manager, always gets orders wrong, talks crazy to customers, i don't even want to eat my food because they are so rude and disrespectful, and act so ignorant that I would not put it past them to spit in my food. thanks but no thanks, got my entire order wrong, then wanted me to prove what I ordered????? like I said previously the manager is the ring leader. I give this place 0 stars , i was in the drive way I had 2 separated  order first order was with card which was 6 cheeseburgers and 2 mcchickens 1 snack wrap fries and a Powerade. Poor everything argued over because the worker forgot our order just 2 mcchickens that we paid for what was for my kids they specifically wanted . the worker continued to tell me she put them in the bag I got fed up and asked for the manager the manager came to the window and just poorly handled it I got so fed up so I went inside remind you I was in the drive thru . So manager met me at the door i had drinks in my hand she threw them away as we're at the door manager said employee said she put mcchickens into my bag manager asked me if I wanted to leave or my refund so I asked for my refund she asked me repeatedly if I wanted both reciepts on one card after I told her I paid with one recipet cash and the other card so after it was done she still put everything back on the card after I told her that the one with cash is the one I want cash back for . After I told her I wanted my cash back she refused to do it and told me to take my problem elsewhere she also told me she didn't wanna deal with me . I contacted customer complaint line which of course I got to a voicemail so I left my name employee store and advise them I would really appreciated if they gave me a call back I really felt that was poor customer service if they don't like there jobs they shouldn't work in a fast food place and dealing with customer service I just want mcdonalds to understand that this is not okay for a manager to want to fight a customer !!!
They have the slowest & worst customer service I've ever seen. Come here if your wasn't your food screwed up & cold!

Homeless people are coming in and out asking for your half eaten food and drinks so don't leave your food unattended. Homeless people hanging outside as well as other people drinking alcohol in a black garbage bag asking for money. The big mac meal was $7. The cashier was sick and was coughing into her hand. She shouldn't be working that day. There's no small size, so she automatically upgraded everyone meal to a large size. Several hours later, I felt queasy about the big mac meal. I don't think I will ever come back here again.
I ordered a large meal and he only put a large drink when I asked where my page fires were the manager said he had to charge me more for the mistake his employee made of only making the drink Lange.

1) Pineapple smoothies should not have chocolate at the bottom of the cup.  2) Fries should not be given to customers burnt and cold.  3)  When you ask for hot fries the manager shouldn't have an attitude or accuse you of trying to get an extra order.  I had my receipt from not even 5 minutes ago and I gave the old fries back.  After driving a couple blocks nobody wants to drive back to McDonald's and get back in line to ask you to do something that should have been done right the first time. Rude!

This MCD is by far the worst on Florin, they had 3 register and at least two of them should be open. I ordered regular fries and they didn't even salt my fries. The employees here looks like they in deep hell, disrespectful and they look like they need extra extra help !
I have never been so rude to at a fast food place!!!!! The manager Hope was so disrespectful I will never come here agian! I feel so sorry for her employees!!!!!!!!!!

When your in a hurry, and hungry  nice SALTY hot fresh french fries taste delicious especially with a hot hamburger and ice cold DRINK.  Stopped here on the way home from WALMART and never disapointed with Mcdonalds

A typical mcdonalds but has really stupid and rude staff. I ordered a white hot chocolate. Whwn she gave me my order, i told her that it was a hot chocolate latte (i could smell the coffee.) Im allergic to coffee btw.  She still argued with me telling me i was wrong. We argued for about 2 minutes and she assured me it was the right one because she made it herself. Spoke to me like im this crazy lady complaining. I left n Came back after 30 seconds and they admitted that they were wrong and replaced my drink. I ended up going to the emergency room after am hour. It could have been easly avoided if she just replaced it n not argued w me. Soo stupid!

I have one word to describe this place...FILTHY!!! Everything from the old soda around the soda fountain to the dirty greasy floor is disgusting. They even forgot my order! I had to ask them cus they were serving ppl after me. It's a sloppy place will never go back here.

If I could give 0 stars I would. Rarely come here but it's convenient when in a hurry. As I write this review I have been suck in their drive through for 25 min and haven't even made it to the order station. Ridiculous. Not like ANYTHING is made to order. No idea what could possibly make them take so long.

First off, the customer service was terrible. Not nice, playing on the job & lazy. One of the workers even said right in front of our faces, "I'm too lazy to get the strawberry smoothie mix so I'm not going to get it unless you do" (to the cashier). Wtf my food is on the line so how as an employee, are you going to say that you're not willing to serve me yourself unless the cashier does? We also asked for fresh food. It was not fresh at all. My wrap was wrapped wrong, ranch & lettuce all over the place. Disappointed & upset about this experience. Their oven was also not working which was also disappointing, even though it may not be their fault. The owner or corporate should really check up on this place. & there wasn't even any sweet tea in the lobby. Speaking of, it was dirty as hell. I don't expect much from McDonald's, but this experience was just way too much. 2 stars only bc at least my food wasn't cold.

worst mcdonalds ever I wish I did have to go there as much as I do but it's the closest one to me and I don't go unless I have to they get my order wrong EVERY single time. avoid this McDonald's if you can if not check your order every time

Some customers are so annoying. They are stupid to expect hot and fresh food in under a minute.  No good food can come from under a minute. And I feel really sorry for the employees who have to always deal with ratchet and ghetto people. Like all the hobos who be coming in giving attitude and stinking up the place or those people who come in to steal drinks. Then we get those ghetto ppl dancing in line or broke ppl paying in pennies. The employees go through a lot of bullshit bc of rude customers so of course they're not going to be all smiles.

Nice Mcdonalds.  Looks like it was recently redone, very high tech and fancy.  I rarely eat fast food but it was late and needed something fast.  The fries were so hot and fresh it was nice!  Chicken nuggets were good as well and they made sure to give me two dipping sauces.  Order was correct and staff was fast and friendly!

I love this Mcdonalds branch because the staff members are wonderful. They are very easy to talk to and can relate to me and many ways. This is the place where I come to study and I find peace by being here while working on my essays. This place is newly renovated, clean, and is under great management.

Ordered a smoke house double burger no sauce was right on screen then get window cashier changed single then they put no swiss cheese and way over salted burger not even warm.then when told them wanted double and they messed up lady ignored me said have good day with heavy accent like she didn't understand i asked 4 times if can pay for double and she tell me have good day.i then asked do i have drive around and pay for burger be done right 3 times before was anle pay difference then they gave me burger in a box no cheese like really.just putting burger no bun or anything in box alone to bad cant upload pictures.this is by far worst McDonald.

Two days ago I went to McDonald's for lunch and decided to try there quarter pounder fresh beef never frozen. When I got them home I broke a piece of the burger of the patties on both burgers were completely raw.

HAIR FOUND IN FOOD!!! If I could give this location zero stars I would. i went into this location on Monday due to drive thru being super long. The store was full of homeless people taking up the tables without ordering anything.  The drink station was empty and very dirty.  I was paying for my order and notice a young man working the fry station with long bangs hanging over his  face. had no hat or hair net on.  When I got into my car to drive away, I was snacking on my fries and about half way through the container of fries, I felt something get caught in between my teeth and pulled out a piece of black hair. I almost threw up in my car. I threw everything away at next stop.  When I called to talk to the manager Anna or something like that. She didn't even seem to care. All I got was "Oh I wasn't here, I don't think so/I don't know." Never stated she will look into it or said sorry. When I requested who to speak to regarding this issue she just stated to call the number on the bottom on the tag.   She was not helpful at all.  Do not go here if you do not want food in your hair.   I will not be going back.

I don't know about the drive thru but inside even though it's busy they take and make your order very quick literally 2 minutes they made my order right without any mistakes. There is plants of parking space.

I've been trying to file a formal complaint online but your website keeps messing up. Two managers at this location are continously treating uber drivers like trash. Cursing at them and then telling them if they don't like it they don't have to accept anymore deliveries to this location. First instance the girl called the uber driver an asshole after she gave attitude stating he was "late", when in reality the order was canceled by a previous driver. She stated the driver would now have to wait 20 minutes for the order which is completely out of line since she didn't seem to understand someone else had canceled it first which means a whole separate driver comes. 2nd instance same "manager" is now completely ignoring the fact that the uber driver was there since I guess she now doesn't like him. Other employees in view are having a personal conversation and rolled their eyes when he attempted to get someone attention in order to be assisted. They proceeded to tell him to wait and continue with their personal conversation, one of these girls is apparently another "manager" as well. Then she comes over making accusations and tells the driver he just doesn't have to come here anymore. The driver will continue to take orders there since you oblt find out where you're going after accepting, and if you decline after the fact it affects your ratings. But these two employees need to be dealt with as this is completely unacceptable customer service.

Wow McDonald's just gross food. But dang do the everyone that works there doesn't know anything about the quality of their food and the ingredients all they say is go online and look it up I've never seen such lethargic stupidity and ignorance amongst people that work for a company in my life

Absolutely the worst McDonald's I have ever been to. I have never gone to a hamburger restaurant that had no hamburgers. Customer service is terrible I would avoid this particular McDonald's at all cost
Forgot are fries in a damn happy meal with no line and that's all we order how lame .

After obtaining my food I inspected bag to make sure order was correct due to having many mishaps with MD's resuraunts. When I looked inside the bag both of the burgers I had ordered where not even wrapped they were just thrown in the bag along with the wrappers, the chicken nugget boxes were crushed, the sauce I had requested and napkins was not inside the bag either. The french fries were old and not edible due to the excessive amount of salt on them. The nuggets had be old cold and undercooked. Despite the fact that I  went inside to have the burgers remade after getting home I realized they had yet again messed up by using old dry hard buns probably from the discard pile. If the food is not bad enough the customer service is worse. The magager didn't want to open the door at first and a employee was dancing and being loud about there personal life while in the cooking area with 2 other co workers before they were going to clock out of work.

Very poor service.  They refused to do a special order request.  This is the first McDonalds I have been too who refused to cook a hash brown lightly golden and not well done, even though I would have gladly waited.

This store has the worst service I've ever experienced their drive thru cashier Ami is the most rude employee. I've been here a few times and I've never had a good experience. They need to check their attitudes.

Has to be the slowest McDonald's ever. Took over 10 min at the drive thru for a couple of sandwiches and fries. No napkins in the bag either. Employees are either uncaring or really inefficient.   Either way  don't expect a lot

Horrible, negligent staff and manager.  Several days ago an employee there handed me a scalding hot cup of coffee with the lid not attached.  It spilled all over my car, my lap, my cell phone and my left hand burning it.  The staff could not have cared less.  I had to prompt them to give me napkins and burn cream and showed them my dripping phone.  I had to MAKE them take an incident report and there was a manager on duty who didn't even bother to speak with me at all.  Several days later I get a phone call and all I asked for was my warranty copay to have my phone replaced as it now turns itself off at random times since being soaked in coffee and the manager refuses.  He states this kind of thing happens "all the time" and he can't afford to pay for all of his employees mistakes.  All he offered was some free coupons.  Yeah, I'm sure my food wouldn't be spit in by your staff.  I can't even guarantee they wouldn't burn me with it.  Or hurt me or my kids some other way.  There is a McDonals maybe a mile away in Rio Linda that is 1000x better.  Drive the extra 3 minutes and save yourself a scald, a cell phone, a trip to the dry cleaners and a car detail.  Reprehensible.  I am consulting for legal advice on this case and will report them to BBB and code enforcment.
Luz went beyond to give wonderful sevice and help me with everything I needed....something we never get anymore. Thanks Luz for making ny night thT much better :)

Sitting here at the drive thru , it's been about ten minutes... lol they don't even bother to tell me it's going to be a wait or something is frying up that's why it's taking so long.. my food better be nice and hot and FRESH!!  Still sitting here waiting as I write this ...

Third time I've been stuck in the drive through because they are not serving something or are out. Really sucks sitting in line for 10 minutes. Put up a sign or something so I know not to go through the drive through.

Stopped by this restaurant a few times to get my fix of McDonalds. Other than the long Drive-Thru lines, this location is up to the standards of every other McDonalds I've been with the exception that their staff is nicer.
I came into this dump at 10:25 to get a happy meal for my two year old and they to me to wait 7 min. Then I could get one? 7 min really!!!a f@&%ing happy meal for a two year old!!wtf

Let's face it, it's a fast food restaurant, you don't go here for amazing food or anything crazy. With that said, the food is better or equal to other fast food restaurants. Service is fast and employees are courteous. I've ate inside a couple of times, the place looks clean. No complaints. Five stars!

I give this McDonald no stars I order my food waiting for my number to be call about 10 min past and everybody else is getting there food besides me so I walk up manger tells me oh they deleted the order have it to me my order was wrong I ordered sausage egg mcmuffin with egg white and American cheese walk back it they gave me what I wanted come to my car look at the wrapper find a hair in my food walked backed in manager said of its just lines on the wrapper I'm not stupid I know what a hair looks like will never eat at this McDonald's again

I like going to This restaurant once in awhile, and I know if I go to much I sure to get sick lol. Love there deserts, but if your going to get a warm fresh meal, you gave to make sure you get the early. If you get there to late, most there food will start to taste old, or look like it's been sitting there for hours. I can't wait to get a McRib sandwich.

Fast in and out drive through. Typical McDonalds nothing special about it but they do make alot of mistakes on orders. Just about every time I have to have them go back and fix something. Last time they gave my diabetic dad a sugar sweet tea when we said diet several times.
Cone was extra good...not sure if it's cuz it was only like fifty three cents!!! Yummm.

mcdonalds conveniently located everywhere! but this one is located by my parents house..drive thru is always so fast and easy...and big mac-need  i saw more? no other fast food chain can compare - often duplicated but the taste can not match McDonalds...and MMMmMMmmmm softserve and $1 yogurt parfaits!
Do I really need to learn Spanish so the staff will understand my order better? I say fry they give me a pie, I say no they give me extra!

I usually avoid McDonald's (and most fast food), as much as I can but I decided to stop by for a quick breakfast. It was around 8am on a Sunday - not busy at all. I went with an Egg & Cheese McGriddle (~$4) and a Hash brown (~$1.50). My order was ready within minutes. Talk about "fast" food! The McGriddle is good, but it's so small considering I paid over $4 for this breakfast sandwich. The hash brown is amazing! If there's one thing McDonald's does right, it's their potatoes! If you're looking for a quick breakfast, you can't go wrong with McDonald's. The hash browns will definitely make your day.
Ghetto in... Ghetto out... Too bad it was just remodeled. Fries cold Employees at the window curt Hobos all over. Not good.

What a hopeless service it seems like no one knows customer service and the manager Brenda's she is dumb also for all I ask was extra condiments they wanted to charge me why is McDonald's charging and others don't I will never return to this McDonald's  if I am spending my money Please give me what I want I did ask to give me a few extra condiments nothing else.  All staff needs to be retrained about customer service or maybe the owners don't care.SHAME ON YOU ALL.

First time I'm coming to this McDonald after they finish the remodeling. They looks completely different than before inside and out. The only thing it doesn't change is they still have many homeless outside the restaurant, and some time they come in too!   The foods is same as most of the McDonald. Not better, not worst! It is a McDonald, what else I can say! So the rating is not for the foods. It is for the restaurant itself and the service!   The building is little bigger than before, and is little bigger than the average McDonald in the United States. A lot of windows on all three sides of the restaurant. Feels comfortable! But it also more noise than most of the McDonald too!  The three stars is mainly for the service! They are getting new employees after the remodeling. I guess they needs time to learn the systems. The cashier seems not knowing their own menu very well, but they have three kiosks you can order the foods yourself.   The foods is little slower than most of the McDonald I went before. The dinning room looks clean! I just hope they will able to take care of the homeless people problem!

This people need more training and need to show respect to customer DAVID was giving some ugly attitude, unprofessional instead of trying to calm an upset customer he just pissed them off and kept repeating what he saying instead of fixing the issue and says that as you can see we are slammed like SERIOUSLY? Well what he didn't know he was talking to a former drive thru employee I get 8 cars parked outside to wait for orders and so basic when your co worker go out to give the order you should ask what car is the order for you don't just go out and ask each car what they order!!!! I will be calling corporate because we paid for each and every order and we are entitled for what ever request we want! AND THAT DAVID NEED TO TALK MORE NICER TO CUSTOMER! Take note DAVID was the manager! How in the world did he became the manager??? No professionalism at all!!!  I just can't believe he says they are busy but employees working on slow phase!

Look at this!!! Wrapper is still on my quarter burger... On top of that, ketchup, pickles, onions, cheese, etc, was on it. The paper that separates he burger when it's frozen was still on it!!! Never again!!

If it stays like this after the grand reopening I'll be very impressed. Great customer service, got orders out quickly, and everything was delicious and well prepared. Place was very clean and there was almost always someone in the lobby sweeping or wiping down tables. Love the new way to order, as an introvert I live to order through a machine

Absolutely the worst meal I've ever had at McDonalds!  The fish fillet sandwich is what I always order, and I've always gotten it hot, freshly cooked, on a soft, fresh bun.  The sandwich at this location (10/18/18) was on a stale bun that was hard, and the fillet was hard and cold, as if it had been sitting around for awhile.  Very disappointing - I didn't even eat half of it.

I came in for a large Big Mac combo the fries were stale and the ice cream was all melted and didn't taste right their soda machine is a bit watery than usual for my honest opinion I would stop to the McDonald's on Fulton Avenue I usually go through the drive-thru this time I came in and I'm not impressed I should have just drove to Fulton McDonald's

So we probably go to McDonald's more than we should.  Saying that, we get quite a few of duplicate happy meal toys and when I try to trade them in most employees right away will say sorry that's all we have.  I worked there when I was 16 for 3 years so I know there are boxes if at least two different types in the back.  David, who seemed like a manager, was extremely nice and right away went all the way to the back for me during dinner rush to find me a different toy for my two boys.  This small gesture makes a HUGE difference to my kids and to my sanity...lol. David is obviously an asset to this store with his pleasant attitude, he is always smiling, and customer service going above and beyond for his guests.  Thank you David!!

Lesson learned- Always check your order from this McDonalds. This is their version of a grilled artisan chicken sandwich. I'm not seeing a lot of artisan craftwork. Actually, I'm not even seeing a sandwich.   Salad was okay at least...
Out of apples. Again. Don't even attempt to eat even vaguely healthy at this McDonald's.

This review is for the McDonald's on Howe Ave. I usually hit one closer to my home, but they don't open early enough before work. So, I ordered 2 mocha frappe'.. no whipped cream...EXTRA chocolate drizzle.. I have been drinking these for more than 2 years..I know how they are supposed to look. Everytime I get it, it's barely got drizzle..let alone EXTRA drizzle...  yet they charge me for extra on both cups..also, this morning, after handing me my drinks, the lady closed her window and turned away from me...no receipt.. I'm just done being ripped off!  I'm pressed for time in the morning..thats why I get fast food...because its fast.. I'm going to go again in the morning.. This time, I WILL say something..if they try this again.. I am not usually one to make a scene... but like I said..I'm done being ripped off!

This McDonald's has gone through a remodel, which seems totally unnecessary. It was kinda cute and old timey before, now it's just another modern boxy place with no personality. With the new decor, they've added the self-order kiosks. Whoever thought THIS was a good idea was just wrong. Ordering is confusing, and there's more room for error. We ordered a breakfast sandwich meal, two burritos and an extra hash brown. The order was brought out and the server said, no, we hadn't ordered the extra hash brown. A bad argument when the receipt clearly said a meal and then the hash brown with an additional charge. The burritos, which are normally really good, we're hard and dry. All in all, not a pleasant morning experience. Gotta say, McDonald's, technology has its place, but this isn't it. If it's a cost cutting move, bite the bullet and hire some good people instead.
Why do they have two drive thru if they are only going to use one. I wait it three cars to then take my order it's that okay?
Always mess up my order. I just got water in my drink instead of soda. When I called to inform them they told me their machine was broken. They never gave me an option. Rude customer service.

OMG! I've done had it with this McDonald's. I Live 3mins alway And go Here probably 4-5 times a week. I order the same stuff almost every-time; large drink, 3pack of chocolate cookies. Okay so everytime I go it's a night after 9 or later. I went last night and bought cookies why they burnt my cookies. The customer service at night there is just poor. Disappointed will never ever go back here again. Hurry and reopen Arden n Watt McDonald's Please
Don't EVER GO HERE!  wait at least 20-30 minutes in drive thru. the customer service is terrible, they always fu** the order up, and them bitches that work there are rude!

Unhappy with their happy meal.   I got my daughter a 4 piece chicken nugget happy meal and they totally got skimped out on her fries and they didn't do anything about it when I showed them the fries...    Long line Skimpy fries Bad customer service

I went through the drive thru to get some breakfast and ate it in my car in the parking lot. When I was finished eating I went back inside to refill my drink. The manager stopped me and was really rude. He told me something about as soon as you leave the dining room you can no longer get a drink refill. I explained to him what what happened but he either didn't understand me or didn't care.  These people are tripping over dollars to pick up nickels because I have eaten here every day since I've been working next door at the Guitar Center.  I will not be returning nor would I recommend anyone else to come here.
This McDonald's by far is the worst McDonald's I could ever go to there's always some type of issue with the drive-through at night... Poorly understaffed For a Friday Saturday night

I was asked to order, I place my order, and then I was asked a second time to place my order. You people want $15go to college and get a degree do you people do not deserve more than minimum-wage this is not a career job

During rush hour the food is always fresh . One thing to note is that during 12AM-1AM, they are always rebooting their system which means they can only accept cash. I hope that eventually the McDonald's franchise finds a fix for this but for now I suggest people always bring a little bit of cash just in case they get stuck in the cash only time frame.

Worst customer service! The girls there are always rude, giving dirty looks, poor customer service, like say thank you or something ? The girl  messed up my order and when ( I apologized) I said I wanted the chocolate instead of the mocha she got mad and gave me a little attitude and handed me my card and receipt back in a aggressive way. It's not my fault your job sucks because you work at mcdonalds, go get a big girl job like the rest of us. I get that some customers will make you angry and you have a bad day but that doesn't mean you have to project that anger on other customers.

I handed my cup to an employee tonight for a refill and instead of grabbing it around the cup like a normal person she grabbed it with a "claw" hand shape and put two fingers inside my cup...... Are you stupid? Who does that? I get it, it's McDonalds, but still I feel like thats basic to having a brain and working in the food industry. As if McDonalds employees didn't already have a bad name.

If I could give 0 starts I would. Called because I wanted to order about 8 large fries for a company potluck, I called and the said they couldn't help pre-order since people don't always show. Fine, I understood that. So then I ordered through the app only to find out that they don't actually start your order until your there. So then what's the point of the app? When I walked inside, the workers were clueless about the app and it worked. They kept asking if I ordered it correctly, showed several workers my order and that had it not only been completed but I had a reciept number. Showed them the number and the location for pick up which had their location listed. The front cashier kept asking a lady in the back what to do and they insisted the order wasn't processed. ChArged my card, did not include my discount I got on the app. And less than a  minute later, my order which was purchased through the app was called. I let the cashier know this was exactly what I said would happen. She then spoke to the same lady in the back who began trying to say it was the order I just paid for( not on the app) even though her own employee tried showing her she was wrong. After finalizing that it indeed was the app order she just told the cashier to give me a refund and did not have any othe concerns- no sorries from her even though it was clearly their fault. There was a line building and building and I was so embarrassed. I just took my fries, and let th cashier no that this was a terrible experiencing and that I'd be reaching to corporate. I just hope this never happens to anyone else.

I went to this McDonald's today for the first time since they completely remodeled the store.  5 stars for interior cleanliness and for the new, modern decor.  However, I was less than pleased with the new do-it-yourself touch-screen order kiosks.  I consider myself a fairly intelligent person but the order screens were very confusing.  There is no "finish order" button when you're ready to check out.  Instead, it says "add to order" which, to me, would mean "add something else to your order", as in add another product to what you have already ordered.  I had to summon help from one of the associates which was embarrassing and frustrating since I was in a hurry.  Even though I only live a few blocks away, I don't think I'll be visiting here again except to go through the drive-thru.  I don't think a customer should have to do the work themselves when ordering.  What next...cook your own food?

This is the McDonald's that I always go to because it's the closest one. It's nice inside, kid friendly and very creative. The customer service can do better. How about more smiles? Some workers there act like robots who don't want to be there. The food service inside is fast, but the drive-thru is always a pain. Almost every time I go through the drive-thru, they have me and my boyfriend wait in the parking lot for such a long time. Once we waited 15-20 minutes for my caramel frappe...that should take no longer than 5, and they weren't even that busy. Other than that, McDonald is mcdonalds.

What the fuck. I go through the drive thru and they tell me they can only take cash, but by that time there's already people behind me soo I'm stuck.. I get up to the first window and there's no one here so I go to the second to ask nicely if I can order there and the bitch says no! Literally wasted so much of my time I should have gotten free food! I even scrounged up some quarters ready to pay cash and she wouldn't do it! Like at least let me order and pull to the side but No! Fuck her! Fuck that shitty McDonald's customer service!

I have only ever been through the drive thru at this location so I'll express my review based on that alone. They have one of those spilt drive thrus that allow you to make the choice of right or left. Two different paths. Where will each one take you? In a quantum physics sort of way, each path could lead to to a different life. Different experiences. The choice is yours. However, this is micky Ds. So it's all good. Breakfast is good and they are quick. One employee here in the morning is super friendly. I like when he is working. The number 2 and number 4 are the right choices. Just like when you choose the left drive thru and now all your wildest dreams are coming true. All those poor souls who took the right side. They are now jobless and sad. Come here for breakfast.

So much for a grand opening.  I live just down the road; they sent neighbors coupons for their grand opening, so I thought I check it out (most of the coupons weren't worth the trip though.  Anyways, I went there on a Sunday evening; the actual restaurant looks cool, but the drive-thru was pretty confusing with two ordering-lanes merging into each other - interesting idea but first drive-thru experience was seriously lame.  After managing to merge into the main lane after ordering, and without pissing off members of the other drive-thru lane, I get to the first window and some dude who may as well been stoned, looked a bit confused and said something like 'what did you order'?  Oh boy..  Eventually he gets it and paid.  I get to the food pick-up window and lo and behold, another confused employee, quickly joined by a third, who then said to pull out front and they'll bring me my order.  Ok, lame.  Then it took almost ten minutes for someone to come out and give me my order, and he looked annoyed.  Ok.  So about 25 minutes since entering the place I leave.  I think well, I'm friggin pissed, they wasted my time, I'll do the online survey.  During the survey I said yes, have someone contact me.  Coincidence or not, they never called but all of a sudden, and for like two weeks now I've been getting called everyday on my celly from a couple insurance companies.  Coincidence?  Either way, McDonald's Grand Opening at Howe/Arden, epic fail... won't be returning.

The one time I come to get food late night, the service was horrible. First we were greeted order when your ready. Then when they read our order back everything looked good, but when we received the order. They had forgotten 20 of our 40 piece nuggets and the mcchickens were poorly made and fell apart after one bite. Really upset that the service wasn't friendly and the cashier on the drive thru didn't even look at us when taking our card. That's bad customer service, I should know since I've worked in fast food for 2 years.

These assholes hung up on us when we asked about coming back because they charged us for 4 burgers 2 fries gave us 2 burgers 2 fries.. the face that they hung up is the problem the integrity ..  I'm a person!! You rude as little bitches!!!

Ive been here a few times, always use the drive thru. Arden-Arcade, is just overrun with homeless people, and beggars. I decided to write this review based on going through the drive thru the other night. I want to say, it was like 2 am. I just ordered a Double Cheeseburger, and a coke. The Cheeseburger, was so fresh, I couldn't believe it. I have been eating at McDonalds for 40 years, Ive never had a burger that good, from McDonalds.

Stopping by to grab a late night snack. Having a bad experience I reported to customer service and in return received a call from Sheri. She is one of the sweetest ladies ever! (refreshing after the manager from the night before) I will be coming back to this McDonalds knowing that management cares about their customers and put forth and effort to keep them. Thank you again Sheri for changing my attitude about this McDonalds!
Hello my friendz!! Super busy Mc D's!! This location is not my normal one. But, as busy as they are,,,,the staff ROCKS!!

Received incomplete order. Tried calling. Was hung up on after 3 rings. Called back and let ring for 17 seconds. No answer. Filed out survey. Explained issue. Still nothing. This was weeks ago. Rip off.
Clean bathroom clean tables and food was fresh customer service was great I much enjoyed the atmosphere

So bad. Horrible service extremely rude. Not only that but they forgot my sauce gave us the wrong toy, boy not girl, awfull awfull awfull. The chicken nuggets were burnt to a crisp and one of the soda machines was broken and after letting them know they didn't bother to fix it.
Love the location it near my place. Also you can't go wrong with the sausage biscuit.
The food was good, hot, and fresh. The tables, chairs and floor were clean and someone was around wiping tables and picking up garbage. Staff was friendly and bathrooms were clean.

Stopped in to grab a quick burger. I ordered a Big Mac meal. The hamburger patties were paper thin and tasted like cardboard. Its been awhile since I had ordered and tasted a Big Mac. I must say I will not be ordering this burger at this location ever again. I don't know if this is the new McDonald's way of making a burger or if it is only this location. All I know is the burger was barely edible.
Only two stars for the food and the cool architecture of the building. The cleanliness and hospitality was not there!!!

This location is really cool because it has some cool decorative pieces inside, like a dinosaur playing key-tar.  But the service here is just plain rude.  My last visit was on a weekday around 2:00 p.m. and there were a couple people eating, but I was the only person about to order.  The woman working would not let me look at the menu and kept rushing me to order.  I know it's fast food, but I wanted to take a look at what the menu had to offer- especially since I rarely ever go to McDonalds.  Food is pretty much the same as any other. But I probably won't be back any time soon.
Stopped by to grab a quick snack and use the restroom,  I had a quarter with cheese and it was the best one I have had in a long time.  Service was friendly and fast.

So the other night my friends and I went to this McDonald's around midnight. We tried ordering some of those chicken wrap things and they told us that they didn't have any more chicken due to their night menu. We changed the order to breakfast burritos and ordered a bunch of other stuff too. We got to the window and paid got our food and drove off. We got to my friends apartment and realize that they didn't give us our burritos! We called them and they said they would give them to us if we went back. Luckily my friend lives just down the road. But we ended up wasting like another half hour trying to retrieve the burritos they didn't give us.
Horrible service. Nasty location. Messed up on the food made it super disgusting and when I called offered no help. Super lame
This McD is kinda crazy, saw a domestic dispute or something here. No physical fighting, just elevated voices and baby mama shit.

I go to this location every Wednesday at the drive thru! Each time I've ordered 3 OATMEAL cookies why is it I get 3 chocolate chip cookies?! If I wanted chocolate chip I would have asked for it! I speak English well and I don't stutter when I order but for some reason these idiot employees cannot comprehend my order! Today 9.28.16 I spoke with the so called supervisor named Bon/Von or whatever his name is and was not apologetic at all nor did he offer to rectify the situation!!! He told me if I didn't like how I was treated I should go to another store and out of the 1,000's of customers I'm the ONLY one who complains! Well hell if my order was correct then I wouldn't have to complain now would I?! Anyway I will call the corporate office and ask why they employ these persons who can't speak English nor have any idea how to provide good customer service to the people that frequent their restaurant!!! I've gone there 5 or 6 times and each time my order has been incorrect and it's a simple matter of cookies, even a 1st grader has better comprehension than the employees that work there! This is what happen also when they just hire anybody and everybody to work there esp people who have limited English abilities!!! I'm from another country but when I came here I practiced my English speaking skills and why TF should Spanish be an option anywhere?! That's complete BS!!! If you come to America the least you could do is conform and learn the language here not the other way around! But anyway I won't be going to this McDonald's cos I'm afraid if I ask for a burger I might actually get my oatmeal cookies finally since they can't understand!!!! Bwuahahaha  I'm done

Came through the drive thru around midnight. My girlfriend ordered a Big Mac, got home and ate it. At the end we discovered there was a DEAD FLY INSIDE THE BOX!!!!!! It was disgusting!! They should make sure all containers are clean and not filled with infested insects!!!! I do not recommend this place ever

I will admit that I went at a particularly early hour (5 in the morning), but I had ordered a number 6 and a plain unsweetened ice tea. The Iced Tea was sweetened so I requested a new one. The lady at the window started arguing with me and told me it wasn't sweetened. Honestly, it's not hard to taste the 3 bags of sugar they use in it. Anyways, she traded out my drink and gave me the right one. When we got home the fries were cold and unsalted and my burger was wrong with extra mayo when I asked for none.
Yes it's a McDonald's, but comparing apples to apples this is a solid McDonald's. Friendly and quick service... What more are you looking for.... 2 lane drive through?  Oh yeah they deliver.
This McD's is quite busy given its location, so I always go through the drive-thru to get my usual Diet Coke.

It's located near Arden Fair Mall.    Great place to grab lunch/breakfast if you are in a hurry - The drive thru is always busy, BUT the lines go really fast.    The surrounding area is sketchy - I would not eat inside the restaurant.  On my first visit, I noticed the place was not so clean, but had plenty of seating space.    There is also a statue of Ronald McDonald near the ordering area.

I ordered a cheeseburger from this place once, it was midnight and I had the  munchies. When I unwrapped the burger, I was shocked to discover that the hamburger was raw. How is this possible? I didn't know the meat was real to begin with =/ Anyway, it's located in a busy area and the decor is old timey, very unique. Their iced coffee is decent so there's hope for this place.   BTW they recently inflated a gigantic Ronald on top of their building and it's kind of creepy o_O
Fast service!! As soon as we pulled up to the window our order was ready. Everything was fresh and good. I can appreciate that 6 am with hardly any time to spare :)

I don't know if no stars is an option.  Service here is non-existent.  You have to charge me 2 dollars extra for produce......really???  Please boycott this McDonald's.  The service the prior week should have told me that when I went through the drive thru and they messed up my wrap.  Went in and they remade it only to make a stock wrap wrong again...third times a charm I guess..  no apology no nothing....so after my second horrible experience I would ask that everyone bans together and boycott this McDonald's.

best one in sac every other mcdonalds makes my milkshakes wrong one time i ordered a chocolate shake at watt and arden and they gave me a shake that was vanilla and had a slight drizzle of chocolate syrup i think? so in love with this mcdonalds staff is dope food is best quality and ive ordered pretty much everything from here so yeah go here

Thought I'd try their iced coffees that I hear them raving about on the radio. Big mistake! I ordered a hazel nut iced coffee and they gave me a regular iced coffee. I thought I'd try it anyway since I was running late for work.  When I got to work and tried the coffee there was some weird slimy thing in there. I think they gave me some old coffee and just added ice and creamer to it! Totally disgusted and will not be ordering their coffees ever again!!!

Me and my friends came through this drive thru this morning to get some food before a road trip. And they were extremely rude. I asked the cashier for change for two tens and she just grabbed my money and snapped at me. Then the lady who gave us our food did not put it in nicely, didn't offer hot sauce which they normally do, and threw the food at us! When I told her she forgot my orange juice she told me I was wrong so I pulled out the receipt to show her and she just threw the receipt back at me and gave me two orange juices without saying anythinf. I told her thank you and she sneered and closed the window. I work food service i know how it can be but there was NO REASON to act like this at all. Those girls had no room being in the position they were in
Fast and clean here.  I love the interior decorations.
They're the only McDonald's in the area that isn't a big bag of douche and charge extra if you want more condiments like BBQ sauce.  Fuck yeah!

Regardless of your view of their food or corporate policies, one has to agree that this place is amazing. They have a GIANT dinosaur (!) sculpture singing into a mic and wearing an Elvis costume ...all in the middle of their diningroom. You MUST see it.
Really nice customer service!! Food gets out fast and the decor is very interesting. For a McDonald's it's really nicely managed
so they called me on my answering machine to offer a free meal and never heard from them again....why dont they just send me a free voucher in the mail...head quarters has it on file.

Visited again today at 5:40 AM after swearing this location off for over a year in favor of the much faster location on College Town Drive. I didn't get out of the drive through with my McGriddle breakfast combo until 5:55 AM. There were only 3 cars ahead of me. As mentioned previously, this location is PAINFULLY slow in their drive-thru, and in the year since my last visit, they appear to have not only not improved, but they've gotten worse. "We're waiting for hash browns" is what I was told when I pulled up to the window. Come on, it's breakfast, and every one of your combo meals comes with hash browns. Try and prepare a little ahead of time, for crying out loud.

One word: Horrible.    But at least there's convenience right?  I'm certain that jumping off a 5,000 cliff is a convenient way of getting to the bottom of a cliff too, but I'd rather not do that and live a few years longer by taking a healthier direction.  Same analogy applies with McDonalds.  Next time read the nutritional information.  Then, compare that nutritional information to the nutritional information for toilet water and note the similarities.  Like the Bubonic Plague, McDonald's establishments are still spreading about.  No one seems to care about putting out this fire.  Maybe we're too blinded by the yellow to even recognize a fire if it were burning a mushroom cloud over Arco Arena.  You ever catch yourself driving on a freeway looking for something yellow?  If you have, reflect on that moment and admire the fact at how this Corporation has altered your thinking habits.  Should you one day rear-end a car in traffic because of glancing to the left or right shoulder, in deadly tule fog, for a "golden arches" sign, strongly reflect on that.  This commercial has been brought to you by Common Sense.

Overall, I had a pretty pissy or crappy experience in more ways than one.  There were homeless circling like sharks all around the store.  There was another one filling up a water jug inside mumbling loudly at the staff.  There was only one cashier, so I had to wait a long time to order as well as getting my food.  There were children screaming and running around the dining room.  My food was hot and delicious, but it didn't make up for the otherwise crappy visit.  I went to use the restroom before I left, and there was dried piss all over the toilet seat and dried crap stuck to the inside of the toilet bowl.  I would strongly recommend going to the McDonald's on Watt & Arden or the McDonald's near Fair Oaks & Howe instead of this location.

Last time i ate here i got sick. I asked for mustard and they tried to charge me 50 cents. What kind of bs is that. I have never heard of being charged for mustard anywhere or sauce for that matter. I wont eat at any McDonalds again.

Dropped by here after going to the Arden Fair mall, Love the inside of this Mcdonalds, BUT it doesn't compare to the Mcdonalds where i live, in Chicago, the one in downtown two floors, made out of GLASS! it's badass, check it out!
Pretty shady looking McDonalds. Hasn't really changed since I was a kid and I used to be afraid of the shark hanging on the wall.

Decent food for a mcdonalds (which isn't saying much) but the manager here is ridiculous.  When you ask for ranch (which I'm obsessed with), she says "50 cents or you can trade in your ketchup".  Can McDonalds really not afford a ranch cup on my $7 premium angus meal?
Very convenient to Arden Way and the drive thru has 2 seperate lines to drive thru.

Well it's McD's.. what can I say?! I love the one in Antelope on Walegra (the staff that is- in the DAYTIME) and I have ordered the Sausage McMuffin, hold the sausage add the bacon from the Antelope location for quite some time now with no problems. One day the line was long in antelope and this one is close to work so I figured I will stop by and get my "bacon mcmuffin".. WELL .. I drive up and place my "special" order and I hear "We cant do that".. What do you mean you can't do that hold that big greasy sausage and throw in some bacon.. really? Freakin charge me more I NEED MY BACON MCMUFFIN! Nope they were refusing. I was so sad. FINALLY... they said yes except I got a lecture to go along with my muff on how they dont do this, every McD's is a franchise ..different owners blah blah blah... WELL they must have called the Antelope location because less then a week later they told me the SAME THING?! WTF.. I have been getting this for months and now gone? no more? REALLY?! I know I know.. just STFU and order something on the menu. No.. this is not the point people! It's a rant and I want my bacon mcmuffin! I plan to call McD's corporate and demand to have them add this shit to their menu! Until then their breakfast burritos aren't half bad. Oh ...and I guess their staff is pretty nice here too. WHATEVER! :)

I haven't eaten a McDonalds hamburger in 20 years, because I find them disgusting. However, I do enjoy a good fillet o'fish, a small fries and a light lemonade. Their premium chicken strips are good too, and their salads are yummy and fairly nutritious.  If you eat at Mickey D's frequently, and supersize, you are not doing your body any favors, but all things in moderation.
One of the best steak house in the world very delicious the sauce that comes on the steakhouse as good as ever thank you McDonald's

The people in this McDonald's really don't care. They live because they are lazy. Went into order in Oreo Mc frappe they said they don't even have such a thing. That's funny because on the McDonald's website it says that there is such thing. I will post the pictures since the idiots  can't figure out how to make it next time.

Late night drive threw, food sucked(burger was dry fries tastes old), it is fast food didn't expect much, however, nuggets come with sauce, preferably sweet and sour like I ask, but to put none in the bag, again?! Yes this has happened multiple times, I should have checked yes, but still, dry nuggets suck
Coffee was watered down.  You can hardly taste the coffee. We asked them to make a new one and it was still watered down.

Ugh orderd from you guys yesterday the 2 big Mack$5 and a med fry for my son and I around 2pm,and that's all we had to eat until dinner,but we didn't make it to dinner because we got sick from your food,food poisoning ,never again at this location,ugh and we live right down the street,never again,blah your food
Nasty ass tables dont even have clean sanitized towels to clean them! This is what $10 an hour gets u

I literally sat in the drive through for 27 minutes. When I told the girl at the drive-through window, that I was extremely unhappy and that I was going to leave a negative review, she simply stated "that's fine it's not my fault." If you have ANY time restriction, like...oh, I don't know, maybe you're picking up breakfast on the way to work... Pick another place!

This location is the absolute worst in Sacramento the food is usually cold the fries are old if you order a meal with cheese you may not get it in short unless you are desperate and no means of transportation do not!! Visit this location. I wish yelp had a minus star option.
Slowest drive-through in the West. Staff seems completely unequal to the task of making food and accepting money. If I could give less than one star, I sure would.

I orderd medium coffee, 2 burritos and 2 pairs of mcgriddles. It took them 10minutes to nake my food. I was number 207, they called 208-210 first. They should have let me know that I was waiting for my food. I was there standing. They gave me my coffee two minutes before they gave me my food. Just a tip: let the customers know that they have to wait if it's already like 5 min waiting.
To all these people with bad reviews here, get a life it's McDonald's they are all practically the same. And if you can tell the difference between locations you probably eat way to much crap.
This has to be the slowest drive through I've ever been trapped in! Been sitting here for over ten minutes.

Came around 12:20 am to the drive through. We saw workers but no one was saying anything so I guess they're not open until 2:00 am. The workers saw us, so they could have at least told us they weren't open instead of just watching us sit there for 10 minutes.

So, there was some gay dude idk if he was gay but he sounded like it. Anyways, he was a total dick hole and had hella sass. Idc if he had a bad day, idc if you're sassy when you're tired (1 in the morning), but you need to chill out. "Yknow were closing soon sooo.... uhhh.. Yeah." Ohhh. "Uh yeah?" Okay giiiirl.  Don't be a little twat. Where's your customer service @? I didn't do nothing to you. Maybe Im having a bad day too??? #nohardfeelingsonthesexualitybecauseimgay

Worst place ever! Rude and dirty. They let three cars go ahead of me because their speaker was broken on the other lane! They had CAMERAS of course! Got to the window and there's napkins and shake mix everywhere! Disgusting!
Worst service ever!! Slow they never get your order right! Some of the employees just standing around when theirs a line...
Service is slow they don't always have what you want and a lot of times they're out of various items and the drive thru takes forever
I waited 20 mins in drive thru. Never going back. The girls in the back were just talking away with the window open not working at all!!

Is there less than 1 star.  How do buns get so smashed ?   The food is thrown together and not even wrapped completely.  Transients pester you in a Long. Long line.  Dining room closed.  I can see employees chatting on phones while waiting for order.  The order comes screwed up.  I tried to call them am it just rang.  I wish I had one of the phone numbers of the employees (not working)  I was so irritated I called corporate.  Mailbox was full.  Big joke.  Lousy quality and evening/night staff do not care.

I was here last week due to a funeral.  It was a bit past midnight and I was next door buying gas.  Since I was slightly hungry, I decided to buy a snack.  I waited at the drive thru menu (where you place an order) for roughly 5 minutes before someone answered me from the other side.  I quickly placed my order and went straight to the cashier window.  Paying was a breeze but as soon as I got to the other window to pick up my food, no one was there.  I waited another 5 minutes until someone (cashier) came to hand me my food.  In terms of food, it was just ok.  My McChicken was pretty dry.  You can definitely taste that they use processed meat and the meat has been sitting there for a while.  I don't mind processed meat but a little extra mayo would save it from being inedible.  Customer serve was so-so.  It was past midnight on a Tuesday night and the cashier didn't seem too happy.  There was no "Hi, how are you tonight?".  I totally understand what the cashier was going through so I decided not to dock them any stars for customer service.

Service wasn't bad The restaurant however, was filthy. I know McDonald's isn't exactly a fancy restaurant but they could at least keep the place clean. I don't think anybody likes eating in filth. Oh and the bathrooms were disgusting. There was literally a tampon on the floor.
Worst drive thru McDonald's I've ever been to!! Git our order wrong & made it our fault! Then they forgot our drinks!! NEVER come here!!!!!

This is the worst McDonalds I've been to. I was in the drive thru and the people in front of me knew the worker I guess and were ordering so much free stuff. So I had to turn off my car because they were taking so long. She finally realized I was next and told them to roll back around so she can give me my food. So when I got my food she didn't give me 10 of my nuggets and the sandwich was like hard fried chicken skin. Never going here again.

I ordered a happy meal for my daughter at the drive through around 6:40pm . the African American young lady at the second window was  in a bad mood and had horrible customer service . She handed my boyfriend a milk and he said oh we ordered an apple juice. She looked annoyed rolled her eyes and got an apple juice. she said not one word the whole time. I said have a good day and she just turned around. I was an assistant manager at a restaurant  for 5 years I get it. You may not like your job. But At least fake a smile and say hi.

I love fast food, but at this particular location, one half of my burger patty was so tough that I could not bite through it. Also the biggest rat I've ever seen ran through the parking lot. So gross.

Ive been coming to this McDonald's all my life they mess up my order sometimes and some of the workers are a little rude but I don't believe I'm going back to this McDonald's again because today I order a big breakfast with hot cakes and when I opened the breakfast platter I lifted one pancake and their was a big live spider under one of the pancakes I'm just overall disgusted and don't wish to go back
Food is disgusting, service is even worse and the location is just the icing on the cake. Then, again it's McDonald's. Can't expect too much.

Just stopped for a lemonade. A young woman working the counter accidentally let another family in front of me not realizing that I was there before them. As they were ordering, two others joined the family and placed their orders ahead of me.  After they finally finished (complete with special orders and special requests), I stepped forward and ordered a small lemonade. The Young lady (Samantha) said "I'm so sorry that was my fault and you stood here waiting just for that.  $1.09 please" I handed her $2.  She gave me a cup and my &2 back and said "we want you to be sure and come back again next time!"  I will.  Thanks for making my day with a gesture of kindness Samantha!

These workers do not know how to properly help a customer. I had to repeat my order four times to the Drive-thru rep, and he still didn't get it correct. I ordered a #7, which comes with a 10-piece chicken McNuggets, fries, and a drink. Doesn't sound too hard, does it? Instead I received a 10-piece chicken McNuggets and a drink...no fries. When I called to confirm that the meal came with fries, the rep that answered the phone said it did. So I went back inside and received another round of terrible customer service. They blamed me for ordering incorrectly and would not give me my fries, but instead told me I had to pay extra for them.   Instead of trying to make the issue right, I was blamed for ordering incorrectly. I asked for the number to corporate and instead was directed to call a customer hotline. I asked for the manager's name, he said, "My name is Jose." I asked him for a pen. He said, "I don't have one. You will just have to remember it." Then he turned and left without resolving the issue. So I called both the customer hotline and the corporate hotline.   If you want your food to be correct, the right price, and have a good customer experience, then I recommend eating at any other McDonald's!!!

I ordered threw the drive threw and had asked if they had a certain toy for the boy happy meal she said she would tell the second window. I would order the happy meal only if they had the toy I needed so it would not help for me to know at the second window because they do not allow you to change or add to the order once you pass the first window. I proceeded to the second window and no one knew what they had finally a young man came and told me exactly the toys they had and while he was still letting me know the information the manager yelled at the employee various times to get to the other side. The worst I have seen at a McDonalds. Employees should be treated with respect.

Went to this location (through the drive-thru) since the baby gidget was hungry and we had to wait on a refill of a med at the RA location.  She had a hankering for a McChicken and fries.    I do not have any kind of gourmet expectations since it is fast food.  But I would expect the food to be at least fresh and not over seasoned.   The chicken was seriously dry and overcooked.  The fries were over salted.  It was like eating the contents of a salt shaker.    They did get our order correct and they were quick and friendly so will give them two stars for service.

Don't waste your time at this location!!!!  Dear branch manager,  Please replace the whole crews or you will be out of business..... the worst McDonald I have ever experience in the world.   Rude service....  Go to Jack in the Box across the street!!!!

Came here recently through the drive thru slappin the song "2 On" by Tinashe & the cashier looked at me saying, "I like it, I like it...."  lmao  Depending on the workers, your order can be right or wrong, always double check in front of them. Couple of times they accidentally gave me fish bites instead of nuggets. Can't blame them though they're probably new people.

I've gone multiple times to this location and the customer service are always very nice. Their food is cooked correctly. I've gone to three locations of McDonald's around this area and this is the best one. The others uncook either the fries or the nuggets. I'm definitely a regular of this location!

I don't have high standards for fast food. Just be fast, hot, and edible.  This McDonald's is THEEEEE worst! Awful. They are slow and always get my order wrong. Always! Even after I have them repeat the order back, it comes out wrong.  I only ate here cuz it's two minutes from my house. From now on, I'll go a few more blocks down Fruitridge to the next McDonald's.
Bad!Bad!Bad! I just got a Big breakfast. The egg is overcook. The pancakes are cold. The whole meal just like leftovers. The worst experience ever!

I've gotten so many Bic Mac's here, they should know the sound of my voice already.   It's probably the only McD's in my area that gets my order right, the only problem I have is the make me wait sometimes for a single meal in the reserved parking when they can just have me wait at the window.

I wouldn't step foot in this McDonald's location if it wasn't so close to my house. You may as well think that all McD's locations are the same, but they're not. This has to be one of the worst of all. The service isn't that great. As I recall, I got yelled at by a cashier and for what? I tried to buy a gift card for my Dad and she promptly yelled, "You need to pay cash! We don't accept cards for gift card payments!" What? Since when was that a rule? I bought a gift card at one in West Sacramento and they were more than fine with me paying with my debit card. She almost made it seem like I was committing fraud or something. Totally rude and unprofessional. I was going to buy food as well, but I just left. On top of that, this place is a haven for homeless people, given that is right on Stockton Blvd and Fruitridge. Ah indeed, it would be certainly strange if you came here and weren't asked for money by a homeless dude/dudette. Not surprisingly, the store isn't all that clean and don't even get me started on the nature of the restrooms. The drive-thru is a hassle as well, because when that mo-do is packed, it's packed to almost the entrance/exit of the parking lot. Of course, in my experience, they've gotten my orders wrong way too many times to count. Whatever training or hiring processes they have going on here, it's not working out very well, that's all I can say.

Always check your food. I got my son a kids meal with apple slices only to go home to find the apples were expired. Yes I called back nunorous times til I got a answer a man named Cedric told me to come back for replacement , did I? no! Have not been to McDonalds since!!!

I thought after roughly 2 years things would change . Came on a Friday night after preparing for my sons 4th birthday to grab a quick bite . Ordered 20 piece nugget meal w/ 2 fries & 2 drinks and 2 double cheese burgers , order came out to be 12.47 exactly . Before I left the window I asked the lady who handed me my food if my sauces were in there , she said yes ! Came home and no freakn sauce ! Called the store spoke to someone named Lucas who claimed to be a supervisor . He said he would replace my entire meal since they lacked customer service . I asked if I had to bring my receipt and he said no as long as I remember his name it should be ok . I told him I would not be able to come back until Sunday ( today ) . Went through drive thru and ordered ( mind you this is an exact replica of my original original , which they messed up on ) . Went to the first window and I mentioned that I'm picking up a replacement confirmed by Lucas . A lady named " Tracy " came over to the window claiming to be a supervisor and I handed her the order number paper I had ( I tossed the receipt ) and she asked me to pull up the 2nd window . Waited at the 2nd window and she comes up and says according to Lucas the 20 piece was just the nuggets and not the meal . I told her I no longer had the receipt but I do recall using my debit card so I pulled up the transaction . She said even if I was to prove that I had the exact amt debited from my account the day I called and spoke to Lucas she would only be able to accommodate the 20 piece and the 2 cheeseburgers .
