She said without a receipt it didn't do any justice. I could not believe what I was hearing ! Bc I don't keep all fast food receipts in my damn purse and although I could prove I paid the exact amount 2 days prior , she couldn't help me . She said it's written in the it "policy " . I ended up paying the different for my 2 medium fries and 2 large drinks but I am not done here ! I will be contacting cooperate to advise of my horrible experience once again . This place only gets my services bc it's so close to home and my son occasionally likes to be treated to fries and nuggets . I am stunned and appalled that although I could prove my purchase she only confirms with " he said she said " . To Lilly yesenia and Tracy who work the night shift at this McDonald's , I hope the 10.50$ an HR you're making does you justice bc I'm not done here . You will hear from me . On a side note atleast there wasn't any spit in food

Far the worst McDonald's I've ever been to in Sacramento. I order the Spicy Mc chicken meal both large fries and drink.. vanilla cone..  went through the drive thru.. they forgot to give me my vanilla cone and I only got one spicy Mc chicken. The spicy Mc chicken meal always comes in two burgers not one. I didn't even look in the bag when I got everything because I was in a rush to go somewhere. By the time I got to my destination I decided to open my bag up and only got one burger. I was disappointed because now I had to drive back to complain. I also called them before I went back but they didn't pick up their phone. Which was far more irritating because I have to drive another 10 minutes back from where I was. I gave it a 3 because this is the first time it ever happened.  And I also have friends who works in there. But I will go back just to give them another chance.

Out of my whole experience in my life with McDonalds, I would have to, hands down, say my worst experiences have been at this one. I'm not sure if it's because it's a sign that you shouldn't be eating here but really I just come for the dollar coffee because I don't really like Seattle's best brand and order an actual food item from time to time. But at this particular location they either a. Always mess up my order, b. Run out of whatever I am going to order, Or c. The staff is so rude. Or best case scenerio: be a combination of all 3.  My fault for coming here quite frequently, I guess I should just stop being cheap and take my business elsewhere to ensure that they are stocked on their product. Lesson learned.
I agree with everyone else! This has been a bad mcdonalds. The food is always wrong the service is lacking and the employees are quite rude. I've been to way better mcdonalds out there
Bad service. Lacks quality, even for a McDonald's I expected a little more. The places smells like pee! Do I need to say more?
How easy to run over and grab a large Diet Coke while getting gas at the Valero next door.  I especially like the large ice cubes here as it doesn't melt as fast and water down the soda.

Oh hell no this is the worst mc donalds i've ever been to. tried it twice because the first time the fries werent fresh and was hoping next time it would be better but no.. the fries are never fresh and the food is just crap.. now a good mc donalds thats always fresh would be in elk grove area.. so what makes the food worse here? never came back here and still never will.

Nice enough people but poor service. Three times my drive through order has been incomplete. Always a long line with slow window times. Unless you have lots of time to waste and a small order that you can check while still at the window, you're better off finding another location.

It was 9am Christmas morning when I visited - needing a take-out breakfast for a friend who had been working since 6am with no refreshment.  While no McDonalds boasts Cordon Bleu food, it will do when needs must!  The quality is usually consistent, if not quite healthy.  Given that the staff were working on Christmas morning, service was prompt and cheerful, and my only criticism was that they were out of pancake syrup - not good planning for Christmas weekend - but I'm sure that my cardiologist will approve :-)  I try not to visit too often, but nothing on this visit would preclude my return

If I could give this Mcdonalds zero stars then I would. Worst mcdonalds I've ever been to. Both times I went, the employees were very unfriendly and took forever to help my boyfriend and I and both times they messed up our order. Not going back and may complain to the manager.

0 stars for this McDonald's. Everytime I go to the drive thru at night time I wait to order for 10 mins and there's no other car behind me or in front & take for ever to assist me. I have to pull up to the first window to place an order! There always talking instead of being fast

This is the worst McDonaldls I've been to. I go there often because it's cheap and around the corner from my home, but yesterday was the worst. I decided to enter the store because most if the time my drive through order is usually wrong. Well I waited 10 minutes for 2 Mc Doubles. Why 10 minutes? I counted the drive thru cars being served to see if there was a difference. 8 cars were servered in my 10 min wait. Why???!! When I was waiting a gentelman entered the store who's order was also incorrect and waited for a long time to get his meal correct. Why? When I asked a person who looked to be in charge where my 2 Mc Doubles were she told my she didn't know and should ask someone else, instead of helping me the customer. Why? When I was finally fed up (12 min. Into my order) I asked for my money back. The person who said they didn't know anything was the person to refund my money. So it seems to me the manager at the time didn't care about me until money was involved. Why? I have called and complained about this store to the phone number provided at the drive thru yet nothing has changed. Why?  This is an embarrassment to the McDonalds chain, and management of the store.

First time coming to this mcdonalds and I have to say my service was great! The young lady who took my order was very polite and informed me my extra pumps of hazel but will cost extra! Some places won't even tell you! And she let me know they were making me a fresh cup of coffee instead of just making me wait and not know why. I say costumer service is everything

The worst morning crew ever! They are hella slow. They all seem like they hate their jobs. They cant even get hashbrowns or coffee right. One time had egg shells in a sausage mcmuffin. Will never order that ever again.

The only reason I went was too try the chicken mcbites and I had coupons. This is one of the worst McDonalds I've been too. The service was ok from 1 to 10 I give it 4 1/2 . The place smelled like piss and this place is quite ghetto. I'll never come here again .
Wednesday evening, 6:00, supper rush...did well handling the rush but still could have been better. The food quality was adequate.

Before I start with this review about this McDonald's,  im a very patience person and I never complain. However this McDonald's made me ran out of my patience with them.  My boyfriend and I stopped to get breakfast before heading out to South Lake Tahoe and I suggested we ordered inside instead of going through drive thru since there was a long line. We ordered our food and waited for more than 20 minutes.  While I was waiting, i noticed that there wasn't any manager on the floor or saw any manager. Instead there was a white girl who was running the floor and she was scratching her head and touching her hair while she was bagging the sandwiches and hash browns for all of the orders that came up from drive thru. Finally waiting for a good 15-20 minutes, two managers walked in and they immediately took charged and was actually excuting the orders out for front counter. I was glad that the white girl wasn't touching anymore food because that was disgusting.  However, I still didn't receive my order while all of the other customers who ordered after me received theirs.  At this point I was furious and I asked the manager why i haven't receive my orders while everyone else who ordered after me did. I would expect her to apologize and give me my food right away. However she didn't apologize and rudely said that she dont know because she just got on and she walked away. They don't provide good customer service,  enforce the importance of having good hygiene,  no teamwork, no communication, and no leadership to run a business.
My kids love going to Mcdonalds just for the Toys! I always get 3 same toys, they will like to received different toy everytime we got and we will like to have more variety for kids to choose from.
Nice, quite, and clean location. Waiting time is less than 15 minutes, with good customer service. The food is fast food anyways so I don't have much to talk about it.

Significantly improved since the last time. The hours seem to be more consistent in terms of when they close. Just recently, after a long time, they've gotten their Wi-Fi going again. And they seem to process people better during busy times. Very much better than before. Also, for a long time they have had a homeless problem were homeless folks basically camped out in the lobby for hours and hours. Several of them stayed 24/7 with their cars in the parking lot. This McDonald's clearly has done some stuff to address this issue In the last few months including limiting access to  electrical outlets in the restaurant which were magnets to folks coming simply to charge their phones. Way more enjoyable and pleasant place now.

These people need to learn how to work a drive thru faster. All I wanted was some sweet tea but it took 25 minutes with 4 cars in front of me?! Not only that, I get up to the drive thru window and people just refilling the cups and talking to eachother while I'm waiting for my sweet tea which btw is disgusting. I can't even drink it. It just tastes like bitter watered down tea. How do you screw up sweet tea?..   Slow service.  My sweet tea tasted like garbage.  Slow everything.

This McDonald's is so rude and DISGUSTING! For one, drive thru is SO SLOW. I ordered 3 sausage McMuffins this morning and there was a long piece of hair in the food! My sprite tasted like a club soda sprite! Nasty! There's a worker named chu and Candice , they are so rude. I tell them about my food and sprite and they literally tell me that the only way I can get a new one is if I pay for it and than go and talk shit about me behind the counter as I can still hear them! I don't recommend coming here! Take your money elsewhere! If I could rate it 0 I would. Even 1 star is too good for them! I've also heard that there was a few roaches seen in the bathroom just crawling around! That could be in your guys food so watch out!
Less than 1, food is cold and tastes like poo. Literally food is older than my grandma and she passed away when I was 14.... I'm 27 now

My 950th review!  You know, I've actually remember going to McDonald's when I was a little kid back in the 1990s, and I was felt in loved with their Happy Meals every time of every month by giving a complimentary kid's toys and goodies especially for their burger and fries too. 26 years later as of 3/20/2017, I came back to revisit, and it's my first timer by coming to this East Sacramento's location! What does McDonald's do? It's easy because they serve the customers to taste and enjoy their well known fast food goodies from Egg McMuffin, the Big Mac (their signature favorite), delicious French fries, McCafe's coffee and smoothies and many more! The atmosphere and the concept remain the same as most McDonald's has across the world, and as for this location, it is very well spaced, cleanly and neatly without any debris behind.  The employees here are doing a great job for making the customers like me a fine service! Very friendly and approachable! No cons!  Now onto something interestingly good here! I ordered one of their limited time seasonal drink of Shamrock Chocolate Chip Shake in a small sized cup. It contains the remaining amounts of Shamrock ingredients filled with blended chocolate mint pieces and milk. It concludes with a top of whipped cream with colorful green sparkles. As I drank it, that smoothie was sensational! I can feel the flavors of both Shamrock and Chocolate Chip combined into a fantastical, drinkable dessert! Blended perfectly without the remaining chunks of ice cubes. Delightful!  There's a good amount of parking spaces available, so you can park anywhere you want near or far. Also, you can enter thru the drive thru area, so you can order your meals in few minutes. Finally, you can ride a bike, walk or public transportation too without the hassles and gimmicks.  All in all, McDonald's at Folsom Blvd in the East Sacramento neighborhood is the finest and the simplest worldwide franchise fast food restaurant that I've ever experienced. Perfect for all ages from young to old. "I'm lovin' it!" My rating: 4 solid stars.
I went to the Drive-Thru at around 11 a week ago and nobody answered. I went to the next speaker and still nobody answered. This was just awful service in general.

Male Geriatric Daycare 11am to 3pm - DINING AREA - FREE  I was here at 1:30PM on Tuesday afternoon.  Customer service is not the worst I've experienced, but it's pretty close.  No greeting at the counter.  Grumpy workers.  The dining area is dirty and looks like it hasn't been cleaned in several hours.  The worst part for me specifically, are the loud patrons in the back-corner of the lobby.  Every time I've been here around this time, there are 4 to 6 white men (approximately in their 60's & 70's) who sit in the back corner of the lobby.  They are not rude and do not bother me personally, but they are extremely loud and annoying.  I'm on the opposite side of the lobby from them right now and I can hear there entire conversation like they're sitting right next to me.  I'm assuming the Mcdonalds let's them hang out here cause at some point in time perhaps they ordered a food item? I don't know, but literally they are here every time come in.  I always regret coming here every time but I never learn my lesson.  Perhaps this time will finally be my last.

Now that they make the quarter pounder w real beef it takes forever to get through the drive through. The guy in front of me just jumped the curb to get out of line. Also I hate how the fries are so bland now. Back in the day they were good when they used beef tallow.

This is the worst McDonald's ever been to in my life.  I forgot that this was that bad of a McDonald's, and it is the second time I've come here. Fool me once, shame on you, fool me twice shame on me. I give myself one star for coming back here.

McDonald's, I can't quit you.   Lord knows I've tried. Your highly-processed, additive-laced, corporate-laboratory-created, environmentally and ethically appalling "food" has been a staple of my diet ever since I had the spare change and independence to eat on my own. I'm the first to admit my hypocrisy - shaming your mammoth empire and the drug you push while continually coming back for more. In my own warped mind, it only makes sense to review the local store I visit the most as some sort of compromise.   What's refreshing about this McDonald's is the human element. You may be ordering a carbon copy of the same assembly line "food" you could get anywhere else, but it's refreshing when the human being serving it expresses kindness and a personality. Those manning the drive-thru have always been quite friendly, even when lines of hangry borderline diabetics impatiently honk and rev their engines as they await their next fix.   This is also one of the cleaner McDonald's. I've been to other locations (namely the one off Alhambra) whose "dining areas" look like they were abandoned or turned into a makeshift homeless shelter. Here, the employees seem to at least take some pride in keeping everything clean.   It's enough to keep me coming back, health and personal values be damned.

I don't know about this place it looks just like every other remodeled McDonald's but the stuff here is amazing their service is  amazing. They did my order so fast that I when I poured my soda and was about to be seated, they called my number. I was amazed my their speed. Their workers do understand what is the teamwork

Terrible service. Almost very order was wrong, the poor girl at the register had no help. The line was out the door, and when she asked for help they tolf er the til was elpty. The girl in the grill area was in an argument with the drivethru runner.  Took us over 15 mins to get to the register to order. And another 20min to get our food. We ordered 3 hamberger happy meals and 4 mc doubles...  We had to walk back up to ask where out order was.. when we got out order it was wrong!  what was so difficult about our order to take so long.     Terrible terrible service

Easily one of the worst drive thrus. Horrible service, you'd think the manager would be better, nope. Waited in line 25 minutes only for them to say their mobile service wasn't working and then had the audacity to get mad once we asked to order since we had waited so long already. Then took about 30 minutes to get our food to us. Save yourself the trip and go to the next McDonald's.

If you are going to spend the money to remodel then keep it clean. Really dirty. Soda machines have slimey stuff on them. Tables, chairs not wiped down. Slow service. Out of buttermilk nuggets at 12:15 pm. Orders wrong. Won't come back to this one.

They were super rude. I asked for fresh everything, and normally Mc Donald's would put it on the screen but this one didn't and when I asked if my food was fresh, the response was "we always make it fresh" with an attitude and little did you know when they hand me my food NOTHING WAS FRESH. Fries were super soggy and overly salty. Disappointed. I normally don't Yelp but Jesus Christ that was a horrible experience.

I come here on Fridays after class to grab breakfast before going home. As a poor college student, I often eat at McDonald's for their inexpensive and, for the most part, consistent food. But every time I have gone to this location they have managed to mess up my order. For example, I wanted an egg white delight without the Canadian bacon; what I received was a McMuffin with only Canadian bacon on it?? The next time I ordered an iced caramel macchiato and got a cup of milk with caramel sauce. I'm not sure if it's poorly trained staff or what, but it's one of the worst McDonald's I've been visited.

Horrible services. Went in the drive through last night and waiting close to 20 min in line and finally had to back out of line as did everyone else. HORRIBLE SERVICES and always dirty inside and lots of homeless there. STAY AWAY and go elsewhere.....
Got one of those new Signature Crafted Sandwiches and the grilled chicken was dry AF.  Also the fries were a little too salty.

I don't write reviews for fast food chains because I already expect shitty service but I'm usually in and out of there.  I wasn't even going to waste my time writing this despite what just happened there but, when I got home and I didn't see the egg and cheese (first world probs) after using a coupon that I can't get back, I had to. I pulled up at 6:10am there card reader wasn't working (that's out of their control, I'm a reasonable person) so I went to the bank across the street and came back. I specifically ordered a sausage, egg and cheese mcgriddle and 2 mcmufins. My order came out to be $7 and some change. I gave her $20 and she gave me $6.98 back. As soon as I pulled up to the food window, I realized and notified her co worker. She takes awhile and comes back saying the girl at the register gave me the right change. Meaning, the girl handling money truly believed  $20-$7 = $6. I worked at KFC in high school and they had minimal requirements; know common sense and take/give exact change. If it were a couple cents or even a dollar I probably wouldn't have noticed or really cared to be honest. I'm not rich by any means(I used a coupon) but it isn't worth the drive back and hassling with people who hate their job to begin with. But you're going to short me $6 and have the audacity to say your calculations are correct? So, on the drive home I thought, "they better have put fucking egg and cheese on those overpriced $4 mcgriddles". Take a guess.  **edit**  After writing this review, I went to go eat my food and they forgot to put the egg on both the mcmufins as well. Bravo, I wasn't even being a dick to y'all but it's ok. You work at McDonald's and can't even do that right.

I ordered a big breakfast and i received a super small portion of egg. Our friend ordered the same breakfast and received 3x the amount of egg. They dont seem to have a portion control standard on some of their meals. I will go to a better Mcdonalds.
Worst mcdonds I have ever been too..My entire order was cold and drink was wrong.. I will not be back here.

Ok not the most glamorous spot to grab lunch, but ya know what? They have a huge parking lot, the interior is clean (including the restroom!), the service was polite, and my McNuggets were some of the best I've ever had, fried up fresh and hot! Nice job!

I was super disappointed after ordering a hazelnut latte. Usually, I get an iced one. Forgot to specify today. I figured it didn't matter much since it's getting colder out. Sadly, my latte was 2" from the brim! And even then cappuccino levels of foam. I could have gone to Starbucks and spent 50 cents more for a REAL latte. Having said all that, they DO always get my order right and the food has met my expectations with the food... it's fast. Lol so they get a 3* anyway.

came here they close in an hour & they won't take me order. i even drove up to the window and there she was sitting there not looking at me when i tried to get here attention. extremely rude!! will be calling corporate!

Not sure what happened here! This location has gone downhill. It is in need of a makeover fast! New staff, warm food & correct orders are a must! Went to the  drive thru,  ordered. The cashier repeated my order. I paid n got to the next window n was given something else! While waiting another staff member came to give me food that was still not my order! I had to pull to the side for like ten minutes. One would think my food would be hot.. no where near! Another visit about a month later was in the area  to get my car washed close by so walked over to sit inside and have some fries. Heard another customer in line asking how much longer? Was waiting for her McDouble for over fifteen minutes.. yikes! My order didn't take quite as long but was a lengthy wait! Again cold food.. fries are never to be served cold! I asked for different ones n was obliged with some eye rolls, huffs n puffs. I ended up waiting another ten minutes to get them! Ended up giving it to the homeless man outside..I'll know better to splurge on a different treat not here!

I went here to get a drink in the drive through. I asked for a Large drink, half lemonade half sweet tea. Sounds simple enough right? Apparently not. "Our machine is automatic so that's actually not possible."  To which I responded, "Can I order this drink if I come inside?" "Yes."  Anyone see the stupidity here? Not possible? More like you're being lazy and incompetent.

They never seem to keep their posted hours. Ive had the drive thru lights turn off 20 minutes before they were supposed to close as I sat at the menu board. their customer service is better than the drive thru on Howe  ave though.

This is the mcdonalds close to my house. But im giving them only 2 stars because they are always closing earlier then the time they should. We have to drive to the one downtown. They are supposed to close at midnight on fridays. We were there at 11:30pm n they were already closed.

We have been to this McDonald's a few times. Today and the last time we went through the drive through. Both times we have gone my husband has ordered a double cheese burger and both times he has got a reg cheeseburger in a double cheese burger box. Our food has been cold and just sloped together. No longer we will be going to This location.   I

This McDonald's seems more upscale than the other McDonald's I go to. I like it! McDonald's trying to modernize their establishment and trying to change their image. However, in my mind McDonalds is still gonna be McDonalds. Every time I come here, I receive fast and friendly service.   I usually get mcdouble with Big Mac sauce and for breakfast.the big breakfast platter. Everytime I go to McDonalds,  it also seems like they are raising the prices of the value menu (not dollar menu anymore) cents by cents. Oh wells, I'll come here when I'm craving some McDonalds.
Bought an oatmeal and large orange juice. The oatmeal was extremely watery and the orange juice was warm.
I like the Southwest Salad, it's so good and even healthy.  That's all I get.  This McDonalds is really nice and the employees are always friendly.  I would highly recommend this McDonalds.

I'm here at the McDonald's at 11:55 p.m. it says they close at midnight. The lights are on. I sit in the drive thru and nobody answers. I sat there for three minutes went up to the front window lights are still on nobody in sight. Two cars in the parking lot so somebody's actually there. Workers obviously don't want to serve somebody 5 minutes before closing but I'm curious how the owner of this McDonald's feels that he's missing out on income during operating hours. Looks like I'm not going to this McDonald's again.

After about the 5th time these guys have gotten my order wrong, I feel compelled to review. I don't expect much from mcdonalds, and I'm pretty forgiving when they get my order wrong on occasion. But I can safely say that every time I've ordered a double quarter pounder-no bun- my order comes out as a single patty.  Today I checked my order quickly and it looked right, but when I got back to work and actually took a good look, it was of course, a single patty. And not on shredded lettuce as I requested. It was too late to turn around and fix my order.  Sigh. My office is between the Folsom mcdonalds and the one on Alhambra, so the latter will be getting my lunchtime business from now on.

The worst, slowest, most unorganized McDonalds I have ever been at! Seriously, every time they make something wrong and I'm only asking for things like, no onions. They are always goofing off inside. The fries are always way too cold. They either don't salt the fries enough or, they are covered in salt. They are only consistent in their inaccuracy and inconsistency. Corporate seriously needs to throw out every employee and start over. It's a mess!

No joke, there's a guy named Ronald that works here. Real cool little dude with superb customer service and a great attitude! I went through the drive thru and they happened to forget three filet-o-fishes (my fault for not checking at the window)... so I pulled up front, and before I could get outta my car that dude Ronald was all up in front of me with the missing three filet o fishes and with two large fries! Hooked it up and was real apologetic and cool about it. That's whats up
This place fails, the manager is a douche. I asked for some mustard this guy hands me one packet then turns his back and walks off. I don't know how he became a manager but they need to switch.

We come here every few nights to get out of the house and get some work done on our laptops. The area is Ok and the staff is friendly. We have used the drive through on several occasions and they forget things sometimes. But they always seem to fix it if we are go in and ask them too. The place is clean except for when a bum wonders in and decides to take a bath in the sink at the bathrooms. There are allot of shady people around the area, probably because of the location that they are in.it will do in a pinch.

Went to get breakfast order time 1013 received order 1040. Line of customers complaining. Then I get almost home no orange juice.  I gave two stars due to the young ladies working the drive through and front register were really trying to help.
Love this McDonald's... good customer service
No play area for kids, but the service was good.  I felt the staff was friendly and professional unlike many other McD's I've been to.  Perhaps because its in a nice neighborhood?

Went in the other day and manager was so rude and short with me. Accused me of stealing beverages and took my cups. Really? Your gonna be that cheap and rude? I will not be returning and will be telling friends to go to the mcdonalds down the road ;)
I'll stop at any McD's for a Diet Coke, love the $1 for a large soda.
Just stopped by real quick before heading back home to Chico and got excellent drive thru service! Super genuinely friendly staff!

My friend and I received the most friendly service we have ever had at any McDonald's. We were in the drive thru and the gentleman working the cash register/taking our order was the one of the nicest employees! He has a really cool radio voice, we didn't catch his name but we will returning! There should be more people like him working in customer service!

I think I am done going to this location. Their drive thru is a joke. I don't know how many times they messed my order up. It's not like I'm asking for anything special. Either the wrong meal is given to me, the wrong drink, Don't know their own advertised specials, etc. Today I ordered a drink, large Sweet Tea. I get to work and drink it, it's regular tea. This is not the first time. I will kit be coming here anymore. It's a shame because I work down the street. The last rant are their prices. They are more expensive than the location on Alhambra.
Went to drive thru.. They forgot to give us our sundae cone.. Had to honk and wave them down.. They could have better service

Sac State students, show your One Card with every meal purchase and you get a free soft serve ice cream cone or small fries. Make sure you show it before you pay because person at the register can be pretty dull. On my last visit, my friend showed them the card after making the purchase and the cashier said that we had to do it before paying which made no sense seeing as its free food... Other than that doofus, its a good deal.
One of the worst mcdonalds I've ever been too. The place smells like toilet water and the customer service here sucks! Avoid having Ashley help you she's terrible!

Looks like nobody likes this location I thought the food was good and iced coffee wasn't bad at all. The only complaint I have would be why mop the floor when you aren't busy and use less water so nobody can slip and the ceiling was leaking on me while I waited in line also. But nice and friendly staff for sure.

Wow just wow I have never experience such horrible service at a McDonald's and that's saying a lot!!! I know fast food isn't going to be the best service and I've seen my share of hot messes but this was a disgrace.  I waited ONE hour for 3 small orders!!! The average time should be between 5-10 minutes tops but we all know it usually takes longer. But it shouldn't. I worked for McDonald's in Florida as a Assistant manager and ran the new employee training program for non English speakers so please believe me, when I tell you, I know what I'm talking about.  So I decided to go inside because the line trough drive thru was long and I wa on my break. When I get inside the line is also long and one register only takes cash while the other credit cards only?   I had three orders... first one was a double cheeseburger and a mchicken.. 2nd order was a frappe no whip a double and two pies. I asked what toy they had because been on the hunt for jack jack. Guy at register said he had it so got a happy meal even though I wasn't going to but what the hell.. plus a 4 piece strips and two parfaits. The guy tells me they only have one. Okay?  So everyone is running around with their heads cut off like chickens and looking at customers like deer's in headlights. the people ahead of me complained because they messed up their order. As they asked for their missing apple pies (among other things) they were  told they only had one left. Wait what???  I asked the girl that I ordered 2 apple pies. She asked if I wanted to wait 12 minutes for the next batch?? okay??? so you don't have parfaits and now you don't have apple pies? I said no and wanted my money back. no apologies.   side note: apple pies are the easiest thing to make there. If you realize you are down then the manager (ERIKA) should have asked someone to make more and while at it some parfaits.  Ok got my first order. My frappe without whip cream came with whip cream. Okay???  So asked them to replace it and a drink cup. waiting..waiting..waiting.. 25 mins later. I get the second order. Now waiting for the third. I'm calling out my order #178...6 orders behind me got their food. So I asked why it was taking so long for a happy meal, 2 strips and a parfait?  No one answers me. I asked who the manager was and they pointed her out and I asked for her name but she wouldn't give it. So I finally told them I worked as a manger and they need to tell me the managers name so I can file a formal complaint with corporate. Finally she said Erika. I told her I've been waiting for over 45 mins for my order at this point. No apologies. did nothing to make it better..so filed a formal complaint.  To top things off I didn't even get the right toy. No jack jack!!! So I ordered a happy meal for no reason!!!!   Who ever is the regional manager or district manager needs to update their staff training. Especially after the fight that happened at another location here in Sacramento (el Camino) where the staff did nothing to help a poor girl get beat up. It was on national news.   Clean your Act,,, McDonald's. supposed to have one of the best fast food services in this country, Standards have really fallen...

Recently, i've been using the mobile app of Mcdonalds and other fastfood chain to place an order. What I love about this is you I can get some deals, but lately I'm  disappointed with it. I thought using this mobile order app of Mcdonalds is faster than walking in or going in to drive thru, but it was not!! I had great experience with other fastfood chain, like I just have to place my order, pick it up and I'm good to go, but Mcdonalds is different! I used this app three times already, I thought there's a long wait because I went during lunch time for the past two stores, but the last store I went to they only have few customers and it's not even rush hour and I waited around 15 minutes, PLUS THEY GAVE ME A WRONG ORDER! So disapponting! I ordered Double Bacon Smokehouse Meal and 6 pcs chicken nuggets, but they gave me TWO order of nuggets ‍‍. Smh!

If I can rate this McDonald's a zero, I would. There is always something that goes wrong here. First and foremost would be the customer service. Drive thru customer service is condescending, not a smile nor hello. Secondly, either an order would be mistaken or an item would be missing. This has happen too many times. It's disappointing really.

ALWAYS SO PACKED HERE AND BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! They messed up on my orders TWICE so I had to go back.. After they gave me my food I checked it again and they messed up on it AGAIN. One of the lady there asked if I needed her and I said yes, she then turns back around and continues working.. Like how freaking rude, if you're gonna ask me if I need help then HELP ME!! Drop what the hell you're doing and help me. SMH!! My kids just got out of school and are hungry!

Just got back 20 minutes ago! They took a while to take my order. ALSO, they forgot to give me my full order. While they were nice to communicate and give me my missing order. I think they should improve their service, I can fully understand the 1 star now as they were not busy too!

Worst damn McDonald's ever . Such HORRIBLY RUDE CUSTOMER SERVICE . I took my order and you would think she would be NICE and take it . So I asked her did you get my order ??? & she goes " oh now I did so you wanted the two sausage egg McMuffin & what??? " so rude. I swear this one never fails to take my damn orders or at least have the courtesy to take my damn order NICELY. Not to mention how long they took and a guy wanted his refund and they go " she's getting it bagged . Five minutes it isn't even bagged . " please have better customer service. However a super nice lady came out and helped. So thanks and kudos to you.
Be aware of this Mcdonald. They have workers in the back slacking off and goofing off. My burgers did NOT come with any patties. Got my full refund but still was not happy at with the service.

Every time I come here I ALWAYS request my food FRESH. They take about 15 mins for the wait but they come out not even hot just all warm like it's been sitting there. The fries? It's soggy and it's not fresh at all. If you are going to run a business atleast listen to the customers because they are paying you guys to make good food for them. If it was vise versa you guys would want the same too.

Every single employee here is sooooooo rude . Mostly women.. & don't even get me started with the "managers "'of shift leaders or  whatever they are ..  I mean, if you don't like your job why are you even working here? If you're going to have an attitude because a customers asks you for a ranch cup why would you even apply? Lol , it's never been that serious! Go work for the DMV with that shitty attitude , I'm sure they'd be more than happy to take you

Worst McDonald's in the south Sacramento area. They got most of my orders correct except for 2 cookies and my baby sister's chocolate milk. Gave them a call over the phone to get a refund for those 2 items ( under $3 ) and the refuse to do it electronically. They expect me to drive 5 Miles back there to get my $3 back??? Lol

Bad location. Took them almost 10 mins to give me my iced coffee in the drive thru. Order taker was rushing me to finish, and gave me my total a few times before I was actually finished. Weird since there was nobody else in line. They just seem like they didn't care and wanted to get me out as fast as possible. Again, took 10 mi s for a small coffee

I've worked at mcdonalds before so I understand at times it can be difficult, and I've given this location several chances before posting a bad review but they have officially fckd me over for the last time. I've gone to this location several times and they are AWFUL. Every single time I go here, something goes wrong, usually it's old food, but this last time they over charged me and tried to challenge me on it. My total before a coupon was $10 and some change and after the coupon, my total went to $12?! On top of that they forgot my sauce, gave me old nuggets and fries. Oh and to top it off the gal who was "fixing" our order was a total b!tch about it. I would recommend never EVER going to this location unless you plan on being there for over 15 minutes so they can make and remake your order.
Worst drive through ever. Waited 25 minutes around 2pm for a "cold" hot and spicy chicken sandwich. Stay away from this one!
Worst McDonald's ever !! Waited for just two spicy chicken and small fries and took 20 mins ! Really do you call that a FAST FOOD ? NO ! Shouldn't have to put Stars !

I've been to this McDonalds 4x's now at different hours of the day... their chicken nuggets are the BEST! It's how they are cooking them, I'm convinced they are chicken experts... from the McChicken to the Panko strips  EXCELLENT! I've ordered these items at every other McDonalds and always soggy or a little old! If you want the BEST nuggets ever ya gotta go to this location always fresh n crispy  Their fries are always HOT N fresh too I have yet to get a bad meal here, it's nice since this location is very convenient  Believe me if I get nasty nuggets I'll let ya all know, but I doubt that will happen since this location is very consistent   Thanks MickeyD's

This McDonald's location is always messing up my orders. There have been at LEAST 3 occasions where I order food only to come home to find an item missing that we were charged for. And every single time I've ordered fries here they are always old and/or over salted. I don't even bother coming here anymore. I just drive past it down the street to the other McDonald's location on Mack and Valley Hi to save myself any troubles, plus their fries always taste fresh.

This location disappoints me every time. Whether its long lines, wait time for food, or the food itself. Even if I'm the only person in line I still have to wait about 3-5mins for my food and it's not even fresh. Fries are stale! Burgers are tossed together. No effort at all into making the food look presentable. 2 out of 5 cause this place used to be good, not sure what happened.
Came to get a large HOT cappicino and received a half cup of cold something with lots of whipped cream.  Gross!  Will probably not go to this location again.

Stay away from this location at all costs! This place is a health hazard! Found a cricket in the order of french fries they gave me. Manager decided to do nothing about it.   STAY AWAY UNLESS YOU WANT FOREIGN OBJECTS IN YOUR FOOD!
I sent my husband for o grilled onion cheese burger and I could not believe what I got. I have attached a picture for words fail me. Fail!

This McDonalds seems like it don't get the business that it use too. Its been a long time since I've been here. Sometimes when a big business around other businesses close it takes away from the small businesses. And I'm wondering if this is what's happening at this McDonalds.   The Bel Air/Raleys has closed down. As always I'm here to get those famous chicken nuggets for my granddaughter.  It was slow and quiet in here today. I unfortunately waited for almost 20 minutes for chicken nuggets and like I said they weren't busy today. I gotta say tho the bathroom are never clean in this McDonalds, they never have any seat covers for the toilets and they usually don't have any paper towels to dry your hands. You find paper all over the floors. I think that they could solve the bathroom problems by putting a lock on the door and make it for their customers only!  They keep the rest of the restaurant clean, not real sure why not in the rest room. This McDonalds has been here for many years and I would hate to see it go, because I'm sure the neighborhood appreciate it being here. This McDonalds use to thrive at one time, they got to get that back.

Okay lets be honest Mcdonalds is garbage but this one more than most. The fries no matter what will not be fresh who knows how long they been sitting. I dont like mcdonalds much but sometimes I gotta get my fry fix and after a few tries I go to the one down the street by franklin those fries are at least fresh.
wait time is ridiculously long in the drive thru. food doesn't have the best of tastes if any. Still giving one extra star because the frappes are mostly up to par

At this McDonald's the customer is not always right I ordered oatmeal I wanted my oatmeal microwaved they refuse to do so stating that they don't do that, well my problem is, is that I've never been to a McDonalds and they didn't  want  to microwave my oatmeal on my request this maybe small to them or someone else but it's big to me.

Okay so it appears many don't care for the drive thru here. I prefer to go inside to eat.  That way if they mess up, then it's easier to get the problem fixed much sooner. During the afternoon, inside the dining room, I had no problems with ordering my food and them getting it correct.  It didn't take too long to get the food either. Afterwards before we left, we asked for a particular stuffed emoji that they're giving out as part of the Happy Meals. The manager went to go look and came back with the one that my daughter wanted, and I paid for it separate.  I'm not sure of all the bad reviews, but most of the time when we come here, things are usually good.  The manager during the day whom I used to get help from in the evening even remembered us, so that was really nice as well.
They don't wear gloves...   Good service though we waited a little bit longer for the fresh 50 pc nuggets for $9.99

I think it's kinda weird to review McDonald's, but since I located this one on yelp and saw the bad reviews, I feel compelled to do so.   Recently, I did a drive-thru order for 4 teenagers and 2 smaller kids -- huge order, and everything was complicated. They were friendly, courteous, professional (which seems like a weird thing to comment on in fast food, but is the best descriptor I have) and got the entire order right. I'm a fan!

I think its ridiculous to have to wait in the drive thru for over 20 minutes for someone to take your order. This is my 3rd time at this location and it's always like this. The wait time for the drive thru is always ridiculous. Visit this location if you have time to waste

I honestly don't know why this MCdees has such low reviews. It is actually one of the better ones in this area. The employees are always nice and they ALMOST always get my order right 8/10 times (they usually forget the bacon). But other than that I have no complains.

Being new to the area, this McDonalds is the closest to my place.  Based on some of the previous reviews, this review is for the Drive-Thru only.    Pretty convenient hours, and they stay open pretty late (1am Sun-Thurs, 2am Fri-Sat).  Can get pretty busy during peak hours, but they are pretty quick.  The best thing so far is that they havent screwed up my order (yet).  I usually ask them to hold the onions in my burgers and sometimes other places forget.  Sometimes the same McDonalds forgets more than once.  But this one hasnt yet, so I'm giving it 3 stars.  Nothing special, just McDonalds.  lol

Hm. There's so many freaking Asian's here. I can say that because I'm Asian. Their services could've been a lot better. They were nice and all, just a little too slow. Their soda dispenser ran out of ice and they did not bother to check it. Soda was a little flat. Nuggets were kind of old, hard. Definitely not fresh. Mmm, yeah... I only went here because I had to get an alignment done. This would not be my choice of McDonald franchise. I'd go to the one on Florin Rd/Franklin before I'd go back here. Truth.
HORRIBLE! The manager is rude. And its filthy I only eat here because I am broke. LOL
It's McDonald ..nothing fancy  I usually come just for the smoothies and fries

Long waiting times EVEN when it's clearly slow. Order was incorrect and wasted about 10 minutes trying to get it right. This isn't the first time my visits here have been horrible. Staff is lazy, rude and I will certainly be taking my business else where.

Fool me once shame on you fool me twice I looked foolish. In the past this place has given me horribly slow long lines in a "fast food" drive thru. It also has messed my order up twice, on a bacon sandwich put ONE small sliver of bacon on it, and in another case put COLD french fries in the bag. You would think I would have learned my lesson but like they say... sometimes people have to learn the hard way.   Bought their new "Mighty Wings" for a football party and drive there and we open it and both boxes are filled with burnt to hell wings. I mean I heard the chicken horror stories but these chickens must have done some evil things to suffer this inferno crispy torture fate. What... is the mighty super wings kryptonite peanut oil? Was Ronald McDonald off scaring little kids instead of manning the fryer, what's up? Chicken was so bad everyone just said no thanks and we actually ate my friends food we NEVER eat! Yes... you heard that right, we rather eat a friends food who cooks like Guy Fieti eats... messy. Instead of calling them doing the yell at the manager over some chicken wings thing I try to be professional and email their corporate office and get a phone call from the manager at the store, email from customer service, and another email apologizing for the product. They tell me they put me on "the list" which tells the employees I get free food. I feel so special, although something told me this fast food VIP list was probably still not going to end well somehow. But I give them ANOTHER chance since well.. I'm cheap and thought hey free wings why not, although once a place burns me this bad (no pun intended) I usually just avoid like most people avoid South Sacramento. So I go through the drive thru and tell them that my name is on the "list" and she takes 5 minutes trying to figure out if it is or not. I got 4 cars behind me getting mad, a friend in the car telling me they told me not to give them another chance, a prostitute in the parking lot showing her breasts to guys, and a inept worker who finally tells me that my name is on the list but they have me picking up said wings and the manager signed off. I tell them I did not pick them up and she says yes you did. Wait......... what?! I did?! Was it my bizarro alter ego again? I shake my head and tell her I have not came back since the failed Chernobyl wings and she swears I did.I tell her they should check the tape in frustration but if they don't have a grease thermometer or timer to tell you when to take out wings before they become nuclear then sure they don't have that so I tell her forget it and made to feel like somehow I AM the guilty one holding everyone up and trying to score double free wings.  Overall, McDonalds stick to burgers and leave the chicken alone. Also, when service and product is THIS bad you do NOT EVER EVER EVER go back and I didn't listen to myself or my friends. Management screwed the pooch TWICE on this and don't think all the promises of free food is going to ever get me to come back so they have lost a customer. I don't care if it's the apocalypse and McDonald's is the ONLY place serving food through marauders, wild dogs,  psycho backwood preppers, and a zombie breakout I will gladly walk past this place to find food elsewhere.

5-29-11  Ugh! Where to begin.     This is THE WORST McDonalds I have ever been to! I went through the Drive Thru and ordered 27$ worth of breakfast for the family. The asian girl taking the order did a good job entering it all in but when I got to the window her customer service skills sucked. When I got to the next window I was given half my order and told to have a nice day???!!?!!   Really??  I was missing 6 Hash browns and when I told him I order 3 on the side and 3 should have come with the 3 value meals I ordered....he brought me 3 hashbrowns the first trip so I had to tell him that I needed 3 more...grrrrrr....ok, so then I was also missing my egg mcmuffin,side of bacon and egg on the side.  When he brought me the hashbrowns they were the most disgusting looking hashbrowns I had ever seen...burnt and grease soaked when i pulled them out and showed him.....he told me that was all they had and appologized...WOW! I just left because I have a bad temper and dont want to end up in cuffs. 4 out of 6 of those hashbrowns ended up in the trash.  I hope the manager of this place sees this and makes some changes because there is way to much room for improvement. Foot Note: I had two drinks and when I got home I had no Straws! Grrrrrrr!  Heres a pointer.... I think this whole restaurant could use a day of training from the Mcdonalds on Calvine.  And I thought the one on Meadowview was bad.......
I like coming here when it's not busy.  When it's busy, I have to wait longer and sometimes they would even forget an item.  Nice employees.

This is the WORST Mcdonalds i've ever know .. i went to Drive thru cause its already late and drive thru is fast .. the asian who took my order is good .. She took my order correct but .. on the 2nd window .. i waited 5mins before they give my order .. and they ask me to wait for my Mcflurry .. and i waited 5mins more .. i ordered the Mighty Wings and i ask for the Drumlettes only .. but when i got home theres 3 winglettes and 2 Drumlettes .. And i ordered Mcflurry .. the worst is i ordered Regular size Mcflurry, the cup is correct .. But they put just a little ice cream and oreo almost 3/4 of the cup .. Wow !!! i paid $11 for this !!!

The food is just OK. But because they would not let us park our racing bikes inside the restaurant mine was stolen.  And only after it was stolen did they allow my friend to bring his bike inside.  There was plenty of room to put both bikes inside.  Only 4 other people were inside at the time.  And these are professional racing bikes. not junkie bikes. The policies at this store are awful. I wrote the owner a message and they never responded at all.  I wrote the HQ office an email and they said they sent it to the owner and that the incident would be investigated and appropriate action take,.  Well still no response from the owner. Don't go to this restaurant with your bike unless you want to get it stolen.  In fact, don't go to McDonalds  unless you don't care if they don't care about you. Way to go McDonald's !!!
Nice restrooms, great food, super fast and friendly staff!!  Way better than any McDonald's back home.  And the fries were so fresh!!

Bordering on being in violation of Food safety regulations, there were  flies coming out of the drive thru window that the workers were very used to. The fries tasted like farts smell, no exaggeration. The "sundae" (ice cream + caramel glob = Sundae) was standard, and as such, fine. Don't go through the drive thru if you're claustrophobic, that miserable wall is in you like a junior at a senior ball.   All in all, avoid, unless you just want to get uncooked food (soda, a sundae). The workers were very nice.

Wtf. People still eat here? Seriously... people still eat here?   If you're looking for an urgent bowel movement, a tendency towards them,  and an inability to control them,  dine here regularly.  But hey,  it's cheap. It's not like it's future life insurance,  or anything.

My reviews all start out with 5 stars and I remove a star for every negative I experience. As you can see, my experience was less than impressive. Let's start with the good and go from there.   Good: The restaurant is in a good location. You are out of the Sacramento so it's a good place to get lunch either leaving from or heading to. It is in a good location and getting on and off the freeway is easy. By the way, there is a Chevron near there. Don't go to it. Their gas is about 50 cents more than the other stations around. Back to McDonalds. It is also really clean. They also have 2 of the Coke machines which are awesome. I actually gave them a star back because of that. That's about it for the good.   Bad: Ok, first and foremost they got my order wrong. I ordered the 10 piece McNugget meal. I got 10 chicken tenders, no meal so not even close. Minus 1 star. Secondly, the tenders I did not order were completely gristle and gross. So had I ordered them, or anyone else, they would have been disappointed. Minus 1 star. Thirdly, and the reason I didn't complain about getting my order wrong, the person in front of me got their order wrong too. When they tried to tell the cashier about it he just stared and nothing was ever corrected. So no customer service. Minus 1 star. And lastly, the place was full of flies. They were everywhere. It was annoying trying to eat with all the little things flying around your food. Something needs to be done about that. Minus 1 star.   So overall, not happy with the experience there. I really done think we will be going back. Will probably just try Auburn down the road next time.

It's like playing Russian Roulette with this place. Pretty sure there are two main crews that work this location or something like that. If the dude with a very "radio-personality voice" is on drive thru, you will definitely get out of there with no problems. If it's anyone else, you better check your bag(s) before leaving. We've gotten home with the wrong order and then they proceeded to tell us about how it's our responsibility to check our food before leaving and they normally wouldn't remake an order because of a mistake and then being nothing but rude at the window (opening the window and handing out the food without so much as a word. No thank yous, sorry for your inconvenience, nothing). Both of my two stars given are for the one guy I mentioned who's always on point.

We ordered at the drive thru tonight and they screwed up our order. We didnt realize that until we got home so we had to drive back there. The lady taking our order kept cutting my husband off and not letting him finish his sentence. No apology either..just a "what do you want to do sir?"  Got to the window where you pay and she asks for our initial back and still no apology. Get to the second window and get handed our food with still no apology and no effort to compensate us for the inconvenience. Treat your customers better Mcdonalds!

I don't think it's ever an easy thing to do to give a fast food restaurant more than 3 stars... this one deserves it. We stopped here on our way back from Reno as it appears virtually every other yelper has done, and even though it was Christmas Eve and it was incredibly busy, this McDonald looked clean and well-kept. Both of the employees that I had interactions with spoke clearly and concisely and were friendly and helpful. Transactions were fast and food was good, despite how busy they were. I would not hesitate to stop here again.

Convenient location right off interstate 80(west bound)   Due to the location this place is always busy with folks coming and going at all times of the day. Good size parking lot that stays full every time I've visited on my way down back from the Sierra slopes or Reno NV.   Food has always been prepared fast and fresh. I've noticed the morning and afternoon hours are the busiest as it's a popular time for road travelers.

Came on Thursday around December 10:30am   Establishment:  - no trash on the ground - tables that are not used are clear  - about 10-15 tables  - bathrooms: well stocked, a little toilet paper on the side, a little wet around the toilet floor   Service:  - efficient  - professional   Food:  - typical McD food  - nothing out of the ordinary   Overall, good typical McDs service, bathroom not the cleanest but not the worst

Meh. The food was good, your typical food from McDonalds. However the amount of flies inside was ridiculous!! Also the garbage bins were packed. Either there's not enough people that work here or they don't care.

I was rolling back from Reno with the Elk Grove Enforcer in his Whip . When I got thirsty .  I asked my Bro to pull into the Mickey Ds . So I could get a Drink.   We rolled in to their  Parking  lot . I rolled in and ordered a Drink and 2 Mc Doubles .   This McDonald's looks super Clean.   They have 2 super new Drink Machines .   My Burgers were done in 5 minutes .  I rolled out. I would stop there if I was in the area again.

My teenage sons begged me to take them to McDonalds, I'm not a fan but decided to relent. My sons each ordered burgers, fries and sodas. My son spread his French fries out on his napkin to put ketchup on, when he did there were several pubic looking hairs mixed among his fries, I gathered his fries up and asked to speak to the manager, he came up and I said to him quietly, that I'm not looking for a free meal, or money, but want you to see what was in our food, he told me to "get out" of the restaurant! I couldn't believe it, not an I'm sorry, or let me replace your fries, but to get out! I guess my business was not important.
Very disappointed, they said they're open till 4am I can at 12am and they are closed do not believe them
Ugh. Bad as always. Anywhere is better and healthier. Too many good places out there to waste your time and money here.

Poor poor Jeremy. Training, but being spoken to in the absolute most condescending manner by fellow peers (unacceptable).  Shortly after starting this review - I noticed that they were sharing insight with a lady.  I caught her eye and asked her for a minute. Shared with her my experience with her workers. It wasn't that they weren't sharing thing he needed to know - it was how they were delivering it to him.  As a manager, we depend on the staff that we have train a new team member to treat them with the utmost of respect and teach them all the things that they had to learn to become trusted trainers. They knew that what they were doing wasn't proper behavior because myself and other customer were speaking about it from our side of the counter (if it bothers bystanders, it should be giving you a twinge of discomfort when your doing it).  Needless to say, she was kind and receptive and thanked me for my input. I am sure that she will handle it appropriately, but I will leave this review to see if anyone lets me know how Jeremy is doing later.

Stopped by here on our drive down from Tahoe and I was truly disgusted. Trash bins were overflowing.. there were dozens of flies inside. The sides of the LCD screens were covered with flies. Drinks area was covered in sticky stuff and it looks like it hadn't been cleaned in a while. It was a fairly hot day but they had no soft serve or sundaes and limited selection on drinks from the soda machine. We were going to order food but got disgusted by the state of the place. With that many flies around, there must be some eggs in the food right? Really terrible and this was always our stop to and from Tahoe.
This location always will mess up your order and their employees will always have Hickey's engulfing their throats. Makes you want to throw up.

I don't understand a Mc Donald's that doesn't serve lunch until 11. We waited in a long line with a full service menu only to find out they only serve breakfast until 11. The guy who took our order also sounded a little clueless and when we said we didn't want anything he never even replied. If your the only Mc Donald's in the area that doesn't do lunch until 11am please put up a sign. People are headed up to Tahoe hungry and don't want to waste time waiting in line for no reason.

This McDonald's is such a staple to my drive from Tahoe to the Bay Area because the bathrooms are always clean and available and I can grab a snack on my way home. The service is super friendly and they have beautiful Tahoe artwork in the restaurant. Food is typical McD's fare, so no surprises here. Definitely a good alternative for bathroom breaks than waiting at Starbucks or at the gas station.

July 8, 2015 Wednesday - 7:00 AM for breakfast 4 Adults & kid  Atmosphere - 4 stars Food - 3 stars Service - 3 stars  Background - Road tripping to San Francisco for the day from Reno.  Atmosphere - Outdated.  Needs work, looks like the counter was updated when the McDonald's corporate coffee push happened but that is it.  Food   Drinks - coffe.    Breakfast - Two sausage egg McMuffin, yeah that is the old name for it but I will always call it that.  Well the English muffins were burnt, a lot.  If I was not driving I would have taken it back.  But the eggs in the sandwiches were very good.  Service - Three adults and a kid ordering, wow everything was on the receipt.  They gave us our food on a tray.  I was in the bathroom when the orders were placed so whether or not if we asked for it to go was uncertain.  I asked for a bag and the small drink I was missing.  I packed it up myself.  As we were driving and have the food pasted out it was determined that my father did not get his food.  Yeah it was on the receipt, again I was not there to hear the order so I packed like a mad fool to get out of the place, and no I did not leave something on the tray.  Future - Hopefully I plan better for my next road trip.
Premium Artisan Roll Grilled Chicken sandwich.... with NO CHICKEN IN IT!  Are you kidding me?  We're already 10 minutes down the highway.

Literally every single time we come here they're mcflurry machine isn't working. This is not a one time thing...I live in this town, and sometimes feel like a treat after a dinner...And feel like giving McDonald's some business. It's a cold rainy day and I wouldn't think they would have overload of mcflurry purchases to cause it to go out...However this is the case. I would not recommend anybody stop here!

Why would you come here to eat this trash.. Taco Bell taste better and is some how more sanitary then mc donalds... I've seen the Mexican women in grill picking her nose while making your burgers. TRUE FACT: Did you know this McDonalds at this location was on a show on tv called 60 minutes because they used a toilet brush to scrub and clean they're stove for a long time. They found this out when they took a swab of the grill. So yeah eat up!!
The crew at this McDonald's is the best. They are very friendly and helpful. This is where my family always stops on our way to Tahoe for our extravagant getaways.

Hey McDonalds is McDonalds, to me all food is the same at every McDonalds. BUT customer service is Not always the same. Hannah cant even answer when you say hello to her. She. Ever asked any thing. It was the most awkward ordering ive ever had.
I stopped here at the prodding of my youngest and the dirty bathroom really turned me off, but my kid enjoyed her kids meal so 3 stars.

Lobby had fries and rubbish all over the floor,  bathroom has toilet paper all over the floor pee drops on every toilet.... Sinks were stopped up and counter was soaked with water.  I didn't even eat there because it was so dirty this big giant wheel barrow looking thing was filled with rubbish and parked in the outdoors patio.  Dirtiest McDs I have ever been to.... And I live in central CA!
Horible loud beeping noise went off every couple of minutes.  Women's bathroom 3 stalls 1 door!?  Service and food on par with McDonald's.

Your standard McDonald's located conveniently right off the freeway at one of the first major exits coming down the mountain. The establishment is a bit on the smaller size than most McDonald's. We stopped in because we needed to make a pit-stop to stretch our legs and use the restroom. Only three stalls in the women's bathroom so if you come when it's busy, the line will be long.  BF's Order Premium McWrap Sweet Chili Chicken (Grilled): grilled chicken breast filet, w/ tomato, cucumber slices, spring greens, shredded lettuce, drizzled w/ sweet chili and creamy garlic sauce all wrapped in a flour tortilla  I wanted the Eggnog Shake but they were out. =( Tried my BF's wrap and couldn't eat more than a bite. The sauce was way too sweet for me. The BF thought it was ok, but wouldn't order it again. In and out in less than 10min.

HORRIBLE!!! There was flies every where I was eating a French fry and A FLY LANDED ON IT AT THE LAST SECOND AND I ATE THE FLY.  Too many flies that we had to protect our meals like we were all mothers with newborn babies. yuk yuk yuk. Will remember never to stop by here again during a long drive. Also AVOID ANY TABLES NEAR THE RESTROOMS I feel sooooo sorry for anyone who might have sat there there is MORE THAN A HUNDRED FLIES HERE There is probably more flies in this McD's than ALL OF COLFAX.  Anyone eating near the restroom will have more of a fly sandwich instead of a Big Mac. STAY AWAY go to Subway instead !!! Staff is nice and friendly but flies are EVERY WHERE . I can't tell you how much to avoid this place but TRUST ME AVOID IT go to Subway instead or the other McD's 15 min up the freeway. Staaaayyy awwaaaayy from this place or prepare to swat flies, eat flies, and protect your meals from hungry fries.   Seriously this is like a real-life video game where you protect food from flies.  STAY AWAY for your own safety.
Emili & Jacob are both bad workers. They don't listen. I don't recommend coming here  if it saved your life
We stopped here on the way home from Reno tonight.. Outstanding service! Everyone was so nice and the food was all made fresh. We will definitely stop here again.

Above average McDonalds restaurant. When all of the flat landers come through on their way to or from the snow, it gets busy, which is to be expected when a thousand people suddenly all descend on the tiny town of Colfax at once. The staff are super friendly and they bust their buns to get the orders out to everyone hot and on time. The restaurant is always clean, as are the bathrooms.

After the gridlock coming out of the Sierra's in the snow, this is the first real stop when traffic starts flowing.  Of course everyone is clamoring to use the bathroom and the line can be hectic.  Of course the night I was there it seemed like everyone from an Asian tour group had arrived, so in addition to the crowd, there was also the language and culture barrier.  ( so when nobody responds to your, "excuse me", you may have to resort to international hand gestures, just keep the birds out of the air - LOL)  I was able to make Shelby smile and our order was up post haste and I just had to strong arm my way through the crowd like a salmon swimming up stream to get to the counter.  But my food was fresh and hot and much appreciated after a chilly day in the snow with the kids.

Coming home from snowy Soda Springs we stopped in to potty. That's probably the same idea all the other patrons had. The bathroom was a little busy but when isn't the ladies bathroom a waiting room?   Shelby was our cashier and appreciated our speaking English to her (there were so many Asian families there!) the order went in quick and even thought the place was packed we got our food in under five minutes.  Hot and fresh fast food, that's what's up!
Just another McDonalds.  I've eaten there a couple of times and gotten stale bread/buns both times.  Probly won't pick this place often
when i ordered 20pc McNuggets...and ask for 1 more extra sauce it cost me EXTRA $0.54....:(

They rolled out a new Quarter Pounder in 3 flavors---I tried the Habanero Ranch version:  Kaiser Roll with Sesame Seeds -- pretty decent for a McDonald's bun Leaf Lettuce (not the crappy shred on Big Mac) Slice Of Tomato (never before seen on QP product before) Hickory Smoked Bacon (small amount, but definitely part of the flavor) Habanero Ranch dressing (very spicy -- not for the faint of heart)  The burger patty was surprisingly juicy.  I prefer "Medium Rare" burgers, but this well done burger was OK, it won't replace In-N-Out but it would suffice if McD's was the only pit stop available on a road trip.....

So I complained via the McDonald's website that night about being stranded in the dark in the drive through and it took the manager over 3 weeks to call me back.  I chose to ignore it and not return the call.  Either call me right after I am endangered on your property or suffer the same courtesy of being ignored.

so fighting the storm down 80 I needed a pit stop so Mciedees jumped out at me... when I got inside it was crowded. I had to wait to pee. I wanted to pee in the sink, dam.  Anyways, the order: one Mc chicken and a Iced coffee. Took F N FOREVER. WTF. The drive thru would a been faster.
Your typical McDonalds. They have everything you need for a long drive. Also the bathrooms are decent. The hand dryers are the old style though and are put in an awkard place, oh well.

This McDonalds is probably the worst one we've ever been to.  We stopped to switch drivers and grab a couple McFlurry's and use the restroom.  The place was filthy and they took forever.  Not to mention it was like they just put some candy on top of the ice cream and didn't mix them together before they gave them to us.

Just a random stop on a road trip to Tahoe, but it gets the job done.  It's relatively clean, and it's not a franchise, so they don't charge a ton for your food.  Their coffee is pretty good, and gets you going the rest of the way on a night trip.

like everyone else, stopped here during the battle with the summit, grabbed a quick $1 meal and coffee, used the mens room (not busy) of course the womens RR was quite busy.. and headed back out.. service was good and food was hot..

Fast  and freindly service hot food....they aim to please if your heading to or from Reno stop off here. There's a large  field off the side of the parking lot where you can walk your dog or spouse.These guys are number 1 in my book.
I place my order at 8:11 pm and the wait was incredibly long. My order was given to me at 8:25 The dining room hours say 9:00 pm they close, however the doors closed early.

If I could give ZERO stars I would. Worst Mc Donald's ever!!! They will steal your money and food. Manager Denise is ruuude! How she got that position idk! Stay clear of this crap hole!  When you mobile order at this Mc Donald's you get a charge, receipt, and no food because according to them your order didn't come up. How do you get your money back, you can't they say. How do you get your food, you don't they say. What now, a call to corporate!

Ordered the 20 piece chicken mc nuggets and went home and realized that I only received HALF of my order.  I paid for 20 pieces, not 10. Unacceptable, especially after I had to pull over and wait for my order for an extended period of time.

Everytime i come to this McDonald's they make me pull into a parking spot and wait for my order No matter what time of day or what i order, if i wanted to pull over and wait i would go inside or go to a restaurant, this really irritates me!

Every time we come and ask for a Mc flurry they always say that their not serving ice cream at the time...fuck you mean!! It's not like you have to make the damn ice cream just pour the ice cream in a cone you lazy bitches!!! Never again this place is a joke.

This McDonald's is straight sorry af, horrible customer service and bathrooms are shitty af. Will not be returning to this abomination they call a McDonald's. And yalls sodas are beyond hurt. Y'all need some upgrades fr fr
Says they close at 2, yet at the drive thru you ignore your customers. Has a truck unloading right beside the store and still doesn't take my order. Trashy place

I have been here a few times and each time it is the same problems, so I probably won't be back.    #1= they are really slow... took over 10 minutes to get my order... the least they could have done was give me my cup so I could have had my soda ready to take to the table when my food was ready.    #2= I have ordered the sausage burrito twice, and both times there have been something in it that's burnt so bad it's hard & I can't chew it.  #3= They do not seem to like to clean things. When I worked at McDonald's in the 70's, we had a person that kept the tables clean.  These tables are dirty (crumbs, liquid rings from drinks, trash, and spills). I found one that I could wipe off myself with a napkin, but I don't think that's the same as using a sterilized rag.  #4= Even when they're told that the soda counter has spills all down it, they do not clean it up (picture is being uploaded, but doesn't show the clear liquids well).  So far, it has been 29 minutes since I notified them of it, and it still has not been cleaned.

Worst place to go. Got hair over food. Customer was horrible. I waited in the drive way. They have two lane. I got there first and got my order last. Two car that came after me got their order taken first. I ask why was my order taken last. I spoke to their manager and all she did was nothing. The worst part I have food in my order. Living nearby this McDonald's, I won't ever go again. I would drive 30 miles somewhere else who can serve better and better quality on the food.

My order was completely messed up and the lazy manager could not be bothered to actually do his job. Horrible service and even worse manager. Even by McDonald's standards this place is horrible. I guess it's too much to ask for the employees to actually do their job. And these people think they deserve $15 a hour when they can't even fill a simple order. What a pitiful excuse for customer service. If I could select zero Stars I would

absolutely rude!!!!!!! hands down the worst mc donalds experience ever, the drive thru lady tried to rush us through our order.we asked her very politely to wait as we were not done with our order and her attitude got worse!!   we will not return to this one  ever again!!!!

Although the sodas are a dollar for any size. It seems like I have to ask for more ice every time. There's only ever like 10 cubes in it when I get it the first time. They must have a very slow ice maker.

this shithole drive-thru place closes at 2am  I come inn at 1:15am and they say their closed, I ask what time they usually close, she replied 1am...straight bs!  hah nah they just lazy af especially when that ugly red hair latina is working there, she looks dummy retarded af.   Hands down the shittiest mcd u can go too! it's workers like ya who ain't got no direction in life.  we'll gl making high school change at an dead beat job! hope it's enuff to live with your parents.

This is the most unclean McDonald's ever. I use to take my kid here when he was younger to play in the play area. The play area does not smell like it is properly sanitized on a regular basis. They need to remodel this place and start fresh....service is decent

This Location is centrally located to my homestead so I frequent it for drive through beverages often. The service is consistent, food hot and up to Mc Donalds standards. The bathroom is clean and has  always been free of riff-raff and no lines! This is a great little economic guilt free shopping center. Park your car at Mc..E... D's, fuel up on some quick carbs and head to .99 cent store, and our new Wallmart neighborhood market!

This is not a McDonalds that I stop at often. Its a pretty big McDonalds and theres lots of parking. They have a play area for the kids, which you don't see at too many of the other McDonalds anymore. The drive thru here is always busy and the wait is ridiculous. I feel like the service is not the best. The dining area is always dirty and looks like theres no one to clean it.  They always seem like their short handed as far as the employees go. I have used the rest room here a couple of times and was not impressed. This McDonalds is in a very busy strip mall with lots of other business and a busy area period. I think that the employees are over worked and always short handed makes it difficult for them to be the nice people that you can see they could be. They are friendly when it's not too busy.   Management to me is always someone young and don't seem to really know how to deal with the situation. But you get what you pay for, so to speak. Well truthfully to me, this one is one of the worst McDonalds I've been to out of them all and I guess that's why I don't come here often. To stop here for me is that last minute "oh lets stop at McDonalds " and they are the one that is in sight when it comes out.  But the  question becomes how many times do you spend your  $$ where the service isn't worth it. One is really given them to much. But never the less this is McDonalds and people are going to spend $$ no matter how bad the service is.
This establishment does not deserve a star at all.. They are horrible when it comes to customer service. In fact it doesn't even deserve a 50 word review. So im stopping it here

McDonald's don't fall high on my list for choices anymore. It just seems like non of these places ever get it right! But not sure if its the day of the week or what, but this McDonald's is so{....} OMG, I'm at a lost for words. I have never eaten inside of this restaurant and for good reason.
