The tables are always dirty and if you want to sit at one you may have to clean it yourself. The floors underneath the tables have food. All around the soda machine it is dirty. Soda spilled all over and paper laying around like its the trash. The same guy that cleans the bathrooms also cleans the tables (picture that)! It never fails whenever I come here to this place it is always short of staff. It seems like they have one person per each job, but the one that gets me the most is they never have more than one cashier, no matter how long the line gets. And that person always seems like today is there first day. But trust me when I say if you go thru that fabulous drive thru. Make sure you check your order before you drive away.  The manager is always some young kid! They for some reason or another never get the orders right, don't ask for NO ONIONS, lord knows you are going to get plenty of them on that burger, way too much salt on the fries, if you can manage to get some Hot ones that is. I really only come to McDonald's for chicken nuggets now.(every other day) for my granddaughter. Shake machine here, lets just say I don't know why its still in the store... moving on because they earned their one star...ijs

I usually don't review any McDonald's but this place was disgusting. All the tables were dirty and the floor was all sticky. This place needs to hire a professional janitor because nobody throws away their trash therefore there is nowhere to sit. Also whoever decorated the place did a really lame job. Most McDonald's I've been to look nice with a theme, hanging french fry boxes up on the ceiling looks weird.  As for customer service... it is so-so. The person who took my order was grumbling and was rude. When I got my order they forgot a few things.

Although this location is pretty close to the other spot down florin road, I give it one extra star because although it IS McDonald's & customers don't help the situation either, so you can't fully blame McDonalds.  Could they use more workers? Yes. Could they keep it cleaner? YES! But that's life.  I usually stop for a diet coke, no ice. Aaaaand once a blue moon, a ice cream cone & anyone who loves vanilla loves that ice cream....it's especially ahhhhmazing of the cone is FRESH !  yuuuuuuum  Be aware of the long line in the drive thru, with 2 drive thru ordering stations and all... Be aware.

Nasty, unsanitary, filthy. My coffee came with a hair ball joined by a slime dark, God knows what, I havent stop vomitting since, noticed it when I was almost done. If you care for your health dont go here. Will never go back.

The owner or the manager style here is really like 'save every penny' style. They seems like lack of staff all the time and they put ketchup and straws inside the count, you have to ask for it every time, because They always forget to give you. Even more, if you ask for an additional sauce they will charge you for 25c. If not for their play ground here, I would never come here.
Kind staff in the early mornings.  drive thru busy sometimes in the early morning but I always leave with a smile with my sweet tea & hash brown.

YALL REALLY DON'T WANT TO MISS OUT ON THIS REVIEW. My cousin and I just got back from this McDonald's about 15 minutes ago. Let me start off by saying that I come to this McDonald's drive thru often and the line is always stacked! I'm not one to complain about the line though because I've worked in customer service before. Usually my visits are great here, BUT tonight's experience was terrible! The guy at the first window was extremely rude! I don't know if this employee was having a bad day or what, but he was rude when we ordered. At first I ordered two large fries, a lemonade drink, and a 10 piece chicken nugget. Our total came up to like $13 let's say. So my cousin and I wanted to pay for our own items and ask if we could pay $3 in cash and the rest on the debit card. First he said okay, but then he handed us the money 10 seconds later saying that he can't do that because we could cone him. Because supposedly that's what happened to him the last time he did something like that. We were fine with it and paid with the debit card and got our food at the second window. I got half way home and decided to check if I got everything, but nope I didn't receive 2 large fries, but only one. So I had to turn back around to purchase another large fries because the guy didn't charge me for it. The second time at the window he was still rude as before. When he handed me back my change he folded the money....like why did he do that? Keep in mind that these two visits I was being soo kind and using good manners saying please and thank you. I got home and the BOTH of the fries are crap. They taste straight up like ass. They were cold and not chewable at all. Also, the saddest part was they weren't salty at all and if you know McDonald's fries you know that they are always salty asf unless you ask them to freshly make yours. I called the same location and asked for the guy's name at the window JUST FOR THIS REVIEW. HIS NAME IS JOSEPH. He made this visit terribly awful and I hope he gets some good vagina tonight or something cause the boy acts like he could use some.

So I returned because I really wanted McDonald's. I also wanted to give them the benefit of doubt. What a very disappointing experience two days in a row.   The drivethru still took forever to respond. And when I had finally took my order the person who was taking the order just stopped. He did not say a word just kept silent while my dumbass just sat there like what the eff is going on. When I was like hello? This dumbass fool gonna say oh you weren't finished? Like wow... and you are who?   So I pull up and I asked him straight up are you going to compensate for the long wait and terrible service you have? He goes nope because there is only 2 people working. Now... what kind of structure do you have? Maybe, just freakin maybe, you should stop trying to hire so many of these young kids who obviously cannot work past 10pm to help you work the late shift. Or.. maybe you should restruct your staff better.  Someone had sent me a message pertaining to the location and how ghetto the workers are. Now I'm not trying to be judgmental so I won't consider that. However, what I'm going to say is... poor staff and customer service highly reflects on the training team, hiring managers, managers and the company itself. Obviously customer service is not as important as money therefore the way this particular store is structure is terrible. Yes I'm going to blame management, I don't give a damn what other priority you may have. If I was managing this branch I'd put the whole damn staff in check on what customer service is and why you should seriously do your job like you are supposed to.   I hope the damn district manager reads my review, because obviously they ain't doing their job. Why am I so anal? Because I worked for fast food industries before, been there done that, moved forward and now I run things. Ugh. Terrible just terrible.

Dear McDonalds Manager, if your ice cream machine messes up when dispensing a cone please don't tell your employees to flick the ice cream that made it into the cone back into the top of the machine.  This is VERY unsanitary and gross.  Instead please instruct your employee to throw the messed up cone in the trash and start over.  Please don't recycle food like this.  This makes me wonder what else you are doing in your store.

It was soooo hot inside. Of course menu is all the same. Cashier was great the only one taking orders when there was more than enough people for someone to be able to jump on the second register.  Cashier was great receipt doesn't give name... & I forgot to look. When we had a question for the manager I felt like she wasn't really helped.   Watching my fries being prepared... Looks like they pulled them early... Not exactly crispy golden brown...    but at least they were fresh... I guess... All of my order was packaged in one bag... I had to ask for another one... No ketchup was offered.... And when my order was called it was just left at the counter no eye contact... To ensure my happiness... I know it's mcdonalds but man I feel like it's your job customer service  maybe if it wasn't so hot it would have been better...

Ordered 2 sausage egg mcmuffins..  They asked if i wanted one with sausage and the other one with egg because they ran out of sausages and it'll be 3 minutes wait..  I said I'll wait..  Came home Only to find both with eggs and ham

NEVER go to this McDonalds it's not clean manager unprofessional a simple mistake was made on my order I had to deal with cups being snatched and slammed because they made a mistake It was the Manager that made the mistake I ask to speak to another manger and I was told with attitude I am the manager Totally unacceptable I thought McDonalds cared more about customer service but I guess not I called the corporate office and I still haven't heard from anyone NEVER go this McDonalds
Order was correct and hot. Service was friendly and fast. Plenty of seating here. Plenty of parking too.

If I could give zero stars I would. Sat in the drive through 15 min. Without moving after I ordered. Luckily there was an opening to get out of the drive through so I left. So did 2 cars behind me. Went to the Taco Bell drive through, got a breakfast burrito and left. Same cars still in the mc donalds drive through.

I like the smoothies at McDonald's but there's a problem finding McDonald's that will make them. I've tried to buy them 3x in the last month and a half) at this location but they keep telling us the machine is broke. My husband then called 2 more McDonald's in the general area to see if they had smoothies available only to be told that 1. The machine is being cleaned and it will be a few hours before they'll have them and 2. The machine is broke. If they don't want to make them, just take them off your menu, or as a franchise , are you allowed to do that? I'm not sure but we won't ever stop at this McDonald's ever again or the other 2 we called.
They need to upgrade the play area . All these climbing is making me go nuts.   Friendly service but she took my order wrong.  It's ok .  Just here killing time. ..

I would like to give zero stars but I can't. This restaurant Jason horrible service, I have been there 5 times and my order was wrong every time, or have asked to speak to the manager and after waiting fit 20 minutes of was greeted by a very rude, ignorant young lady who spoke to me like she was on g he streets, I was unable to receive any relief nor a refund, I was giving the wrong food and judging by the way the manager reacted I didn't trust asking for them to remake my order. I followed up by calling their corporate office/ franchise owner twice and never received a response. If their corporate doesn't care how the customers are treated or if they are even giving people their food than its no wonder why their employees are so rude and  disrespectful. The only way this McDonald's is ever going to get the picture is when they start losing money. I now go out of my way to go somewhere else to spend my money and I advise everyone I can to do the same.

The first time I stopped and the second, I did not write a bad review but after 3 times it is apparently just the WORST McDonalds ever!!   It took 20 minutes to get my food and in the meantime I saw so many horrible things I didn't want to eat my food much anymore... including a worker who noticed something was wrong with a burger, opened it, and saw a bite taken out of it and showed the manager. He said "what??" and he threw it out and just looked at the burger line workers in disgust and then kept working!   The lines just grew bigger as wrong orders were returned and exchanged! Yikes! An outbreak of sickness waiting to happen here...

I ordered food through drive thru but was asked to park on their reserved parking lot because the food wasn't done yet. I said ok. I was waiting for more than 10 minutes and decided to get a refund.  The workers accused me of lying. They said that they had already given me the food but never did, surveillance camera can prove that. Wasted my time. I will never go back to this mcdonald. Manager there should put their workers on check.  Keep up the bad customer service and sooner or later no one will go to this Mcdonald. This place doesn't even deserve a star. I had to in order to post this review.
When did Mcdonalds get so expensive??!  On another, this location's drive thru is pretty speedy.

Pretty sure the biggest morons alive work here. I order the food any its not that hard. A number two and a mcchicken. Dumb girl at the window completely forgot the mcchicken all together. Didnt give me any napkins either. I had to ask for them and then they told me if i wanted what i asked for in the first place i had to drive back thru. Management here sucks. Employees suck. Mcdonalds sucks! I am not going back to any of them for a while. Worst fast food in America!

I don't usually eat fast food breakfast, only when i have to go. But I haven't found a McDonald's that is satisfying. I'm sure a big platter with hot cakes is not literally just a sausage egg McMuffin next to a stack of pancakes. Really, if that's the case, I could have ordered a sausage egg McMuffin with a side of pancakes. Wtf. And to top it off, there was no line, so clearly shows they were not busy at all, why couldn't they make the order right. O, and where are the hash browns. I would like to get what I paid for. Their breakfast ain't cheap.
This McDonald's is so gross. Their dining tables were so dirty and sticky. When a girl was taking my order, she messed so badly, I didn't even get most of my order I wanted. Ridiculous.

It's fast good, faster paced food to go basically. If you want a great restaurant then go to one. Service isn't fast, but I'm sure it's due to the sporadic traffic. I'm one of those people who never orders fries from any fat food joint.  For good reason, I've never had fresh ones here. I point to what I said previously, they're fast food. You want gourmet from a dollar burger? You're doing drugs or need to start doing them
PLACE IS DISGUSTING! UNORGANIZED! Ordered 4 large French fries and they wanted to charge me 50¢ for each sauce. Place is ridiculous. I wouldn't RECOMMEND anyone to come to this place!

The customer service at this Mcdonald's is horrible. I was trying to start my day with a cup of coffee and a mcmuffin, but i had to wait over 20 minutes for my order. SERIOUSLY?! It was pretty empty too. Why should there be such a long wait? Shouldn't fast food be FAST? Well, guess not anymore. When I finally got my order, the mcmuffin was toasted too dark. I'm not expecting it to be perfect, but at least pay attention when toasting the bread. When I asked for a refill for my coffee, they happen to say they ran out of coffee. Definitely not coming back to this Mcdonald's anymore.

Can you people be any stupider? It's no wonder you don't have real jobs! I ask for a bacon quarter pounder without ketchup and onions and you imbeciles give me BREAD AND CHEESE. WHATS WITH THAT?! How do your window licking employees survive in this world long enough without forgetting to breathe?
Don't come between 3 and 4 during the week unless you like eating with a bunch of hormore ridden middle and high schoolers.

This used to be a perfectly good McDonald's, but they installed do it yourself kiosks which are so difficult to use, even the employees have trouble with them. I wanted a 10 piece chicken nugget meal. But the worker stationed at the kiosk kept trying to order me a child's nugget happy meal. He did this over and over again. Not only did he not understand the machine, he didn't know the menu. I finally figured out where to look for nugget meal and tried to pay with my card. The card reader has a sign that says "scan" card. To me, that means swipe. But to them it means insert. Why don't they just have a sign that says "insert card"? Paying cash is a two step process that will require to go to the counter after using the kiosk. And if you get a drink, you'll have to find a worker to get your cup.   As you can see, the new system is slow, cumbersome, and stupid. McDonalds is trying to save money by replacing humans with machines, but what's the point if you still need a human to work the machine, or go to the counter to either pay or get a cup? This is a big fail for McDonalds.  Regarding the food, on my most recent visit, I ordered from the kiosk and specified light salt on my fries. It's nice that you have that option. However, they pretty much ignored the request and gave me cold salty fries instead. The chicken nuggets were also lukewarm. It was very disappointing that they couldn't fulfill the most basic principle of food service: serve warm food. It wasn't busy that day. They must have actually tried to serve cold food.

This location is all over the place for me. The inside is super clean, the chairs are more comfortable than any of the chairs at the other locations I've been to, and the staff works pretty fast to get you in and out. My food has also always been hot. Some of the downsides though are that the fries are usually no good, the oil seems to be old which makes the fries taste gross and the color be really dark. The soda fountains are also meh, no fizz and low on flavor. And I always have to triple check my bag to make sure the order is correct from the number of times it's been wrong.

I'm so split about this location! I come here all the time for a quick snack/sweets/coffee for the family.  Let me start out by saying the morning crew is KILLER!!! They know how to be efficient while delivering quality, cheerful service!!  With that being said... NEVER. COME. AT. NIGHT.  The crew is careless, inconsiderate, and flustered every time. I've come here before their closing hour and they are REFUSING CUSTOMERS or have shut off a majority of their machines! Just today I came for some coffee for my late night and THEY SHUT THEIR MACHINE OFF AN HOUR AND FORTY MINUTES EARLY. Basically their night crew needs to stop being lazy and do their jobs.

This  a.m. I got around 9:30 and all I order was a 2 mcgriddles combos with no cheese or egg . No cars in front of me and I told at the window they need me to park ??? This location males you park for everything it seems . So this time I said just gimme my money back . I went to Jack n a box and was out in 5min or less . This location just seems to be slow when the regular lady isnt at the register . When in the drive thru the last thing customers want to do is WAIT!!!!
Dirty, dirty, dirty! Soda all over floor, sticky seating tables. Employees not sharp. Flies flying around. Order wrong...as the topper to the experience!
This place rushes you through the order, paying, and when they hand out everything at the window ... and then constantly misses items from your order!

First of all I would like to give this McDonald's location a good word and the only thing I can mention that's good about this place, is their morning crew. I order breakfast from McDonald's maybe once a month or so and I have never had any problems. The morning people tend to be quite friendly and are fast when it comes to giving their customers food.  For the most part however, I go to McDonald's for dinner more often than I do in the morning. I also want to mention that majority of the time that I go there I dine in. Recently they remodeled this location and have added electronic kiosks so that the customer can order their food from there. In addition they added new floors as well as tables and chairs.   Now I know that this may seem like a good thing, but ever since they remodeled I feel as if their staff especially those who work in the afternoon or late at night have gotten careless. For one thing the kiosks are a bit tedious. For example, if you want to use a coupon or pay with cash you need to go over to an employee so they can ring you up the normal way. Also if you have ordered a drink, you need an employee to provide you with cups.  Since this location has remodeled you would think that the employees would want to keep it looking nice and clean for their customers. Well to be completely honest they haven't been doing that at all. I went in today to order dinner which I did from the kiosk and got a cup from an employee. Then I went over to the soda machines and I noticed that the floor around the machines as well as the counter top was very dirty and sticky. Since they have kiosks at this location shouldn't that mean that there are more employees that are available that can clean? After getting my soda I went to sit in one of the booths, but they were all dirty with crumbs on the table tops. I looked at the other tables and they were the same way. I know a dirty table isn't that big of a deal, however I shouldn't have to clean it off myself because I am not an employee. Therefore I went up to the register and asked if they could clean the table off for me. The lady I asked then asked her co-worker to get someone to do it. Immediately I thought that she should've been the one to do it because she wasn't doing anything in the first place. I waited a few minutes and saw that they told an older female employee to do the cleaning. That to me seems somewhat rude. That gives me the impression that none of the young adults wanted to clean and the older employee was stuck with the task.  All of these things combined just makes me as a customer, unsatisfied with their customer service they provide. I would like to advise this location to clean up their establishment to create a much better eating experience.

Went in and was told I had to order my own food on the touch screen kiosk.  They were happy to show us how to use the ordering system, but wouldn't take our order at the counter.  It was easy, but time consuming and annoying. Then our food came, but not our drinks that we had to specify what we wanted on order. I'm not interested in helping McDonald's employees teach me how to get my own food to replace their workers.

This place is horrible worst McDonald's ever no changing table in the bathroom even though they have a play place. This i do not understand if you have a play place there should be a changing table. Place was dirty spills and food everywhere. The garbage can in the play area leaks and a kid slipped and fell in the garbage juice. The delivery service is nice but the worker walked past the spill 4 times and did nothing before the kid fell. There is no place to put the kids shoes and it stinks. There is not enough air flow.

During the remodeling I was told my granddaughter could "walk through" the drive through window.  Since she and her care provider do not drive this was the only way they could get McDonald food at this location.  They were later told they could not do this and today were treated very rudely and told they were there yesterday...They were not..There is NEVER any excuse for the kind of rudeness they were treated with today and I will be contacting the corporate headquarters with the employee's name that treated them this way.  There are no "happy arches" at this location...

Takes the fast out of fast food. Waited in line 10 mins inside just to get my order taken.  The cashier seems maybe new, slow. And theres only 1 when there should be 2 for this volume of people. The mcdonalds i worked at always made sure positions were well staffed and danger zones were taken care of. Definitely wouldnt pass a secret shopper. Bummed. Just wanted a quick bite to eat before i go from work to school . Then waited  7 mins for my food .  And only got it once i asked for it. It was in the hlz ready to go just didnt get it to me. Im now gonna be late to class.

Be careful coming to this McDonalds. I came here last night to get a quick bight for me and my boyfriend. I decided to try the quarter pounder with a steamed bun plain with cheese only. It was highly recommended from a food blogger who used to work at a McDonalds. When I asked for this request the girl didn't make it seem like it was a problem but when i got to the drive through window to pay I could hear the employee making my burger complaining and repeating over and over what are they requesting with an attitude. I was almost going to tell them to forget it and if it was too complicated to just forget it. I wasn't sure if that was a normal request because i never asked for it before, it was just recommended by a previous employee who said it would make your burger taste so much better! they gave me my food and i left. When I got home my burger was made the complete opposite! Tons of onions ketchup and pickles and NO CHEESE :( .They did steam the bun which was nice so i just took the onions and pickles off and took a few bights out of my burger. Sadly I couldn't finish it due to a really odd taste! My boyfriend joked saying they probably spit on my burger! No beuno! I through the rest of my burger out and just ate my chicken nuggets instead. Now here i am today at work running back and forth to the restroom with what i believe is a mild case of food poisoning. Which sucks because I'm recovering from being very ill. I will never come back to this location. You guys have been warned!
They've always gotten my order right and the workers so far are all friendly. The place is always clean inside. What more can you ask for?

I was just at the drive thru 15min ago. I come home to my uncomplete order. I ordered a #1 and the bigmac was never in my bag? I called several times, apparently no one ever picks up phone calls. The young lady at the 2nd window, stated that the big mac was in my bag too. This place needs to double check their workers, and us customers need to double check our food. I would drive all the way back, but that's just a waste of gas and time. What a waste of my money, since I didn't get my complete meal.
I had gone through the drive thru and was  almost to work,  when I saw ants floating in my iced coffee, took a closer look and they were in the ice. Yuck.

Well, for now, I'm the duke here, so I ought to write a review.  I like this McDonald's, the interior is nice and the service is always quick and the food is good.  While I try not to overdo it, I am "lovin' it" at least once every other week or so.  I like to get a bacon egg and cheese biscuit with the round egg.  Ba da da ba ba!

I am getting less and less free with my 5 star reviews as I see a difference in a true 5 star establishment, and a "good" establishment. That said I give them 5 stars.  Mc Donald's is McDonald's, sure, but there are still huge differences between good ones and bad ones. Here in Lincoln for example, there are 2 distinctly different McDonald's..  This McDonald's has always been quick, accurate, clean, and with smiling helpful employees. They have a large play place with its own family restroom and large windows. If there is ever a mess, left by inconsiderate customers say, (rare), an employee will cheerfully come right away and make it disappear. That is a big one for me.  Wi-Fi as is common to majority of McDonald's is readily available here so multitasking is effortless. They even do some fundraisers for local schools where they have teachers work registers and give a percentage of sales during that time to the school. Kind of cool.  I'm not big on fast food or anything, even if I do easy allot of it, but this McDonald's has earned 5 stars from me for sure.

Taking my business to Jack in the Box and Taco Bell where they actually care and still support the troops.  They used to offer a military discount.  I don't need one but it's always a nice gesture when a business offers one.  What I do expect is customer service and not some attitude when I ask about something this location had offered before.  I'm late posting this review and these employees may be gone but, so is my business.

This is my #1 go-to McDonalds. And as a huge MickeyD's fan, believe me, I've been to a lot of them.  Why this one is my favorite: - The best kid's play area around. It's relatively clean. There is a door to the kids' area, so unless an older child or adult opens it, my kid cannot get out. There is also a family bathroom IN the play room, so you can leave your kids to play and use the restroom quickly. It's also great to change a diaper, or let little ones go to the bathroom alone. - They have the good soda machines, with a million different flavor combos - The employees are nice, and are especially accommodating for those with kids. They often carry my tray to the kid's room, since my hands are already full - Food is regular MickeyD's food. If you like it, then it's the same here, fine. - It's clean. The tables are always clean, even in the kids' room.  My only complaint: - The temperature in the play room. Sometimes it's freezing and sometimes it's unbearably hot, but it's never comfortable. It's clearly on a separate control from the main dining room and no one can ever seem to get the temperate comfortable here.

Wow, that girl in the drive thru every time I go get breakfast, she always has an attitude and doesn't smile or say hi when I get to the second window, then when I leave she says "have a nice day!" (Sarcastically) um I won't have one because of that attitude. It almost ruins your morning. Someone please remove her from the drive thru. Ugh.

Clean, newer McDonald's. Like Rodel's review stated, they have a lot of Asian employees.  So if that's not your thing, you should probably find another McDonald's.    That said, the employees are very friendly, whether or not it's faked enthusiasm, I don't care, I'm fully aware that fast food workers are generally not working their dream job.  The lobby and dining areas are always clean.  While eating there I noticed that they had an employee dedicated to ensuring the place is clean, this is awesome.  The food is McDonald's, consistent with other locations, the temperature of the food is right and the portions are also consistently where they need to be.  Drive through is fast and accurate, much better than Burger King in downtown Lincoln  Recommended for those times where you crave good ol' American artery cloggin' fast food!

Slowest McDonalds drive thru I've ever been to... I am actually writing this review while waiting in line for my food.  This also isn't a one time thing... It's every time I drive thru here. I've been here in the morning, afternoon, and evening and the same slowness issue every single time.  Management needs to be either fired or retrained because they're obviously doing something wrong.   Half the time, the reason I choose McDonalds is they're usually the fastest food restaurant around... Not the case here.  I've never had a problem with the food, just horrible wait times.  Hire more staff or retrain the existing staff!

This McDonalds usually has amazing service however tonight there was a few mistakes. I called when we were home and realized. Even though I was clearly upset ( I'm like someone on the snickers commercial when I'm hungry) the manager on duty was amazing and deserves to be recognized by the owner for his amazing service! Not only did he remain calm and sweet as can be while dealing with me. He made sure to make the matter better and keep us as customers. I was so hungry I forget his name  however this took place tonight at 7:30! Thank you again!
Great place for my daughter to play. Big play place, hot food(better be.) Never had any issues here. Nothing but pleasant experiences!

drive through guy made my family laugh when he greeted us by name and a voice inside asked how he knew everyone's name, he replied, "it's on their  cards ". He was very friendly and cheerful.  The girl that handed out the food had the biggest smile. Great job.
My mother always told me if you dont have something nice to say..........
Always Yummy.  I end up going to a McDonalds at least a few times a week so the wife can have her daily "sweet tea with extra ice".

Very disappointed in management, I was eating a late lunch when a shorter female manager told another manager (I asked who they were) to write up an employee.  He told her he was uncomfortable doing this since he didn't agree, that "she" had not had a problem and he didn't count the drawer.  He told her she should do it.  The only other comment heard was do it out you'll get fired.  I will not eat here again nor support McDonalds.  The female manager was rather nasty and hateful.  I understand things are done but employees should not be disciplined in public and the young lady kept her cool.  Very unprofessional manager.
Place smells horrible, like smelly feet.  Something is not right with this place.  I recommend going to the Roseville location. As this place probably needs a visit from food and health.

Clean and friendly Mcdonalds... the only reason why I am giving this 5 stars is because they have never messed up my order and my food always tastes pretty fresh, like it has not been sitting in the back for a long time.   At sunset, this Mcdonalds has an absolutely beautiful view! Wow? I was so surprised to sit and enjoy the view of Lincoln Crossing. They also have comfortable chairs here but only a few...   Children mostly hang out in the play area, and the eating area is usually pretty nice and quiet.   One time, me and my sister went here to get $1 cheeseburgers (Im sorry but where the fuck else can you get those?) and the guy at the drive through told us to try the new cherry pie or something??? anyways we said no, but THEN he told us how HE LOVED THEM and THAT THEY WERE SO GOOD and HOW HE ALREADY HAD 2 OF THEM FOR BREAKFAST! My sister, trying not to crack up, decides to order one. We tried to keep a straight face at the window but damn... i guess you had to be there
Can't say what happened, but freshness and waiting time have become issues at this location. C'mon managers, move at a speed that encourages your employees to keep up with.
Breakfast is super fresh...my parents come here every Sunday because of it!

This is the worst McDonalds I have ever been too! They always screw up my orders, the fish usually tastes off and they only give you a half of a slice of cheese. Yes, I did say a half of a slice of cheese! The only redeeming this about this place is the very friendly staff.

Oh, I knew the first time I went through the drive-thru after a new manager had started that there was someone new in charge.  I live very close to this business and know it well.  They have always been absolutely unmatched in their efficiency at the window and I never received food that wasn't top notch: hot and fresh.  No longer.  Under the new management, there has been a slow line every time I have been in it and the last time we went through, I ordered a small chocolate milkshake for my poor father, a rare treat.  She hands me a cup filled with a slightly, very slightly tan-colored milkshake.  I said "that's not chocolate; I ordered chocolate."  The girl began arguing with me and, after calling (she called) the manager over, they both stood there and told me that was the way it was coming out.  I even said,  (because now I was just incredulous and genuinely surprised at their demeanor) "then you didn't make it right; I order them once a week!" and I got no change in there blank stares.  I finally got it; the customer is no longer king at the Lincoln McDonalds.  Luckily we can go up the street to the G street store - no problem!
McDonalds is what it is.  This one in the lowes parking long is always fast and never messes up my order.  People that work there are very nice.
Very rude service, the young lady at the register at 9:30am had a very poor attitude.
Poor Mobil order! Order two latte and it's been 30 min waiting and they still didn't bring my latte out to me. Poor service. Need better strategies and organization!

Unfortunately I have to leave a one star, if it were up to me I would give this place a -5 star rating. Completely rude staff, no acknowledgement of customer in the drive thru. I ordered a large combo #3 which is a double quarter pounder with cheese and a large fry. My large fry is filled up 1/3 of the way and my burger looks like Freddy Krueger assembled it.

Literally just left there 2 minutes ago & and the girl in the drivethru was very rude. & disrespectful. She shoved the bag of food to my husband and slammed the window. Absolutely no customer service here at all.

This is the worst McDonald's ever. As if there's a variance in different levels of crap service. This place has only the bare minimum number of people working at any given time. The lines are long, the service is slow. Go somewhere else. Seriously.

This visit deff sucked!!! And it's sad too... the crew there were kind and helpful but the food was terrible... I ordered two cheeseburgers, large fry, & a grilled artisan extra salt..   The artisan was for me and I was upset when I came home and it had this old sad piece of lettuce... and no tomatoes!!! Like really???!! Needless to say that is the only thing I was suppose to have to eat today and I only took 3 bites...   And the fries were cold per the usual... it doesn't matter if u try and tell them no salt.. or fresh... cuz it's not like they will actually do it anyways... it was upsetting about the fries cuz my 9 year old came to me and said he didn't want to eat them because of how cold they were...   Sad to waist good customer service in ur front of house.. when ur engine in ur back of house isn't working..
Ordered two sausage McMuffins and the muffins are burnt. Honestly they could have remade them we would have waited the extra minutes.

Customer service was friendly but food quality was horrible. Was there right before their lunch rush (if any based on the quality of their food). Paid for a large fries and it was the same amount as the regular fries. The fries were stale and kind of warm. They only had 4 kinds of drinks available and ran out of some of their burger options. My 'artisan chicken' had a small limpy piece of lettuce if you can call it that.  Very disappointed.  I knew there was a reason why I haven't been to a fast food in so long. And I only went today cause that's what my niece wanted for lunch. I had to ask her 3 times if she was sure McD was what she wanted.

Worst customer service I have ever experienced, this is the second time I've gone and they just don't know what the fuck is going on, I asked at the drive through window if i could get 3 ranch and 3 bbq and I paid the $1.50 then they had us wait on the side for out food and they only gave me the 3 bbq so I asked the girl if I could have the 3 ranch, I showed her my receipt and she looked in the bag saw the 3 bbq and then went to get the ranch and she comes back and tells me that they already gave it to me... but I didn't get it and she knew that. And last time I came I asked for ranch and bbq and they gave me BUFFALO SAUCE.... who does that? I'm done with this McDonald's

Rude as hell i swear if you dont like your job quit... God i hate mcdonalds but husband was craving it..... Id give them a 0.... They shouldnt hire just anyone to work there they should hire people that are jolly and friendly but then again alot put up a front during interviews..... And rude and on top of that on there phones ughhhh with loongg asss drive thru line sooo sad .. Last time we came here at 1:15am and the girl said sorry our systems are down and there was a car parked on drive thru window and they were just chit chatting we watched went around came back they were stilll there just talking....

Surprise, surprise: super slow per usual. Twelve minute wait in drive thru after 7pm for one soft serve cone and one original McChicken sandwich. Always this slow or worst St this McDs. Then the girl giving me my order is holding my cone without a napkin and she's not wearing gloves. Ugh.

Can I give this place negative stars??? They've always been horrible. 9 Times our of 10 they will get your order wrong. Got home today and one of my ten piece orders only had 9 nuggets and I had asked for sauce and they didn't give me any.

Ordered at the drive thru they made us wait at the curb size and told us our foor will be out right out but we waited for 10 mins just for 20 pcs. Chicken nuggets. I called the store while waiting in the car they picked up and they put me on hold i can hear the conversation  bad bad service.

This store has a small amount of stars for obvious reasons. How do you snap at a customer for asking if you're serving lunch and still require for me to park on the side for a sausage Egg McMuffin... So they don't even have sausage Egg McMuffin's ready but they're not serving lunch yet... So WTF are they serving?? The employees are rude and just trashy.

Food is always stale here i havent had a rude worker yet but food here is no good the place is always dirty i understand iys in a gas station but come on now families eat here you know i dont know how they pass the inspection

Do not go to this McDonalds! I don't know what they have going on but I have been here 3 times for Mocha frappes and have had diarrhea EVERY time! I don't know if they don't clean their machine out or what but it's definitely some type of food poisoning. At first I thought it was a fluke but I guess I'm a gluten for punishment, and three times out of three I have gotten sick.   What makes it even worse is...I waited in the drive thru foreverrrrrr just to get the damn drink only to barely make it home each time....

These employees need to be trained properly. Not only did I wait in a long line but as I went to go pay for my order the employee had her back turned to me but not so much that I can't see her texting or playing on her cell phone.  It's called fast food for a reason so that I can place my order and get my food and not so that I could be waiting on employees not doing their job.

No stars. Waited for our food for 15 mins and made our order wrong. Another customer who came after us received his food and another customer ordered 2 iced tea and he also waited 15 mins. Ladies at the counter doesn't look like they want to work. Probably there just collecting their paycheck. SMH...
This McDonald's seems to charge more than others. Why? Is this the rich part of Stockton?!?  It's in a Walmart parking lot and you need to be buzzed into the restroom. Service was fast and friendly.

This Mac Danold is so bad. Service is horrible. Never give you all your food or they give u somebody else (drive through). The line is always long because they are slow. They ask what sauce for your nuggets but they don't put any in your bag. I live near them and I stop by there often for my kid. Everytime I come out of there very angry and disappointed. I just can't say enough how bad this Mac Danold is. Very bad. They need to do something.

I usually go this McDonalds but today was pretty bad. It super packed and I was in the drive thru. The girl who took my order didn't understand me much. She kept telling me to hold on. The girl at the first window, was slow. It was like she did not know how to approach my order or my total. SHE WAS ON HER PHONE. She also told me the wrong total. They need to tell her to get off her phone. They also charged me for coffee that I did not order but was nice enough to exchange it for a smoothie.
This is the worst McDonald's in Stockton. The employees are rude, the food is stale and there is always a long line.

Drove in to get breakfast at around 11:30. Pulled in the drive thru to make my order. Placed an order for two sausage egg mcmuffin "MEALS". Saw the total was shorten then usual. So I made sure I confirmed that it's "two meals. Two orange juice, & hash browns". She acknowledged my order. Pulled up to the window to pay and a young lady ask if I was the one who ordered the sausage egg mcmuffin meal, I responded with yes, and that I order two of those meals. The young girl said "yes the two mcmuffins". So here I am thinking, maybe the price have gone down? I made sure twice that we were on the same page for the order. When I pulled up to the window to pick up the food, not to my surprise they give a sausage egg mcmuffin meal with an extra sausage egg mcmuffin sandwich. I explained to the lady at the window what happened, who then got her manager to remedy the situation. The manager came to me, and I expressed everything that happened, and she told me to have better communications with the window next time. Wth? I just explained I confirmed the orders with them because it was clear that they weren't getting it right the first time. They acknowledged my order, and yet the order is still wrong.. this place needs help, and better management.
Worst fucking Mc Donald I've been to! Been in line for a good 15 minutes and I'm still in line posting this!

So just came in last night for a simple ice cream cone. There were 2 girls at the counter just chit chatting with a customer and another one just milling around in the dining room. I was stared at for a good 5 mins and then one of the girls behind the counter yells out "COUNTER"! It's like no one wanted to take my order.
Horrible service. I ordered a chicken nugget happy meal for my kid and instead of nuggets it was tarter sauce. And when I went back there the manager was acting like it was my fault

Nice service, food cane out fast. But when you are here at 10am and order breakfast before 1030 and on your food you have a monopoly piece for a free breakfast sandwich and they font honor it 7 minutes after 1030 after you purchased breakfast already ticked me off but besides that everything was alright

Went in on Sunday 10/23 at 6:29 for ice cream and the whole store was filthy! Garbage was over flowing with garbage. The floor around the whole store had some type of garbage. Tables were dirty and the counter smelled like poop. The clerk looked unhappy and I heard the manager talking mess about a person who complained at the drive through. Never again will I go  there again gross.

CHEAP as hell!!!! Want a large coffee with your meal??? One dollar extra. Need I remind you drinks here cost $1 regardless of size and you are already being charged for a drink. Want to substitute your hash brown for anything else, $1 charge. Oh your 1st coffee had 2 sugars and 4 creams but you want an additional cream because coffee was stronger than anticipated? Sorry, I can't do that. You'll need to buy another one. WOW!!!!!!! Only come here if you are desperate!!!
Horrible McDonald's. Customer service is very bad, they were very rude to us and their ice cream machine is never working! It smells inside and there are flies. Horrible.
Gal taking our order got the order wrong after we repeated our order to her. No salt on the fries and no ketchup either.

McDonald's while shopping here at Walmart I decided to have breakfast here ,Greeted by the cashier and ordered my breakfast of Pancakes, coffee, and desert. When I was putting my shopping cart aside.The breakfast order was ready within less than 5mins how impressive with fast service! The food was hot on the tray with all the condiments.  The restaurant was immaculately clean ,no clutter of carts or trash around dinning area.I will surely come back when shopping here ! The McDonald employees are very polite and they are effective on delivering your food hot .I use to just order and leave ,but now on Ill dine in here while shopping . Customer Service  Food Restaurant  5 Stars

This is horrible, I wanted a RoloMcFlurry but they gave me an cookie and cream or Oreo whatever McFlurry instead. I look at my receipt and was like, this ain't want I wanted. Where my rolo McFlurry? My husband didn't want to go inside and complain so we just left! I hate how they gave me the wrong order but I was like whatever at the end. A McFlurry is better than nothing but get the right one and look at what I order correctly .

Give 2 stars to McDonalds in general.  Sadly went into drive thru tonight. Shocked to hear one single big mac is $5.33 for sandwich only. If Im going to b ripped off. I prefer my robber to have a Gun on me ! Ludacris price.  ! All a big mac is , is 2 single cheese,  3 pieces of bread with thousand island dressing. Not supposed to be a $Thousand Dollars !

I would give a 0 star if I could. Ordered drive thru, forgot to order a Big Mac. Added at the cashier window and my price went up so I assumed everything was okay. Went to next window no Big Mac added so I asked to add on. Was asked to wait at reserved spot. Waited there for 15 minutes before the person comes out with 1 Big Mac. The rest of my order not there. She comes back with a happy meal. I hadn't even ordered a happy meal. She came back with my order. I checked there was 3 sandwiches but 1 Big Mac was still missing. I went inside to order and pay for it. Got it 5 minutes later which is fine. Went home thinking everything was okay. They gave me 3 Big Macs and no crispy chicken and no cheeseburger. This place has always been bad. They are in desperate need for actual management. While inside I noticed the people can't even manage to balance helping customers and getting them the food. Saw a fella wait 5 minutes for a soda since their outside soda machine was out of that flavor.

If I could give a negative star I would. Lines are Too long for how horrible the food is there. The employees need to be retrained. Got a mc chicken and the patty was so thin/hard it was like chicken jerky. Honestly has to be the worst mc donalds in stockton.

This is by far the worst McDonald's in all of Stockton I've tried to give them the benefit of the doubt multiple times n they forget items in my order when I ask for extra pickles they put them on the side give u cold fries due urself a favor n go somewhere else

This McDonald's was messy garbage on the floor swept employees walking around picking up trays food wasn't bad, except the flies landing on me while I was eating it. It's trippy that no one Put a broom on the floor here, or stains on the floor place is a mess... Then I tried to complain on the McDonald's website and after filling out all the information I was told that I didn't have permission to access that website... Which means I can't complain to McDonald's about the condition of McDonald's.

Worst mcdonalds in stockton! Constantly messing up the order. And when and if they do get it right its a complete mess the food almost cant be ate. I have no idea who they have working here or if its the manager but this mcdonalds is a f****** disaster!

We came here to purchase regular black coffee, we're told to wait in our car and they will bring it out. I decided to walk in instead only to see that there are no customers inside, no line, and I ask for my coffee. Kayla was very nice although she had no idea what coffee I was talking about. We have to return to this McDonald's to bring our coffee back because it is absolutely HORRIBLE to say the least. Kayla was very apologetic and helpful, she tells me one of the coffee machines is broken so she cannot make a particular iced coffee. I decided on an alternate iced coffee and AGAIN, ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE. It's coffee, how hard can it be to make good coffee? WE WILL NEVER RETURN TO THIS MCDONALD'S AGAIN. Thank you Kayla for trying to accommodate us, however the coffee is horrible, there is nothing you can do to fix that!

All I ordered was a sausage egg mcmuffin and first they gave me one with no egg then they gave me one with the wrong type of egg. I normally don't even write reviews but I just felt these employees need a better manager to help them with making orders

This is quite possibly the slowest McDonald's drive-through I've ever been in. I hate Stockton. Hate it. After this long wait, 20 minutes, the attitude filled cashier barely says a word to me, no apology, says 10 piece McNuggets and acts like I'm crazy when I correct her that it was 20 then tells me that's what she said. Maybe she did, it was hard to understand her mumbling. Rude, slow, pathetic franchise. Someone should probably just wipe this whole city off the map.

I sent my son up to the counter to get some sauce to take home. I had him ask for five barbecue five sweet-and-sour. I was waiting off to the side and I saw that he was standing there for a while so after about five minutes he comes to me and says mom they don't have any sweet-and-sour sauce. I say OK so tell them just to give you all barbecue that way they don't have to cancel the order and make it so difficult for the cashier. So he's there maybe another five minutes comes back to me and says mom they don't have any barbecue either. So I tell him OK go back and get your money back. So he standing up there again for another five minutes. So I look at him and he looks at me and I put my hands up in the gesture like what's going on. He waves for me to come towards him and as I'm walking over there the cashier yells at me across about five customers and says I'm waiting for my manager it's not my fault. So I addressed the young lady, I told her At no time is it professional for her to yell across customers to me. She replies well you Look like you had an attitude. I said I didn't say one word to you before you started to yell at me over a bunch of customers. She said well it's not my fault so you're gonna have to wait I said my son is been waiting 15 minutes. She says oh well and starts attending other customers. So I ask for a manager the manager finishes with the customer she's assisting and then comes to me I let her know the situation about the sauce and tell her that I'm just waiting for my refund but I also let her know about her employee that decided to yell at me not just raise her voice but she was very rude and she yelled at me in front of a bunch of customers. The manager then tells me we have a bunch of barbecue sauce my apologies I'll get them for you. So she gets me the sauces and as I'm walking out I hear the cashier say that bitch had attitude. I'm not from Stockton so I didn't do what most people from Stockton would have done.
Hella flies everywhere look dingy you got one employee that look like the slug lady from monsters inc

So the cashier decided that she was too lazy and did not change my order so it'd be cheaper for me. Instead of 2 mcpick orders she sold it as it was as 4 separate burgers. So I basically paid 35% more.. and their service is horrid when they are busy. Also got my order wrong. What the hell..
This has got to be the slowest McDonald's drive thru I've ever been to!!!  All we were getting were ice cream cones.  Almost 20 minutes!!!

This is review about how the food here gave me the stomach flu.  It was either here or Peets Coffee because those are the only two thing I had on 12/21/2015 and I'm still feeling very sick today as of Christmas 12/25/2015.    So I ordered two sausage egg muffins from here (this is about the second time I order McDonalds in years).  I gobbled it down and the very next morning:  Nausea, chills, muscle ache, and diarrhea.  Since it's the holiday week, you can imagine how many events I have to cancel.  This place is not a safe place to eat if your stomach isn't used to it.  Avoid this place if you can.

I'm writing this review a bit late. This happened when they were still doing their Monopoly game. I was craving their chicken nuggets, so I asked my boyfriend if we could stop by. Pulled up to the drive-thru and ordered chicken nuggets. Right as we tell the worker that we have a coupon for the meal, she loudly yells, "NO!" My boyfriend and I look at each other with confused looks on our face and started questioning her. She then sharply replies, "Are you asking if we have coupons?!" Seriously?! Even if we were asking for coupons, that is no way you respond to a customer. Customer service 101! T__T  Fast forward to us receiving the food and are about to eat. I open the bag to reveal that it is absolutely NOT what I had ordered. I'm a very patient person, however this is not the first time this McDonald's has messed up our order. I am not exaggerating in the least when I say that every time I come to this location, there is always something wrong with my order. The only time I ever come to this location now is when I am either with my mom or boyfriend. I prefer the one on Hammer and Thornton!

Employees were very  rude not even a good morning or a thank you or even eye contact when at the drive thru window. I received my food get home and eat my sandwich and get half way thru and bite into almost half an eggs shell within the cooked egg..gross never coming back. Terrible food and service..I know it's just fast food but at least make an effort to meet the minimum standard in the industry.
Pit stop....Worst and slowest customer service ever. They should hire new people, or shut it down. I stayed in line for 25 mins...didn't even order...and just left. Not worth giving my money to.

This is a review for the McDonald's by Walmart off of 99.  I just went through the drive-through here and ordered a small hot mocha and a small french fry. The drive-through took quite a long time. When I finally got to the window, before she handed me my bag I asked if I could get one ketchup.  She shouts "NO" with a loud irritated voice!!! Then she says "just kidding", without even smiling.   In the drive-through employees have a small amount of time to make the customers feel happy. Not put them off!!! Not funny drive-through girl...
Beaky was awesome great customer service! Way to go! Best mc Donald's to date! She was very patient with our  order
I would not come to this place. The have roaches crawling on the floor and it seems that manager really didn't care! Who to know if it does get in the food

Decided to get a quick bit to eat before I head back to work for my second shift. Ordered 4 sandwich with my boyfriend. Drivetru right, waited at least 5 mins until an employee came to the intercom after saying hello anyone there for the millionth time. Ordered 4 sandwiches, simple 2 mchickens, 2 mcdoubles. Waited for my food for 32 mins in the drive thru. Looking thru the glass window seen 6 employees standing around! Finally got our food, expecting to get piping hot sandwiches but nope barely just warm, and at that no napkins! I ended up being late to work because these kids who I would say are about 8 of them working that night.

Horrible ! Horrible ! Horrible ! Horrible ! cold fries , dry cheese burger and long wait,never in my life will I ever go to this McDonald's location because they don't even know how to make their food right.

We got some things off the value menu and fries it wasn't too too bad but this location had probably the worst service (at least on nights) they are always so mean and not friendly the fries were not fresh at all seemed like they were sitting for 10 mins and McDonald's fries definately need to be fresh! I'm disappointed with this location it should be so much better

Just a typical updated McDonald's in Stockton with typical fast food service. I don't ever approach a McDonald's and expect great customer service. Plus, I'm only paying $3.69 for a McDouble, small fries, and a large coke.  I'll be back here again, regardless of the food quality and service, because I live two blocks away and I am not trying to drive to Lower Sac and Hammer for the next nearest McDonald's. Plus I'm tired of Taco Bell and Wendy's.   Next time I'm gonna try a #2 with Mac sauce.

Worst customer service ever. Had a african-american lady by the name of Markieda(?) working at the drive thru who was giving me and my girlfriend an attitude like something was up her butt. She even have the guts to mock us and plus did a hiss sound with a disgusting look on her face. This is a customer service job and if you can't do the job, then please find another one. We did not take the order and went to another window and found out the other african-american employee was also cooperating with Markieda (?). She was also giving us an attitude. We ask to speak to the manager and she said, "Oh you want to speak to this manager here? That's even better. She's good." We spoke to the manager and yes, she was being very formal and polite, but it just seem she didn't even care at all. She said she'll take care of it. I understand how busy it gets, but if one of your employee is acting beyond her job description as a customer service representative, then you really need to take her out from that position and get her to cooking without any contact with the customers. We were frustrated and furious. So we also decided to take it to corporate. I am never coming back to McD and will recommend anyone not to come to this one either. If nothing is done with this situation, then I will take it further and make sure something is done. I've worked in a fast food place and other customer services before, and this is yet the most disgusting service I've ever experienced. If any employees who are reading this, put that Markieda woman in her place. Do your job, not your attitude.

Rudest employees ever!! Just wanted ice cream in a cup and I was told oh we charge u for a sundae and just don't put topping I said ok then was ask so u want  t to be charged??! Then get to the window to get the Ice cream she hands it to me and stares I'm like where is my other stuff .. Then they were struggling with the ice cream machine looked like it was out and then another girl came over and said the machine isn't working u want a refund or what??! Really!! Horrible customer service!!

Big breakfast was horrible. The scrambled eggs had a polished sheen to it; as if sitting way too long. Go elsewhere for breakfast; why buy old food when so many other places serve fresh food. Btw coffees good, didn't taste at all like spit. Perhaps they serve walk-ins new food.

I was in a McDonald's watching a friend's kid so she could run off and do something fun, I guess, I wasn't listening.   I saw a couple I knew there so we sat by them.  The guy went to the bathroom, and I proceeded to do what I always do put the patties between napkins to drain grease.   (I don't eat meat  but I thought it was my duty to the kid.)  I guess I was yakking so I didn't notice this might look funny to some people seeing my pile of  4 or 5 napkins are crumpled up after a grizzly greasy death. In the past, a witness said, "So you basically want a dried out hockey puck."    I always bring a packet of coffee with me to "fix" their vanilla shake.  When the guy came back, he caught me mixing the coffee into MY shake and said, "Can't you eat anything the way it comes?" The wife said, "Oh you missed the best part- the wringing out of the patties." She didn't even mention when I wiped off the cheese and sauce from the patty.

Whoa is that sad they have a DRINK ROBOT! No teenager just stainless steel. Got a large drink because it was 100' outside, and they are only a $1. To review my favorite restaurant McDonald's, inside East Stockton WalMart. It was extra filthy with crud at the bottom of the non functional dispenser if hand sanitizer. Empty dining room yet trash all over but average being inside WalMart get an extra star.

I try to order breakfast at 10:31am and I get told "we don't have that" cause they stopped at 10:30am. Is this candid camera? ARE YOU FREAKING KIDDING ME??? Customer service BLOWS! Have you seen the movie Falling Down where the guy goes ape-sh** when in this exact same scenario? Instead of going ape-sh** I just went to Jack-in-the-Box down the street however...
Stay away from breakfast and lunch time. Sometime it is better to go in and order then going through the drive thru. I do like their any size of coffee for a dollar.

YUCK, since I used to work @ mcdonalds and I know how disgusting &how poorly the food is made, I dont eat the food. This Mcdonald's is SLOW, the cashiers are rude and the table people who make the burgers don't wear GLOVES when 'grilling' the burgers and making the burgers. GROSS. No wonder a lot of people complain about having hair on their burgers.
Such a waste of space. Customer service sucks, people sucks around there and food is gross.

Long lines and they forgot our patties...We came to order the quarter pound burgers for the dollar deal and two of the burgers had everything but the patties... How can that happen? It was upsetting when you count the boxes and thought everything is right before you drove off and now at home realizing that they forgot the patties.  We drove back and got two new ones, but it was so inconvenient.

(This is for the McDonald's over at Chevron.)  We have to stop going here, but it's my nearest McDonalds.   The cup lid holder and where you get the straws are FLOODED with spilled Coke. When I wait 5 minutes for my cheese and ketchup only McDouble, when I open it, the cheese looks like it was SMASHED onto the meat. The good thing is, is that the fries are nice and golden-salty, and the burger was fresh. When I order a plain filet-o-fish, the bun is hard as rock. I rarely get my McDouble wrong, but it happened before.  This is the part of my review when you wanna never go here:  It was a nice summer day. I was hungry, so I went to McDonalds to get breakfast. I ordered a Big Breakfast w/ Hotcakes, and they gave us the bag. When we went home, Our big breakfast had nothing but used and eaten leftovers. Who would just eat a customers' food right after they cook it? So I called McDonalds, and we got it the next day. Still horrible service as who would wait more than 24 hours just to get their food?   They recently remodeled for 2014, and it was nice.. but that didn't stop me from noticing the unchanged service.  EDIT: I have given this three stars before, but due to the worse service since I first wrote the review I change it to 1 star- but due to the nice remodeling I take a star back.  Worst but nearest McDonald's I have ever went to.

The sorry a$$ excuse for so called service. If I can review without giving any stars, I would. Went there one time and was in line for drive-thru. Got there @ 10:20am, but because their idiotic reps were taking so long by the time it was my turn it was already 10:35 and I was told they no longer served breakfast... Seriously? And just now, I was in line, again for drive-thru for 10 minutes. My son only wanted 2 large sweet tea but I told him I wasn't about to go out of my way just to buy sweet tea at McDees so I got him 2 McDoubles. They took my order and when I was about to pay, I was told they no longer had sweet tea... Jesus!!!!! Do they do any training at all??? A multi-multi million dollar franchise and they can't spend some money on training. NEVER AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Get crunk get crunk get crunk (let me see ya)... So what you waiting for hit the door put the pedal to the floor.... Meet me at the McDonald's parking lot!!!  So there are actually two McDonald's within this parking lot (one at the Chevron gas station and one inside the Wal-Mart Supercenter).  As you can see by the title of this business listing, I am speciflcally reviewing the one inside the Wal-Mart Supercenter.  I am from the Department of Redundancy Department.  Was hella hungry around 9:30pm and Perseus had to gas up at the Chevron.  Since that McDonald's was still open, my complaining gastro-intestinal tract led me towards the golden arches.  However, per Perseus' recommendation, we headed to Wal-Mart because he needed some cereal.  May I remind the readers that sales tax in Stockton has now increased from 7.75% to 8.00%.  8.00% is significantly less than the 8.5% Sales Tax in San Francisco, and relatively less than the 8.25% Sales Tax in Daly City.  Bottomline: you will not be raped as much with Sales Tax when you buy your cereals in Stockton.  So he goes off to buy his cereals and I go to the McDonald's inside the Wal-Mart Supercenter.  It is located on the left side, if you are facing the Midnight Mall from the outside.  They didn't have the grilled chicken snack wrap (only had crispy kind), so I opted for the cheapie $1 bacon cheeseburger, a soft-serve vanilla cone, and a small fries... for $3 and change.  Once I got my food, I proceeded to a relatively clean table, as most were trashed due to the lackadaisical ways of the customers and/or employees.  I felt up my burger, which was seemingly hella thin.  I thought, "dang, the burgers are getting smaller and smaller by the day."  I opened it up and, lo and behold, the burger patty was not in the sandwich.  All I got was some bacon, pickles, ketchup, and mustard.  I brought it back and the cash register lady apologized, then proceeded on mocking the sous chefs in the back for fucking up my burger.  (Bad move.... don't scold the sous chef in front of the customer!  Just apologize, make me a new burger, and let's move on.)  While waiting for my replacement burger, my fries got cold.  I enhanced the fries by eating them with the soft serve vanilla.      This McDonald's does not have a "Playland" section, but they have puzzles and little wall-mounted trinkets for little children to play with in the back.  If you are a parent and have children, please be cautious about your children's involvement with these mounted puzzles/trinkets.  They are teeming with bacteria, so please keep a close eye on your children if they decide to put their mouths on those things.  (this is USEFUL).  I don't even know where I'm going with this review.... but isn't it good to  know that you can grocery shop and go to McDonald's in the same location?

being an unfortunate Stockton resident, I've frequented this mcd's on several occasions (there, i admitted it!). the last time i ate here was sometime in october/early November. I've put up with the filthy tables in the past, tolerated the lack of parenting skills with the ghetto families and their illegitimate brood running all over the place, and survived eating their mediocre excuse for fast food. what had been the last straw for me on my last visit, was that the mcd's here were doing some form of remodeling, making the eating area smaller, and removing the self serve drink fountain in the process. having done a rigorous round of last minute shopping and grabbing something quick to eat at mcd's, i went over the counter to grab a refill on my coke after i noticed that they no longer had the self serve fountain... "seventy five cents." was the reply from the thick-pilipino accented witch (no hate mail to me I'm pilipino too).  now, for those of you who know me, here's the rundown: 1) i just shopped at WalMart 2) i just bought a mcd's meal 3) I'm a Stockton resident 4) I'm Ilocano Stockton resident so, in consideration of the above, HELL NAW am i gonna pay a fricken "sebenty-pybe-sents" to get a refill on my soda! being a cheap-ass that i already am, I'm gonna boycott this mcd's until they get the self serve fountains back, and just head over to the mcd's across the street at chevron- eat there and get gas as you would say, but thats another story...

This is so sad the place is real nice they cleaned it up pretty good they did some reconstruction to the dinning area,and inside the kitchen the workers are super fast they try as much as they can but I've been to breakfast maybe three times during this month and they're so understaffed they cannot keep the line going because they are so understaffed it's sad that the reviews probably show a bad review but it's not the workers fault  it is the owners fault they do not want to pay more money so they have the restaurant so understaffed it is a shame that they are so miserable the owners of this place that they do not put one or two workers more.

If you guys want a horrible experience and a bunch of frustration go to this McDonald's.  I ordered 2, 20 pc nuggets, (which is 40 total) a bacon McDouble, a Big Mac combo, and a large fry. Pretty simple right?  Well... the lady that was doing my order in the drive thru said everything correctly. But when I got my receipt it said 2, 10 pc nuggets a large Big Mac meal with a medium coke, a bacon McDouble and another 10 pc nugget.   I went up to the 2nd window. I told the lady that was handing the food out, what the problem was. She said you can give me $5 dollars for the 10 pc nugget and I won't trip over the change. I asked her if they still did the 20 pc for $5 she said yes. And I was thinking to my self that doesn't make any sense. I also didn't see the large fly on there. She said I can give you the large fry for the inconvenience. there wasn't any bacon in my bacon McDouble.  And she only gave us 3 dips for our 30 f***ing nuggets.   I don't think I will be going back to this mc Donald's again until they hire new people that actually know what they are doing.

Today 0t/18/2018 i went in to the McDonalds on 2517 Del Paso Blvd and it took almost 8 minutes to get one ice cream cone...The is that...its lime this all the time so its not like its a one tims thing...they really need to take this store from the owners... This place is horrible I place my order and paid at 1:37 cashier was wonderful but the waiting time was garbage I didn't get my food till 1:57pm 20 min of them running around like chickens with there heads cut off the older lady that was in charge of the line and expedite the orders was not doing anything to help the production and when I got my food it was already cold their promise of the double quarter pounder being made right when you order it doesn't matter to them. this manager and crew are a disgrace to the restaurant.i was just verbally assaulted by manager and workers. a soda thrown at my truck by a worker.manager watched and contributed ti the behavior..worst management i have ever seen.delpaso mcdonalds is a disgrace

Slowest McDonalds of ALL time! I must confess I frequent this establishment for my $1 drink;especially in warmer weather..but this location is by FAR the slowest within I'm sure a 20 mile radius! I don't know WHAT is going on with the drive through at this location but I HOPE someone in the corporate office sees this and acts accordingly! The past few times I've made the MISTAKE of going through this drive through I only stopped because the line did not seem that long and THEN I figured out WHY! You literally wait about 20 mins until you get to order and while you're sitting there, multiple cars exit the drive through and LEAVE! The drive OFF because the line is not moving! Well today had to be the third time at least within the past month I have been through here and at least 3 cars drove off while enduring said LOOONG wait. I'm writing this review not JUST to complain but to fair warn others so they don't make the same mistake I did by going through here.. ALSO with the hopes it may catch the right person's attention. Well..my lesson has been learned and the cashiers no offer of apologies and blaze attitude about it confirmed it's the new "norm" at this location.

The old lady would not let me use the washroom, and I really wish she wouldn't have... it was SO GROSS. Like it hadn't been cleaned in days, I walked right out. Both toilets were clogged and toilet paper all over the ground. And the sink was filthy.

This is by far the worst McDonald's in Sac. Every time you go through the drive-through they always give you attitude. I was in line today, they have a split ordering lane. I came up first and was told to wait, the car next to me came after they immediately took that order and made me wait like three more minutes. I left, it's always a problem here. I will go out of my way from now on just to go to another one.
Slooooow, dirty, and locked bathrooms. Not what I expect from a Mcdonalds.  I'll have to drive a little further next time.
Rude. They always forget your orders. Never leave until you check your food. Or just dine-in. But I hardly visit this one anymore only sometimes because I live close by
They take forever and there store is never clean and they don't cook there food all the way . They don't care about there customers

I never write bad reviews but this will be the first  we went to McDonald's so i can buy my 4 year old  son some lunch and this happened on 5/4/2018 we order from the drive thur they gotten are order wrong when i ask for 4 strawberry and cream pie but instead thet gave me apple the fuck I hate Apple pie and what else did they do wrong we also order ice cream that I never gotten my ice cream 0.89 cent wasted. And to top that off my son fries was cold and they didn't give him no sauce with his nuggets. My son was unhappy my baby didn't even want his food anymore he was looking forward to his lunch sad shame i wasted my money on this and other thing we pull up to the drive thur window to get are food why the worker kept asking what we order the fuck like i know damm well all McDonald's has a screen that show all order the fuck I use to work at one and fries dont get cold fast. I only live 3 min away by car. They need fire everyone and hire all new people for real never come here
Ordering food why does it take sooooo long to get your order especially in the drive-thru.
This McDonald's never gets the orders right and there's always homeless people begging for money. It's nasty!!!!

I am only giving this McDonald's 1 star because at least the sweet tea is always good. The only reasons I frequently go here is it is on my way to work and near a business I go to on a weekly basis. The staff are always extremely rude when you walk in. All they seem to care about is drive times and break times. I was made to wait five minutes before a staff member even came to the counter and when I tried to give my order he said he wasn't taking my order and walked away. Then I asked to speak to the manager and that was a big joke. The manager was rude and argumentative. She said the drive-through times and employees breaks were her first priority.

Where do I start ? If you want McDonald's stay away for this one it is absolutely horribble it must be managed by 3 year olds the drive threw is a mess be prepared to wait 10 -15 minutes with 3 vehicles ahead of you they have two order windows and one of them actually works but don't advise the public the children 5years old need to prove they are customers before using the restroom facility what a horrible policy to make customers provide a recipt before using their restrooms if you want to get a meal GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!! it will definitely be worth the drive of 2 miles this McDonald's needs new management it is being ran into the ground.

If I can give zero stars I would..I went to get some food at this location on Delpaso Blvd today January 31st at 11pm an the drive through woman was a complete bitch an Hella rude kept rushing me to make a selection.told me she closing soon an it would take her a a minute to make or food an our smoothie an she has other ppl in the drive through...I DON'T CARE MAKE MY SHIT I ORDERED.....answering every question with a attitude ..and when she gave me my total an told me to pull forward she forgot to turn her mic down an we heard her say "OMG..UGGHH " AN HUFFED AN PUFFED. if u hate your job move on don't get it to customer service..that bitch should be fired.period

The food has always seemed decent when I went through the drive thru. But after going inside due to the line, I will never eat here again. The area around the front door is disgusting. Homeless people sit outside with their belongings. The inside looks like its never seen a mop.   I definitely will not be eating here again.

If I could give 0 I would. First of all, the lobby is completely closed down. That's sanitary. Then I finally get my turn and I ordered.
