Went there this weekend and ordered 7 hashbrowns and found these disgusting black gooey slime in them. So nasty! Tried calling corporate about it and no explanation has been given. I mean these were large black chunks off goo.

I have officially stopped going to this location..the customer service is poor and the homeless people harass customers..there needs to he security guards here to make sure theres no loitering, its not safe at all!

In the three years, since we moved to Sacramento we have only frequented this location for a total of 4 times.  Every time, they have forgotten the sauce for the nuggets. EVERY. SINGLE. TIME.  Even with my asking at both windows. Twice. Now, let me tell you, in high school I had the wonderful pleasure of being a McDonald's employee. It clearly says ON THE SCREEN, with the rest of the order, which sauce was chosen. It's very hard to miss, which leaves me to believe these employees are lazy and/or ignorant.   They also can't remember to put napkins in the bag. Company policy 'used' to be, one napkin per item. Maybe this has since changed; however, I don't think the zero napkin policy is adequate.   And please don't even get me started on the incorrect drinks. You're managing to press the correct button on the screen, but we never seem to get what we ordered.  Every trip simply reiterates my revulsion for fast food in general and I am reminded that even though it was a particularly busy day, it is 100% worth skipping the 'convenience' and making food at home.

Absolutely ridiculous long wait for burnt food!!! The staff behind the counter is more worried about coffee drinks then the actual food that built McDonald's. When I called the manager about the burnt burger I received she tried to explain to me that their burgers are cooked well done. Yeah well done is one thing burnt to a crisp is another!!!
One of the slowest McDonald's I've been to. The inside was empty but they still took forever to make my food. And the kicker, they got my order wrong.

This place is literally horrible! Homeless people rush your car in the drive thru and they claim they can't do anything about hem harassing customers. The employees barely care about giving your the correct order let alone decent service!

This place absolutely sucks the screen is broken the white guy at the window with brown hair said he couldn't take separate orders when we were not trying to do that when we proceeded to go to the second window the black girl with glasses said we ordered a dr. Pepper and a mango smoothie when In fact all we ordered was a strawberry and banana smoothie but she still proceeded to hand us a mango smoothie and say we might as well take it this is disappointing and definitely will not be back.

hell no never again. Sunday night 9/16/2018 was terrible service. I was told I had to wait 15 minutes if I wanted 3 pies or I can order 2 and they are ready. Got to the window and the young unprofessional girl told me to pull to the front and wait 10 mins for food. I asked her that didn't you tell me if we ordered 2 then it would be ready and she told us that he was lying and that the pies was never ready. We were forced to wait as we paid with our car so we sat in the car ate our food to wait for 2 damn pies...if it was ok to wait then we would have ordered 3 pies don't you think...50 thumbs down for them as they need to get rid of the light skinned girl and the guy in the back who would not give their name....TERRRIBLE SERVICE

Ordered at the drive thru tonight. All I ordered was an apple pie. I get home(10min. Away) and settle in to enjoy my pie and as soon as i bite into it the pie is rock hard. I try to take a bite and it so hard and chewy, the filling was all dried up even the apple was so dry!!. So i drove back all the way and went in the dining room and told them i needed a fresh apple pie and showed them the pie how hard, dry and old it was. So they said it was going to be 10min wait so im like ok whatever im already here and i want an apple pie. 15 min later i get my pie, which i should have gotten atleast 3 for my drive and wait time!!!! Uughhh... but they just gave me a small fries.. I also have a problem with their new apple pie recipe i like their old recipe better!!

It's 930pm Friday night and all I want is a cappuccino. I cannot believe I waited 15min just to get to the speaker and almost 30 min to get my cappuccino. If there was a way to get out of line before someone else gets in line behind you I would have left along time ago, but I was stuck no Matter what with no way out!! Also its only one worker taking orders for both lanes and the right lane was getting orders in more than the left side. Unfortunately i was stuck on the left and 2 and 3 cars behind me went ahead of me in the line because they wouldn't switch over to take orders for the other lane. I was really pissed!!!! What is going on with this McDonald's they always have long lines and takes forever. Other McDonald's I've been to and busier are never this long of a wait. After waiting for so long they didn't want me to do a last min order for the free frys Friday that i had forgotten about...seriously they could have just thrown in some free fries without the coupon to compensate me for my long wait!!!!

This is the only McDonald's I've been to that does not carry hot mustard sauce. And they never have it every single time I go. Every other McDonald's I go to has hot mustard. Also the nuggets were so old they were hard and crunchy. And the woman at the speaker was difficult to understand because she mumbled when she spoke.
They are to slow and the front counter person needs more training when it comes to there mobile deals and it doesn't hurt to smile
This place has horrible service if you like McDonald's do not come here there is always somebody upset while you're waiting for your food

This McDonald's always takes forever to serve you. You stand around for 2-5 mins before getting greeted. Then after you ordered your food, you wait another 15-20 mins. I can possibly get wingstop quicker. But the guy with the glasses and grey shirt at the drive thru is cool. He actually works.
Terrible terrible terrible.... I thought addition was a prerequisite for McDonald's employees! Young man taking orders needs to be fired immediately, he has the attention span of a rock

My first mind told me to not stop here and when I did then I told myself to go inside, but NOOO I had to take my happy self through the drive thru anyways. Boy oh boy was I sorry. It was only two cars in front of me and it took about 25 minutes for those two cars to get food.   What was interesting was the guy in the truck in front of me was trying to show off and he pulls his truck so close to the pole when he had to pay for his food that afterwards it tookhim about  3 minutes or so to back up and try not to tear it up. Had to smh!   Then when he's at the window he gives them a empty McDonalds cup, one of those that they put the ice coffee in and they give him two full cups back. Had to laugh. Still just waiting and mad at myself because I didn't follow my first mind and go inside. I gotta admit every  time I come thru the drive thru here there is always some kind of problem.   Oh and let me not forget the attitude on the young lady that was working the window where you paid for your food. She was all frowned up, didn't even make eye contact with me when she took my money for my order. When I got to the window to get my food, again I had to wait because the order still wasn't ready. When I pulled into the drive thru it was only 3 cars. Now the line was long and all the way around.   All I can say is fast food isn't fast food anymore. This was the worst experience I have ever had in a McDonalds drive thru before. Not to mention a woman walking up to people car windows asking them  for money. The things I do for chicken nuggets!   I give them a 1 star simply because I have to give them something!!! But what an experience. ...

I'm sooooo frustrated with this place and will never return. We are remodeling our kitchen and have lived off take-out food for 3 weeks. We go to McDonalds 2 times a week, the little ones love it. Every single time I go they either get the order wrong or forget something. I do not think they have ever gotten my order correct and that is pretty bad when you are ordering by number... tonight was my last straw. The kid who took my order was so lazy with his speech that I could not understand one thing he said, not one! The kid who gave me my food was the same way? Oye... I asked him; is everything in the bag? He said; ye... ye? What does that mean.. I left and something told me to check the bag... I checked it when I was at the light and sure nuff there were NO fries.. I had to turn around and go back Through the drive-through... When I got up to the window to get the food I looked at the kid and he turned around and walked in the back of the restaurant... I sat there and waited and waited until I saw somebody and then I had to knock on the window in order to get somebody's attention... They didn't even apologize for forgetting the fries... I will never return to this McDonald's again

This is the worst fast food place I've ate, & some of the employers & the manager (this older dude) is actually very rude & you can barely understand what he says since can't speak proper English I would never come here for food but managers desperate for new workers cos she they don't get enough & the fries are never fresh. I would prefer any other McDonald's over this one, not being negative just being real

Slowest f'ing Mcdonalds I have ever gone to, ever. Waiting in line for 25 minutes almost every time I go. Why always the hold up ? And why is it that every time I order, it's always either wrong or messed up. Never gets my order right !! And HELLO what's with the woman with all of the piercings all over her face ? Forreal needs to drop the attitude. Since when do they hire people in an environment with FOOD with PIERCINGS ? Never really had a good experience here. Would rather drive to the farther one down Florin next to the Taco Bell. Get a grip on time management, team !!!

Drive through is terrible. Could not hear the drive thru person ask what the order was so i repeated my self a few time. Not sure if the drive thru person notice but i heard her just fine. She basically said she wanted to punch me in the face because i kept on repeating my order. As soon as i said i heard her order it seem she got quiet and gave me to a different drive thru person to ask my order. I was upset and just cancel my order. Upon arriving to the drive thru door i was ask if I would like to place an order i was already upset and just told the drive thru lady to relay the message that they had a rude person working and i didn't  appreciate the comment she made. She probably did realize she had her talk button on while she was telling her coworkers she wanted to punch me in the face. Because i could hear it all and so did the car behind me. I doubt the will notify the manager about this situation. I would love to give this place a 0 star of i could however 1 should suffice and my family and friends will not be coming back to this location.

Slow Food Restaurant.. after waiting 20 minutes, they didn't accept any card payments.. what a shitty restaurant. Last time I came here and had hideous presentation of the food. Everything was not neat, not salty. Very plain.

Worst McDonald's experience ever. Pulled into drive through ordered 2 filet o fish a med fry and a coke - got to the window they ask you order the spicy chicken -I say nope and repeat my order - dude comes to the window and says my order was given to someone else and as I assume they are scrambling to fix my order he says I owe him 2 more dollars. okay I had him the money - they hand me my "corrected" order and I drive away get back to my office only to discover the spicy chicken sandwiches I did not order - the fry's were not up to usual standards more like grease sponges and the coke tasted like what I could only describe as cleaning fluid. I hope I don't get sick from the sip I took. I am on limited lunch time so I just throw it all away and got chips and a soda from the machine. If I could give negative stars I would give -5

Do you like your nuggets burned? Do you like being over-charged 10 dollars for a 10 piece nugget medium combo? Do you like your smoothie barely smoothed, and your coffee making you cough? Well, if so, this McDonald's is right for you! If you're a person who enjoys actual quality food and drink, try to avoid this one. This is worse than most other McDonald's, and that's saying something.

Very disappointed with this McD. Every McD that I have been to honors the PROMO of buy 1 and get 1 sandwich free of equal or lesser value. I just returned from a trip to Florida and they refused to honor the promotion. It is sad that they have refused to be one of the participating McD. honoring this promotion so if you are looking to use this promo you might want to avoid this McD.

This is the worst mcdonalds around if you go inside and order..they literally had nobody working the inside register for almost 20 min and another 20 min to get the food..worst customer service ever..would give no stars if i could.

The drive through staff is incompetent.  Either that or their managements business model is to improve profits by not giving out all the food people pay for.  My fault at this point...one of of four times I leave without one of the items...so I know better. I started to examine the bag tonight but then the worker said, "one more bag is coming".  So I took it, assumed it completed my order and left.  Nope...no cookies.  It's usually cookies or fries and happens when I'm ordering for three or more people.  So they can't seem to handle larger orders.  I'm done with this place.

I like the way this place is starting the year off...  Service is better than before and the food quality has gone up. I give them a solid 3 with hopes of raising my rating later. Previously I gave this place a generous 2 stars.  They hired many new employees. I think they finally got rid of the old lazy manager.... Or maybe not lol.   The key to this place getting a better rating now would be for them to not pull their fries early and overall consistency with their food. Some times I'll get a really hot burger and a cold burger. Or my burgers are fresh but my fries are floppy and Luke warm.   I hope they keep improving. I am a fan.

This is one of the worst mcdonalds I've encountered by far.  They are extremely slow, rude, and did I mention slow.  Every time I've gone here, I am either the only customer or the second customer and it always takes a good ten minutes or so before I get helped or get my food. Horrible service

So they don't accept paper coupons and just spent 20 minutes in drive thru and waited 5 to have cashier take my money so said screw it Left  Why send me coupons if u don't accept them? Even my 10 year old begs me not to come to this one

My wife and I went through the drive thru last Friday night around 10 pm.  The wait was 30 minutes and that is no embellishment.  I would have left, but I was stuck between other drivers who had no where to go. Once I arrived at the windows, it was clear why the wait was so long.  The employees were laughing and goofing around.  One was eating in plain view of the pick-up window.  The other had a drink she was busy drinking and it was no big deal that customers were sitting in grid-lock.  Worst service ever and I assure you I will never be back.
Clean bathrooms but when eating inside water is not an option for drink at the soda fountain.
Shocker they say they open at 6:00am but this is the second time here and they are finally opening at 6:30am

This is the most service oriented McDonald's I have ever been to for coffee/fast food.  They have the dual problem of transients and two nearby high schools.  Their staff is friendly, their coffee is always fresh, and their restaurant is clean and decorated. If you are scared of beggars just use the drive thru, but management will come out and deal with them for you .

staff is friendly enough but prices are drastically higher than other McDonald's in surrounding areas. They tend to end corporate promotions early here and all day breakfast doesn't include mc griddles. They also charge an "up charge" on any happy meals that include any healthy alternative to soda (very few McD charge extra). Worst part is that the bathrooms are locked and you have to get "buzzed in" to use them... I removed 2 stars for the bathroom, 1 star for the uncharges, and 1 for the early ending promos.. then added 1 back as the staff that I delt with today were friendly enough with me and all the other customers I watched getting served including the homeless guy that just wanted a cup of water...

Never going back, every time i go there my order is screwed, i can't understand a single word they are saying, they forget something's, one time i got a whole different burger than i wanted. I rather travel to another location, or just even stop eating at mcdonalds.

Double cheese burgers are more expensive on the right side of the tracks at $1.79 each... Wow that was a shocker lol ;)~  ^^^ This was my check in commentary as I swung in this Land Park location after a trip here to visit my new derm doc.....   Is a cheeseburger, a cheeseburger just a cheeseburger?   Well....... Yes and no.....   On my first visit to this Micky D's while in a new neighborhood for me I swung in here to grab my usual 2 double cheeseburgers & large diet Coke while continuing onward towards my route when I spoke my order through the speaker-box and was shocked to see that my usual double cheeseburgers were ringing up at $1.79 each INSTEAD of the customary $1.29-$1.39 each that I usually pay when shopping over in the hood where I call home....   Now I know that the Micky D's franchise is just that; sold out to people who must adhere to specific corporate rules and regulations however the pricing it appears at least on some items is independent to each franchisee....   Well, without going into too much detail lets just say that there was nothing special or spectacular about this days purchases; the burgers were no larger, filled with more yummy greasy goodness NOR was the customer service any better than what I have become accustomed to over on the wrong side of the tracks and so I DISLIKE greatly the higher rate of exchange that this location charges for exactly the same items that other locations sell for less....   Poo-poo on you Land Park location and the owners of this store and you can keep your burgers as I have decided that regardless of how hungry I may be next time out in this area I shall make other arrangements beforehand and deny you the extra change as its a matter of principle for this chic.......   The End

I actually give this zero stars!  I hate to say this but today will be my last time I'll be coming here at McDonalds on 24th and Florin Rd. I came here a lot for my lunch breaks even though they are very slow but the worst part is every time I come there are a lot of people outside asking for money and food.  My last straw was earlier today when I was trying to have a quick lunch before I have to go back to work but got interrupted by a guy who i dont know, actual sat IN FRONT of me on MY TABLE where I was trying to eat and asked if he can buy him food!! Who does that?!?!?! This place is soooo ghetto! There shouldn't be any soliciting aloud! Customers shouldnt feel threatened and obligated at anytime at McDonalds! Everyone should feel safe and comfortable when at McDonalds! This is horrible! Why doesnt the staff do anything about this?!?!

DO NOT EAT HERE. My wife got food poisoning. The fries are stale, the bread feels like cardboard boxes and when we complained about this all the head manager could do is offer a $5 coupon for more stale fries.   We dont want a $5 dollar coupon we want you guys to stop pre cooking your food and letting it sit all day just to serve people. I would suggest going to the Mcdonalds on Florian Road, it may be a little further from your home but their fries are always fresh and the buns are never hard unlike this mcdonalds. Also expect to have a ton of teenagers mess up your order. AVOID THIS PLACE LIKE THE PLAGUE.   If you do happen to go here make sure you check your order before you leave as they mess up all the time.    I workout and eat junk food like this on my cheat days, I thought junk food is suppose to taste good?? This mcdonalds plus the management and the owner are all greedy careless scum. Shut this place down already.  Went there 2 nights ago around 10pm-11pm ish some hmong girl in the drive thru had no people skills and was on the phone texting while taking orders. If it wasnt illegal I would of slapped her ugly face. I think she was hooking up the car behind us with free food because they said hi and drove right by.  The mexican girl who handed us the food just gave us our bag without saying anything.   Smh please give these jobs to people who are positive not these young high school scum bags. Lol  Pathetic experience but it was late and was too tired too cook.

We went through drive through and the lady kept saying they were busy and not taking orders but the other lane kept taking orders. Waited for 10-15 min.We then backed up to go to the lane taking orders and made our order and once we do they start taking their order on the other side!

Ordered my food cashier was great. My number gets called I go get get my food at least part of it dude says it's gonna be a minute on fries ok I'll eat other stuff while fries cook,smh I finish eating and after like 20 minutes go by I go say something after 5 minutes of being ignored dude comes up and said oh yea smh I get my fries that were sprawling getting cooked and we're stale as fuck never again yuck
They forgot my sauce for my 20 piece nuggets. How the hell am I suppose to enjoy 20 nuggets without barbecue sauce??? Wth

Wherever i go i eat ice cream chocolate every time after. But in this place they didn't have it at all!!!!!!!!!!!and they only had two customers and they were so busy that they couldnt even answer my question!!!!!

Went through drive-thru  this morning and tried  to order 2 McMuffins using a BOGO coupon. This was a paper coupon that didn't need to be scanned.  They had a sign that said App and Scannable coupons could not  be used due to system issue, which I understand, but when I asked why they wouldn't accept a Non-Scannable coupon, she wouldn't/couldn't answer me.  Change your signs or train your employees!  I backed out of the drive-thru and went to McDonald's on Florin/Franklin. They were busy (no wonder) but the knew what to do with the coupon.

"Did you just roll your eyes at me???!!!"  Seriously, the girl was not done finishing up my order yet.  She handed me my food and turned around and I asked, "Oh, can I get some extra napkins?"  The girl rolled her eyes and I asked if she had just rolled her eyes at me, but I don't know if she heard me say it to her.    Some people need to remember where they are working and what they are doing.  I hope that they don't forget that if they piss off a customer that customer can simply make a phone call to complain.    I have to admit that this location is pretty slow in serving people, but maybe its because they ran out of food and everything was backed up.  I don't know, but I won't be coming back here ever again.
Always takes forever to get your food. Expect to wait at least 20 minutes in the drive thru. There's always homeless people coming up to your car asking for change while you're trying to order too.

It's just your usual McDonald's. As a guy who sweats really easy, this place is a dread to be at. Service is decent although you have to ask for the restroom to be unlocked. Once in a while when you order something, it won't come out the way you want it to. For example, my mom ordered a Cheeseburger one time without onions and it came with onions anyways. I'd love to give it more stars but this place needs some serious remodelling first.

Clean place but they need extra help. I ordered a side of mac sauce for 50 cents and they gave me hella little, the size of a extra sauce which cost 25 cents. They need help, literally same girl taking orders and running the orders when they had the person taking lane 2 unoccupied. The food was fresh and got but not worth the wait and I'm still irritated over the Mac sauce, they gave me hwlla little but charged hella .

I took my grandson there to get some hot chocolate, while sitting in the car waiting I observed 2 drug buys, scary looking men with their pants to their knees hanging out front, after 15 minutes I go inside to see whats going on, kept asking about the chocolate, the MANAGER kept saying ok we got it. Finally, I got upset and told them to give my grandson his money back, that's when the manager told me they have to make the chocolate!!! I was like give him the money, we will go else where. You guys should had told him you had to make it. He gave him his money back with a attitude!!! Every time we go there we have to wait longer than 15 minutes. Terrible customer service!!!  And to be honest a little scary because of the people hanging outside!!!

I give this a zero star! I come here almost every night around 9:30pmto grab their chocolate chip cookies. One time the lady said they're out and I said I can wait for it but she said they're completely out! Just the other day I went and the guy took my order and said I will have to wait half an hour. So I replied, "doesn't it only take 1-2mins only?" He replies, "because we will have to preheat our OVEN to bake the cookies". Luckily my cousin works for a different location McDondalds, she told me that they're lying! Cuz McDondalds only microwave it! LAZY ASS MOTHER 'EFF!

I know I'm probably 1 of hundreds... nay, thousands who are writing about McDonald's, more specifically about McD's and the McRib. I had one last week. So tasty.  Chicken nuggets, McCafe's, McRibs... ohmygosh, what else could you want or need?! 5 stars.

Visiting this spot exemplified the song "I do it for the Ratchets." Play area is dirty and invites parents that just don't give a damn coupled with a guy trolling parents for change. Really? Management controls cleanliness and law abiding governs when it comes to panhandlers harassing you while you are with your family.

This is the third time I have had to wait more than 20 mins for food. Every time I come in there is only one person working the register regardless of how long the line is. Today the manager completely ignored several people asking for service in order to get the drive thru orders out. The drive through was going quickly while everyone  inside had to wait. Not fast. Not convenient.

Waited 15 minutes in the drive thru for an egg white delight. Did I mention I also waited about 5 minutes just to order? When I finally got my egg white well let's just say it was a cold ham about a quarter of egg whites unmelted cheese and a hard muffin bread. Worst location ever.
I go here from time to time to get comfort food during a stressful day. The staff is nice, the place is clean, and it has a decent drive-through. The free wifi is a nice plus.

This is a McCafe. It was the first one I had seen and I was pretty impressed. I hadn't been in a McDonald's in many many years and was surprised at the design on this McD. Gone are the tacky yellow and red. In are muted colors reminiscent of a coffee shop. I only got a hot chocolate while I was here, but it was actually good.   I came in, expecting day-glo red and yellow + salt and grease, and what I got was a relaxing scene with a cheaper and tastier version of hot cocoa than that other ever-present establishment - Starbucks.

I just try to avoid this McDonald's. Food is just like the rest of the McDonald's, it's the service level that's awful. Horrible, horrible, horrible. To place an order your generally start with four or five in front of you almost every time. Always have only one taking orders and that person is all so having to fill orders, make coffee, make oatmeal, and do 1000 other things beyond just taking your order. Takes an amazing amount of time from when you walk through the door to when you actually get your food. I guess the place is trying to limit staff to reduce staffing costs. But in doing so they greatly wipe out any decent service-level to its customers.
I LOVE THIS NEW MICKEY D!!!!  They have a flat screen tv inside, and the layout is pretty cool!!!  I just dont like the parking lot, kinda far from the store.

This place deserves a zero star. Today is my last time coming to this place. Their customer service is terrible. Last time, they missed half of my Togo order. Today I ordered thru drive-thru. It was heavy raining and I was the only customer there. However it took them 10mins to finish my order while one of the girl was standing there doing no shit.  I reminded her that I wanted BBQ sauces for my burgers and nuggets and it also states in the receipt that I have 3 BBQ sauces. When I got home and booom!! No sauce at all!! And they never ever pick up their phone either when I call to have a complain. The worse. Don't go to this place!!

Came in to grab a bite because we're driving back home from Reno and the staff was absolutely nice. I had misplaced my mom's wedding ring and My boyfriend and I was going crazy looking everywhere for it and the staff offered to help look as well - the girl cashier was very helpful and helped me thru it all and I'm giving this McDonald's a great review because of the staff !!   The cashier always had amazing nails and I thought they were pretty !
This Mcdonalds location is ridiculous. They are always out of items. Very slow service. Also just because its fast good doesn't mean customers do expect professionalism.

NoMay 20. 2018 at about 1:15.  / 1:30 pm my daughter. And myself went in to get ice cream...it s sunday after noon and there not really that many customers in side the McDonalds at 4242 Norwood ave...Its a all young girl crew with a older lady managing the floor... as I'm waiting to have my order taken theres two guess in front on me and frustration is building because almost everyone is standing around are mostly chatting like they don't have a single clue what's going on and with a wait time of 15 minute i dont think you could call it or considered fast food at this point...Once again...McDonalds has more screw-ups showing tbat the customer really isn't important...they just want the money.... Facebook.com/thetruerevi…

This is the worst McDonald's in Sacramento. Their lines are long because their service is slow, dine-in and drive thru. I don't know which one is worse. Even after your long wait, your order will be incomplete. Never fails. Make sure you check your bag before you leave.

Incompetent workers here; their I.q's are too low to hold a job. I pulled up to the second window to a back facing me; as the young girl at the window continued to gossip to her other young co-workers in the establishment. Who gets dressed this late to go to work and do a shitty job. Its a job not a career, if you dont want to do the job and get paid for it then stay home, why bother getting dressed. Have common sense to know you have a job to do and that you get paid for providing shitty customer service. This place needs to re-hire employees.
This mcdonalds hella garbage. They forget stuff everytime. Fire every last one of them working. Matter favt just get rid of this mcdonalds. Straight up.

This is another McDonald's we have gone to and the service for the customers wasn't any better than the one this morning. I had gone in to order and nobody had acknowledge you were there. The employee didn't say 'hi, how can I help you'? They just look at you like okay what would you like to order. After placing one item to order I had more items and he said anything else (I walked in with three other people). All I said was one item at the beginning. The employees are talking really loud to one another and having a discussion about the drive thru of an order that wasn't correct in front of other employees and customers. The food was hot which was good though the whole time the employees talked to one another and helped a few customers. Still talking  about the drive thru and not quietly about it. Not happy with the atmosphere or the employees here. Just a bit too loud and there is still eight people waiting in line for food in the lobby. Really disappointed.

Slowest drive through I've ever seen.   Honestly...? McDonalds is a well designed system. Say what you want about the food. The system works. How this team at this location can have me in the drive through trapped for 25 minutes BEFORE I was even close enough to be skipped over twice while I was at the menu and microphone... is beyond me...   Oh... and as for my food I finally got thirty minutes later? It was... fine.   I won't be back.

This place is horrible. I only do reviews when I feel that I've had amazing customer service or the worst. THIS MC Donald's is the WORST!!  1. Drive-Thru expect to be there over 15 mins with two cars ahead of you!  2. I wondered if writing a Yelp review for McDonald's even matters...  Then I searched for this location and found that it really does! After ordering my friends and I heard one employee say to another employee, "I'll give you twenty bucks to lick this ice cream cone before I give it to (the customer) through the window."

This is one of the worst McDonalds I have ever been to and I live within walking distance. They have plenty of staff and still can not keep up with the orders both inside and out. I tried to talk with the person behind the counter and she walked off.  Bad bad bad, no more for me.  Patty T.

Ok so yesterday it's been about 4 months since I've been here last. I tried it again and this was my experience at the drive through...  Mc: IUGTWOcanBIUGiTEIOhelpUFGTyouWILO? Me: I'm sorry I couldn't understand you. Mc: Can I help you? Me: Yes I want a large size #1 with no sauce on the burger and an unsweetened ice tea. Mc: OK that will be $7 at the second window. A kid inside walks past and then comes back to the window and opens it up and says:  Mc: You need to pull up to the second window. Me: Yeah duh, there's like 3 cars still in front of me. I can't go anywhere! Mc: They take the money up there.  Me: Duhhhhhhh I get that.  When I get to the front window...  Mc: OK you got a #1 with no salt... Me: No wait a minute, I said that I did not want "sauce" on the burger. No "sauce"! Mc: Well you got no salt! Me: Too bad - have them redo it. Mc: Are you sure? Me: YES I'M SURE!!!  After a few minutes I finally get the meal and the drink. As I drive off I pop the straw into the ice tea and it's mutherf*&$&^#% SWEAT ICE TEA!
Waited 20 minutes in the drive thru for a stale breakfast sandwich and a hash brown that tasted like it had been soaked in grease.

I don't think this drive-thru could be any slower. One person working both windows, it took 15 minutes to get coffees, they messed one up by making it a frap instead of hot, and had no drink holders. Wouldn't recommend this location at all.

The people at this location work hard. My order has always been accurate. Flies happen, not the store's fault. This Mc.Donald's needs to be shut down. After my experience and reading the reviews about this place is like "OMG!" I went in here to this facility two days ago and bought food for my family and friends we ate and I got food poisoning from there store, I called them and talked to one of the managers and she said she would give me a refund. The worst McDonald's ever!  Closest to my house so I deal with it sometimes but 90% of the time something is wrong here. Runs out of everything. About a third of the time, the order is wrong. Why do I even try to do anything in this area of Sac?? Sitting in line at their double drive thru. Ten minutes to even get to the speaker. Do yourself a favor and go to the next McD's. Or don't go at all because their food really is garbage.
THEY DONT ACCEPT COUPONS! Makes sense considering how little money they are already making by how shitty their service/food is. Go to Northgate, worth the drive I can promise you that.

Always have bad experience here dont recommended if your are in a hurry or short time. Employees there are slow! They always forget something in your order. Today they forgot my hash brown. I suggest the owner of this location to train your employees better for faster service!

Yelper Russ S is spot on with his review. This particular McDonalds' drive thru is terrible.  Some of the workers are nice and know what they are doing, but some are just incompetent and so slow.  First off, if you drive up to one of the two drive up speakers first, it doesn't guarantee that your order will be taken first.  Once they take your order, they may or may not have what you want (i.e. they may not be able to make an Egg McMuffin because they are out of eggs... the coffee machine is broken so they are only serving cold drinks...).  Once you get to the window, they usually ask you what you have ordered and then will scramble to just then start making your coffee drink.  If you order something with specific requests like an Egg McMuffin without ham, you may end up with an Egg McMuffin with ham and no cheese.  So... yeah... this McDonalds is not good.  While it is on the way to my daughter's school and is a more convenient location, after so many inconsistencies, I will go out of my way to go to the McDonalds on Northgate because their drive thru is soooo much better.

Stopped by here to grab something to eat. It was packed around 4:45pm on a Friday. I originally ordered the Artisan Grilled Chicken, and the cashier talked me into bumping it up into a meal to save me money. I gave in even though I really didn't want a bigger size fries other than a small, nor did I want a drink. My total came to $10.26. I sat down to wait for my number to be called and thought how ridiculous the amount was for 2 things I technically didn't want and a damn chicken sandwich. I'm ballin' on a budget and trying to lose weight, so more fries PLUS a soda just wasn't necessary. Now, I hate being difficult at a restaurant because I know how it feels on the receiving end but I just couldn't justify spending well over $6 on a meal at McDonald's. Needless to say; I went up to the counter and stopped Latesha to cancel my order ASAP so as not to have the food made and potentially wasted. It was swamped in there and I could see how fast everyone was moving and I could feel the chaotic energy. But Latesha remained calm and polite, and got it done. I didn't have to stand in line again. She ran back to cancel the meal, came and asked if I would like something else. I gave her my new, smaller and obviously cheaper order, and she came back with the exact amount of change and a smile. A few minutes later, she had my meal ready and I was on my way home. I told her to have her boss check these reviews so he/she would know that she handled business, and remained cool amidst the craziness and my inconvenient ordeal. I placed a second order for another hamburger for my friend and the cashier, who was new, short changed me by a nickel. But I let it go when I realized after the drawer closed just because I didn't want to be more difficult. Maybe her drawer might be short tonight and my 5 cents made all the difference. Also; prior to this, the moment I walked in - said cashier and Latesha were dealing with an angry customer - and neither of them let it affect their positive attitudes.

I wish I could give this McDonald's a zero but yelp won't allow that! We were in the drive thru for about 10 minutes just ordering then when we get to the window she asked us to repeat the whole order because there was a mix up. OK so we did...then again she asked what we had ordered. So annoying already. She then forgot what drinks we had and then she asked what color lids we wanted? I didn't know we had an option? The whole time all the employees were complaining about how bad the mix up was and continuously saying the word "hella". So unprofessional. So we finally get our food after a total of 30 minutes in the drive thru. I get home to a nice juicy DEAD FLY in my burger!!! Produce was old and brown. I called to speak to a manager and she was so nice and offered me another burger? Really? I just found a dead fly in my burger and you want me to go back for another one? The health department will be knocking on there door pretty soon. Like tomorrow. Do not go here its terrible!!
This place needs a makeover.  And health inspection.
So apparently when you have a coupon for a free french fry and medium drink with the purchase of a  10pc nugget, they run out of nuggets??? WTF

I have been to many McDonald's and I always ask for my coffee the same way at all locations however this location seems get it right. It is not in the best of neighborhoods and it is out of my way but I have learned lesson not to buy coffee  anywhere else as I always end up throwing it away. I also like that they have two drive thru aisles definitely speeds things up when ordering. I have only been at this location in a.m. as that is the only time I go to McDonald's.

This location is ran by incompetent teenagers and their boss can barely muster up a half-*** apology when her entire crew is sarcastic. Every few months I'll drive by, hoping their crew has changed, and every time, I regret it. The crew does change, but for the worst. Customer service is not difficult, but it is never used at this location. The only regular staff member they have is a 'manager,' who barely speaks English and therefore, lets the children they call employees get away with rudeness. Drive to another location or just go to Jack In The Box across the street. Soda is always flat and fries are either cold or not even in the bag. Not worth it. Rated 0.

This McDonald's is just horrible. I went today with a friend, they completely messed up our orders. So then, we had to wait for it to be fixed so they asked us to go wait in the front.  Which we did, we asked for some sauces...finally they brought our "correct" order. I semi checked and everything seemed right, so we left and come to realize they only gave us one fries and no sauces....yes, it was my fault for not checking more carefully but after having so much time to fix it, I had assumed they would have gotten two burgers and fries correct...we tried calling but no one answered.

Rude rude stale rude. Horrible experience every visit. Loud low life's infested this area, its even dangerous. Because the employees are so rude the customers are hostile.  Not the busiest place so food served has gone hard and dry.
Disgusting food disgusting employees. Rolled the dice with hopes of better breakfast service boy was I wrong.

From time to time I order McDonalds when we are on a long drive to the bay and the kids need some replenishing.  This place is usually on the way when we are coming from some kid sporting event so that's why I come here rather than the one on Truxel.  Anyway, there was one morning that I came here since I was coming into work early or needed some food after an early morning doctor's appointment and grabbed some breakfast.  I was shocked when I received my order of the not-so-healthy kind and received a bigger orange juice than other McDonalds near my house (that are of the kid's size rather than the "small" size).  I was happy to see my "small" orange juice and quickly went on my way to my next destination.  The people at the drive thru are really nice and it was a plus that I received a bigger orange juice than normal.  So, yes, when I feel like, I'll come back.

This has to be the worst McDonald's restaurant. I have waited up to 13 minutes and yet I'm the 3rd car waiting in line. This is not just a one time thing this occurs frequently and honestly do not go to this location. I have made several complaints to the headquarters about them not accepting some coupons even though it states its acceptable throughout Sacramento. This location is close to my house but seriously takes a lot longer than the ones I have been through now it has been 20 minutes and I'm waiting for the cashier to get my money. Do not come here!!!

Many of these reviewers have experienced exactly what I experienced, bad customer service. At the drive thru, I practically repeated my self 5 times. I told the lady we wanted a club chicken sandwich meal with no cheese ( #11). We also ordered a #3 meal and 1 apple pie.   Right after we had paid, the lady told me to park my car and wait outside in the front. " Park your car and wait in the front." I asked what do you mean? Do you want me to get out of the drive though? She looked at me with contempt and said "yea".   So I pull out of the drive though, and waited. It looked like they where kind of busy so I could understand why they told me to do this, however getting out of the drive though was a first for me. In addition, her rudeness was unnecessary.   After about 5 minutes another lady pops out with a bag of food, I waved to her and she came. She looked angry  for some reason. I asked her if this was #3 meal and #11 with 1 apple pie. She said " its what ever you ordered, your orders in this bag". After handing it to me, she went inside, no apology for the wait.  We received the following - Club chicken sandwich, 1 medium fries ( we ordered large) and the 1 soda we original got after paying in the drive though. There was a #3 sandwich, no soda and no fries. NO APPLE PIE.   So I get out of my car, go inside and explain to them what I got. They scrambled around asking each other if they had put an apple pie in the bag. After another 2 minutes of waiting, It turns out no one knew if an apple pie went in the bag. She gives me the apple pie but then explains that since I only paid for a sandwich I would only get a sandwich. No apology was given, excess time was wasted and they where beyond rude.  I understand they might have been tired, and busy. But why are you taking your anger out on me, especially when it was your fault to begin with.   So I get home to eat my #11 and find out there's cheese on it. I'm allergic to cheese and had to toss the sandwich out.   Never again will I go to this McDonald's. I will also file a complaint with corporate.

I don't like this place at all! Ones your ordering thru drive thru they ask what would I like to order I tell them and 3 minutes later they comback again and I have to basically repeat myself and the few times I been there 80percent of the time I got the wrong order... they never give napkins we have to ask for ketchup or we will see no ketchup I just hate it...
This location has $1 vanilla cones, boo!  The location on Watt Ave. in North Highlands are only .49 cents!

This Mc donalds i dont even know where to begin...I hate this mcdonalds!!This is the( in my opinion) the worst mc donalds! they are so freaking incompetent there , unorganized the workers they dont care it seems, and they ALWAYS it never fails everytime i go there that they screw my order up!!!! its either missing something or its wrong period, i try to avoid this location as much as possible even though i  live right behind it, if i do go there im always hoping for better service, and i never get it smh. so i wouldnt recommend this location at all

If I could give 0 stars, I would. Just came in yesterday w/ my bf & a very hungry & impatient 3 year old. We waited in line inside for at least 20-25 mins. We were behind a woman w/ a toddler & baby who waited for almost 10 mins for someone to take her order. She kept asking for help but the cashier said she'll be right there. I could tell she was getting frustrated (as I was), so she got tired & left. Then it was our turn, we waited maybe 5-8 mins when the cashier came back. When she read back the order, she thought my bf said number 2 when he said "sweet chili chicken mcwrap" .... Where in the world did you get number 2? Then she was talking in a low soft voice to where you can barely hear her, close to a whisper!  After our order was taken, she went back in the kitchen to help a bit because they were sooo understaffed. You got 2 cooking, 2 in the drive thru, 1 cashier, & 1 sweeping the floor..The line was getting longer, especially since school just got out. 2 ladies were waiting & were also getting frustrated (along w/ everyone in line). After 2 mins, about 6 people left. After that, we waited for almost another 15-20 mins for our food & there was only 1 person ahead if us... What in the world??? Never again!!!!
It's norwood. enough said. Slow service. But my fries were freshly cooked! Lol.

1st time..Worst Service ever! I had a coupon they said they don't take it and I asked why they didn't have any signs that stated that. The supervisor didn't have an answer. Just a waste of time, the supervisor stated to go to another McDonald 10 minutes away. Really, defeats the purpose of having a coupon with gas prices.  2nd time drive thru -they ran out of NUGGETS! I'VE NEVER HEARD OF ANY FAST FOOD RUNNING OUT OF ANYTHING...NUGGETS...ESPECIALLY MCDONALDS...WOWSER..REALLY...  WASTE OF TIME!   :(

Went into Mcdonalds today feeling kinda down. The woman who helped me had a big grin on her face and was nothing but positive. Her great mood was contagious, and I left with a huge smile on my face. I'm giving it 4 stars not for anything else but the fact that a good mood and big smile made such a positive impact on my day, and I really appreciated it!!

Oh gosh i hate norwood micky ds!!! they are sooo dirty! I will never ever go there again! I ordered a big mac the other day before i had class...so i had to go through the drive through...i opened my burger to find dried out meat...cold buns...unmelted cheeeese...and to top it off there was no thousand island on my burger...dry ass burger!!! and my fries were so salty i couldnt even eat them...theyre lucky i had class...or else i would went back and made them refund my money!

It's an average McDonalds, which is to say you'll get 100% what you expect.  There is a children's play area and  one unusual thing is that there is a glass enclosed dining area within the restaurant I'm not sure why.  Maybe if there is a noisy group who wants to use it,  like it would be good for a kid's birthday party.  And then there is a wood paneled dining area that's cool.  Parking is good, bathrooms clean, and easy location on and off  I80 north of downtown by about 2.5 miles

Compliments: The store is newly remodeled & looks nice. The ordering area has several touch screen monitors so you can order your own food if you don't want to wait in line for a cashier. Friendly employees. Offers side salad as an alternative to fries on your combo meal. The food appeared & tasted fresh.   Criticisms: Both Coca-Cola Freestyle machines were out of most beverages. We had to return to the counter twice for items left off our order. Employees can't count because both of our 4-piece nugget meals came with 6.  Final note, there was an on-site security guard that kept walking back & forth. I'm cautious of a restaurant that requires its own security. With such a small area to patrol, he looked so incredibly bored.

Closed at 3am but are apparently 24/7 and I went there about 15 minutes prior and they forgot our mcchicken and medium frie but we got charged and we went back to get our missing items but they were closed!   Update: I will still give them 0 stars if that was a choice! Last night I felt like I was being racially profiled, so I decided to stop here after a concert and as I get to the window I proceeded to show the cashier my scan codes to get discounts on my purchase but as soon as I pulled it out he said that the scanner wasn't working and that everyone has been asking to use it all day and that he would show me it's not working but it's pointless so I agreed and just continued to the pick up window. As the car behind me pulls up to the pay window I saw in the rear view mirror that the customer behind me was able to use her scan codes without a problem and I heard her yell since my windows were down and say "yes it went through" and I immediately felt discriminated. I'd definitely would like a response and I'll be filling a complaint with the employee as well!

I see mcdonalds has a new chicken sandwich, the "classic chicken sandwich", and ask what it is.   They say, its a chicken patty like the fried chicken club (think the patty is called a "buttermilk chicken patty").   I order the new "classic chicken" and when i get home what i have in the bag is TWO MCCHICKEN!     I could just order a mcchicken for a dollar!!!!!!   I dont know if this is something ALL mcdonalds are doing where they give you a mcchicken with pickles for $3.50 or what, but i can DEFINITELY tell the diference between a MCCHICKEN and a CHICKEN CLUB.  The chicken club was a big white meat patty that costs like $7.  The McChicken is a McChicken. If the new "classic chicken sandwich" is actually a "mcchicken with pickles" then just tell me that so I dont order it. McDonalds is literally so gross and bad quality all I can choke down is their fries!

I did not order,   thru the drive thru where is my tripe stack where my cookies how can you get the order wrong I ordered 3 ITEMS and a soda. My order is 50% wrong again. Why do you disconnect your phone.   Don't pay cash least you can dispute the charge. Ridiculous I ordered 3 items how do you get wrong wtf.  You workers want $25 a hour I think you should get the order right 95% of the time.  No syrup for hot cakes no butter god damn   Sunday 825 am drive thru.  Just another wrong item at McDonald's I order 4 items hot cakes, chocolate chip cookie , egg McMuffin and side order of bacon.  Oreo McFlurry or coke  What I order is super confusing.  I can't even remember what I order cause it's mind bender tongue tickler stuttering words. So I'm with you it is a tough one to get right

So not only does this McDonald's Mc garbage food like most other McDonald's deal, you know, the kind of food we all put up with just because we need food in a hurry? But this McDonald's claims that it's 24 hours, but I'm pretty sure it never has been. Every single time I come here at night it is closed. They always have some lame excuse about how the system is down. And I'm pretty confident the employees just don't want to work.

The Broadway location is newly remodeled with self-order kiosks, wi-fi, and a more upscale dining environment. When I wanted to redeem my coupons I still had to take it to the cashier. The food is no longer pre-made; they prepare the food when I ordered it and the employee got it out to me at my table. The quarter pounders came out quickly, even during a busy lunch hour, and was freshly made.   The dining area is open from 6:00 am to 10:30 pm. The driver-thru is open 24/7. Ever since the remodeling, they've drawn better customers: retirees, construction workers, and college students. There was a security guard to keep the rifraff out. The tables were kept clean. With its promotional offers and nicer dining area, this is one of the better McDonald's in Sactown.

I see why this place has only two stars. I've been here 3 times at different times of the day and the service and food just sucks. The food taste old. The fries are cooked in old oil, burgers are cold, fish sandwich last night was hard around the edges, soda needed the. C02 changed. Just on and on. Last night the girl taking orders was so impatient and rude because she didn't here my first order. Then she gave me the look of death when I got up to the window as she walked away to make my food. I was a bit nervous about eating any of it after that. In fact, I only ate one bite of each item and threw it out.  It's not just this location. McDonald's seems to have a systemic problem of bad service all over Sacramento. I'm done with them.

THEY OWE ME A LARGE CARMEL FRAPPE WITH XTRA CARMEL!!! Ordered at the drive through this morning and was asked to pull forward and they will bring it out to me.  I sat and waited while 7 other customers were served and drove off.  I had to leave without my order to avoid being late to work.   When I called to tell them why I left and to ask if they can make a note of the infilled order - NO ONE ANSWERS THE PHONE Worst customer service ever.   Jeremey at the pay window is the only thing good about this place.
The food is as it should be; but there is no accessible entrance from the alternate parking area, only an "exit" door locked from the outside. A design flaw.

If I would be able to give one star, I WOULD. Where do I start with these idiots? Today was the final straw; with them putting the damn kiosks in they are really forcing you to use card or mobile payments if you want anything. I walk in, and the cashier directs me to the kiosks. I tell her NO I'm paying with cash. She tells me she doesn't have a register open......  How the shit do you not have ONE cash register open? If I'm correct cash is still legal tender in this country. And this is with several, not one but 4 managers or shift leaders on shift. And not a single damn register open?   This location has to have either the worst management or just THE STUPIDEST EMPLOYEES I've EVER seen at any location.   Wish I could say I won't be going back, but sadly it's too convenient for iced tea. I won't be holding my damn tongue next time I'm annoyed.

I wish I could give a lower score but I can't. They superglued a dollar in change together and tossed it at my girlfriend out the second window after making us wait more than 5 minutes for it. Why? Who knows? Worst McD's.

This may be the worst McDonalds in the country.  At 2:38pm I ordered a Quarter Pounder (and nothing else).  My ticket # never came up.  At 2:50pm, I went to the counter to check what was taking so long (12 minute ticket times are about right for good a sit-down restaurant).  I saw a Quarter Pounder already on a tray opposite the customer counter.  There it sat as I waited for an employee for another 5 minutes, not sure it was mine.  Finally, an employee put it on the customer counter but the number wasn't posted nor called.  I could see from the ticket on it, it was mine, but  several other customers were at the counter.  I finally picked it up myself, but it was cold.    I thought I'd go to McDonalds and enjoy my old favorite guilty pleasure, but this was the 3rd time this has happened at this particular store. Nobody is expediting, and apparently nobody is managing either.  No point in complaining and waiting another 10 minutes.  I threw it away and left without lunch.  I'm glad the hunger reminds me how much I hate this location.  For that matter, McD's was always fast and consistent and those days are gone.  Why go to ANY McDonalds, anymore, and pay as much as a nice restaurant for lousy service and cold food?

This Mcdonald's location gets something wrong in my order literally every time I go here. I asked for no cheese, since I am lactose intolerant, yet had cheese on my burger. Asked for extra pickles on another and got zero pickles (It was even printed on the tag--how hard is it to read a tag?) Fries were cold even though I requested freshly made food.  After waiting several minutes, the drive through employee shoved the bag at me and said "Here." and closed the window. Bag was so jammed full it couldn't close.   Called multiple times to complain about my food being made incorrectly and the phone just rings and rings, eventually goes to a fax machine.  Avoid this location.

My mother wanted nasty McDonald's for lunch so I went and got it then drove to her job which is not even a full 10 Mins away. They gave us cold food.. fries= cold, burger= cold, chicken tenders=cold + they forgot the sauce. I'm just annoyed because why the fuck would you give cold food that's been sitting there away?? Throw it away - this is being returned

I stopped in for breakfast. Used the restroom and opened the door too someone shitting in the trash can.   Informed the manager and her response was a blank stare. Most employees did not give two shits. The only one that did was wonderfull but the manager treated her like a idiot.   If this place thinks this is acceptable behavior then I'd be willing too bet their standards are shit too.   I will never go back too another McDonald's in Sacramento.  I seriously hope your managers are fired

This was the worst fillet a fish sandwich I have ever seen! And when you try to call this place they don't answer the phone after about 20 rings it goes into the fax mode. Please look at the attached picture you'll see what I mean

This is a terrible business.  They apparently take 20 minutes to cook a cheeseburger and in the meantime they tell you to pull forward in the drive through. I had the pleasure of being cussed at by several people trying to get around me to leave the drive through while I waited for my food.  My food should have been FREE after I had to deal with this nonsense. I will NEVER be going back to this McDonald's again. I'm lucky someone didn't try to fight me. THEY told me to park there and wait for my food and yet I had to deal with all these upset people because they didn't know to drive around me when pulling out. They should at least inform the other customers that they tell people to do this and to pull around. Worst customer service!!! Beware of this awful place. I cannot believe this is how I had to spend my day.

Needs to get their shiz together. Had discontinued items on the menu that we were charged for which the employees were very nice about hence the 2 stars, but ruined my dinner when I found out my sandwich was beef rather than chicken. I just think they need more organization here and to actually pay attention. I'm not a big McDonald's fan... literally haven't been here in over 8 years and won't be trying it again. Big disappointment.
Love this place....sometimes the drive thru is packed but it's worth the wait...I come here all the time..

They just served me a raw burger. Raw. This McDonald's is constantly screwing up my order, serving up cold fries etc. But it's McDonald's, so...whatever. This is inexcusable. Disgusting. Called to make a complaint, they took the phone off the hook. Eat here at your own risk.

Worst McDonald's ever... Don't buy a salad here, you won't get much more lettuce than you can feed a baby bunny and if you order it with bacon... Forget that too because this place will skip that too. Tired of all the rip off salads I've ordered here just to get nothing but the worst you could possibly make horribly yourself on purpose. Talked to the manager here about it, they didn't care.

I am very disappointed and I feel very disrespected because I specifically told the drive thru worker that I wanted BUFFALO and RANCH sauces. And you know what she did? She gave me SWEET AND SOUR! I am very angry with this place. I have had enough!

After waiting in the drive thru for about 10 min., which I don't necessarily blame on them because it was a long line and a couple of the people in front of me seemed a bit douchy, I got my 10 peice nugget meal. I could tell right away when I put the ketchup in the bag that the fries weren't very hot but I didn't want to join the douche parade and hold up the line complaining. It is fast food so I don't set the bar super high.  What really bummed me out though was when I got home and pulled the food out of the bag. Everything was there except for the fact that my lukewarm fries, that were supposed to be a medium, had barely enough to make a small fries. So I didn't panic and I started fishing around in the bottom of the bag for the rest of the fries that must have fallen out of the box. Nothing. So lame. And what can you do when it's midnight? Its definitely not worth the gas or the time to go back but McDonalds ain't cheap nowadays! Not to sound like a tight ass but it was almost $9.00 for a barely warm small fries, mystery meat nuggets (that were still pretty good lol), and a flat soda. I'm thinking that I'll go in there tomorrow with my receipt and say something. Will I  actually do that...? No. And I'm sure that most people don't either.    The whole experience made me long for the days when any McDonalds worth its weight  had huge plastic characters like the hamburglar, fast foods original felon, surrounded by a rod iron fence and all you could do was kind of climb on them, and burn yourself in the summer. Ahhh the good ole days!

These idiots cant do a simple job right. I ordered a mcchicken add mustard and pickle. I got a mcchicken with no pickles but ketchup and mustard. It's not rocket science to read a ticket and make the order.  I was livid. This place is awful.

Horrible service. HORRIBLE. I come here once in a while because it's close to home and every single time they are rude, very unhelpful, and short on what they have to offer. I just ordered from the drive through - apparently they don't offer lemonade in the drive thru, I asked for a large drink, they gave me a medium, and they seem rude when you say anything. This happens every single time. So disappointing.

This place was OK I came over here after an interview and got some lunch. The drive-through was a little confusing because there are two speakers so you don't know which one you're talking to but I made it work. The service was good just don't come over here in the morning because the drive-thru can be pretty long the staff was nice though

I usually hate using yelp, but this is ridiculous. I ordered 2 sausage mcmuffins no egg, 2 hash browns, and a dr pepper. Literally the only thing they got right was the hash brown order. Instead, they gave me 2 sausage mcmuffins NO SAUSAGE, and a Diet Pepsi/Diet Coke. Yall wanna make $15 an hour when you cant even get a simple order right? Yeah right.

Drive-thru in the AM sucks.....  But overall, the same place is McDonald's. You know already.  My addiction to their fries and ice cream are ridiculous, and their coffee is incredibly decent for the price.   They serve their crap fast during lunch, but that still doesn't make up on their lack of basic service during breakfast hours.

If they aren't getting my order wrong they are getting my change wrong! Just 10 minutes ago today, 4/22/14 I went through drive through and Ordered an Egg-White McMuffin with regular bacon (not that nasty Canadian stuff) with an OJ.   TOTAL=$5.96.  When I got to the first window the woman repeated my order back, but was some completely wrong order with the total being around $2.50, I told her that was incorrect; she looked at her screen again and then quoted me another ordered that was correct. Fine, I understand that you have a two-lane drive through and when it gets really busy, as it was this morning, orders have a higher chance of getting mixed up.   When I paid with a $10.00 bill the girl handed me back my change along with the receipt and said "four -oh-four". I grabbed my change and receipt, put it on my lap and proceeded to the next window.   The food came out quick, the girl greeted me, handed over the OJ and food, and told me to have a nice day.   I pulled forward and stopped to put my money away and to check my order.  They got my order right for the first time, but got my change wrong! The girl quoted back $4.04, which was correct, but she only gave me $3.04!  Hmmm makes contemplate if she did on accident or if she did it on purpose! Skimming a little off the top and pocketing it for some chump change? A possibility.   Anywho, I paid an extra dollar for a breakfast disguised as healthy (I was hungry this morning darn-it!). For what I paid I could have went to Nopolitos and got a delish chorizo burrito for the same price!!!   Bah humbug to Mickey Geez! Mickey Ds? MickeyPlease!  4/21.16 How in the heck do you charge me for 2 When I asked for one and when they read it back at the window I corrected the lady at the drive thru and they still charged me for two?! They suck, they always get their orders wrong and that will be my last time going there!

The lil spongies (my personal favorite nickname for the 20-piece chicken nuggets) were especially delicious and crunchy tonight (1 AM courtesy of the drive thru.) My compliments to the chef. Shout out to my boi Jose at the drive thru window who was a great customer service representative. I hope you had a great lunch break pal. Overall it is a nice establishment for a visit when Bento Box gets rid of their chef special and you're still fuckin mad about it.

I wouldn't recommend this location. I asked for a small hot caramel macchiato. They have me a cold one. All of the other locations I've been to also have me the option of whip cream. I asked for it and the manager argued with me about it. Needless to say, I will no longer visit this location. Someone needs to retrain the manager in the fact that the customer is always right and never argue with them. Because of this, they can loose business. Well, they have definitely lost my business.

I was disappointed at the service, specifically the manager on duty tonight. I have the McDonald's app on my phone and use it often. I had the app set the this location and tried to use one of the coupons on the app. The cashier couldn't get the coupon to work so he called over the manager who very rudely told me the coupon doesn't work with no explanation and walked away from the window. I would expect that if I have a valid coupon it would be honored or either explained to the customer as to why it cannot be used!

Needed to bring something to the annual Christmas potluck at work... Saw the 20 chicken mcnuggest for $5... $25 later had 100 nuggets and a room full of happy coworkers! Crispy, crunchy, and when paired with sweet and sour sauce... Heaven in your mouth! First dish to get DEMOLISHED at our potluck!   Moral of the story, NO ONE CAN RESIST MCDONALDS!! Ain't nobody got time for bad press... Their fries are BOMB and so is that mystery meat! Nom nom nom...!   Workers are nice and load you up with extra sauce and napkins! Just wish this place was open 24hrs--hence the four stars.

Bad service. Grumpy assistant manager :( they did not bother to offer me any specials they had today. All they asked me was what I wanted to order. I ordered the fish filet burger and when I got it, it was only half a slice of cheese. It was really saddening to see that they would not give me a whole slice of cheese as pictured on their menu. The pros to this McDonald's is that they have a larger parking area on the other side of their drive through. It is quite spacious inside and relatively clean.

Oh this McDonald's on Broadway rates the lowest possible rating that McDonald's could ever receive.  It is largely due to the service, but, also the quality of the food.  I personally waited for counter service longer than anyone who entered the restaurant.  I waited so long I left without ordering.  The employees all seemed to be teens.  No one has anything against teens, but, they all seemed to respond to younger customers to ask their orders. The employees also seemed to trip over each other like a letter of new pups.  I observed everyone working behind the counter bump into each other to ask one single employee their questions.  Even though I wrote to the McDonalds headquarters to share my opinion...and swore off ever visiting McDonalds again, I returned months later with a free coupon in hand.  I observed the same exact behaviour.  Again, all employees tripped over one another to ask their question(s) to one employee.  The employee did not seem to know much more than they did, because she had to read the coupon I presented before denying my order.  Oh!  By the Way...the coupon was mailed to me for a free purchase from McDonald's headquarters.

This is the second worst McDonald's in the Sac region. They get my order wrong every single time. Today when I pointed out the errors I was told to "drop my attitude" by the shift leader and made to stand while they remade my burger. Meanwhile my fries (which were also wrong) are sitting getting cold. When my fixed burger was brought back I said "This place is the WORST" out loud at full volume and two guests standing in the lobby behind me audibly agreed and then complained about their own issues. In the end, it's not the mistakes that are making sure I'll never be back- it's the condescending, innapropriate tone that MERED used when speaking to me. Get your shit together, Broadway McDonald's!
Drive thru line on a Sunday is a huge bummer. Employee said a 50 dollar meal held up the line.

Since this place is closeby, my boyfriend and I usually come by here often when we don't have time to cook. We didn't have many problems with our food everytime we got it, but service is always horrible. As long as our food is okay, we don't care for the service. Hey, it's McDonald's anyway.   Anywho, we came here to purchase two mcwraps through the drive thru. I've purchase a mcwrap at another McDonald's and their mcwraps were wrapped nicely. When I got home, I opened mine and it looked like a piece of sh*t. Literally! It looked half-assed thrown together and stuffed in a box the wrong way. On top of that, it wasn't a "premium" mcwrap... It was a f*cken snack wrap stuffed into a premium mcwrap box. What kind of sh*t is that? I purchased a premium mcwrap, not a damn snack wrap. Give me what I paid for! When I called and complained, they made me drive back to replace my order.   When we got there, I asked for the manager, but the lady in the front insisted on helping me. She didn't even care about our service and how it wet. She said straight up, "So do you want a refund or a replacement?" Now this got me mad. She totally disregarded how our service went and the manager I talked to on the phone came up. Now the manager, himself, wasn't even helpful at all either. Disregarded our service, didn't apologize, and just replaced our order instead. No refund was refunded to us. Now we know why this McDonald's is fucked up.   Honestly, just go down the street to Taco Bell. They have better service. Avoid this place. They renovated it for nothing, but to keep the horrible customer service and monopoly going. McDonald's higher management needs to come and check this place out!

It's been over 3 years since I've returned to this restaurant, hoping that their customer service has improved.  Unfortunately, nothing has changed much.  When I drove up to the new drive-thru, the automated messaged told me to move forward to the new speaker-understandable-moved forward.  It took approximately 3-4 minutes for someone to actually take order, and to get their attention we had to turn the music up loud through the speaker. And when someone actually took our order, she was completely rude, speaking so fast that our order on the screen was incorrect several times. Nonetheless, we had even advised her to correct the item, and she kept making errors. She specifically asked what sauce we had wanted for our nuggets, and we specifically asked for sweet and sour, instead she given us BBQ.  When we got to the drive-thru window, the clerk handed out our orders, and when we realized that she gave us the wrong sauce, we went back to advise them. The woman had apologize, she put the sauce in the wrong bag. Not that it is really important, but if she had forgot, it's so possible that she would put an incorrect order in the meal in general.  Food wise, the food was leftovers. Not fresh, anything they had made was recooked. You can tell the difference, the McNuggets were super dried on the inside, the batter was rather hard.  The fries had the taste of fries that were microwaved. The McDouble was ok. It's possible that food was just overcooked, however, the hours we went, there were many cars that drove into the drive-thru, so I don't think that everything could taste that way if some items were made fresh.  I wanted to have a change of heart, but that didn't work out so well. I no longer want to give it another chance to return.

I wish I could give this place zero stars. I went there twice, just figuring the first time was a one off bad experience. Turns out I was wrong.   While I'm sure there are good employees that work there, in both instances the crew were clearly not happy to be there. No "Welcome to McDonalds", just a blank stare the first time I went to the register to order and a "Yeah?" the second. As the manager handed me my food she was half-shouting at someone I couldn't see.  Here's something else: The first time I went there was a large spill in the corner of the eating area, and it stayed there the entire time I was eating. A restaurant that has a dozen young people working finally had an elderly employee go and clean it up. Maybe I'm nitpicking, but that really bothered me.  And worst of all the food just tasted bad. Bad as in like, old and an imitation of what McDonalds should be. Go to the Taco Bell one block over instead.

Is it possible to get ZERO stars? Getting in and out of the drive thru is horrible. Also, waited FOREVER to order and when I got my beverage it had NO ICE, I would have liked some ice considering it's been so hot. Is the big McD now NOT serving ice with there beverages?  Not a fan of fast food, bit this really confirms that I rather spend the money on a local business and get quality food as well as good customer service. I guess they were to concerned with making sure I got my food within a reasonable time between the two windows.
Always a 15 minute water in the drive thru. I have never had good service at this place no matter the time of day. It's supposed to be fast food.

I usually come to this McDonald's because it's the nearest 24hr location and, being a night owl, I usually come between the hours of 11pm and 4am. The food is usually better and fresher compared to other locations (well, you know, for a McDonald's), and I never have to wait forever in the drive thru.  A few nights ago, my boyfriend and I were starving, but only had $2. It was about 5:00am and the woman helping us, whose name I regretfully can't remember, not only helped us figure out what breakfast foods you can get for under $2, but also covered $0.18 when we were short. Instead of getting one sausage mcmuffin between two people, we were able to get 2, and it really did make all the difference for our hungry tummies. Best sausage mcmuffins we've ever had, simply because they seem to taste way better when you're ecstatic about good customer service.

Omg and nasty are the best I could come up with.  I walked in, it smelled and it was dirty. Could not even bring my self to stay. If it looked that bad the food smelled bad or sanitation of the kitchen couldn't be any better.

I don't like that I am eating fast food today but man it's has been a long day. Mcds is so close my job. So I did order 2 Filet-o-Fish sandwiches for $5 and 1 large Powerade drink for $1. I went thru drive around 3pm TODAY...The total was 6 something and I just eaten 1 sandwich and I saving the other for dinner since I've class tonight. The reason MCDS receiving 3 stars from me is because I've been here a number of times and it is always a long wait and the parking is super bad so it is best to walk there. But I am trying my best to eat here but it happen today.
