I called McDonald's and they said they swear they sealed my food, but they didn't and the fact the a general Manager didn't catch this is bad. I had ordered breakfast for my children and it's so unsettling to have food delivered to you that should be sealed not sealed. It looks like this guy went through the drive through for me.

I went through the drive thru, i was asked" what can i get for you" I answered "number 10 large cambo with a coke" The guy didnt hear me or something, so i repeated myself. There was a long pause then asked again what i wanted. So for the 3rd time i said it agian. I pulled up to the window to pay he didnt say anything to me, so i paid. I was never given a receipt. I pull up to the window to get my food then I noticed I had a medium drink I looked into the bag and there was medium fries. I told the lady who gave me my food that I ordered a large drink with a large fries. I was given the large drink and was told to park until they got me my large fries.  So I waited about 10 minutes they came out with my food. yet again a person didn't say anything to me and walked away. Looking into the bag I had a smaller order of french fries. I was very upset and I walked inside talk to the manager she told me that this is what I ordered. I get a 30 min lunch for work by now i already burned 20 min, so i walked out. I will never go back to this mcdonald i will rather take my money and go to the carls jr across the street
What the fuck is up with being stingy with the katchup?? Seriously 2 pack of K atchup for 3 order of full meals? I don't understand. 1 star!

I would not recommend this place! Late at night they only accept cash but don't tell you until you get to the box to order. By then you're trapped with multiple other cars behind you. You're stuck sitting there for 20-30 minutes. It's ridiculous! They could at least post a sign at the front of the drive thru before you drive in to let you know in advance they're registers are down for updating or whatever the case is (Note: McDonalds if you're reading this I hope to take this advice). If you're ever considering going here for a late night snack or work late and need to grab a bite to eat on the way home don't come here. It's the worst!

Caution: This McDonald's does not honor the buy one get one coupons from the feedback surveys that appear on the receipt.  I waited in line for 10 minutes trying to renew my coupon only to be told they don't honor them.  When I pointed out that on the receipt it specifically states "valid at any McDonald's location" they stated it wasn't honored at this location.   Very misleading, McDonald's! It's a shame and because of this experience I will not be returning to this location.  I was a long time, frequent customer.  No longer. Best of luck.

Super duper nice workers at the drive-thru--always polite professional and friendly. I've never had a wrong order in the years that I've gone here. The fries, breakfast items and nuggets have been consistently good.  I usually go late at night or early am so the parking lot clientele can be questionable. I figure the attitude that people experience is a result of themselves, not because of the workers.
Service at this McDonald's is awful.  They routinely mess up orders or send you to wait unnecessarily.  The process to place orders.  I suggest choosing one of the other McDonald's.

Third time coming here and I can honestly say this mcdonalds is one of the best mcdonalds in my area. 1) Food always tastes great 2) Pretty fast service. I've ate inside & drive thru- Although drive thru sometimes is packed & they can be slow  3) friendly customer service 4) If you eat inside they take your food to your table, a pretty unique mcdonalds.  5) They always get my order right! :)

So today we went to McDonald's and ordered 2 sausage mc muffins a bacon egg McGriddle and order of hot cakes we  payed $12.11 once we got our food we checked our bag before leaving and we only see 2 sandwiches? Idk why if we ordered 3 and the girl was super rude and had us pay for the third when they should've gave it to us for free since it was their mistake like how rude I pay taxes.dont ever come here to this location
Drive thru can take forever sometimes. They have a mixed flavored coke machine but don't offer flavored drinks at the drive thru. Not an issue at other McDonalds I've been to, so kinda irritating.
Great service, ice cream machine works, and happy environment by the employees made my experience nice

Recently has been terrible. Used to come all of the time and will no longer. I seriously considered making a corporate complaint at my last visit, as there was more the 5 pieces of a hard, broken plastic that was in my DRINK I took home through the drive through. this was one of my first time coming in the morning, usually the later shifts don't have problems, but as well the last few orders have had at least one thing wrong.  You need to cycle in some better workers!
Love it or hate it...if you go it is the fact that you can count on it being the same as last time...it is what it is...not fine dining...but hot, fast, and McDonald's style...

The manager tonight was very rude and unprofessional. They mess up your order and forget thing. When you call them it's like you're lying for something you paid for. I used to visit here a lot but after tonight I will drive out of my way before returning there.

I haven't been to a McDonald's in a while, but this is one of the nicest McDonald's I've ever been to. There were employees everywhere cleaning, mopping floors, etc. The owners were behind the counter greeting customers and helping with orders. Service was fast and friendly. My faith in McDonald's is renewed! French fries forever!!

This is the most rudest mcdonalds I have ever been to. We waited 20 minutes for our food and keep in mind it wasn't busy at all there was barely anyone in there. Then as we are in the playroom letting our daughter play while she eats her happy meal we are told to get out it's now closed. The only nice woman in there is Rita. She tried to go above and beyond to make things right however the manager while playing on her phone refused to let her do anything. Thank you Rita for bring my daughter a free ice cream anyways. You my dear should be manager as you are wonderful.

$7 for food the size of a kid's meal. Burger alone was $4.49...when it really should be on the dollar menu. When I first walked into this location, it reeked of homeless people and had a few loitering outside. I only came because I had a gift card, but I won't be back. Better off going to Carl's Jr across the street.

Hands down the best McDonalds I've ever been in my life. Being new to the area, I've been kinda avoiding the Northgate area.. But when the kids are off early from school and hungry I needed a playplace. So the closest McDonalds it was! Walked in, and was totally amazed by its cleanliness, spacious eating Area, and separated play place for families.  Love love love this McDonalds. Sacramento, you seriously surprise me.   +Multiple Eating Areas +Clean +Large Play place +New** (Or renovated/McDonalds) +Friendly Customer Service  +Rvcd my Order in less than 2 mins
I like da food it was alright. The mcchicken wer fresh. I love this place im definitely coming back.

I didn't eat here as I don't eat McDonald's but I did stop to buy iced tea and use the restroom - the parking lot is absolutely disgusting - my shoes are legitimately sticky after walking across the parking lot.   I get it. There is a drought but my god a power wash once in a while wouldn't kill the planet...

Went through drive thru late and the lady taking my order was joking around on her headset. I repeated my order to her several times and she was not interested and more interested in joking around and laughing. I could hear her talking to someone else about something that was not job related. I continued to repeat my order which took her  even more time for her to get right. Very unprofessional place.

They have to close at 2pm, it's been many times we got kicked out the play room. I usually drive more than 15 miles here afternoon because I like the fact that this place looks safe for my 23 months old. For some reason I always end up here at the same time, I buy food and usually plan to say about an hour to let my child play and run around before going back to work. It's a good thing they try to keep this place clean but why at this time which there are so many kids running around. Some parents decide to come to this place because there is a play room, if not then there are so many McDonald's out there, I see some parents get here with their kids and have to leave or locked out the play room. Then why driving so many miles here???

This particular McDonald's is fairly busy most of the time. Some of the ladies there have little to no personality to speak of, but I can always count on Charlie in the drive thru to be friendly and efficient. Going inside for service can be a nightmare, as they worry more about the drive thru. My food is usually fresh, just wish some of the ladies knew how to smile. Could be the fault of management since I have seen one manager scold employees in front of customers. More like Charlie please!! She is a pleasure!!

There were about 3 different people working the drive through today and I would say they were not the friendliest people. One guy sounded pretty New which is fine but to still come off rude is no excuse. The girl who I gave my card to said absolutely not one word. This service just added on with the fries ... the fries are usually not that bad but today was like all grease no salt . I was very unsatisfied at a McDonald's level .

I have always loved McDonald's ever since I was a kid but I wish I had not went here at all and went somewhere else to buy a cool drink today. I don`t know whats wrong with this McDonald's they have issues. I went to the drive-thru and was the only car there and had to wait a year and a decade for someone to take my order... now why is that? After a long wait someone finally took my order. I ordered a medium strawberry banana smoothie and thats it no food. I pull up to the second window after paying for the drink at the first window and I was told to please pull over. Now can someone ask me why did they make me pull over for a drink?! Seriously.. like seriously?!! I had to wait and wait just for one drink while other people who came after me at the drive-thru were given their orders while I had to seat and wait for one stupid drink.  And get this they did not even make the drink yet when I pulled up to the second window the first time. How retarded is that! I almost started to say to them can I just get my money back and I`ll go somewhere else. I will not be returning to this McDonald's location ever again. This location is a hot mess! I say go somewhere else.

People, it's McDonald's. I only the food is hot, fries are hot and i have a clean place to sit to devour that which is bound to make me fat. Much to the chagrin of my fiance who is an RD. But it is a guilty pleasure and these guys do it as well as any of the Fast Food places. The only reason it did not get 5 stars, the parking lot is a mess. But it is a high traffic parking lot. But it reflects poorly on this location. So enjoy the food, cleanliness, and the decor is not half bad. You want more then spend more.
Started serving breakfast at 3:50.. what kind of crap is that. Top if off they forgot my hot cakes. Why do I even keep going to this place the service sucks.
Field mice love this place. They like to give you ice coffee with coffee grounds at the bottom as if they don't care either way.

Horrible service. I know they don't care because this place is cheap & everyone will always come to buy. There's simply no "thank you." No "have a good day!" No nothing. As I receive my order from the lady, she looked at me because I was still waiting and asks if I needed something else. I told her I didn't get my 2nd drink. It was sitting just right in front of her. & All she does is read the order just to hand it out so like how in the world does she forget my drink? Or she probably couldn't read our small order. But to be honest, Ya'll need help. If not from work, or school. At least at home.

They have there play place  still. Which is one reason we still come here, the kids get to unwind a little.  They due offer birthday parties here also. Food ordering is sometimes good, depending on who is at register, new person, or lack of knowledge,  or speaking. .. but not to bad otherwise for a mcds. .

I absolutely hate this McDonald's. And it sucks because this is the closest one to me. This McDonald's has the absolute worst customer service I have ever had. They are incredibly rude,when you order inside or in the drive thru. You always get a rude tone when ordering and then they act like they can't understand English. And when you order ice cream you always get the same lame excuse the machine is broken. Especially in the Summer. It's like it's been broken for years. Their bathroom is disgusting they never clean it. The tables are never clean. It's just a very dirty McDonald's. DO NOT GO TO THIS LOCATION!!
Just ordered 2 medium fries after waiting for almost 20 minutes in the drive thru and both boxes are barely half full. Next time check before you leave. Worthless.

I just ordered a McChicken sandwich. There was so much mayonnaise on my sandwich that it looked like they spilled half the jar on the bun. It is absolutely disgusting. I posted a picture of it one here somewhere. It is so bad I won't even give it to my dog. This is unacceptable
This Comment only covers the Coffee. youtube.com/watch?v=MumU… A rare 4 star from me:) A very good cup of  coffee on this day, from a very happy staff.
The place- specially the PLAY area for kid smell like dirty socks. Made me so dizzy . Trash was everywhere. They really need to have someone clean this place  I love Mc Donald's but not this one

It's McDonalds.  The food is the same as any McDonalds.  The reason I am even bothering to write this review is because this is the nicest McDonalds I've ever been to in my life.  I come here everytime I am in Sacramento either to grab and Ice Tea, to grab a snack or to let the kids have a potty break and stretch the legs.  The inside is nice and clean with dark wood fixtures and flowers on the tables.  The staff is always nice, the bathrooms are clean and it's in a good neighborhood.  Sacramento is full of scary and iff-y places so I felt the need to let other travelers know this McDonalds is the best one and a safe, clean place to stop.

Mental feebleness at it's finest!  Oh yeah, and they are a franchise, rather than a corporate Mcdonalds...so their prices are higher than other nearby locations.  As if McDonalds (corporate sites) weren't overpriced enough...

I have been going to this place since I was 4 and in the last 1 1/2 years this place has fallen off its charts, I am unsure if it's management but clearly I can say it's the staff for sure. I am a store manager and the business will only be as good as it's staff. This locations seems like they hire anyone that walks in the door looking for a job they don't take the time to hire friendly professional employees. The drive through cashiers are the worst, mostly all night time shift cashiers they talk to you very "ghetto" don't even say the "hi" or "welcome to McDonald's" they mest up your orders and when you get to the window they are even more of a worst impression then when you order your food on the speaker. Management needs to hire more different races it seems lately they are hiring all the same race. They sell bad apple pies with stickers saying eat by 3pm yet it's 10pm and that's what they are putting in my bag is old tasting apple pies not even warm. The frys are old and clearly you can taste it. The waiting period is out of control at this location, drive through experience needs a lot of improvement. I would like to see better customer service and more professional employees. There is this African American guy that works the mornings on drive through giving the food and he is amazing! He's so cheerful and always says "Good morning welcome to mcdonalds! What can I get for you on this sunny day". He is very motivated and even though I don't know his name, he is a example of how employees should act. To the hiring manager from another hiring manager, you should take your time to recruit talent rather then hire anyone because turnover rates are high. Your business will improve.... till then I'll be going to the mcdonalds at Truxel.
Bad bad service. The cashier told us the all sauce cost even ketchup . U sure aint getting my business or my friends and family. Fellow peers please avoid this location.

Never thought I would have to write a review about a McDonald's before but after what I just experienced is beyond unacceptable behavior of any employee. Even after I had repeated my order multiple times, the McDonald's employee had made mistakes on my order. The same location has made multiple inaccurate orders in the past, I still end up having to stop the drive -thru line because once again this store has failed to completely my order efficiently. I wouldn't return to this store if it wasn't for the friendliness of the few nice staff members. The lady that took my order tonight was rude and did not care about my order whatsoever because when I proceeded to receive my food they had no clue of what I really ordered. Honestly if this is how McDonald's is letting their employees run their stores then my personal opinion about the company have dropped tremendously.

TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE. I work in fast food and am fairly lenient and understanding when it comes to a lot, but this restaurant is disgusting. Half the employees don't wear hats and every single one of them have hair flying all over the place, I rarely see gloves on any of their hands, and they are only just plain rude. TWICE now in the past few month have we found HAIR in our food. The last time we said we wouldn't eat there again but out of desperation I gave them a chance and it seems like i wasted my money once again  hair found in a food again. i wouldn't go here if you want to eat clean food.

There tea tastes like rotten potatoes they probably have strange creatures in it and leave it out and for ever and ever and ever. They have the worst service on planet earth. Terrible I am never drinking there tea ever again. They don't even have water!

So a normal McDonald's iced tea isn't that bad but they just leave there tea out forever so it tastes terrible. these are the people if you got food poisoning they wouldn't do a thing. There tea probably has its own eco system with little organisms swimming around in it.  Worst service ever!
This place is absolutely wonderful. The service is amazing and if they do get your order wrong they will give you your correct order. The people are incredibly kind and love their jobs.

Just pass this McDonald's up in the really early morning hours. This McDonald's has pretty bad customer service . I just happen to be working late one night and went in there to get a bite to eat through the drive-thru it appeared to me that something shady was going on. While waiting to get my order taken. I noticed there was one person before me that didn't have any problems ordering. I pulled up to the speaker and the customers order was still in plain view on the order screen. I was acknowledged immediately and they asked if I could hold for a moment. Mind you there is only one person ahead of me and it's not like there's a long line. Another vehicle pulls right on through the drive thru and didn't even stop to order and pulls up right behind the other vehicle that just ordered. I sat there for almost a good 10 minutes and didn't receive any reply back. I got tired of waiting for them to answer back. I pulled to see if I could pull ford to exit but I couldn't. The two vehicles were still in the drive thru. So in order to leave I had to back out of the drive thru. At this point I just felt like me  leaving and taking my business elsewhere would be a  better. I would give this McDonald's a -10 star if it was available. Pass this McDonald's ip

The gal at the window steals money on every cash order.  When I pay with a ten dollar bill, she shorts me a dollar on change, then says the bill is a dollar more than the receipt says (when I check the receipt after driving away.)  The next time I gave the exact amount in cash and she said I owed another dollar.  When I say I gave her the exact amount, she says no, you gave me one dollar less.  I believe she pockets $1.00 per order as a co-worker told me the same thing happened to her on the same lunch hour.

If I can I will give -5 I'm waiting in line 30 minutes to get mine 2 burgers the employees are really rude the last three times I went here I tried to give them a chance to fix it but every time I go it's worse and worse so they lost my service looks like Carlos Jr is way better
Its McDonald's!! Who doesn't love McDonalds?   This perticular one has greatttt customer service see!!!

I'm not generally a proponent of fast food but this mcDonalds is pretty decent. I come here once a week with my grandson who is 18 months old as time of this review and he loves the indoor playground. Keep in mind however if this is why you're coming here but you must treat it as a public park there is no age restriction as the children who can play there and if you're having a problem with the activities of the children best to deal with them directly because management has nothing to do with it unless they are being hazardous to themselves or the equipment. So it does get rowdy especially after school or when its raining. As far as food 8 out of 10 times they get my order right. They usually do substitutions like apple slices instead of french fries for any meals. The cashiers at the front are not the brightest but the drive thru ladies are much more bitchy here, I recommend save your gas and go inside. The restaurant itself is always clean there's always tables to be had the decor is like a cafe so it doesn't really feel like you're inside of a fast food restaurant when you're eating inside and they have a separate glassed out section for family use attached to the playground. Ironically though they do not have baby changing stations inside the bathroom. This is a corporate McDonalds so they are supposed to honor all Coupons.
They never get the order right! This place makes me scared for our future. I cannot believe how dumb these employees are!

This manager by the name of Nathan, harassed me 2x telling me I had to buy something to sit inside. I told him it was 0 problems for me. So when I purchased my salad, less than half an hour later he pressured me to buy another item. As he left that morning , he was staring extremely hard at me making me very uncomfortable eating my food. Then on his next work day, he came up to me again patronizing me to buy something or I have to leave, when I already knew that. This manager discriminated against me. Everytime I am present at this location , Nathan goes on to harass, and stalk me around the mcds. It 's  Very strange as I do Not personally know this man. Which leaves me wondering why   Nathan continues to single me out . There was again another incident earlier this week of January 18, where It was me , and 3 other men in the lobby, and when it reached 1am he specifically came out in the lobby to oNly look straight at me , ignoring the other 3 men Just to tell me I had to leave. All these incidents leads me to believe this manager by the Name of Nathan has, and continues to discriminate against me. I have even seen this racist loser on the streets, and he tries to mean-mug me, yet I do not pay attention to his Cowardice.

Funny I just wrote a review about the McDonalds earlier on Norwood and today later my daughter wanted and ice cream so came to the one on Northgate + 100% better than the one on Norwood the customer service the service altogether cleanliness and the young ladies and the young gentleman in the drive thru were very attentive very customer service oriented 10 stars for that crew the attitudes alone deserve a raise

Good for a McDonalds.  Got the best they have to offer, burgers, fries, nuggets. Everything was good. One weird thing was that all the toppings on the Big Mac was under the middle bun, leaving a bun on top with nothing under it. The decor in the main part of the restaurant had a sort-of fancy look to it, which was interesting.

Absolutely no complaints here. It's McDonald's so you already know that the food isn't going to knock your socks off. It is fast food after all. The service is what I like here. I don't come too often but, when I have, the food has been nice and hot and the customer service has always been great. They making grabbing a quick bite a real breeze.

Just leaving a review because I liked the play area - I have a 2 year old and a 1 year old and the set up is very friendly for those ages and probably up to 5 or so.  I didn't eat anything here, but hell it's McDonald's, is there anything really different between the ones in the US? Oh yeah, the inside was hot as hell in the main eating area, but the play area was nice and cool... and one of the play things that is supposed to make sounds is broke, but the kids didn't seem to care about that crap so I don't either.

Worst place ever!!! I'm in the drive thru and at this time it was the buy 2 for $5 deal. I didn't know that there were only some specific items that was apart of the deal. I asked the lady and she goes "uh.. Idk it's whatever that's on the screen" at that point I was like ok? Wtf. So I told her my order and on the screen she charged me two Big Mac which I did not ask for and I asked her "how come on the screen shows you charging me twice?" She goes "oh snaaap, my bad you about to get me in trouble" at this point I was irritated, I'm on my lunch break and I don't have time to deal with little kids. I drove up to the window and she snatches my card out of my hand and doesn't say thank you or whatsoever. They have so many dumb employees here. Smh!
Fast service and always get my order right! My granddaughter loves the play area. I am a frequent mcdonalds customer and this facility is my favorite in the area.

I came to this McDonald's through the drive thru. I had 4 cars in front of me, none behind me. It was not very busy, and I can understand why after this experience. The girl taking the order told me to order, I did, then silence. Then a minute later she finally comes back and she says "what did you want again?". I repeated my order, #4 large with Dr pepper and no onion. She is silent again then finally says "I'll have your total at the first window". I get up there she is standing with another employee, I thought talking to each other... wrong! The other employee Shalawny is holding her phone up for a video discussion with someone else and the girl taking my money is saying "you got your hair did it looks very cute!" I couldn't believe it. She says nothing to me and just hands my card and receipt and I pull forward. I get to the 2nd window and the girl Alexis hands me a bag and drink. I ask if it has no onions, she asks "Did you just ask them for that at the first window?" I reply no and she takes my bag back and walks away while I'm still talking. She comes back a couple minutes later and hands me a bag and then walks away. No words no sorry have a good day, nothing. I know customer service and this isn't it. They are rude, incompetent, and not attentive or helpful. They can't even recite the order back to verify, they can't talk to their customer with respect, they just act entitled. If these people get $15 an hour, I will not be happy. I wouldn't even allow them to work for free for me. Besides their customer service the fries were over salted (and I love salt), the burger was dry and old, and the condiments were sparsely applied to the bun. I bet the owner here allows them to do this and doesn't care as long as they make money. I know corporate McDonald's would have gotten rid of them with corporate complaints happening. I just made a corporate complaint on them myself, hope they enjoy it. By the way my cashier, had no name tag on either! It's not difficult to come to work in your uniform there! No slip shoes, check, shirt, check, pants, check, name tag showing I can only work fast food because I'm not smart enough to do anything else, check. Enjoy Shalanwy, Alexis, and your cashier friend, this is going to be your career, so you should at least attempt to be good at it!

I was here a few days ago and started not to write a review but I just can't hold it no more! Service sucked big time and they were not that busy. I usually go through the drive thru but this particular time I went in. Wanted a fish filet combo... No fish! Wanted the cheap dollar menu pies... No pies! Wanted 2 peach cream pies and 2 strawberry pies..... No peach pies!! So I ended up ordering a few combos and 3 strawberry cream pies, there's only 1 strawberry pie will have to wait 15-20 minutes. Nope I want my money back.. she refunds me for 2 cheap apple pies but gave the refund with my change. No tea, was told there was sweet tea! Got my meal and the fries were cold, brown and staled. Counted my change a dollar almost 2 dollars short looked through the bag no pies just food! Goes right back in there and they tried to give me back 50 something cents and swore me up and down I wanted the refund for the apple pies and they put all 3 strawberry pies in the bag, ummm excuse me it hasn't even been 15-20 minutes now so how did you put the pies?? Then they were getting mad and griping at Promise who was a new worker taking my order, it was not her fault you guys had nothing and had terrible service because her customer service skills deserved 10 stars!! Needless to say, I will never eat at this McDonalds again!!
Good service & quality food. The lines get pretty crazy at lunch but  I think it has to do with the location.
Open late. Staff is always friendly. French fries are always hot and salty. Yum.

I decided to stop by to pick up a chocolate shake before heading home, big mistake!  I go to the drive thru a ordered my shake, I pull up to the cashier window only to have the cashier tell me their SHAKE MACHINE IS BROKEN!!! I was pissed!!! Would it be too much to ask the workers to put a "shake machine is broken"  sign outside where it can be easily seen by drive thru customers??? They had no sign at all!! I drove across the street to get my milkshake fix!!!!!

I must say that I'm not surprised that every time I come here they get my order wrong. I don't understand how hard it is to ring up a number 4 on the breakfast menu when that is clearly what I said. I pay & get my receipt back & it says I ordered 2 sausage mcmuffins only. I drive up to the window & I told the worker that I ordered a number 4. She states that it is a number 4. Really because a number 4 is 2 sausage mcmuffins with a hash brown & a drink. The only thing in the bag were the 2 damn mcmuffins. She quickly asked me what drink I wanted & gave it to me with no charge. Oh & they forgot my hash brown. Next time I go I'm going to say some words to those idiotic people.
This McDonalds is very neat and clean.Staff is so friendly and here customer service is so fast and they greet each and every customer very nicely. I would preferred my friends to go there.

Its okay here. They get our order wrong about one in five times we're here. We don't eat Mickey D's often so we don't sweat it. They are always nice about corrections  Hey, it's got the only Playland anywhere near North Natomas. That weighs heavy whether it's pouring down rain or 105 degrees out. The remodel looks nice. Wish they'd finish that Playland already. They said today it would be done by the end of the month. It looks like the new version will be friendlier for little kids - a bonus for tot moms. We rarely use the drive-thru. An occasional frozen cone en route to the dollar store  You know what Joe Pesci says about the drive-thru!

If I could give this place 0 stars, I would, but since Yelp only allows me to give this shitty McDonalds 1 star, it will do for now. The other morning my parents and I came in to get to breakfast and the lady named Sashi took our order. There are no words to describe how dumb she was! My mom ordered iced coffee, and she asked, "hot or iced?" My mom thought she didn't hear her so she told her again. Then Sashi asked, "hot or iced?" AGAIN! She asked about 3 times after that. Then, Sashi told my mom all the coffee machines were broken! We were like WTF? Ok, fine, get me some fucking orange juice then. After that, 2 senior citizens asked for coffee and they received it!   Another customer noticed this also since they overheard Sashi tell my mom none of the coffee machines were working. So now we got other customers and my parents asking Sashi what is going on? Why would she say all the machines were broken, then give these next 2 customers coffee?! So now another McD's employee had to step in and tell us Sashi meant only the iced coffee machine is broken. Ok, first of all, how do you not know what is working and what is not working and you work there?! Second, why the hell do they have incompetent people working at the front? Keep those people in the back, and PLEASE don't even think about putting them on the drive thru window. Nope, not coming back.
Clean bathroom at a busy time. Well done, McD. Well done!  I didn't get food. Just another drink for the bladder to hold until I hit the next McD along the way to urinate at and repeat. :D
Good hot coffee.   French fries are second only to in n out.

EVERY TIME I come here these stupid people cannot get my order right!!!!!! I order a vanilla iced coffee with extra vanilla and light on the ice. They still put the same amount of ice and I still cannot taste any vanilla.. I pay extra for that crap and they scam me.  Most of them are in middle school/high school probably thats why they cant get anything right.
1:42 am.  "6 double cheeseburgers please." - says the drunk.
This McDonald's is much better than the one on Truxel.  Larger store, nicer looking, and much cleaner.  Large parking lot with easy access driveway.  Near I-80 entrance too.

I am embarrassed to even write this review but I must tell my fellow Yelp friends to avoid this place if at all possible. We came here Friday night because my husband HAD to have a hot fudge sundae before our drive up the mountain to Tahoe. This location is conveniently located off the freeway which is obviously a major stop for travellers.   He waited in line for probably 25 minutes to order his stupid sundae because they had only ONE cashier working that night. On top of that you have to wait for everyone to order $30 worth of food for their families so it took forever. The location cared more about their drive-thru customers then actual customers in the store. Now that I think about it, we should have just gone through drive-thru but I had to pee really bad ;)   AVOID this place if you can! One extra star because it is a nice clean location and is huge with a playground so I guess it's good for families to come here if they wanted to. No thanks!

McDonald's is one of those restaurants where you should always get what you order. You know exactly what something you order tastes like at McDonald's before you even order it. That's how this McDonald's operates. The food tastes the same each and every time you visit, and it's always good.  Their coffee is excellent too.  The employees are perky and jovial -- whether you're going at 3pm for lunch or 3am for a midnight craving.  Their drive-thru is open 24 hours a day, one of the few in Sacramento that is (it's Sacramento, shouldn't more McD's be 24/7?) and the drive-thru is open on holidays like Christmas and New Year's Day.  Another major plus: The location of garbage cans throughout the drive-thru and inside the restaurants.  It makes sense to have a car-accessible trash can AFTER the drive-thru window for straw wrappers.  The one complaint I have is the wait at the drive-thru can be somewhat lengthy in the early morning hours, but it's often worth the wait.
The service is so slow and after waiting forever, they got our order wrong. I'm not a McDonalds fan but REALLY not this McDonalds fan!

Wow! No reviews for my favorite McDonald's on the way to Tahoe?! Seriously, every time I go to Tahoe, I visit this McD's! It's actually quite fancy w/ woodgrain-paneled walls, faux flowers on every table and it's pretty friggin clean!  It's right off of the highway so it's super convenient to get off & on 80 plus, it's the perfect distance away from Tahoe so that you can digest enough before you hit the slopes!

It's McDonald's. Just like any other McDonald's. The food is OK. Nothing special. Depending on what time of the day it is, prepare yourself for a lengthy wait time. Sometimes their "atm/credit machine" goes down, so if you don't have cash, you're pretty much screwed.

so unacceptable I do not know where to begin.  I come here because it is close to my work. I went there a couple times during my lunch break and they told me their computer is down, and only accepting cash. Hello! this is the twenty-first century. who carries cash? seriously?  I questioned them if this was a daily thing because this happened before.  This was surprising to me they would turn customers away especially on a Friday night.  So after hearing this news I could not order my lunch, I had to go through the drive through since there was a car behind me. I pulled through to the window where I waited for twenty minutes for them to complete the order for the car in front of me. I thought it was a large order or something,  but they handed him one small bag and he left. Thank you McDonalds. Not only did I spend my entire lunch break suckling exhaust fumes in your drive through, I didn't even get a cheeseburger to show for it.
Late night has gotten much better but no matter what time of day there always seems to be a line at the drive-thru.
Thanks Josephine for assisting us and other customers! This location has been my best experience thus far with McDonald's. Nice and clean.  Side note: McDonald's radio is kind of weird.

So this is the only place that has a play palace in Stockton to take the kids for dinner and play, it's extremely busy yes!! But the dining room was filthy, and the front counter person was VERY RUDE. Walking around talking about she only takes order does not give out drink cups, sauces or even napkins to customers. It's one thing or another coming into this McDonald's.

So apparently, late nights are equally as bad. Ordered a double cheeseburger meal, the fries were absolutely horrible! They were cold, hard and filled with grease. Not the typical McDonald's fries. Burger, let's just say the cheese was not melted, The meat was horrible, and the bread was stale. This particular McDonald's is by far the worst in Stockton (Lower Sac Rd). I will drive 25 miles across town to get a better McDonald's experience. But I will probably just give up McDonald's all together.  The Habit is looking better each day.
So. I've been waiting inside 15 or more minutes on my food and I got cold half filled fries.  Thanks so much pricks

8/18/18 - The cashier that works at night is very courteous, one of the reasons I like going at night, she always gets my order right.  The food  is always fresh, I have never gotten a bad meal.  My only gripe is I wish the French fries  were hot and the sweet tea was better; last two times it was on the weak side.
Worst quarter pounder burger i've eaten. Super salty!!!  I gave 2 star because the nice and friendly order taker.  The problem is the one in the kitchen.

If it's not forgetting my half empty 2 oz container Mac sauce that I have to pay an extra dollar for, it's giving me a regular bun on a Big Mac instead of the sesame bun it's supposed to come with. Never fails to disappoint at this location

I give this place one star because today a mother with three children was asking one of the servers to please provide her with something to clean up the floor due to her son had just threw up, she waited there for more than five minutes and none of the servers brought anything for her to clean up the throw up, they told her to leave and that they were going to clean it up, it's been 20 minutes since the lady left and no one still has cleaned up the throw up in front of the register it's Very unsanitary

Literally the worst mcondalds in Stockton, ca. Terrible customer service, drive through people suck, ice cream machines never work, drive through orders always come out wrong and they always the ice cream machines hella early. They close early all the time, cause I gert off off work and want fries and they are fucking closed 15mins before it says on their drive through window.

I ordered 2 large mocha frappes at the drive thru. They asked if we could park and wait because they had to refill the machine, which I didn't mind.  I received the drinks a couple mins later and didn't notice that they were both 3/4 filled by the time I got home and I didn't notice it considering it was night time. Tried calling this establishment 3 times... no answers at all.  Very disappointing.

Ok so why yelping McDonalds . We all know that we will still come back here once in a while . I just thought it might help a little bit to fellow yelpers.   Drive thru : I'm in a hurry so I chose drive thru . I made my order and I know that in almost all the drive thru around here not just McDonald's , they always forget something . The staff are nice . I added some meal when I get to the cashier. And then I carefully checked all the items . So we are on our way . Munching on some of  the fries and I thought I got everything but lo , geez they forgot my drink in a meal . Omg . Well lesson learned I need to really take my time to make sure everything is there in the bag . I don't know if it's only me but everytime I go drive thru they always miss something . And sad thing is I don't want the trouble  to come back and ask for the drink .

The LBGT Asian manager was very rude. I asked if I could get a last minute drink at the second window and he told me to go back around the drive thru. Since I used to work at McDonald's, I asked him why I couldn't just get it there. He rudely gave me a dirty look and ignored me. I'm a nice guy and rarely ever have any issues with customer service reps but this guy needs to get evaluated. Very dissatisfied with my experience.

Poor customer service,  VERY rude girl working counter, worst part is her manager was standing right next to her. Didnt seem like manager cared either when I asked who the manager was and that the employee was rude, I watched it with other customers and then myself. Owner has several locations in Stockton, out of touch perhaps ???

So when u order a big breakfast u think ur getting a big breakfast wrong. No hashbrown. N the eggs o what eggs. That was the worst i have ever seen at a mc donalds. Who was cooking back there today. Very upsetting. Just wanted my order to be correct and good. So sad
Awful place.People are like zombies and take forever.So disorganized.Peppermint mocha was the worst ever.Do yourself a favor and stay away from this one.

I've been here several times. Unpleasant experience. More often than not staff are rude and food orders commonly have errors. Clearly this location has Leadership issues. It's a shame because this is a new store in a great location.
This is the worst mcdonalds. The staff are very rude i will never go here again. I would tell ppl NOTto go yo this mcdonalds until they fix the staffing problem.

They got my order wrong. They are all acting unprofessional. Also, there was a horrific incident in the men's bathroom and it took them 30 minutes to figure someone needs to clean it. The manager couldn't even go to clean it. There was also bad table service.

So. I like MC Ds ,So this is very disappointing. #7 was  greasy as hell some nuggets were crispy no chicken inside just crispy, also my large frys were grease with no flavour at all.  I could even eat it. The pic show no justice.  Services was ok in the Drive threw window. I ask for extra ice in my large coke three time on the order she even repeated it back to me. Get to the 1st window an she was like "you order?" I was like really. #7. She then rings it up again. An tell me we'll can you just tell the 2nd window to add he ice. She having troubles. So I did. Well the lady who 1st poured my drink was handing it to me. The sound was light. Like no ice at all. I ask is there extra ice. She looked at the screen, she gave me a look walk away. Another lady was kinda rude. Got my extra ice. Coke was awesome. Last time I go to this MC Donald's  come on Ronald. Crack that whip.

This place was once nice a clean now it's dirty disgusting.  You might get lucky and have a good worker but most of the time your get some rude monkey who just wants to make you flip out . It's my last time coming here. customers who don't mind eating in a filthy place were they run out of everything this is the spot for you .

so GHETTO!!  The employees are rude with an attitude, even the managers, so unprofessional and lack the common courtesy to say thank you.  Pull up to drive through, they are switching out the cashier drawer and can't even acknowledge you or say just a moment PLEASE.  So so ghetto, not the first time.  I go in as a customer and don't appreciate attitude and lack of basic common courtesies and manner.  BYE BYE Ghetto McDonald's

I don't know why i keep going back to this place ...this was probably the last time tho ..So with my order they didn't give my kids fries in their happy meal and they didn't give us one of our drinks ..The girls were young and rude always rushing ... all round customer services  is bad and this was maybe the 3rd or 4th time that this has happened ..So yes lesson learned  i will not go back to this one anymore..I'm a fool because its close by and my kids love nuggets from time to time ..But ill have to visit another McDonald's ..

This is the second worst McDonald's in Stockton, i asked for crispy chicken sandwich meal the fries were ridiculously cold, My sandwich looked like a damn salad with all the lettuce on it, the customer service was decent that's why they got 1 star.
How can they not have sugar or creamer for your coffee on the side??! Second time they do this. They're Very RUDE by the way

I come here occasionally because it's the closest McDonald on my way to work.  This morning i ordered an oatmeal and when i got to work, opened it and i was shocked to see how very little oatmeal they put in there. It's only half the cup! Not worth my $2.71! What about the rest of the cup filled with empty air?? And this isn't the first time too. Everytime i order oatmeal, they always put very little in there. What is wrong with you people??? Not only that, one time i got a parfait and it was only filled to half! If y'all people gonna only give me half a cup of things, then you need to charge me half a price only!!!

I enjoy McDonalds because of the cheap prices, this location always seems very busy, there's homeless always wondering around, service is bad, there's this black gay dude that obviously hates his job and is always in a bad mood it's funny because I always see him dancing on a random corner around town and he seems happy then lol

First of all people who even have the time to comment their worthless opinions on yelp deserve to sit there for their orders if you want 5 star quality for a dollar price you are probably delusional. If you had a bad experience at a restaurant don't go back and tell all the people you think care because no one else does.

Holly cow!!! Ok so I go through the drive thru and order the following! 2 sausage mc muffins with egg and cheese. 2 sausage mc muffins with EGG WHITES, and cheese! 4 sausage burritos! I pay get to the window to get my food to find out that they only rang me up for 2 Sausage egg and cheese (one regular, and one with egg whites) and 4 burritos. And then they tell me they can't fix it at the pick up window! So I go inside! WHERE I WAIT FOR 15 min before anybody even takes my order! Then at that time they proceed to tell me they can't make my sandwich with egg whites cause it's past breakfast! SERIOUSLY YOU MESS UP MY ORDER AND REFUSE TO MAKE IT RIGHT! So I get the sandwiches as they normally come! 35 min later I get my food! Yes I waited there for 35 min to get 2 sausage egg and cheese mc muffins! This is not the first time this has happened to me! They mess up my order almost every time I go there! And if there was another mc Donald's near me trust me I would change where I go! Mind you the people behind the counter are RUDE AS HELL, and trust me need to all be taught customer service!   AVOID THE MC DONALDS AT LOWER SACRAMENTO ROAD NORTH OF HAMMER IF YOU CAN!!! IT IS BY FAR THE WORSE PLACE EVER!

It was dirty, all drinks were out.. When you tell them that their drink machine isn't working, they look puzzled. Homeless wandering around inside, filling their cups up with ice, order took 20 minutes. Wow..

Most of the time I'm here for the dollar drinks, but damn, this place sucks. Seems like none of the workers want to be here, and they move as fast as a 1 legged jack rabbit in the middle of December on a snowy day.
Never going to this McDonald's again! They served me a raw chicken sandwich and they're service is the slowest in this area

Service sometimes sucks because they do not try to get your order right or at least make your order so they always tell you their machine is broken. I'm giving this place 5 stars because I love one of their cashiers, I believe his name is LEE. He is awesome!!!

I really hate to give a one-star review but dang. I sat in the drive through for 7 minutes; didn't move. So I backed up and though "oh I'll just go inside." Got inside, no one was in front of me in line. Ordered. Got my food 13 minutes later. I understand the world wants everything NOW but this is fast food, right? It shouldn't take that long to get a breakfast meal (which I'm assuming is essentially thrown together from a pan under the warmer...) ugh.
Slowest f***kin place in the world. I dont know which line is slower. This drive thru line, or Space Mountain at Disneyland.

We went to get a quick bite to eat after shopping and the cashier was very nice I believe his name was Ben. Sadly there was no sense of urgency at all with the other employees they were taking their time and very rude.

Worst drive thru McDonalds in the county. They have yet to get my order right ONCE. I give up. 4 years living close to this one and I'd rather drive to the one on Trinity Parkway instead. Tonight it was a missing GoGurt in my son's happy meal. I'm done.

This is the worst McDonnells the people running this show don't know their head from a cold asshole and they think white people are the problem and cool dude so I would never go back it's ran by bunch of idiots bunch of women I don't know what the fucks going on so no please don't go back to this establishment it's terrible the worst the worst please stay away I wouldn't even give it a one but I have to it's a piece of shit because of the management.

HORRIBLE SERVICE!!!!!   I never get what I ordered, the employees that run the drive thru are RUDE!!!! Order 20 nuggets and get 2 sauces! Helpful suggestions!!!  1. Train your employees  2. Rethink how you treat customers  3. Maybe just maybe realize that Mc Donald's is a HUGE corporation and can afford to give atleast 4 sauces per 20 piece nugget meal!   4. Maybe check your customers order in their bag before saying BYE!!! If you even say BYE to your customers!   So not happy

Went to the lower sac McDonald's to only get half my order an when i tried to call they would just pick up phone an hang up without saying a word...thats reason enough to get someone hurt in this town...i wont be back to that location ever again ...u guys suck work on it...
The team was busy visiting instead of taking care of their customers. My daughter was at the counter for 8 minutes
Dirty  the restroom is very dirty, feces in the toilet bowl not flushed, feces stains on toilet seat, paper towels on the floor. Tables not wiped. The dirtiest McDonald.
Dirtiest Mc Donald's I've ever been to. Didn't even let my kid take her shoes off in the play center . Absolutely gross. Even cup o noodles trash on the tables .

The cashier was really nice. When I got my order and went to the playroom, all the tables were dirty. The table I sat at had grape jelly and food on the seats. I didnt get any napkins with my order, I had to go back up to get napkins after already going up front because they gave me sweet and sour sauce instead of ranch for my nuggets. Food was good, right temperature, not cold not super hot either. Fries were fresh although the oil can use a change. Overall customer service was great. Can use a little more cleaning in the restaurant.

I would not recomend this place at all very rude and disrespectful staff, play area is very very unsanitary it is not ever clean soda spilled food all over the ground , when asked to clean they take very long and do it as if its a very hard job
Ashanti that work the drive thru is very nice !!  She is always smiling I come in throughly the drive thru for a cone when I pick my cousin up from school and take him home live right behind it
Usually the food is good and relatively fast at this location but this time i got expired pie and had to wait 10 minutes in the drive thru just to get it. Annoying

Sat at 11:53am want to this mcdonalds for lunch drive thru was full so decided to go in line has about 6 in front of me and 8 behind me by the time I ordered. Food took extremely long to get and at this time employees were clocking out and leaving with the lobby line and customer waiting for food and overall service was slow. And to top it off after 15 min for food was charged 50c more for sauce after spending $9.50 for meal! Place is a wreck would not reccomend!

The first thing i noticed when i walked into Mcdonalds was that it was remodeled just like other Mcdonalds. The restaurant looked more fancy and I felt like if I was in a fancy restaurant and not fastfood. As soin as i opened the door I smelled burgers. It was pretty busy, but the line to order was going by fast. When i was ordering the cashier was really polite and always had a smile on her face. Once i ordered I only waited about five minutes for my food. Once i recieved my food i was happy with it because my burger was in the order it was supoosed to be and it was not messy. Overall i can say i was happy with my visit.

I understand that this is a fast food restaurant, but seeing that I live about a block away from it I happen to frequent it a bit - probably more often than I should. I have learned a lot about establishments from seeing how people treat the employees there and vice versa. My thought is that it is run as well as they can - even excellently with the staff and the product that they have. Imagine trying to work with people who are just starting out in life - this is many of the employees first job. The fact that they can serve up the product that is expected while constantly training people who know nothing about work, and maintaining a clean restaurant while dealing with customers from a wide spectrum of social and economic backgrounds is a marvel when you actually stop and think about it. And the beauty of it? They treat everyone the same, with as much kindness and speed as they are capable of. Next time you go to a fast food restaurant, keep that in mind.

This is my main mcdonalds! I wish there was one closer, but oh well. The workers are speedy &friendly. Always get my order right which is a blessing! The drive-thru is always busy, but the two drive ups help.

I am a HUGE McDonald's fan.  H-U-G-E.  Only 2 stars, you wonder?  This particular MickieD's always manages to screw up my order.  And then they're slow about correcting the problem.  I avoid this McDonald's.... after all, there are many others in Stockton to chose from.

Use to visit this McDonalds quite frequently because it's the closest to home. However, it's gotten harder and harder to ignore employees BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE (McDonald employees: Please don't be upset with me, be upset with yourself, who made the choices that brought you to become a fast food minimum wage employee. I'm just the customer whose business is vital to your paycheck.), INCONSISTENCY (One day they charge you extra for condiments, sauce ect. that can't be tasted or seen and the next they'll give you an EXCESSIVE amount for free?!) and their FREQUENT MISTAKES (Seriously, more than one employee is wearing a headset, your order is displayed on several screens and they still manage to mess up on your order, how do they do it? The world may never know).
cheap, fast, clean, and efficient.  also has a play land for the youngsters.
Sheila, great customer service! Her approach was clear and professional! Efficient multitasker and treated every single customer the same!

Slow doesn't cut it. The word to describe the pace in which these guys work hasn't been invented yet. I am literally sitting in line right now writing this review. I am stuck in a line of cars, otherwise I would just drive away. I have been sitting here for 30 minutes. Literally 30 minutes. I still have two cars in front of me. This is crazy. How can an owner be ok with this?   I just stopped writing and had a 5 minute conversation with my wife. I have not moved in 5 minutes, since finishing that last paragraph. The worst experience at a Mcdonalds in all of my life.

Old oil in fryers!  Really Really old oil.  Like years old oil. The hashbrowns were absolutely inedible.  I'm gagging just thinking about it.  Grossest McDonalds visit of my life.  The cashier didn't know how to pronounce money amounts.  How much? "Ten four"  What?  "Ten four"?  Finally I realized that this meant ten dollars and four cents and wasn't a trucker salute.  Amazing that this place is in business.

The only redeeming quality of this place is that they do have automated kiosks that let you bypass the hired help.   This is definitely one of the worst McDonalds that I've ever been to. Slow service, absolutely. Incompetent service, absolutely. No ice in the drink machines, absolutely. Dirty facility with bugs and flies, absolutely. A bathroom that you have to be buzzed into, absolutely. This McDonalds has it all.   The food is fine, the problem is it takes forever and when you do get it, something is likely to be wrong. Then add another 10 minutes to get your order fixed.   If you are in the Lodi area, definitely give this specific McDonalds a pass and drive into the town if you want your Big Mac fix. Otherwise there are plenty of competitors in this area.

very slow, there are no people, I ordered a simple coffee at 11.45 and I was waiting for coffee for 12 minutes ........ I would like to drink energy and work faster .... and bring cleanliness to the toilet, there it smells very badly.
More flies than customers at all times. Been a few times on road trips, clearly no attempt to improve conditions. I'm choosing to stand outside because it's so bad.

Worse time ever here, it's declined in cleanliness, customer service, and quality. The bathrooms were disgusting, first of all it's not that hard to wipe mirrors down, they looked like they haven't been cleaned in over a month. The stalls, sinks, floors had all debri on them. The quality of food was nasty too, tasted like old nuggets left out for long then redipped ( which fast food places do). Our large fry looked like a small, talk about skim or just lack of care.
I went to McDonald's because I have the McDonald's app that contained a coupon for any burger for a dollar. Awesome deal! Ordered a Big Mac. Got it in record time and it was delicious!
The service here was terrible. They kept messing up orders. I waited an hour to get my food and was still missing parts of my order. I didn't even eat my food after that.

Yes! I agree with the previous reviews! This McDonald's is probably the worst I have ever seen, and I have been to some bad ones!!!  I initially stopped here to use the restroom and buy a cup of coffee before heading down the road.  Going into the restroom was bad. It obviously hadn't had a thorough cleaning in months, literally.  At least they had soap and water.  While standing in line for my coffee, I started looking around.  Disgusting!!!  This place is so filthy, I turned around and walked out.  It is gross!!!  How does the Health Department allow to stay open?  I didn't see any dead rats or roaches, but I bet I would find them if I stuck around...

This has to be the worse establishment I have been to in my life. 90 degrees out and No AC in the dining area. Must be 1 fly for every table and wall. No wonder they have only two stars. I actually called the corporate office while I was sitting here to complain. Two flies just landed on me! If your expecting a respectable establishment don't come here.

I'm surprised!  The cashier was very nice.  She asked me what would I like to order with a smile!    The Mocha Frappe $3.75 for a large size was yummy.  It was mixed just right.  It's one of the best tasting frappes I've had compared to other McDonalds.  Would return to eat here when I'm in the area.

Very bad customer service, total joke today waited 20 minutes for a simple breakfast. Employees don't know what's going on and they are forcing customers to use self kiosks. Customers are confused, irritated and even walking out. Manager says they are getting used to the "new" system. One customer has waited over 30 minutes with all this confusion, customers are taking pictures of kiosk as this is a total failure.

Deplorable. Simply deplorable. This is not only the worst experience I have ever had at a McDonald's, it's the worst experience I've EVER had at any retail restaurant. The drive through experience was bad, but when I went in to attempt buying a $50 gift card, I was met by the rudest employee/person I've ever encountered. I walked away from the counter having not buying anything. I will never return.
I don't understand the Quality of food at McDonald's has went down so much over the years the French fries hear at this restaurant were refried and served at 3:30 and afternoon or Friday unacceptable

This is by far the worst mcdonald's i have ever been to. I stopped here with my husband on our way to an out of town wedding and they screwed our order up completely along with our friends order. We were missing a soda, and after we told them we noticed we were also missing three mcchicken sandwiches. They gave our friends food (3 sausage mcmuffins) to another car so they never got their food. Poor customer service. Just awful we are now running late to our party and we're hungry.

I went to the drive thru and asking for 2 sausage McMuffins with no egg and the very rude employee taking my order told me that it was $3 for sausage McMuffin with no egg and that it was $2 for a regular sausage McMuffin(Which is essentially the same thing just without egg rite?)....So I laughed and said huh...I don't think your understanding me why would it be a $1 difference based on the way I worded the girl then decided to cut me off while talking with a very nasty attitude and said she would gave my total at the window so I parked and went inside where she decided to cut me and the supervisor off as I was talking and kept jumping in our conversation....this is the worst customer service I have ever experienced and I will NEVER EVER step foot in this place again I ultimately did not buy anything from this place and would not spend a dime here!!!!!...Her customer service was disgusting!...As well as the supervisor because he did not put her in her place and advise her to not yell at or go back and forth with a Customer!....

It's McDonald's. It's just like the other ones.  Why the hell did I check in here?  Now I have to write a review....  It wasn't bad. We always stop at McD's to either order a drink, breakfast, lunch, use the bathroom or stretch our legs. That basically covers everything doesn't it? Anyways, this is an okay spot if you don't compare McDonald's to higher end joints.

Terrible service.... Dont stop here..... Line out the door and one cashier with a register that wasnt working.... 15 minute wait... Then another 15 minutes for food and the order was messed up......convenient location but service was not.  Soda machine also needed servicing and was out of certain flavors.
Poor customer service. Ran out of sugar at 5am! God help them serving breakfast for the rest of the day.

So slow,  ridiculous wait with ONE person ahead of me; and they only ordered a small breakfast item! The cashier had more hair hanging down and sticking out than was in her bun,  and wearing a dirty jacket.  Totally unprofessional and disgusting.

The service here is insanely slow and they have no respect for any of their customers. Had to wait 5 minutes just for 2 cookies and no one except a young nice man said sorry for the convenience. To add to this dirty mess of a restaurant, including flies, the parking lot is extremely damaged. The large dip on the far side caused my passenger to hit their on head on the windshield regardless of seatbelt and cracked the windshield. I truly hope that this horrible fast food cesspool gets shut down.

I can't help but return to this McDonald's, in fact I looked forward to today's visit. This the first time I've actually eaten in the restaurant. Usually I just drive through because I'm always rushing from place to place. But the idea of savoring two egg sausage mcmuffins was to great to resist.  So I go order and because of my error I ordered the wrong combo. Suddenly the idea of two sausage egg mcmuffins died into one order. Because of my error I asked to pay for an upgrade. And to my surprise the line manager said no charge. Yup no charge and as I sit here enjoying every bite, I think this is why I do of all my business here it is because of the good food and great people. As I think back while ordering through drive through I can hear an almost musical voice take my order and followed by driving up to talk to wonderful employee. Anyway because of this great service and good food I can't recommend going anywhere else.
Quick pit stop, service was polite and prompt (to me at least) but overheard employees talking smack about other customers. Also, lots of flies by the McCafe area.. Order with caution :-(

Two bathrooms in ladies room out of order. Bathroom filthy. Unable to wash hands as water not working . Hand dryer in men's room not working.  After ordering was told "cash only".  Others in line had to cancel their orders as they were not carrying cash.Unable to hook up to Internet . This place is a disaster and not up to McDonald's quality.

I'd give 0 stars if possible. Dumb ass girls working here. No communication, I shouldn't have to listen to bitches bicker while waiting for food with kids in the car. Then they assured us we got everything and did we? Nope! Had to circle back around for my kids milks. Awesome.
The girls at the counter were really polite, meanwhile there were customers being really rude for nooooo reason. Had to leave a positive Yelp! review after seeing that.

It's too bad that I can't give a no star score. This McD is the worst I have ever been in. The staff are so incompetent that I thought it was a joke. They have no sense of caring about the customers.  Drive-through window employee walked up to the cashier and start talking about one of the customers outside we all heard how she was complaining that the customer was a jerk all because he wanted his food on time. This place should be closed down

Man, this has to be the grossest McDonalds ever. Men's bathroom was a wreck. Women's bathroom had glass on the floor. Drink machine parts broken. You stop at a McDonalds not for great food, but because you know exactly what you're getting. This place is way below normal McD's. Eww.

So our first visit was on my way to my parents and my husband got a Big Mac & it was very very salty (he's had many Big Macs before) and was very slow service. Then Came here Christmas night because i was coming home from my parents house and was craving French fries.  About 6 people inside. And 2 orders Infront of us. Ordered 2 mcchickens, medium fries, & peppermint mocha. Everyone working seemed SO SLOW, the cashier & the cooks. (Yes I was watching them) they took forever to call our number. (It was a Togo order) then finally we got our food and went to the car and checked our food. And ended up with 1 Mchicken, 2 hamburgers, 2 cheeseburgers, & 1 medium fries -___-

NO STAR ESTABLISHMENT...NO WHERE NEAR MCD's QUALITY Been here several times, trying to give them another chance each time. This is by far the worst McDonald's we have ever visited. 20 min to get 2 HAPPY meals after it took 12 min to get 1-chicken sandwich and 1- 1/4lb meal with cold fries. HAPPY meals were cold and found they had been sitting on shelf since we got our original partial order. They forgot to call with my wife standing right there asking for them. Fast food my butt. Both bathrooms were disgustingly dirty, women's bathroom had no toilet paper. Men's bathroom hand dryer so loud that we couldn't hear ourselves talk in the dining room. Manager said she was understaffed but looked like drive through was more important than the dining room service. Several orders taken and people crowding around waiting for their orders. We have stopped at this location several times and our order is always wrong.I will be contacting corporate about this DUMP! 6440 Banner St, Lodi Calif 95242 McDonald's  #14444

Re: Banner Street FLAG CITY McDonald's in Lodi CA @ Hwy 12 & Interstate 5.  PLEASE make some changes, McDonalds!  Of course my kids enjoy McDonald's, but in comparison this store is the worst McDonald's in Lodi. The other Lodi McDonald's stores are really rather nice. Please note... The counter and dining room employees were great! They were very nice, helpful, hard working and efficient... I appreciated that a lot! But there are other big problems with this store.   First off, this store is very small, often dirty and incredibly HOT! They do not turn on the A/C high enough (even when it's 100 degrees outside!), as they should and the result is a group of sweating customers trying to eat their food...gross! When it's too hot in there it just seems more dirty, sticky and unpleasant for the customers (and I'm sure the employees too).   This store attracts a big group of homeless people that hang out inside and around the store parking lot (loitering). I guess it's because this store is by the freeway and next to a big truck stop. It makes it very uncomfortable to eat here with my family when there are many disturbed people talking to themselves, hanging around in the bathrooms, taunting others and asking people for money. They like to hang out inside the restaurant for long periods of time. Some of these folks have been quite aggressive and threatening. It would be fine, but you cannot allow ANYONE to behave with that kind of disrespect to your customers... or employees for that matter.    We decided to leave the store early (again), as to get the kids away from the aggressive men staring and commenting at us while we were trying to eat. It was very unpleasant for my family. And it scared the kids. I'm sure the McDonald's Corporation wouldn't be happy about this sort of thing at one of their stores. Maybe they need a security guard at this McDonald's store.   I like McDonald's (and Lodi) a lot, so I hope they can get a handle on this poor situation at this Banner Street (Flag City, Lodi, CA) McDonald's store.   Keep up the good work employees...I can tell that you work hard... even though you only get minimum wage. I respect that. And to the managers (and owners)... I really think you need to step it up! I KNOW for a fact that you can do a lot better.   Managers... make sure your franchise owner knows what is going on here.   Well, we'll see how it goes the next time we're in the area. Please work on these issues, so we don't have to skip this store for a better one.   Bottom line...   - Clean the store... inside and out! - TURN UP THE A/C!!! - Run off the aggressive people that loiter inside and outside the store. - Do not allow the loitering people to be aggressive towards your customers or employees.   - Clean those bathrooms! - Appreciate your hard working employees.  - Put napkins in the dining room, as you spend too much time retrieving napkins when they are requested.

Food was Normal for what you can find here this is mostly about the bathroom. I am traveling with my wife and 8 month old son. Had to stop to feed him and change him you would think a Md there would be a changing table in one of the restrooms since many people bring there kids here well there's not. When I went to use the stall it was very dirty tp dispenser looked like it was broken in to the stall had brown and yellow stains by the back of the seat and a pair of underwear sitting in the corner very gross went across the street to use there john much better and it was a gas station

Well, let's start with the fact that I thought I ordered a 1/4 pounder.  What I got was something that looked along the lines of a veggie burger (I think I just threw up in my mouth a little, lol).  I've been going to McDonald's since dirt was born and I have NEVER seen meat that looked like this.  I asked them if they microwave the patty because it was just, just, ugh I'm just so traumatized I can't find the words right now.    I know the pressed chicken parts nuggets are not a better option but at least I saw those come out of the grease bath.  So they exchanged it for me.  Now, I don't know what kind of trickery y'all (yeah, I said Y'ALL, lol) got going on down there in Lodi, but you better start serving real meat and not whatever you scrounge out of the back of trucks over at the truck stop.    Of course, with the truck stop very nearby, there's a lot of 'local talent" hanging around.

Driving home on our family vacation and had to stop - my sister got stuck in the bathroom. My mom went to ask the manager for a key or sorts. The manager took her time coming over. Then she tried the door handle and said it had to be opened from the inside. We said we understood and asked my sister to try again she tried and shook the door. Nothing.  The manger then said, "Sorry, we don't have keys for any of the doors." And walked away! We stopped her and asked if they had a screwdriver and she said she didn't know and walked away. So we went and asked someone another employee who went asked two other guys to help open the door.   Eventually we got the door unstuck. But I was shocked at the rudeness of the manager and lack of concern.   What if there was a medical emergency for the person behind that door? I work in emergency medical services and have had situations of the person locked on the other side having a life and death emergency. There was always a key that was used to get to the patient. Not only was management lacking in concern but lacking in necessary resources.  UPDATED: The general manager just called me and apologized for the incident, and said he was would review and help the said manager work on a better way to respond. Thanks guys! That was fast! He was  very understanding and helpful.

If it could be negative it would. Ordered a special order cheeseburger for my daughter-they had to remake 3 times. How hard is it to just put cheese on a bun. When I brought it to her attention she yelled at me "it's not her fault, she didn't make it. You literally told me meat, cheese and bun."  The manager Julie was rude to employees as well as guests....including us. She was "punishing" employees and giving them time outs for their attitudes etc. there was poop all over the wall in the women's restrooms.

I was totally falling asleep as I was driving back to the Bay Area, so I decided to stop for some fries and iced coffee.  It was almost 6:00 p.m. on a Friday night, and it was pretty busy inside.  After I placed my order, I realized that there were flies.  Everywhere.  It was hot and stuffy inside, which made it feel even grosser every time the flies landed on me.  There were a lot of people working, but everyone was either behind the counter or preparing food at a station.  I thought it was weird that no one was cleaning or trying to figure out how to get the flies outside.  The fries, as usual, were good, and the iced coffee tasted like coffee flavored water.  Fortunately, the snack kept me awake for the rest of the drive, and one star for not getting diarrhea!

We were passing through on our way to Disney Land and thought we'd get some ice cream and smoothies to beat this heat. . But nope. They weren't serving ice cream and the smoothies looked like watered-down, expired juice with crushed ice. My fries were warm but stale. The restrooms were filthy and the drink machine was out of almost everything.  This has been the crappiest McDonald's I've gone to thus far.

Wow, I thought the one in Lathrop was bad, but this one ranked up there. We ordered, paid, then sat at the pick up window for at least 5 minutes if not more to get the food. Please acknowledge us and let us know if it will take a long time instead of just leaving the window open and ignoring us. Have a nice day.
A great place to stop for a Diet Coke if you're getting on or off I-5 or especially if you're getting on Hwy 12.

Not a McDonald's fan like when i was younger. After coming leaving Stockton from a family party, we stopped by here to snack... Sadden was our order taker, he had a good sense of humor, customer service & helpful.   Most fast food locations lack this kind of customer service / employees.   the dine in closes at midnight.  something we didn't realize until Sadden clarified.

The bathrooms are clean... ish.  It's pretty much same ol', same ol'. The same typical McDonald's like anywhere else... But the restaurant itself is clean and tidy. There were a whole bunch of cheerleaders that left their messes everywhere, but after they left, an employee started to clean up their mess immediately. A plus for me!

Quite possibly the dirtiest Mc D's I've ever encountered. I'm surprised corporate allows it. Service was sub par. I ordered the chicken bacon club and received the burger, the line was so long that I wasn't taking it back.

The worst service I've ever had ordered 2 coffees and  one hash brown waited 15 min and then I asked when it would be done they said they ran out and would have to wait 15 more minutes I had to leave I couldn't wait anymore than they were rude about giving me back my money

ZERO STARS I'm telling you, unless you like flies, ants in your drink, filthy restaurant (that last word said loosely) and men walking in womans bathroom WITH female employee... OMFG. The manager was RUDE, UNPROFESSIONAL, STRESSED OUT (dude, you have like two customers and 18 employees...get a grip) , but can you blame him? Not every teen drop out can manage a place ~ I'm pretty sure he was barely 19. I meet a friend there as a half-way point between our homes, to visit and hang out.
