The worst worst McDonald's ever!!! Don't ever come here to get breakfast before work. The drive thru took 30 minutes and the line was NOT MOVING. I was seriously thinking about running over the grass to get to work
Worst McDonald's ever I don't even want to give it one star it's taken us over a half an hour in the drive-through line no apologies no anything horrible will never come back to this one.

I had the great opportunity to visit homeless shelter of McDonald's off Richards Blvd today. Was awesome seeing so many great people. 15 people in there and I am the only one going to work today. Was especially fantastic waiting 10 min for a McMuffin, as crazy homeless guy touches my arm talking jibberish. Same shit hole as one off k st. Hire security and or an officer as Safeway Alhambra did, this Immediately fixed the problem. McDonald's I give up, either be a restaurant or a homeless shelter. I just want to get my food in a clean, safe environment at your establishment but obviously too much too ask.

First of all the service is very slow. I came to use restroom before ordering there were some customers ordering, they were still there when I came out. I've waited for a while and decided that on the drive-through will be faster. Guess what? It took me so long 10 more minutes with few customers on the line. Even longer then in and outwait line. On top of that it Sunday 4 PM not busy at all. Finally they didn't give me my complete order. I have to come back again to that nasty place to pick up my final order. My suggestion to you all avoid this McDonald's. Their restroom is nastiest, there was no toilet paper it was stinky with poop all over the toilet. From my previous experience working in McDonald's I know that restroom should be cleaned every hour. This restroom hasn't been cleaned for the whole day. Such a disappointment

This McDonald's has to be hands down the worst McDonald's in northern California if not the entire West Coast. Not only was I disrespected but I was refused service because I was paying with cash and not credit card.  No customer service skills and they need to fire the entire staff do not waste your time and money here!

This McDonald's is absolutely one of the worst ones I've been too. It always takes forever and when they have you wait in the stalls for the drive through you get the pleasure of being heckled by the local homeless wild life. McDonald's is supposed to be fast food. This location needs to step up their game

Was just that Mc's yesterday as we left Old Town Sac and needed some quick dinner for the 2hr drive home.   Easy to find as I went to yelp and look it up. Right off the highway with a clean lot and nearby hotel/Dennys.  Dual lane drive-thru which was lighted and easy to see/read.  Person was friendly who took the order, hard to hear at first but c'mon it's a drive-thru gotta have low expectations.  Once i got to the window to pay was greeted with a smile and friendly.   Thats where it dropped..  We pulled up to the 2nd window with no cars in front of us.. Took over 4mins before someone came to the window. For most of that time no one was around the counter area. The dinning room wasn't busy. 3 more cars stacked up and then the associate was managing the automated cup machine to figure out the drinks. She lidd'ed near 8 drinks and then split.    Came back opened the window and was handed our happy meal and told to pull forward to spot #1 to wait for fries....   Really a Saturday at 5pm and we get parked at a McDonalds for Fries?  We waited about 5 mins before someone came out and handed us the bag. Nothing friendly about it either.   Order was complete, fries were ok but not super hot/fresh...
Y'all suck. How are you going to give me attitude when i ask for extra sauce. Tel me it's going to be extra yet still forget to put ANY sauce in the bag. I know McDonald's ain't fine dining but geez

Order number-1340  7/11/18 @ aprox. 9:15pm  Just left this facility feeling disrespected. First when we came up to order in the drive through the woman taking our order told us to "hold on" then proceeded to speak to another customer while her microphone was still on. This of course was confusing so we responded, then she said "I told you to hold on!"  We asked for two orders of fries but ended up only getting one on our ticket. When we were given our food, we questioned why there were not two orders of fries. She then rudely explained that there was only one order.  In order to avoid any further frustration my partner then just said, "okay that's fine." Although he was slightly agitated he did not say it in an aggressive tone. She then replied with "you don't have to snap and be so rude!" Unbelievable. This woman needs to learn the concept of customer service even if a customer is rude in the slightest bit, you should NEVER treat a customer this way. Although I guess I shouldn't expect good service from a McDonalds...

What's the point of having a drive-thru if you're going to make me park and wait?! Waited in the drive-thru line for 20 minutes just to be told my ONE cheeseburger and TWO McChicken sandwiches weren't ready. I probably could've walked inside and gotten my food faster and I would have if I would've known. HORRIBLE service.
Came around at 12:30am, literally took 35 minutes to pay for my food at the drive through. Thee were only five cars here, including mine. And they were only accepting cash. Ridiculous.

Went through drive thru at 10pm on Wednesday and the lady that claimed to be the manager was the most disrespectful bitch that I've ever had to deal with. Was accused of lying about not getting fries when there was clearly none in the bag. Definitely not going back there.
Took 21 minutes to get through the drive thru at 7pm on a Saturday night. From what we could tell, no big orders ahead of us- everyone was handed 1 bag, maybe 2 tops. Avoid this location.
Ordered 10 mcnuggets, got 9 cold ones. Ordered an oreo McFlurry and got vanilla ice cream with a few crumbs of oreos. You want to a make S15/hour? You can't even count up to 10.....
Slow , slow, slow, slow.. did I mention slow? Don't bother coming here late night. You'll come out of the drive thru after your kids graduate.
35 minutes waiting in the drive thru horrible it's supposed to be fast food never again will I return to this McDonald's

This is the worst McDonald's i have ever been to. It was surrounded by a lots homeless people inside and outside. It smelled really bad and it was very dirty too. I wouldn't recommend it to anybody and especially families with little kids. I would always have to keep eyes on my back because I didn't trust the people around me.

Drive five more minutes to a different McDonald's....trust me.  The drive through here is very slow and the employees are very cold and look miserable.  The longest I've waited in this drive through was 23 minutes!    The service inside is slightly faster, however it is always packed with homeless people and drug addicts loitering and making a mess.  Because of this, the tables and chairs are always dirty.    The only reason I gave two stars instead of one is because the food is just as good as any other McDonald's.

The area is super sketchy, especially if you are from out of town like I am. I'm staying at the Hawthorn Suites across the street, and honestly I feel like Sacramento is like if Skid Row were a city. Many homeless, many either on drugs or mentally not there.   Anyway! This Mcdonald's is like an oasis in this mess. The people that work there are professional and polite. The food is as good as as McDonalds can be. Hot fries, very caramelly caramel sundae, an appropriate amount of ketchup, extra pickles was a good amount of extra, a healthy amount of napkins.   Thank you McDonalds of this location for being a safe and convenient place for me to drive 0.1 miles to get my dinner and dessert.

No stars. It's a haven for the homeless. I was there for 20 minutes and almost everyone who came in was homeless or trashy people. Saw 3 bums take cups out of the trash can and get free drinks from the soda machine. One took an unfinished burger from the trash and ate it.

It is kind of weird that the worst McDonalds in the world is right across the street from the worst Denny's in the world. Both places will have you wishing you went to the gas station and got a hotdog or beef jerky.   The fun at this McDonald's starts in the parking lot. Panhandling junkies infest the parking lot. Not only does the security not do anything about this, the junkies bs with the staff here.   It takes about 20 minutes to order and get your food which will be cold, even the coffee. The flaming queen shift leader is entertaining to watch though, watching a 450 lbs queen melt down in a hissy fit, I would pay $8 to watch that if I did not have to eat here again.
The cashier "Stevie" wasn't focused and not paying attention to my order. She was to busy listening to her friends that were hanging out.

Worst mcdonalds ever. If you didnt think it can get any worse. It did. I know it may be convenient to a lot of people working but trust its not worth waiting  30 plus minutes for fast food. The food was cold also so really just don't bother. Not even worth the time to go back and return it. I'll never go back here again.

I'd rate it lower if I could.  This is one of the worst McDonals.  If you plan on stopping by, be sure to make sure you have at least 25 minutes to be stuck in drive through.  It's ridiculous.  And I promise this is not an exaggeration.

This is the nastiest mcdonalds I've went to , i couldn't even finish my mcchicken and THATS ALL I ORDERED ! The Shredded lettuce was soggy and the chicken itself was soggy . I also work at mcdonalds so i know its not supposed to be 5 star but come on now I've never had anything like that . Do not go to this fast food restaurant they're disgusting .

I can tell the managers and staff wish the homeless would just go away, for the most part. With that being said, the staff does tolerate the constant influx of homeless clients by just leaving them alone.  Sometimes. The homeless do get out of hand there though. They are allowed to sit in there occupying a bunch of tables while buying nothing and as a PAYING customer, there are times when I can't find a seat because the non paying homeless are occupying them all.  The staff are okay. Don't expect any love or loyalty from them even if they see you often but they are good at their jobs. Some of them are rude and terrible at customer service though but they get the food out.  They do allow anyone to use their bathroom and I really really appreciate that. Saved me many times.

This Mc Donald's is conveniently located near the I5 exit on Richards Blvd, which is excellent for picking up breakfast on the way to work or a late night snack after a night out in mid town.  Service here is ok, nothing special than a regular Mc Donald's.  They occasionally do have mistakes on orders however this has occurred to me at other fast food chains as well.  Just make sure to re-check your order before leaving the drive thru.  What I dislike about this Mc Donald's is the homeless population that resides in the surrounding area.  There are a lot of them who are on the sidewalks and also relaxing inside the restaurant.  The homeless here are confrontational and on multiple walk in visits to this restaurant I have been stopped by homeless who were asking for money or food.  I have yet to confront homeless people while using their drive thru service.  NOTE: I have witnessed a homeless person pick up a Mc Donald's cup from one of their outside trash bins and walked in to refill that exact same cup... That was very disturbing and dirty.  I immediately notified one of staff which immediately sanitized the levers on their machine.
Sucks!!!!!  Drive thru backs up, less than friendly staff, and can't see the menu until you're at the speaker when you're suppose to have your order ready.

This McDonald's has a very tight drive-thru where it seems to say, "enter at your own risk." I'm no weeny, so I'm not freaked out by somewhat risky situations, but the design is just stupid.  There is an unprotected gas meter right along the drive-thru path and it would not take much for a drunk driver to hit it while on their hangover binge for grease food nourishment.  The restaurant was poorly staffed and it took FOREVER to get our "fast" food.  McDonald's is McDonald's, so the food was satisfying for what it was, but no different than any other McDonald's.

I see why this place carries so little stars! Horrible, horrible, HORRIBLE customer service!! And the hours, it says the dining opens at 6:00am I showed up at 6:24 and they told me that they weren't open!! Never again will I ever go back to this McDonald's!!!!

This location is close by and right off I-5 so that can be a plus. Whenever I do go inside it is clean and the staff is quick and courteous. Downfall really only hits when they get an order wrong or long drive-thru times. But overall 3 stars for this McD's.

ZERO STARS IF POSSIBLE  Last time me and my bf came here, we ordered a Big Mac meal, 2 McChickens, and an extra drink. WALKED IN THE HEAT all the way back to our hotel.... JUST TO FIND OUT THERE WAS NO BIG MAC IN THE BAG!!!!! HOW DO YOU FORGET A WHOLE BURGER??????? Walked back in the heat all the way to McDonalds with our bag and receipt. Told them that we didn't get a Big Mac even though we had paid for it. One of the old Mexican ladies QUESTIONED us, saying something like "are you sure they didn't get one?" HOW ARE YOU GONNA ASK ME THAT? I'm not going to come all the way back here in the scorching heat to lie and say I didn't get a hamburger if I actually got one. The other worker handed us the burger and said "I don't care, if they say they didn't get it, they didn't get it."  Today we went back again to get breakfast (in the drive thru). My bf specifically said "I want 2 sausage mcmuffins with bacon." He even repeated it to the cashier when we paid at the first window, even said clearly "I DONT WANT EGGS" checked the receipt and our order was correct. Pulled up to the second window and was handed our food. My bf checked it and they gave him 2 muffins stuffed with bacon AND EGGS!!! That wasn't what we ordered. He tapped on the window and said "I specifically said I didn't want eggs, just the sausage and bacon." The worker GAVE US ATTITUDE, said "so you just want the muffins, sausage, bacon, and cheese" in a flat, unapologetic tone. WHY ARE YOU MAD AT US WHEN YOU GOT THE ORDER WRONG??? She came back to the window several times and told us "just a couple more minutes" ???? Sure I guess. Last time she came to the window, she asked us to pull into parking spot #2 and it'll be out shortly. We parked and literally 20 seconds later our food was brought out. What was the point in parking then?????  The worst McDonald's in all of sac. Never met anyone more rude than at this McDonald's location. I'll drive all the way to the next closest McDonald's than coming back here. Staff are rude, unapologetic, and not even welcoming. Worst customer service ever.

Used the drive thru after getting out of the Sleep Train Arena and wanted late dinner before I made my way to my hotel.  Ordered the sweet tea and a chicken McWrap. Drive thru was a breeze and staff was polite.  Half a block from the freeway. Very convenient.

the absolute worst mcdonalds in sacramento hands down. 3 times now from you guys i had my food stale hard as a rock... whats going on?? need to fire the whole staff and rehire. i hope a manager sees this. you guys are despicable. ive never complained about a mcdonalds in my whole life. SODAS ALWAYS FLAT AS WELL. GET IT TOGETHER YALL

They've screwed up my order more than any McDonalds I've ever gone to. I've written the manager several times, and the response is always along the lines of "go f*ck yourself". Once again, ordered a deluxe meal (which is $7 btw), and they give me some half-assed sandwich with no lettuce or anything, just some sad looking burger patty with old bacon on it. Yay.  Stuck going to them as they're the only fast-food place on the block and I work right down the street, but I would avoid them like the plague otherwise. Unless you also happen to enjoy get harassed by homeless people regularly.
Bad Service, bad food, ect. This place is definitely a last resort to getting fast food period!

Cashier got my order wrong. We were paying for our order the gave her the money told her that I wanted to pay the two cents change so I wouldn't get the $0.98 change back would rather have a dollar bill instead of loose heavy change. I was told that since her drawer was open she couldn't take the two pennies and gave me $0.98 in loose change.

This is a very convenient McDonald's (5 star location), which is just east of the 5 Freeway in Northern Sacramento (less than a block).  It is a very clean store as well, and the staff is very friendly.  I am amazed that the store is so clean (and smells clean).  When I came in at 7:30 AM on a Sunday morning, there were about nine homeless men hanging out inside and outside of the store, and everyone wanted me to buy them food.  Such is the life in North Sacramento it seems - lots of homeless people.  Despite the clean, convenient location and the friendly staff, the food here really does not measure up for McDonald's.  I love McDonald's coffee, and DH and I each had one.  It was about the weakest coffee that I have ever had from McDonald's.  We also each had a Sausage and Egg McMuffin with no cheese (mine was egg white only).  The manager checked the order and fixed it before I left, so it was right.  However, the English muffin tasted microwaved, rather than toasted, which results in a VERY chewy muffin.  The sausage and egg were standard, but that chewy muffin was a real disappointment.  For $5.97, it is a very cheap breakfast for two.  But, I would try to find another McDonald's that is toasting the muffins.  They are so much better!

The only reason I go here is because it is convenient and I forgot to pick up coffee to brew at home. I have been here a handful of times and every time there is no one in there but I always seem to wait FOREVER (I order a regular coffee and sometimes an oatmeal, just pour the coffee and put water in the oatmeal cup) They are very slow and never very friendly. And yes there are a lot of homeless people who hang out here due to the shelters near by but not once have they asked me for anything or even bothered me. And I'm not sure why someone says it smells because this is one of the cleanest McDonalds I've been too.

I was so baffled by this restaurant as I thought it was supposed to be fast food... However I have now been in the drive-through stuck for 14 minutes. If there's a way I could back out and change my mind I would but unfortunately no. I can only assume the cars in front of me are each holding the cashier at gunpoint hence the reason it's taking so long? I sure hope the cashier isn't too traumatized just give me the damn Coke that I ordered.

Came in with another person on a Friday for fast food dinner.  Food: Ordered carry-out for a pretty large order, 4 filet-of-fish, 2 large fries, 1 grilled chicken sandwich. Like any other McDonald's, tasted pretty good.  Place: Conveniently located across some hotels and a freeway exit, across a gas station also. But kind of in a sketchy area. The person I was with was ordering while I went to the gas station across to get something else. Said there were a lot of homeless people inside the store, also some outside. Not really appealing.   If I'm hungry then yea, but prefer not visit this place again.
Slowest McDonald's in Sacramento. The wait is always slow in the drive thru!! I've waited 15 min before after ordering.

"I want to give this store a 0 stars but I cant" it's very true. Iv been to some pretty terrible mcdonalds but this mcdonalds, with its dirty bathrooms, krabby people, and poor excuse for customer service. This Takes the gold. Pretty cool homeless people there though. Ok so the 1 star is for the cool homeless people there.

This McDonald's has won the state Award for the absolutely worst customer service within the state of California. You think I would have learned my lesson but I've gone back numerous times. It's always the same, extremely long wait times and disorganized crew. This past visit, four cars in front of me in the drive thru took 20 minutes!!! Their employees seem to lack the most basic common sense (I know, they're young) and management doesn't seem interested in giving proper training. Today's example ... After waiting the 20 minutes for the four cars in front of me to complete their transactions I arrived at the window to receive my order,  the ice cream cone was melted and dripping down the cone. Here's a tip, if you see more than three cars in the Drive-Thru line go inside. Do NOT go through the drive-thru. You'll be waiting half the day. Also, park near the building, there are a large number of homeless milling about asking for handouts.
The best McDonalds ever! Stop here when in Sac and the burgers and sweet tea never disappoint! The ones in Yuba City/Marysville need to step there game up!

I went there Sunday, 8/20 because I wanted a coffee for a long drive.  I ordered a large iced carmel macchiato and the young lady (KS#2) who took my order was so not friendly. But that is okay I dont expect for them to be as friendly as I am especially with the clientle they have to deal with. BUT I certainly did not expect to wait close to 20 minutes to get the coffee drink when I DID NOT order any food with it. (JUST SO YOU KNOW THEY WERE NOT THAT BUSY!!, In fact it looked as though they were just trying to make it look like they were as some of them were just walking around aimlessly.) The girl who took my order just kept taking the orders and in her down time was consistently looking up at I guess a screen on their side telling them what was needed; she did nothing else AND...AHH why does a drink order get put in line with a food order?? I dont get it?? So I asked another young lady if she would help me. Tyreesha (hope I spelled it correctly) was very accomodating and went ahead and started on my drink. Then this other young woman who took my order said very loudly to Tyreesha "What are you doing?"  She is doing her job and giving good customer service Miss KS#2. Tyreesha was doing what you SHOULD HAVE BEEN doing MS KS#2... Unfortunately I think I saw the manager come out once and wouldnt even look out at the lobby just looked up at that screen in the sky and went about her business. Didnt even offer to help anyone. I feel sorry for Tyreesha having to work with those people as she is a nice person and really deserves better. Maybe even a promotion. She is the only one who seemed to give a crap. Well done Tyreesha from Bonnie who was there on Sunday, Thank You!!
Friendly people but for some reason cheap with the fries.  I have twice paid for a large size and got home only to find the box half full.  Tired of getting ripped off.
This Mickey D's has the worst drive though. Always long lines and they move so slow. Never a quick in and out. I keep coming back thinking it'll be different each time but always disappointed.
This place is.horrible in time in the drive thru. Do not go here if your in a rush. I hate the drive thru   Do I need to say.more..there food isn't to bad
I only gave this McDonald's a 1 star because I had to. Every time I come here there's a problem. Don't waste you're time or money

Went through drive thru to get a McFlurry... not only was it fast but it actually had flavor. Most places barely put any reeses into it. ... but this location has made me come back twice now.  Good job!

If I could give them 0 stars I would have done it in a heartbeat. This location is pretty close to my apartment in downtown so I used to frequently visit it. Nothing they have is EVER working. I have gone 3 times to get ice cream and each time it wasn't working. One time, they handed me warm sodas with no ice and no prior warning that they had run out of ice. Also if there is a line, it always moves extremely slow. Not to mention, you can wait 20 minutes in line and they won't ever apologize for the wait. Terrible customer service. Even though this location is closer to me, I have completely stopped coming here. I will take the longer drive to the K street McDonald's which is much better.
they are soooooo sloooooow!!!!!!!!!!!!! the food is good but the wait is horrible. each time I think and hope it will be better and it never is.
Try to avoid using the drive thru at all cost. You can spend a half hour waiting for your food at times
Zero stars if I could, ordered a 4 piece nugget and it wasnt even cooked all the way, terrible service. Never coming here again. Just gross.
Worst mcd I have seen... No app offers.why it is different from other mcd's. They don't follow McDonald's rules..........too bad

This is the worst McDonalds on the planet!!  I have seen paint dry faster then the time you will spend in the drive thru..  Then after waiting an avg of 15 min or more (yes that long!!) the food is almost never fresh!!!   I have never seen a McDonalds where you wait 5-7min at the pick up window after you have ordered and paid for your food!   Don't go here keep driving!!!!!

This is the worst drive through. I wish we could assign negative stars. While there are two lanes to order only one line gets serviced at a time. We had a 20 minute wait for three egg mc muffins. We then had to go inside because they got the order wrong.

Worst drive through in Sac. Always take forever, drop my coffee and they would rather stand around speaking Spanish to one another than get me a new coffee and get the line of 29 people behind me moving on a busy day in the morning hours. I go here often out of convenience but they are by far the worst service McDonald's I've been to. No care for speed and quality.

This is one of the worst Mc Donald's. They get your order wrong, they are SOOOOO SLOW. It took me 6 mins just to get to place my order. There was 2 cars in line. Once I ordered my food, it was another 7 mins until I got my food.

Got breakfast at this location this morning. Went through the drive thru which was a pretty long wait but it was during the breakfast rush which is understandable. The cashier, Charlene I believe, was friendly. I got my food and coffee just the way I ordered it, 8 creams 8 sugars. Love my egg white delight. Good job McDonald's.

This place sucks.. Signs and website say 24 hours on Friday and Saturday.. Nothing but a rude employee who won't answer the drive thru... 5 minutes from downtown sacramento.. This is why sacramento sucks sometimes
Their drive-thru service is so slow in the mornings.  They were out of toilet seat covers and pumpkin pie on Halloween afternoon.
This McDs is in a convenient location right off I-5 but their drive through is ridiculously slow.
Charged me the wrong price, gave me wrong sauce, then no ketchup for my large fries. Seriously?

Has the slowest drive they ever!!! I have decided enough is enough! Their egg mcmuffin bread always tastes stale, coffee hit or miss, but you can always expect a wait in the drive thru regardless if you are the 10th person in line or the only!

Ive visted this location many times over the past 10 years and never had any negatives to share about the food or service. Always friendly, prompt and courteous. But on a recent cold damp Sunday I stopped in for a lite breakfast and as I was sipping the coffee, a paunchy Palladin Security guy came in and rudely ordered a bunch of presumed homeless guys out of the restaurant. There is actually as sign that prohibits occupying the seats longer than thirty minutes. Ok fine. But I have on occasion seen people being allowed to remain much longer. Thing is, the manager never approached any of those gentlemen himself. He just had his security deputy remove them like rodents. Not a very nice image of "Im' lovin' [customers] it" to me.

I mainly go because their sodas are only $1 no matter what size you get....got the hubby the $1 small mango-pineapple smoothie, which he said was good.  Other than that, it's your standard McD's...except a lot of bums/homeless because of its location on Richards.  Let's just say I never park and go in; always drive thru!

Wow. Normally I wouldn't be in a neighborhood like this but I was getting some auto glass at Safelite across the street and stopped in for a bite. Okay, I like to think I have compassion for my fellow man, or at least I try, but...serious? There were homeless people asleep in the booths INSIDE the restaurant. I attempted to sit down to eat but the smell was overwhelming and I had to leave. I feel bad that I felt bad but, come on.
The only reason they are getting two stars is because they have nice employees....been here due to it being the closest Mc D's to my office but every time I order hot food it is cold

Ordered my food  at 7:30 am 2 McMuffin meals and a burrito meal all with small OJ it came to just under &15.00  when I received my order I looked and the burrito meal was on there when asked about the missing food  All they could say was NO NO  8:05 am I drove off and what do I find now no meat on the McMuffins I will not go there ever again This happens a lot at this restaurant  I will no longer be a customer.

Food n service is good. Bums outside. Someone was getting arrested as I entered for my mcflurry. Inside was clean. Hard on luck folks did walk in but didn't mess with customers....it's okay location if u go during the daytime hours
It's Mcd's folks. I work near this location. The staff is friendly, they are fast and the food is always consistent. I don't know what else to say :0)

Came here once and they put huge slices of stinky onion on my Big Mac. Haven't been able to eat one since. So gross and so completely odd. Not like I asked for extra onions or anything like that.   Kind of a strange MickeyD's all the way around. It's the only one close to Garden Hwy so I keep giving it another chance, every time sure I'll never be back.  Loaves & Fishes is just a few blocks away so the bums are plentiful. Scary filthy tables inside, but you don't fare much better in the drive-thru. It's slooooow!

Thank goodness for coupons. I don't go to McDonalds often but I made an exception yesterday because I had a coupon for a free 16 ounce McCafe.  The drive through went pretty quickly and the people were nice. Nothing unusual for a McDonalds although I don't know what baseline McDonalds is really suppose to be.  I drive on Richards Blvd on a regular basis and this seems to be a busy location especially being so close to the freeway and gas stations. Not sure when I will ever be back unless I have some type of sweet coupon!
frozen potatoes raw and served with a smile if you eat cold frozen fries then they are happy to take your money
Made me sick as shit. So I went again as a control, and got sick again. Avoid this place like lepers...

as far as the Donalds goes this place gets 5 stars. the staff is always friendly the order is correct the food is only decent the restaurant is always clean the bathrooms. the only downfall is sometimes are some people outside of homeless people everywhere the reason they congregate here is because there is a homeless shelter down the street. this mcDonalds is easy access on off i-5 and Richards Boulevard. close to where I live I have 5 McDonalds to choose from and this is my go to store.

It was a hot day, and we went over to this McDonalds for a cold Carmel Frappe, after we pay for the drink at the first window, the worker tells us that they are cleaning the machine and asked if we want money back ? why they clean the machine in the middle of day in summer time, i don't understand this. the worker didn't ever care. we left with disappointment, zero star for this McDonald. never go back again.
what's up with the half a cheese on the fish filets?   So freakin sad that the cheeseburger comes with a full cheese but this sandwhich doesn't.  1 star for being too stingy.

Thank you McDonalds, for serving breakfast the morning after Halloween for three half drunk hungover girls craving a  greasy breakfast of McGriddles, McMuffins, and Hash Browns. You have not failed me yet McDonalds, and I only wish you were good for me, because I would enjoy your companionship on more of a regular basis. Thank you also for giving me the choice of not one, but TWO drive thru lines to choose from. Please tell the stop light by your location to speed up though, we had to wait 5 minutes before we could turn into you, and it was the longest 5 minutes of my life, McDonalds, seriously.
fresh, hot, salty fries and a nice fatty big mac, yum.  the place was clean, too.

I've been here more than 25-30 times and the drive through situation is always the same. My last visit the employee didn't appear to know how to use the phone app with the girl in the car in front of m and held the lineup for 20 minutes. Would have been faster if I went inside but I was boxed in on the left drive through lane side at this point. A manager had to help me use my iPhone to do the order for the employee as well. This McDonald's has average prices to other Bay Area McDonald's. They have the$1-3 menu currently as well. They do take the app and Apple Pay.

For the past 4 months I have went and ordered the same thing every time a McChicken light mayo. The either put 15 gallons or none. And these are the people wanting $15 an hour. If you want that kind of money study up friends and get a better education I'm sick of paying for crappy food. Avoid even if you have the urge. It is the plague of Stockton's McDonalds. I tried to tell the manager and she told me to bleep off.

Be where of this location. The homeless that hang out here are very aggressive and they do break in cars. I witnessed it and I am a victim as well. Not from the area I will try to avoid this area from now on.

Made me wait so long for a sasauge McMuffin and I asked for a water w lemon and they didn't even add it in that and I had to ask for a lemon on the side and gave me this ... look at my lemon ... gross how old is this

I would not recommend this McDonald's (Store #802) to anyone in the Stockton area. Yelp lists this as in the mall, it is not, it is a standalone location with a drive thru and such.  I had ordered an Oreo Frappe, the cashier said okay, then also ordered a Mango Pineapple Smoothie. When they got to my order, the workers in the back where all like, who took this person's order, we don;t have Oreo Frappes here, don't process orders we don't have. As a customer, we should not be able to hear those things.  Not to mention, this location is dirty, with trash on the drinks area, trash on the floors, on the counters etc. They don't clean up here much. Also, the prices here are higher than the bay area, but they had a buy 1 get 1 free on McCafe Beverages on the App.   At least the employee apologized for not having Oreo Frappes here at this location or any location in Stockton. Still, meh.
Terrible customer service  couldn't even answer there drive thru I even had to get out the car and knock on the window and they still didn't answer. Smh and I saw two mf

5 stars just so you guys can see my post . I just went to McDonald's about 15 mins ago to get a hot fudge sundae and it was the worst one I ever got . There was barely any chocolate and the chocolate that I did get was all over the top cover by even on my ice cream . I worked at McDonald's before so I know how one is supposed to look .

Well I I have had this problem many times with McDonald's tonight when we were in the Drive-Thru getting dinner we tried ordering some shakes only to be told that they weren't doing ice cream anymore okay fine we get up to the second window and realized I forgot to order fries for someone so I send my boyfriend in and he orders in why I'm still in the drive thru and what does he see once he's inside workers making ice cream McFlurries and giving out ice cream cones if you don't want to do ice cream for the drive-through just say so two stars are only for the new buttermilk chicken

This is the worst experience I've ever had at a fast food restaurant! The set-up they have with two separate ordering windows let this jerk cut me off after he nearly hit my car. The girl at the checkout was nice but the one giving the food was miserable and when I asked for a sauce she charged me a quarter! McDonald's is a billion dollar company are you fucking seriously that petty? I have never been charged for sauce at any other location and after I paid her she gave me the wrong one! Are the employees getting commission or is this just her way of feeling like she has control over something in her pathetic life?
Service was really, really bad, even for a McDonald's. Employees seemed more focused on talking than actually getting my food

McDonald's   Located on Pacific Avenue in Stockton California.  Here's my story:  Tip - Free Wi-Fi  The Wi-Fi here works pretty good. Sometimes it could be a little spotty. There is a drive thru if you don't want to dine inside. The customer service is pretty cool here. I never had any problems with my orders.   The staff works pretty hard and the dinning room is pretty clean, when I come here. My favorite items are anything off the $1 menu, lol.   I really like the dollar side salad and the dollar sweet tea. Probably two of my favs when I hit Mickey D's.   I used to not eat fast food but I fell off the wagon and get my chubby on. Well I'll keep on coming here to get my Mickey D'S fix.   Sincerely VD  "Life is beautiful"

Very shocked to watch how they recycle orders. I kept watching the girl dump the fries back in from the containers to the big batch. Then dumped out a coke and reused the same cup for a different guest. To top it off my plain cheeseburger had ketchup and it looks like they realized the mistake and scraped the ketchup off my bun. ;(.

Like any McDonald it's a good place to get cheap food. Location is pretty convenient if you go to Pacific or Stagg HS. I usually go to the drive-thru cause I hate dealing with other customers' complaints about the food or waiting.  Goodness it's cheap quick food, you get what you pay for. If you go to any other restaurant you'd wait much longer, so no point complaining.

I don't usually review fast food chains as the food is usually consistent in taste.  But everything else can vary a lot. So I tried this location the other day. It did seem like it took an unreasonably long time to get my order. While waiting, I filled my drink cup...the soda fountain area was dirty all over the counter, the machine, and the ground. While waiting for my order, I scanned the area I was sitting in...there was no one else sitting in the area and there were about 20 tables. It too was dirty everywhere...all the tabletop, seats, and the floor. I was pretty shocked as I don't think I've ever been into a McDs that was so unclean. I almost mentioned it to the counter, but decided it wasn't my place to say anything...it was the shift supervisor's job. I thought maybe they were overwhelmed serving customers....nope, hardly anyone in the joint. There were a few cars in the drive thru...but just 3 or 4. So why wasn't someone attending the needed clean up in the dining area? I can't imagine what the food prep or storage area looks like and don't want to real think about it...yuck! I couldn't help but think if McDs corporate headquarters knew about this, I think they'd pull the franchise.  So I get home and checked reviews for this location. This specific location has a very low rating. Most of the poor reviews are pretty accurate in my opinion. In common, they say bad and or slow service. They also say this location is dirty. So add my two cents to the common trend. If your are looking for a McDs, there are plenty around...I would not recommend this one. If it weren't for the consistent food taste, I would have rated this location only 1 star.

Reviews for McDonalds should have nothing to do with the food. It'll taste nearly the same everywhere you go. You rate it both on the service, and on whether or not you can get a meal there without tripping on a homeless person. Sadly, this McDonalds fails the latter as every time I've set foot in this place, there's always a typical Stockton native creepin in the corner. Drive through is the way to go here.  The drive through is convenient. It's a little weird though. There's two lanes you can go in to order, and they both merge together for one pick up window. Sounds like a situation for a car crash, but I haven't had any problems with it so far. The service has actually been pretty good for a McDonalds. They're actually pretty nice considering it's environment.   As another person said, this is great for UOP students. I don't even go to the school and I still think it's super convenient. McDonalds is always a half decent solution to late night/studying/drunken induced hunger.

I usually don't eat McDonalds, but it is midterms week and I guess I had a moment of weakness. Those fries, supposedly the best in the world (based on volume sold), and McNuggets just sounded so good at midnight for a study break.   Service was prompt and friendly. I got my bag of food and headed to the library to study and enjoy the greasy goodness. Only it wasn't good.  The McNuggets were luke warm at best. I could taste the fryer oil, and the crust was stale. The inside almost tasted like it wasn't cooked or something.   Luke warm is an understatement if I were to describe the temperature of the fries. The flavor was so bad that I could not palate it. I gave it all away to a friend who wanted to feed them to her dog. Poor dog. What did it do to deserve such punishment?

If you go to drive-thru please check the contents of your order before driving off because they seem to get the order wrong at this location too many times. You have been warned. When you go back to the drive-thru lane to have your order corrected they don't seem to care. Demand they fix your order ASAP. I tell them my blood is boiling and they seem to fix the order!

This place has yet to make me leave not irritated. Someone wrote on one of the reviews that we can't talk about the foods taste, because it's all the same where ever you go. That's a lie.   I come here because it's a convenient quick place to go during my break at school when I forget to bring something to eat. EVERY SINGLE time I've come here they mess something up with my order. Today for example: ordered a chicken club, no lettuce (because it's never fresh, always slimy) and a coke.   I get past the rude girl at the first window, it wouldn't hurt you to smile! I mean I know McDonald's can't be the best place to work. But in this economy be happy you have a job. Waited another ten minutes to get to the second window, where the second rude girl hands me my bag and shuts the window. Uhhh where's my drink? Waited another five minutes watching her talk to her co-worker completely oblivious to the fact that I'm sitting at the window STILL waiting for my drink. Finally opens the window with hella attitude, and says "Can I help you?". Yeah can I get my drink? Rolls her eyes and goes "Oh she didn't give it to you?" CLEARLY NOT IF IM STILL WAITING HERE. Finally get back to school and what do I find? No napkins, no straw, and slimy lettuce all over my sandwich. To top the whole thing off, cold fries. By far THE worst McDonald's I've been too.
Run of the mill McDonalds; nothing special here.    I love the fries and chicken sandwiches, hence the 2 stars.  I would have given it a solid 3 stars, but the employees don't use gloves.

I am eating a whole-foods plant-based diet. I am willing every once in awhile to splurge with possibly something that's more preserved. We all know McDonald's is not considered healthy food. But I just went through the drive-thru and got some coffee and tried to order oatmeal with no brown sugar due to other health concerns. They said it was impossible to get oatmeal without brown sugar. They said they discontinued oatmeal that does not have brown sugar in it. And just so you know they put cream in their oatmeal so if you are trying to eat vegan or on a plant-based diet you will want that removed. Also for people trying to watch their weight it makes for a lot more calories or points trying to eat healthy and trying to eat a plant-based diet. Even with being a little flexible there was nothing I could order on their menu. Haha well I guess if I wanted to eat a bun and some lettuce and tomato. Come on McDonald's it's time to get hip modern and fresh. Times are changing.

2 Stars.  Sausage McMuffin Meal, Small Cup of Coffee, Hash Browns: $4.39.  I had Breakfast here this morning... had a seat... took a long look at this "Breakfast"... said to myself... "Five Bucks gets you this?!?!?"   I would have to consume half a dozen of these so-called "meals"... just to be satisfied! Maybe that's why I haven't been to a McDonald's in...  years....

10-19-15: 10:45AM; I come here to eat often. I attend Delta college & McDonald's is a fast & cheap place to eat. Before today I've only had minor complaints. After today I will no longer eat here. I'd rather spend $15 on a meal somewhere else then eat at this place ever again! There is an old man who eats at this McDonald's every day. I've had conversations with him & he is very sweet. Today as I was waiting in line he went to the counter for a refill on his coffee. You could see he was struggling to stand at the counter, because of his age. The place was not busy & still he was ignored. When someone finally talked to him she was rude & brushed him off & told the cashier to refill his cup. The cashier has 3 people in line including myself so this lady decides to do it. She touches the coffee pot to the mans cup. This is unsanitary! I work in a restaurant & have for three years & would never do that. He then pointed this out to her & asked for another cup. Which she rudely said no. He explained to her that it was gross & he doesn't want someone else's saliva on his cup. Understandable since if she did it to refill his cup she probably does it all the time! He told her, "You've got to understand where I'm coming from." Which then she replied, AFTER turning her back on him, "NOPE!" He then tried to say more & she talked over him yelling, "Have a nice day!" Basically rudely telling him to shut up & go away. It's disgusting how she acted! He is a regular customer who did nothing but ask that she do her job & follow the health department safety codes. She should be fired for health violations & for not knowing how to treat customers. To top it all off of course this girl wasn't wearing a name tag! She must always act like this & leaving her name tag off means she won't get reported. I know that whoever reads this review, if they even care enough to, will know who she is. Check your scheduled people for today. She is African American, long wavy hair in a low pony, looked about 23 years old or so. She was bagging food at the time.

The Sweet Tea is really, really, really, really, really, wait for it...sweet.  I poured half  of a water bottle in it to dilute it and it still tasted the same. That's a ton of sugar man. I don't know how people drink it on a daily basis. You could easily get type 2 diabetes drinking this stuff. Can't even finished this drink right now.  Also they forgot to give us straws. C'MON MAN.Also I think they turn off their ice cream machine at midnight or something, so if you ever get a craving for a Oreo McFlurry, or Sundae, plan ahead. I usually get the parfaits (which are freaking awesome) but they usually run out of those around that time too.   Bottom line: it's a McDonalds. They're eveywhere, you've probably eaten at one. Nothing more to say.

The fries were old and disgusting!! Since when do they not make fries to order? The only reason I came here was because my kids wanted to but even they said that the fries taste weird!!! Not eating here ever AGAIN!
It's McDonalds you know what they have and hate yourself after eating it but the convenience of fast food brings you back again and again

I know working at mcdonalds sucks. They don't treat their employees very well and barely pay them anything but that is no reason for the blonde girl in the drive thru to be rude to me. I can overlook the many times they have forgotten to give me straws and napkins, and how they never put my yogurt in a bag like I'm going to drink it while I'm driving or something. But I really hate rude people. Maybe mcdonalds should think about paying employees a little more and then they could hire better people.

This location pretty much sucks when it comes to McDonald.The frys always seem to be old and/or cold. It seems to take them for ever to get even the smallest of orders right. Many a times through the drive thru I have not been given napkins. Some of the burgers I have bought seem to have been thrown together without care and are falling apart or sloppy with sauce. I have started to drive the extra couple of miles to go to a different location.

They are beyond slow! I ordered a large Hi-C and proceeded to wait 5+ minutes for my drink. I was trying my best to be patient, but that was wearing thin and I didn't want to make a scene over a drink.

Very convenient for UOP students. Every time I go during the week in the morning, the nice Chinese lady greets my friends and me with 'HELLO UOP!" It's a pretty normal fast food restaurant with a ....diverse/strange....crowd of customers. I think I saw a mutant and a woman with a beard one time.
Good food for when your on the go and have no time to get food prepared. Service is ok and remodeled building is nice

Came here yesterday with my pally pal, Ronaldo. First off, the location is not bad, very close to UOP, so good for students who get hungry and need to grab a cheap, satisfying bite to eat.   The elderly woman who was at the register was kind, but kinda creepy as well. She was very enthusiastic to take my money and give me change, very excited, actually. Also, Ronaldo gave her a bunch of ones and she was just as excited. There are free refills, but "NO REFILLS AFTER LEAVING MCDONALD'S!" I guess they have a big problem with people walking in with empty cups and filling them. The booths were roomy and quite stylish, if I do say so myself. But "for fast food, it arrived kinda slow,"  as Ronaldo noted as we sat down to stuff our faces with food. The bathrooms LOOKED clean, but didn't smell clean, at all...who knows if they're actually clean though.  Also, Ronaldo made a remark about how expensive the chicken nuggets were. "$2.99! FOR SIX ONLY! And they weren't, like, that amazing." Nope, Ronaldo was not happy with her nuggets. Did Ronaldo even get her sauces for her nuggets? We'll never know. Did you, Ronjonapaloj?  Next time maybe Ronaldo and I will check out the play area and sit and bask in the sun too!   HEY, RONALDO, HEY! Let's do cheap lunch at Mickey D's again! HEY, Ronaldo, HEY! Yeah-uh!

Been going here scince high school and its just gotten worse. employees their now hiring just lack training. Management has always been great with accommodating for troubles but they should not have to if every one was trained properly. orders are never correct and something is usually always forgotten.

I feel that this McDonald's don't listen to there customers. After they repeat my order they still got my order wrong. When I mention to them that the order was wrong. Instead of them telling me to park on the side, and try to correct my order here comes a long line at the drive Thur. After all of that they still had my order wrong, and then was upset because I had ask for my money back. But on a serious note cook my food like you want your food to be cook. After all I'm a paying customer that's how we pay your paychecks.

Was inside Mcdonalds awhile back and me and my fiance found pieces of little hairs in our coffee we do not go to Mcdonalds anymore their food really is bad the only good thin there has to be their fries.
the food is excellance buti saw a young adult she was eather black or hiispanice cute she said hi to me but she was barefoot no shoes the employies ssadid nothing I could it beleave it

I love McDonald's but who wouldn't say that lol. . But let me tell you THEIR service is just TERRIBLE. drive thru always takes forever. Whoever makes and package the food doesn't care either. The McChicken is always done crappy. And around 1am I order chicken nuggets and the sauce they gave me looks like they threw it and stepped on it smh. Another one looked like their nail punctured it. How can you not look at what you're bagging. ALSO another time we came ordered a Big Mac it was a different burger in it lorrrd.
Worst Mc Donald's ever. I always go to this one bcos it's closer and every time when I order the food there, the food is always old and the buns were hard. Smh
When you know somethings going to go bad... but have to chance it because your kids are brainwashed for happy meals

Can I give them a negative star?! You spend over 10 minutes in the drive thru to screw up your order  Then wait! You have to park so they can complete when they screw it up!!! Then you have this ridiculously miserable cashier in the drive thru window!!! You attempt to correct she has to have a comeback, and what a coincidence that you can't see her name tag nor is it on the receipt! We've been here now over 15 minutes waiting for them to complete it!
I am not really to much of a fast foods person. Everting  was good. However I do understand that it was breakfast time I just wish they had regular menu items. Not to much of a breakfast person.

I had a BOGO coupon for any breakfast sandwich. I was really looking forward to using the coupon since I really used to love their light flaky buttermilk biscuit breakfast sandwiches.  I ordered one with bacon and one with sausage, both made with the round egg. (I received two with bacon!) I specified that I wanted them made fresh since it was late afternoon and I didn't want them taking the ingredients from the warmer trays. I can see the cook. He stuck a couple of muffins in the microwave. Right then and there I knew it was going to be a disaster. And it was. What is soggy solid mess the biscuits were. I about choked on them. It's been quite a while since I had a breakfast sandwich from McDonald's.  Sad to say I believe that they have reformulated the biscuits. Now they are crap and I would not order them again!  No longer light and fluffy!!  AND... they charge FIFTY CENTS to add mayo to a sandwich.  Totally ridiculous.

This place has the worst wait time in the drive thru! It took over 30 minutes at one day I came which was just a happy meal! Mind you it was only myself and two other vehicles in the drive thru on a weekday in the middle of the day. The other cars were there before me so I could only imagine how long they waited they even started honking. Tonight was no different two cars behind even backed out of the drive thru so we did the same. My only order a burger and large fries with only 3 cars in front of me. I would like to go to this place as it's close to home but I'm willing to drive to another location!

I have been to this restaurant 3 times and the service is terrible. First time I had to wait for 10 minutes for my order. Second time was the same. This time I went in to see if it was any better, 5 minutes later I left without anybody acknowledging me.

Least favorite place in Stockton.   It's always something.   Advertise breakfast after 10:30  it's 10:40 and they said in 10 minutes.    Had to wait in the long drive thru lone was longer then 10 minutes.  Sheesh

Literally? Literally.....WHY ARE MCDONALDS ICE CREAM MACHINES AAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLLLWWWWWWWAAAAAYYYYSSSS DOWN?!?!?! Like are they allowed to do that when they just don't feel like using them??? I feel like it's a recurring unnecessary situation every single time I go. Just like going to Starbucks and them getting your name wrong on purpose for advertising. Someone should seriously pull there heads out of the dirt and figure this issue out.

So I'm pregnant and having morning cravings, I arrive at this mcdonalds at 5:30am after looking on yelp to see they open at 5:00am and I'm in the drive through getting told they're not open yet. WTF!!
2nd day in a row with no ice cream.  Such a shame I have to wait in the drive thru lane for no reason.  I am handicapped.
Semi friendly, but I waited way too long for a few items. Wouldn't recommend this location.

Fat piece of shit manager was rude af when I tried to come back and exchange my order because they have messed up and gave me something else, and the manager comes and gives me attitude and started yelling because I didn't have a receipt but I have told her and another employee before her that I paid thru the mobile app and got my order on curbside and I didn't received a receipt but her yelling was uncalled for and I feel like she should be working there if she's yelling and shit

Tried to give it another chance because it's close.  Ordered a regular burger from their menu, nothing made different.  A family behind me, no crowd,  This time I looked at it before I went home, nothing on but the burger and bun.  I raised hell because I've always been nice but they almost ALWAYS leave things out of your sandwich, like everything, a plain burger or sandwich when you didn't ask for it, or give me really old food.  The little cashier said she was the manager and offered to remake it, forget it, so they can spit in it now?  She has been their the last three times the order was messed up, though things were messed up before!  Sweet, but her cooks need to go then.  She takes the order good but the ones in the back  don't make it right, even when you didn't ask for anything changed!  WHERE IS THE OWNER??????  You can remodel but unless you get employees with brains, you will lose business.  If we want to stay close, we will go to Carl's Jr. or DQ from now on!

I live near here so I visit here every so often when in a hurry for a quick bite, but 3 out of 4 times it's anything but quick. I've been the only car in drive thru before and still received snail like service. I never really cared too much to complain here about it until today!! I ordered two Sausage McMuffin meals, a big breakfast and 2 sausage burritos. When I got home and checked my bag I had no hash browns and only 1 burrito!! So that's 4 items missing in total!!! They were not even busy!! How do you not give a single hash brown when the order has 3 and the burritos come in pairs of 2 when you order them so why only one? I checked receipt and yes I was charged for all missing items. What an inconvenience to have to drive back. Yes they made it right but it shouldn't have been an issue

I keep giving this location a try because I love McDonalds, but this location is just terrible. Horrible in store customer service. I needed a straw and literally stood there for 5 minutes without anyone helping me. The cashier girl just kept helping customer after customer, but they weren't even that busy. There was another lady, not sure if she was a shift or just another worker, but she looked at me 3 times and did not approach to help me at all. And she was 4 feet away from me taking to the sandwich makers. On top of that, my Big Mac box was covered in oil. That is disgusting and it was the first time it ever happened to me. My sandwiches have always been assembled sloppily, and I usually don't mind as long as it tasted good. But this one tasted so bland. They barely put any Mac sauce on it. I'm aware that they use a device to put the sauce on the sandwich, but I could not taste the sauce at all. This is by far the worst experience I've had at this location. I would give it negative stars if I could. Oh and also, they always run out of soda here.

On sept 13, Mcdonald was suppose to serve all kids k-8 th grade a free breakfast until 9:30a. when I pull in b4 9;30a this Mcdonald said they stop serving at 9a, so is that false advertising or what... you suck you did not honor no kid left hunger day.
Food was good. Lady that took our order was nice. Cold orange drink would be nice. But in all it wasn't a bad experience.
This place is disscusing one time I got a vane in my food it makes me want to puke tastes like junk.

It's seems as though their ice cream machine is down more often than not. Their customer service is below par. There have been many times we have ordered McFlurries only to have them stirred rather than use the machine. Employee once told me that they didn't want to clean the machine.

Horrible customer service. Cashier took a long time helping 1 customer and then left to handle food without washing his hands and also left a long line of customers waiting. I left after waiting for 5 mins in line.
They will charge u extra money if you want something extra but won't put extra. I paid 50 cents for extra mayo per sandwich but check out the picture I added.
Today I ordered three meals. A kids meal, and two adult meals. One thing from every meal was wrong. It's almost comical to come here and order food. It's always wrong. And the food was old as hell.

Horrible, made me pull through and wait for my nuggets, about ten minutes. They definitely let the other portion of my order sit and wait for the nuggets as it was cold. Let alone the limp cold fries and the lack of ketchup or napkins. Maybe they should try hiring some staff that actually gives a shit, as proven with the bs apology I was given by the emo girl with the bad attitude. If they would allow zero stars I would have rated it that. Just horrible.
Worst McDonald's have ever been to we ordered like 10 things and forgot 3 things and they were talking crap about us behind our backs they were saying so again I'm not helping them
This is a good place to go to when you are hungry. The line is very long when you are going to the Drive-thru. It takes a really long time for them to make the food though.

The manager Liz has to be the rudest of the rude. They messed up our order and said they didn't ring us up right so we owed .90 so I gave them a dollar and they gave me the food...no receipt or change. I ask for my receipt and she comes back with .10...again, where's my receipt? So Liz comes walking to to the window signaling me & saying "move to the front" "move to the front so I can print the receipt" "I need you to move to the front because the sausage is a difference of 1.64 I'm only charging you .90 so give me your receipt and I'll redo the whole order to give you a receipt." I told her there was no need to be rude. They're the ones who messed up the order anyway! Terrible customer service, terrible example of a manger. Last time at this location for sure. Can't wait to report her to corporate!

Slowest employees ever. Waited in line behind people who work there, came in on their own time, and the staff took forever to take their order. Customers waiting behind them the whole, including me.  Then the manager Jason, I'm assuming, finally arrived as the cashier had to keep calling to him. Operating at their own leisurely pace.  WE'VE GOT SH*T TO DO, HUSTLE THE F*CK UP.  PS: I walked out, that's how long they took. 10 mins, no joke.

My cashier name is Jackie.  She was so very nice. She was calling me maam throughout the whole conversation. She took my order and even interacted with her coworkers in a very professional manner. She deserves more than 5 stars.  She obviously cares about her job and her customer service is supurb. Thank you for making the experience very plesent. I know customers can be so rude in this kind of business. I wish her all the success in the world. She deserves a raise and promotion. If I owned a business I'd want her running my show.

The most shittiest and disrespectful McDonald's I've ever been too. I got a sweet tea that was filled to the top with ice. I called, the manager said you should've asked for light ice. Which I did and then she said or you shouldn't of put that much ice. How would I put the ice in if its behind the counter. Worse McDonald's ever I don't advise anyone to go to it.

Placed my order thru the drive thru at 10:40 pm and was told the food wasnt ready, the rep asked for me to park in the customer parking lot until it is ready. After 22 minutes at 11:02 p.m. the rep brought out the food. I'm OK with the food being a little late but 22 minutes and 5 cars after my order was placed is a little excessive. I would hope that a little compensation is in order and the staff members be briefed and trained to properly handle all necessary customers besides myself in the near future.
Horrible costumer service, bathroom stinks like hell, dirty floors and not a good place to comeback for nothing if I can I'll rated with 0 stars.....

The night crew at this place is not the best! I've come here during the day and they're much better, but every time I come here during the evening, there's always something wrong! Our large fry, was only filled up half way! They never give napkins, and no customer service! Even though I live 5 mins away, I'm driving to the Ben Holt McDonald's for a better service!
The last 3 times I have ordered in the drive though from this location they have gotten my order wrong. Besides that the Food is pretty gross, I only order coffee from McDonald's now.

Worst service I've ever had. Maybe it's because it was midnight but the staff just sat and started at me through the drive through window for 5 min (I timed it) rather than asking why I was still sitting there after I received my order. They didn't give me my fries or the right sauce for my nuggets.

Worst place I have ever gone to. The crew is unbelievably ghetto and has a foul attitude. I've witnessed one employee start yelling at an elderly couple because that employee got their order wrong. She said "the couple  as too quiet when speaking so it was all their fault". So she yelled at them in front of everyone. The managers, who should have intervened sat back and laughed while watching the entire thing. This place is disgusting, and they should be all be fired and replaced with more friendly crew members. I will never return to this place after witnessing that.

Bought a lettuce and tomato sirloin burger on May 18th and it was terrible . It was dry and looked like it had been left out as the meat was dry and room temp. by the time I got home and I only live a few blocks away. I had recently bought one at the McDonalds at the end of Benjamin Holt which was moist and warm and tasty. I have since been told that this McDonalds has a bad reputation which I can now attest to  !!!!!!

I normally go to this McDonald's because I live right by it so it's convenient for me. Well after tonight I'm no longer gonna go there unless I'm super hungry. They're so rude. When I got to the first window to pay the lady (which was a manager name Jennifer) rolled her eyes at me. Seriously..... Wtf. I had a split order and I just wanted to make sure I was paying for the right one. Then they tried to give us a soda that was 3/4 of a large cup full but my friend spot that when the employee was handing it to us. So we asked her to fill it more. They're seriously trying to rip people off tonight. Plus it took forever to get our order.
They serve pretty quick and is pretty clean compared to other McDonald's. It's close by so is perfect if you live around the area.

I come here a lot because I live down the street Jennifer is the most rudest person I have ever seen at a work place. The crew members are very nice but her she an asshole. I see a lot of post about her she is really rude a shit
Doesn't know how to take orders correctly half the time. & there prices are constantly changing. They charge extra for things & wont even put the extra stuff that you paid for.

I have been here twice and both times was a fail.  The first time I ordered three cheeseburgers and belive it or not all the cheeseburgers had long strands of black hair  in them.  I thought I would give them a 2nd try because maybe the 1st was a fluke. The 2nd time I ordered a sausage mcmuffin for breakfast.  When I got home I opened up my item and they left out the sausage. 4 components to the sandwich and they left out the meat.  You had one job mcdonalds... One job!

In about a 10 year span I've only eaten McDonald's about 5 times. I use to love this franchise, but since they been changing the menus everything has been going downhill.   The last time I was at this location I was late for work, but needed to grab some lunch before I started my swing shift in Elk Grove. Surprisingly, I get pretty fast service and jump on I-5 north. I usually don't like eating while I'm driving, but knew I wouldn't have time to eat when I get to work. So, I scarf that sh*t down like beast and just think to myself how nasty that was to eat.  Fast forward about a year later... I accidentally drop and kick my keys under my drivers seat. I reach under and low and behold pull out a french fry! I inspect it and look at it in amazement because there is no mold or any kind of deterioration on it at all after like year. It looked like it just came out the deep fryer and out of curiosity I took a bite out if it. Damn! What!? It tasted just like a Lay's potato chip! Pretty damn good...  I was just going to give this place one star, but if you can make food sit for a year and have it taste better than the day it was made, you for sure earn an extra star.

Doesn't matter how busy these people are, you will wait forever for your food and its often not right. It has been this way for years. I am going to blame management for passive training and complete lack of interest in improving. It's location is the only thing keeping it in business.

I only gave two stars because my grilled chicken ranch wrap was good! Thanks cook in the back. So we were ordering and there was someone on the intercom acting like she can't hear what we saying like she's drifting off in space she was silent for a minute, Then I had to tell her a few times about my meal, and i was loud and very clear. That was annoying... When we got up to pay she was at the register. She then says the price for an order but she didn't specify which.. So my best friend was like which one is this one? And she said the first rudely,  my friend gave her the card and looked down to her wallet but while she was looking down, after the shift supervisor Jennifer took her card she rolled her eyes with her stained pink lipstick tooth.. and i said something to my friend, and Jennifer the shift supervisor looked at me.. I paid no problem.. So then we get to the other window the girl at the window was so nice and friendly. She then stepped away, and I seen pink tooth (Jennifer) come get some hand sani when she should've just washed her hands after dealing with money. But as long as she wasn't touching my food.. I made sure of that...! But I seen her handle other people cups and spraying wrapped burgers with a "water filled cleaner bottle" idk what that was about. Anyways the girl at the window had to keep asking what we get, we told pink tooth multiple times what we wanted we shouldn't have to repeat ourselves anymore, and my fiancé didn't even get the extra pickles and lettuce he paid for.. Smh if pink tooth is working you will not get anything extra and be prepared to repeat yourself. Thank you.

This has to be the absolute worst Mcdonalds on earth. The staff is lazy and seem not to care about the customers. I literally just ate  "food" from this "restaurant", im writing this because of how horrible this place is. How they managed to screw up my order, i'll never know. I ordered 2 mcdoubles no ketchup add mac sauce, and 2 mchickens. I get home and they gave me 3 burnt mcdoubles with mac sauce and 1 normal mcdouble. I recived NO CHICKEN!! Go to the Lower Sac. store instead, they know what they are doing.
Found a strand of nasty curly brown hair in my daughter's fries! Enough said.
Big breakfast with hot cakes was delicious but they forgot the butter.   Fast drive thru

Slowest fucking McDonald's EVERRRR!!!! I've been waiting in line from ordering to getting my food for nearly 25 minutes now. WTF!!!  Clearly the car in front of me knows whoever works here and is getting free food. They were even hanging out the window conversating. Food is obviously cold by now.

This is by far the most unprofessional, McDonald's I've ever been to. I asked for two cheeseburger happy meals with fries and apple wedges. I got hamburgers with no apple wedges and two orders of fries in each happy meal. They didn't say we're out of apple wedges would you like a yogurt. I asked for a meal and asked for small fries they don't serve small fries with regular-meals? WHY THE FUCK NOT? Then after I asked the manager for a small fries she says we don't serve small fries and walked away. Small fries come with Happy meals... fuckin idiot!! Then after being lied to and walked away from I went to get a soda from the do it yourself dispenser to find out there's no coke products or Fanta? You could have told me that when I ordered my food!!!!   AND YOU PEOPLE THINK YOU DESERVE MORE MONEY PER HOUR??? Fuck off!

The customer service from the lady taking orders was great even though it was just after 12noon and they had no coffee other than just regular black or iced coffee...which I found extremely inconvenient because they advertise mochas, frappe, lattes... but only had black coffee and iced black coffee with creamer. I got over that because they put caramel sauce in my iced coffee and it tasted pretty good. However the food was not good. I understand they're going through a remodel but having your drive through open, you should be operating as normal and you'd figure they'd have more time to prepare the food correctly seeing as the drive through was all they have to focus on at the moment. I got a spicy mcchicken and a McDouble and let me tell you they were both dry as the middle of the desert. The picture will do it justice. I couldn't even eat it. Mcchicken was no better..no mayonnaise except maybe the last 2 bites of the sand which. My advise to the establishment is since your employees have all this free time from the dining room being closed..take better care of your drive through orders since this is your only income at the moment.

I am stating right off that I am not a regular customer: I am an out of towner.  My experience was on Thanksgiving going through the drive thru in the early afternoon.  McD's was the only game open.  This location is off the freeway I-5 and in its own building in front of Walmart.   With that said, the drive thru crew was awesome. They had pleasant attitudes.  I ordered food and a  bunch of drinks, some McCafé and some not.  They apologized for the wait. I asked "what wait?", I told them they are actually quicker than my neighborhood McD's and even Starbucks.   Overall I did appreciate them and they provided excellent customer service on a major holiday.

This is the worst McDonald's in all of Stockton.  First of all I have complained recently of getting cheeseburgers with ice cold cheese on them and was never contacted by anyone with the franchise.  I went there twice now to get a fruit and yogurt parfait and both times they were out.  I ordered a chocolate shake since they were out of the parfaits and I get a chocolate shake that has not been completely mixed.  If you want crappy food go to this McDonald's.  Your better off paying more and going to the Wendy's across the street.

Horrible service! Management doesn't know how to apologize for their mistakes instead they choose to give attitude. They messed up my order 3x. Didn't think that was possible but they sure made sure to make it happen. They need to be trained correctly to be able to have good customer service

The machine to serve soda dispenses an exaggerated amount of drink, causing it to spill. The floor is therefore sticky. There are no napkins nearby, so the customers have to walk to their table with their drink's cup wet. When my order was called, the tray was left there and no one offered me ketchup. The employees seemed bothered to have to give me ketchup. There was a hair in my burger. The tables were relatively clean.
I don't remember their hash brown with the Big Breakfast being so oily. I wonder if they're extending the change to interval.

This McDonald's is truly stupid. Every time we order nuggets with sweet and sour sauce they always purposely give us bbq.   The kids don't like bbq. Twice I had to turn back and go inside to correct my order.  No one likes your bbq McDonald's so figure out a new recipe. Don't force your customers to eat something they don't like.   What's even more annoying is the employees don't know how to pack the orders in Drive-thru.   I ordered what I ordered so please pack what I order and not waste my time and gas giving me something I don't want! Thanks!

The sweet tea has like no sugar. This has happened the last 3 times I have ordered it.  I'm giving 2 stars for the service which was good.  When you only get sweet tea at a place and you sit in line for days to drive off and it be unsweetened is annoying AF! Check the quality of your product. Per shift.

Are they serious?! This is what they give you! I try to avoid McDonald's especially this location & they always seem to prove me right! I wish I had checked my fries before I drove off. They were old soggy greasy & when I bite one the oil literally leaked from the fry! I'm not asking for 5 star fries but this is freaking ridiculous. The fact that these employees even think is okay to hand out is disgusting.
Good god man... it's been 3 months!!! How long is your milkshake machine gonna be broken???!!!

I stopped by this McDonald's cheating on my diet and it wasn't even worth my time. I discussed pricing of my order with the cashier and she still charged me full price. Well I guess it stands to reason that this location's cashiers and computers doesn't work in tandem. I'll be going back later to get either my money or more food. Not one of the workers at the windows I stopped at had the slightest bit of customer service and didn't even issue a hello or good morning.  I'd give zero stars as a rating for such a debacle as this location. Management get a grip on these circus monkeys.

Worst thing that could possibly happen to my drink !  disgusting, I thought it was coffee particles in my drink but it was actually pepper !  I hope this mishap never happens again.  What should I have expected from a fast food restaurant anyways ?
Up sized my order for a large fry, I got a half full fry then I asked why it wasn't a full large she got got a attitude with me then gave me a medium fry   $8.60 lunch... I should of went to sonics

I work nights and went to mcdonalds at 930 am wanting a burger to be told they don't make burgers until 1030 never heard of such a thing I have gone to different McDonald's and it's 24/7 I'm so confused screw this location I will deff go else where
Next time you get your soft drink through Drive Through, check the ice cubes as mine were mixed with black solid particles assuming they were coffee ground. Totally Unacceptable

I'm only giving a 1 because I have to.... went through the drive through to get some items to eat and a gift card. Was told they can't do gift cards in the drive through which was already upsetting because I now have to park the car, unload the 3 month old and go in after already going through the drive through.
