Sometimes I WANT to eat garbage, OK?  Don't judge.  However, I don't want the service to be garbage and I don't want lengthy wait times in a drive-thru when there is only one or two cars ahead of me.    Let me rewind a bit.  In the not so distant past, I went to grab an early lunch at this location.  Went through the drive-thru.  I was LITERALLY 2 or 3 minutes from the breakfast to lunch change over and THEY WOULDN'T LET ME ORDER OFF OF THE LUNCH MENU!!!??  Did they REALLY need those few extra minutes?  Did they have THAT MANY breakfast orders where they had to use the last 120-180 SECONDS to prepare for the lunch time crowd???  In the middle of the MORNING?  The drive-thru worker wasn't the least bit apologetic or sympathetic.     Needless to say, I wrote corporate about this encounter.  They were on point.  I am sure that all of the restaurant workers get minimum wage so they can overpay the corporate folks so they can undo damages done.  I actually felt as though this lady at corporate redeemed my faith in this McDonald's location.  I am stubborn too!  Hold grudges and all but there was something about her Jedi mind tricks that just HAD ME.    Have been back maybe twice since then?  Still lengthy wait times in the drive through, even with only one or two people ahead of me.  Then today, I ordered a sandwich and a small fries.  The total came to the price of a value meal (and don't make some smart@ss remark about it being a "value" meal...  I ordered SMALL fries and NO drink, it just SHOULD have been cheaper).  Would have been nice for him to go above and beyond and perhaps point out the few cents price difference for more fries AND a DRINK.  Wait a sec though, this is McDonalds.  Above and beyond would be an OXYMORON.  See what just happened?  Way to perpetuate your stereotype of being trash.   I tried.  I tried to give you more chances to make it right.  This relationship?  Over.  Officially.

Only time I eat here is when I'm desperate. I do not consider McDonalds food. It's disgusting, just look up how it's made. They don't even use normal meat.  I'd rather pay more for real food fit for human consumption than buy the cheap dollar items.   The one thing I don't mind is the McCafé Frappe.  Stay away from their smoothies, they are horrible. You are better off making your own. I have tried most of their smoothies. I don't know what they do, how long they sit their for, if they are frozen, and etc...   I get why some people come here. It's very cheap for many of their items but for me it's not even worth it. I have a certain standard.  At least some of their food does taste good but just remember it's slowly killing you.  1 tip, if you are going to eat here, never drink soda with fast food. It'll make the negative effect of all the saturated fats and sugars in the food multiply due to the insane amount of sugar in the sodas.

None of the McDonald's in West Sacramento take the national McDonald's coupons that you get in the mail and none of these 3 locations honor the specials that you see on TV either. They just tell you, "sorry, we don't take any coupons or we don't have those specials." I've also noticed that their food prices are higher than at other McD's in Sac. Even the McDonald's in Davis take the coupons marked for Sac. and the greater Sac. region. Plus, with the exception of the McD's on Lake Washington Blvd. the other 2 are in very bad areas of town with a lot of scary folks hanging around outside. Absolutely not worth going to.

The manager here should be fired, her name is Victoria. She has no respect or courtesy towards customers. I really hope her superiors think twice about leaving her in her position. My aunt was eating here and Victoria literally kicked her out and our family. This is beyond ridiculous, nobody should be treated like this and she's lucky we were respectful and didn't do anything about it.

I usually don't leave reviews on fast food restaurants but this morning I went thru the drive thru we had a large order so I wanted to double check and make sure everything was correct ( of course it wasn't ) our snitty bad attitude server at the window by the name of ALEX had to be the rudest customer service attendant I have ever come across I asked her what sodas was what because they were not marked she put her hands up with a sarcastic attitude and said well it's whatever you ordered so as she sees me start to open and taste them because she couldn't figure out what drinks were what when she just filled them!! She walked away shaking her head and rolled her eyes! then when she came back with our order as my boyfriend was checking the bag to make sure it was all there she stood there and kept staring at us like we were stupid and proceeded to rush us out of the drive thru and to make it clear ALEX you screwed our order up we are missing 3 hash browns and the funny thing is you guys were not even busy enough to be in a rush like that! very rude and they want to pay these people $15 an hour! I suggest you guys get the self order machines like southern ca has! It will save you guys the shitty reviews and messed up orders!

went to drive thru ordered my food had to wait in parking lot got a bum asking for change and i said i had none je asked if he could use my debit card i said no i had to go inside waited 5 minutes for fries wasnt cooke yet and still wait for my food been 15 minutes what is the purpose of the drive thru when i had to go inside anyway but cashier was nice he apologize and  gave a cookie

Everytime I come to this location it takes forever in this line they need new management as soon as possible as I speak I'm waiting outside for two spicy mcchickens last time I came here the guy forgot to give me my card back they only have one window working the same window you pay and pick up your food terrible location

if you want to join a gang or score some drugs, this is the place to go.  don't bring coupons though because the coupon button on the cash register seems to be broken all of the time.    ambiance: inmate

I cringe when I have to go there due to convenience because every time I go it is a cluster $@?/. The ice cream machine is always out and has been off and on for year the drive-through takes up to 15 minutes to get food.

Don't even bother coming here! Who in their right mind would give this McDonald's a good rating??  This is one of the worse McDonalds i have ever been to. They have absolutely no customer service. They have ridiculously slow service and most of the time they get my order wrong and i have to go back. I have came to this McDonalds a handful of times, thinking i came on a bad day and trying to give them a chance. But today will be my last time stopping here.  I ordered three milkshakes and sat in the drive-thru behind ONE car for ten minutes. I thought well maybe they had a big order. The lady hands the guy a smoothie and that was it! WTF?! When i got to the window i expected the woman to say hey sorry for the wait and maybe give a discount. Nope, "its $5.34" she said. i handed her the money and looked at my receipt. Shocker! the order was wrong. so i let her know what my order was supposed to be. She looked all annoyed and charged me another 3 bucks for the other milkshake. Really? I've been sitting here ten minutes and then you get my order wrong and no discount or even just an apology? Ugh, well that was rude. So on top of that, after i asked for a drink tray about 3 times she shoves the three milkshakes at me without a drink tray. then i ask for a drink tray and she shoves the drink tray at me. I almost spilled the darn drinks trying to get them all in the tray.  At this point I'm pretty pissed off and on my way home decide to call up the manager to complain. I called twice and no one answered! DOES ANYBODY ACTUALLY WORK HERE?!!!!  This place needs to get it together. Every single time i come here they are terrible. There are two other McDonald's in West Sacramento and i will be going to those ones instead. I will most definitely be taking my money elsewhere.
When I buy here, I always get fresh fries so I'm happy about that and free sweet and sour

My family & I had the WORST experience at McDonalds 1700 W. Capital Ave West Sac and we will NEVER return to this location. We arrived at 8:40pm, at 9:00pm they turned the lights off WHILE WE WERE STILL EATING!! An employee approached us & said the owner VICTORIA called because she saw thru the cameras that customers were still in the lobby & needed to be told to leave because they were closed. I would like to add that the employees who approached us were very nice & apologetic....  However, I had to select 1 star or it wouldn't allow me to post, BUT this location gets NEGATIVE ( - ) stars!!

This is by far the best McDonalds ever!  Not for the food or service ... It's McDonalds, they're the same everywhere... This location changes daily...sometimes you'll get thru quickly and other times you'll end up waiting 20 mins in line even tho they're not that busy. Food seems fairly consistent but don't go here if you don't have time

They are not accepting debit or credit cards today. There is no sign out front. There is only a sign on the speaker. By the time I got to the speaker there were cars behind me and I was stuck in line with no cash. I waited 20 minutes to get to the window. I told the manager there was no sign out front and I was stuck in line. He insisted there was a sign out front. He was not sympathetic. I drove to the drive thru to double check and there was NO sign. I called corporate and they said they will contact the franchisee owner. This is the third time this happened recently. They may have put up a sign earlier but it was no longer there.  The manager should check to make sure the sign was there all throughout the day or better yet make sure the credit card machine is not broken so often.

I am not a fan of Mcdonalds.  It makes my insides angry.  but when you have 2.16 in loose change... we have all been there.  I think it would have been more fulfilling to actually drive my car thru the lobby.  the woman that works the drive through window during lunch has horrible customer service skills.  I have seen armed wives treat their cheating husbands better!!!

I go to this Mc d's alot usually they suck, well most of the time they suck. Always messing up orders and staff being rude. Today I ordered the 20 peace Mc nugget for 5$. The order was fast and cheap just like how I oike fast food.  The nuggets were fresh and hot.  The service was good too. It was this nice little girl. I'm only giving them 2 stars due to the past times ive been here.

Out of desperation I went here on my way back to work on my lunch hour they are beyond SLOW!!! I am not sure why when there are only 2 cars ahead of me. When i get up to the window the guy says oh a parfait and a cutie? I was like 1st didnt know i could just order a cutie but was like no a happy meal for a girl, he said ok i paid for it, got up to the second window and they gave me the cutie and parfait, closed the window and waited like 5 minutes to acknowledge that i was still waiting there. she swong open the window and said yes i said you gave me the wrong order, she said a parfait and cutie i said no i paid for a happy meal, she slammed the window and took another 5 minutes to get me the happy meal then forgot to give me the drink, this is an everyday occurrence doesn't matter what time i'm not sure they care regardless. maybe posting it on yelp will kick some butt and maybe they can snap out of it. OBTW the happy meal was completely wrong i said for a girl and got no toy at all really really

Bummer....was driving around looking for an ice cream shop to grab a hot fudge sundae in West Sacramento and sadly ended up at McDonald's because there aren't many choices. It sucks when you're craving a great hot fudge sundae and instead you get ice cream melted all over the place with hot fudge slopping down the side of the cup while looking for a table to sit down...and although the restaurant was completely empty, none of the tables were properly wiped down. I wasn't allowed to have any extra hot fudge...but apparently McDonalds has a 1 pump rule so that conversation was over even though I was willing to pay for more! The associate was kind enough but certainly not accommodating to customers. I ordered an ice water and did not get that either and after having to get up to replace my sloppy sundae and wipe down tables and ask again for water, the calories from the Ice cream we're not worth it!
Girl who works in the morning is a bitch. Zero customer service. They mess up order at least 1x  a week(when buying food for office)
Slow drive through. Check your orders they have messed up on mine a few times.  Customer service is ok. They are still better than the one on Mack Road and Franklin and also the one on meadowview.

This location is the worst location in West Sacramento! I worked for the owners as a shift manager for over 2 years, I had transferred to the southport location and back due to transportation issues, and this store was the worst one I worked at. The people are not professional at all, the area is ridden with drug addicts, transients, tweakers, the product is never fresh (the onions were always rubbery, the cheese was stale, they don't change out their meat when it expires, etc), they are always slow and unorganized, completely unfriendly. I would get countless customers who would pull me aside and thank me for taking the time to fix their order and apologizing. I felt bad for seeing my old regulars from southport come to this location because of the poor environment.  The owners of this store have two other locations in West Sacramento and I reccomend you spend your money and time at one of those locations instead.
Came here about a few times and ordered medium fries. Each time the fries were filled up half way.

Here is the short and quick on our visit to this McDonalds. It seemed there was no one else in the restaurant nor in the drive thru line so having excellent customer service should not have been a problem. We were rushed through ordering and offered a total and 'ready at the second window' before we were done ordering. There was no recollection later of our order of the gift card and when I asked about the coupon book that goes with it as advertised on the poster in the drive thru I was told that they don't put up those signs and don't know anything about them. After some discussion, a coupon book was produced. It was the attitude more than anything that upset me by both "Maria" and the man that was working with her. We drove away with.. no bacon in the big breakfast, no napkins, no ketchup, no salt and pepper ... oh and had to have them remake my coffee because they had already put the coffee creamer and sugars in it.. thanks? I can't properly describe how maddening the customer service was today. I know it's McDonald's but really? We will never venture to this location again and I hope you don't either. Save yourself the agony and go somewhere else...

Well, we all know that Mc Donald's, in general is not good for us, with their "who knows what" in the products, and the fact that they are in part, responsible for the "fattening" of America (but we must take part of the blame, as no one is forcing this at us, other than not being to afford much else, or kids not being fed properly at home).  But, this property, plus the other three in West Sacramento (can you believe there are four McDonalds in one small, economically hurting city), are also horrible examples of what the food industry is about... SERVICE with a SMILE!  80% of the time I order simple things, like an iced mocha, NO WHIPPED CREAM, it comes with whipped cream!  Or, they don't listen, or are in too much of a hurry, because they are short staffed and truly unorganized (which is what you would think a successful fast food company like this would have down?).  I wrote to them, and  they promised to call me... NOTHING.  They (the local store) did write a nice "form letter that was poorly COPIED with the blanks filled in... very personable!!  I now  find that Burger King has the same breakfast food, and better iced coffee, so I am swearing off McDonalds.  (this last of service and efficiency is not just in West Sacramento, So. S.F., and other cities are the same... they just don't care any more, like so much of our world).  I suggest you do too, or any fast food, if you can.
Worst service ever, they are slow and you have to wait around forever to order, because there's never anybody at the counter!!

This McDonald's is worst than the one's on Charter way and or Wilson way! I ordered a lil over $25 worth of food (mostly nuggets & fries) for my lil nephews. I don't  eat McDonald's much but when I do it's for convenience. That's thrown out the window when your order is wrong time after time. If you go to this McDonald's I suggest you check your food before you leave twice I've gotten the wrong order ‍

This mc Donald's is shit the employees are off the hook and the manager has no control all I wanted was my food I got a 20 minute show

My Son stated "Dad I'm in my Stagg High football jersey" "we're in Lincoln Trojan territory" "So I'm gonna rep my school on them" Gotta love high school football.   Note: Free WiFi  The customer service was good and the wait time wasn't bad either. The food is well McDonald's and sometimes it can be bad but for us that evening it was great. She kept saying NO to a little cream on the side for my coffee.  However i observed she was friendly to every non ethnic Minority customers. It's odd she is Asian herself. I don't want to return to this McDonald again because of this one staff.

This is where I had my very first job 21 years ago.  And I am very proud to say that.  I love Mickie D's food.  The soft serve, the quarter pounders... yeah, I don't have an eating disorder.  It's obvious, I know.  But I am partial to this place.  It's been remodeled and now has the double lane action going on.     But for any of you Stocktonians out there, the left turn leaving this place headed east on Ben Holt could be even more hazardous to your health than actually eating the food!   5 stars to you Ben Holt McDonald's for allowing us that live on the fat gram and left turn edge of life!

I did not like the fries at all....grosss! Since when are McDonald's fries brown? They were obviously re -dipped back into the oil. Not only that, my classic Big Mac was also gross and had a huge clump of disgusting american cheese that it doesn't even come with! I will nit be returning!

This place USED to be decent. However, they have VERY poor customer service. The girl, won't but should put her name out there, decided to be unprofessional and not take our order at the drive-thru, but instead took two other cars that weren't there before us. Unprofessional in every way. We could then see her laughing at us, cause at this point, manners were replaced with cussing. Aside from the laughing, when we did get up to the window (we were blocked in) and asked to talk to the manager, she ran off and was telling the other employee's of what was going on. Pissed off by this point, we went in to speak to the manager, which of course the girl had told the TRUTH to....wow that's laughable...no, Ms. Innocent there wasn't adding fuel to the fire. The manager had a deer in headlights look to her, and I'm sure she didn't reprimand any of the one's involved in such disgusting behavior. If you don't want business in this ass pit, then just fire everyone, I am pretty sure you will find other people that are in need of a job and are willing to do their job without acting like immature children. Go do that crap at home. By the way, making fun of anyone's weight, when you, the one taking orders and working in a fast food place is no thinner or better or worse, than the one's you serve or see outside of work...think BEFORE you speak or act, cause you're not winning any awards for a attitude like that.

Have you ever seen the movie "Meet the Parent's"? There is a scene in which Ben Stiller is at the airport waiting for the flight attendant to board him. Well, I experienced a similar situation at this particular McD's. I walk up to the counter and the person at the register does not acknowledge me, so I figure she is waiting on a phantom customer as there is no one else in line. So she's standing there tapping her finger's on the counter, looking around, occasionally jabber-jawing with her co-worker's. Some other customer's walk in and they point at me. At that point she says,"can I help you?" Then she says, " I was WAITING  for you!"  Really?!? No comment on the food, it's McDonald's!

Normally, I find this McDonalds to be efficient and friendly. Tonight, I bought a Big Mac...you know 2 all-beef patties, lettuce, cheese, tomato, mayo, on 3 toasted buns. Well, I got home bit into my Big Mac and thought "wow, they sure are getting skimpy with their patties." I took another bite...no meat! I looked close and sure enough...3 buns, lettuce, cheese & mayo, but no meat. Have you every had a craving for something and found it was missing the main ingredient? It's like...well, I think you know how I felt. So I called them. The gal listened to me as I explained. She asked if I wanted to come get another one...no apology, no 'oh, I'm sorry'. I didn't want to get in my car and drive back there, by now my craving crashed. I declined the offer. There was a void on the phone, so I said "I just wanted to let you know somebody is not paying attention to their job". She said thanks for calling...no apology, no I'll talk to somebody about this. I do understand people have bad days and miss things. And, I'll probably go back there. My rating is for this one-time visit.
I came to this McDonalds ONCE, and I will not be returning. My sweet tea was WATERY. The service was slow, and messy.

Always fast, and the people are pleasant. The drive-through can get really busy sometimes but they seem to handle the traffic well enough. I love that it's right off the freeway, so not only are they fast but easy to access! The restaurant is clean and well kept. Definitely one of my go-to places when I'm craving for McD's!
I have been stopping by before work to get my last minute lunch . Always nice window workers and for micky d food I have no complaints !!! I'm glad to live near this one :)

Line so long and food was horrible like it had been in there all day. I have gave them several tries and the same thing... they staff is rude... don't complain about food you will get attitude like you wrong for wanting your food reared correct. It is fast food so cook it as I order... Fast...

If no stars were possible for a rating, that would be pushing it, no stars is what I would rate this McDonald's. They are very slow, I waited 9 minutes for a iced peppermint mocha. I could understand if there was a line out the door. Only 1 other customer came in while I was waiting. Looks like customer service is something that is not  practiced here. Very disappointing for the name McDonald's.

Never visit this McDonalds!! The staff here is extremely incompetent and the service is horrendous. I went through the drive-through and they told us we had to loop back around to the parking lot because the nuggets were still cooking. I have never in my life been told to wait in the parking lot for my food from a drive-through! They said they would remember my car but we waited in the parking lot for 15 minutes and no one ever came out to give us our food. I went in and the food was no where in sight. I asked to speak with a manager and that's when she came in with my food - if I hadn't come in we never would have gotten our food and we would still be waiting in the parking lot. They did not offer any apology for the inconvenience at all. Won't be coming back again.

I was here at about 2 today and all I can say. Is. They need to fire & rehire to much standing around and on the phones ,while the line grew long  . The only positive thing I can say is the white girl (sorry) who was taking orders and running orders deserve a raise I was there for at least 30 min watching her do everything by HERSELF please get her help. It's unfair

People here are not organize or should I say the manager. I just waited for 15+ minutes just for my milkshake and pie. I saw that the burgers are delaying..so they should have look at the other pending orders to assist and prepare. Instead, they kept waiting for the burgers until they get back log on their orders. I ended up getting nothing and just refunded my money.how more worst it can be. This the second time I came to this McDonald's. People are kinda not hustling on their work.and the manager is not on top of its man power.
Drive thru attendant refused to serve me on my bike.  Poor service.

For a fast food place, it doesn't get better than this MCD. This location is always clean and conveniently located near a Wendy's and Taco Bell if you're craving that instead. I was trying to use my coupon on the McDonald's App but it wasn't registering for some odd reason. The cashier was nice enough to just enter the promotion for me. I ordered the Filet-o-Fish and it was just as i expected it would be. The fish was flaky and the bun was delicious.

I came here last week and ordered a medium pineapple mango smoothie and when I got the smoothie I noticed the cup was so small. So I asked the guy if this was really a medium because it looks really small! And he told me it was a medium and they make the cups really small now....soooo I come again last night and ask for a medium pineapple mango smoothie and guess what. It was in a MEDIUM sized cup! Smh I feel so played. Magdonals employees are always lying and stealing from customers. Sad.

Currently being remodeled.  Drive thru took awhile to order, which might not be there fault.  Had to check my order twice because they handed a bag but didn't have it all together.  Staff was pleasant just not coordinated.  To have to check twice is bad.....
This McDonald's is hella slow for no reason!!!!!! Dam how long does it take to make the same shit y'all make every dam day smh get it together y'all suck at least this 1 does

No stars!!! But I had to put at least one to continue!! Got lunch for the kids, got home and was taking out pickles on one burger for the kids and saw some disgusting white shit that looks like freakin fly eggs!! In complete disgust, threw everything away!!!! Called McDonald's they said "are you sure it's not onions" I KNOW WHAT ONIONS look like!!! And they said "we ain't got no flys flying around right now" just because they ain't flying around doesn't mean you didn't have any!! Well whatever the F is it that is disgusting!!!!!! GROSSSSS!!!!! NEVER EATING HERE AGAIN!!!

Zero stars if I could.  Got home and they had just served me an empty biscuit! No egg, no cheese, no bacon. Where is my breakfast?   They don't answer their phone they screen their calls. I had to try twice. While I was leaving my message she picked up. Said I could come back or she would write a note. No apologies for my waste or time.

All these McDonald's in Stockton suck they have HORRIBLE customer service I had a girl smack her lips at me because I asked for sugar to go for my coffee. I wouldn't need to ask for more sugar but for SOME reason everyday I order coffee the same and taste different everyday. I swear they should take pride in who they hire.

Being a college student on a budget mcdonalds is the place I come to for a quick fix. I decided to come to the McDonald's off of march lane for the first time. I must say that this is one of the better cleaner McDonald's that I have been to in the Stockton area.   Walking in you can see how staff took the time to clean to really make this place presentable. You can see how hard working the staff is to ensure the smallest mess is cleaned.   As I ordered my food the cashier was somewhat friendly but you can tell that she clearly was not interested in starting a conversation. I felt as though if you are to provide customer service you should take the time to greet your customers.   Most fast food restaurants take an exorbitant amount of time to hand out their food. However, as soon as I paid and went to fill up my drink, my food was ready within a minutes time. Now they really put the fast in fast food.  I highly recommend this location if you are in a pinch and on a budget. It has great entertainment and the music was somewhat decent.

I was on a job in Stockton and stopped  here for a quick bite to eat.  The employees had no sense of urgency, some standing around. There were several dirty tables, the soda area was a mess, and the floor was dirty.  Food was ok, I almost didn't eat it but I was starving. I definitely won't stop here any more.

I asked for an unsweet tea with Splenda, and was greeted with four packets of mildew/mold when I opened my bag. The fourth one we opened out of sheer curiosity and it was pretty nasty! How is this okay? :( mold makes people sick. It made me feel sick just looking at it.

McDonald's on W March Ln in Stockton, California.   I came in early today to get some coffee after my workout from the gym. I was basically falling asleep as I was driving away lol. Maybe a few weeks ago I would have ordered some burgers,  fries and their chicken nuggets. In which I do really love. But I got back on track so it's all bad to be eating fast food.  So I ended up getting my coffee and noticed crew member Ernie, doing what he does best. Working very hard on keeping the dinning area clean. I've come here a lot over the years and I admire him him a lot. People going the extra mile for thier job is always a plus in my book.  A couple other reasons I like coming here is because of Stephanie and Christina. I really do like service with a smile. It means a lot to a person like me. I always felt that "a person's smile is a reflection of their inner beauty". I just see things differently.   So Ernie, Stephanie & Christina good job all of you.   Positive energy, I love it. I find beauty everywhere in my hometown of Stockton, California. I opened up my eyes and see clearly now.   So yeah I'll be back very soon.  Vincent D *VD* Enjoying the simple things in life.
Very ghetto that's all I'm going to say and very poor customer service ! And trust me I know it's in Stockton but still ....
The employees are lazy and they can't distinguish the difference between large fries and large sprite

They are okay... typical McDonald's food... the lobby is usually kept pretty clean, no too much riff-raft hanging out. I can't think of any incidents that stand out good or bad customer service wise.   My biggest issue with this location is they are stingy with their fries. I wish I would of taken a picture of order of small fries last time I was there... I was lucky if it had 10 fries. I've order Large fries in the past and I swear the container was half empty.

I rarely go negative, usually electing not to review. This is an exception, this locaton is messed up worse than Hogan's goat. With a written list, they managed to screw up all three meals. Made order, a nugget happy meal, a 20 piece McNuggets, 1 sweettea, and a medium quarter pounder meal.  Called my order, NO DRINK CUPS.  MCperson said  there were  none on the order. I pointer her error out and got drink cups with a huff.  Go all the home to discover neither nugget order had nuggets. Back to store where that order was corrected, only  after getting the hairy eyeball.  Seriously doubt thes people could pour water out of a boot with the directions on the heel.

Terrible service, lazy employees, no sense of urgency.  They took way too long to get my drive thru, had to wait out front, and when they did, the product was sloppy and looked like they pulled it out their pocket.  I asked the girl if she can get me some ketchup (which I asked for in line) and she never came back.  You're better off driving to any adjacent town to get a decent McDonald's.  God help us, if the minimum wage goes to $15 an hour for this crap.

I stumbled into this establishment 2 days ago... And let me tell you. This is one of the best burgers I've had in town. They have a burger called a "Big Mac." It's two all beef patties, a special sauce, lettuce, pickles, onions, on a sesame seed bun. So good!! There fries were perfectly seasoned and just right portion. I had big appetite today so I opted for the large upgrade... Only a few cents more. Well worth it!!!! But to tickle my fantasy even more... They got this ice cream called a mcflurry... It's so good. They mix your favorite candy in there and it's just mind blowing. I picked m&m's... So classy. All in all this burger joint is amazing. Can't wait to try the MCchicken!!!

First of all, one of the soda machines was pouring fluid out of the machine onto the floor and the response was, "oh yeah I already told my manager" obviously had been doing this for a while because of the amount of liquid on the floor.  Fries were undercooked and raw, had to go home and cook them some more.

The slowest McDonalds I have ever been to!! Waited 15minutes just to get my order taken and it wasn't even busy!!! Then waited another 10 minutes to get my order of just 1 meal!!! The worst experience ever!!

Don't even think about stepping inside to grab a drink or food here!  Waited 20 minutes for a large sprite and an oreo mcflurry! Wtf. I literally saw the shift manager make 5 mcflurries- thinking one was gonna be mines but sike! She gave them all to drive thru customers. They got no priorities for dine in customers here.  It's common sense, must be a sucky manager some shiet but if someone orders a mcflurry and a drink - get that order outta the way first. I don't understand why it took so long -they just hand you a cup and they don't even have to fill it up for you for the soda=___= I understand if it was overwhelmingly busy but food for people that ordered AFTER us got their meals. #smh

So I usually come here after taking the kids to the park and get quick service with plenty of seats to choose from. I like that this McDonald's is spacious and seems to have been recently renovated or kept very clean. This is for the morning crew that do an excellent job.  Today I had a craving for the McChicken and the last that took my order was hard to understand at the drive-thru. When I finally got my order correctly on the screen I pulled forward and there were 2 cars ahead of me, which is fine. However it was ridiculous to sit in the drive-thru for nearly 15 minutes. The cars behind me started honking and I could see the workers laughing inside. It was ridiculous! I definitely won't be back for the drive-thru.

I ordered crispy chicken ranch snack wrap.  The chicken looked a little dark even before I took my first bite. when I actually took a bite, i immediately spat it out. GROSS! BOTH LETTUCE AND "CRISPY" CHICKEN WERE SOGGY ... I unwrapped my tortilla and LETTUCE WAS GREY because it has been sitting out for a very long time! it SMELLED NASTY too..like COOKED LETTUCE  CREAMER SPILLED EVERYWHERE on the side of my COFFEE! wipe it off before you hand it to your customers.. worst part is that they didn't even offer me some napkins. I had to ask  Anyways, here goes my deal breaker story: I LOVE my little tiny piece of CHEESE in filet o' fish burger. that's the best part!!!! I will save and save and save until the very last so I can have that last delicious yummy bite in the end! THEY FORGOT MY CHEESE...... yup..they really did forget my cheese :( i think that says it all

Suddenly the "glitch" signs about their App not working have been removed shortly after I complained to their corporate. Seems like the franchisee of the multiple McDonald's in the Stockton area was just shady.
For my I can putting a 0  for very bad service and the employees have a really bad attitude. First time came here and last one.

Not even worth a star. BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE. Whoever was taking order needs to get her shit straight or get fired. Straight attitude, whatsoever. Receiving my order that I asked for a sweet tea, it was unsweetened. I obviously asked for SWEET tea.
Just got a mcspicy chicken sandwich. They didn't put lettuce or mayo. All I got was bread and chicken. It sucked. I feel ripped off.

This McDonald's is the worst. The employees suck, most of them not very nice to deal with. They charge extra for everything. A small packet of sauce is no longer free. How ridiculous is that.  The dipped cone has 150 calories more than the regular and costs $.50 more. Just an FYI.
The worst customer service ever!! Will never go to their McDonald's! & the wait for a happy meal was 17min. When I was the only one there!!! & the employees there suck!

No lunch for me.   Since a empty bag with napkins is all I got in the drivethru.   How sad no cheese burger no fries.    I know times are making things skimpy but hell  invisible food blows my mind :(
Cleanest, friendliest McDonald's I have been to! The cashiers were awesome on 4/3/16. The coke machines rocked!
My favorite Mcdees!  It's clean and has the fastest drive-thru service well before or after lunch time.  In addition, this is probably the safest location in Stockton.

Not even one star! Been in the drive thru for 25 minutes. Still here. I can't leave because I'm stuck between cars. This place is ridiculous and slow. Fast Food it was not.  They were obviously short staffed.
Dumb dumbs... I ordered 5pcs wings, not a quarter pounder meal. What's so hard to get the damn order right? If I want a quarter pounder I would've ordered. I WANTED WINGS!!! Lol

This location blows. As Joe Pecsi says they *%~€ you in the drive through. My theory is because they are close to the freeway they don't care because most people will be too far away when they figure out they have been hosed ! Check your order !

Thank you to the lady who incorrectly took my order then gave me attitude for screwing up.  I'm sorry I inconvenienced you by asking you to fix the order and refund my money.  And a special thanks to the manager who was completely put out that she had to walk over and handle the transaction (that took 5 minutes.)  Lastly, thank you McDonald's for charging me twice (wrong order and new order), showing up immediately in my account but still waiting for the refund 4 days later.   This is from me and the 10 people that had to wait in the drive-thru line while you got your sh$t straight.
This has to be one of slowest drive thru service ever! Came about 915pm and got my food at 930ish.. that's absolutely ridiculous!!! 15mins in a drive thru... I'm never coming here again
They open at 5:00am but are never ready to serve tell after 6:00am. I live near by and learned my lesson after 3 early trips here.

McDonald's is the worst fastfood restaurant this side of the universe !!!!! Not just the McDonald's on March lane, but every McDonald's that I have walked into out of (desperation) has been a lousy experience. What exactly does McDonald's mean by "dollar" menu??? Dollar menu at McDonald's use to mean everything on that list was a dollar or less... Now, everything on their dollar menu ranges between  $1.19, & $2.00...... Don't think that you will have access to napkins or straws without asking for them.... Stay away! Next stop, Burger King !!!!

Most expensive McDonalds that I've been to. Took 20 minutes on a Sunday morning to get food with only 5 or so people eating there. When we finally got our order, it was wrong and fries were almost stone cold and stale. Took another 20 minutes for them to fix the order and get two sandwiches and a medium fries (while only two other customers came in). When we finally got our order, fries were still stale and cold.
The absolutely cleanest Mickey-D's I've ever seen.

McDonald's.... you dirty whore.  I love you.  You keep my pants tight.    You keep the elastic pants in the front of my closet.  The luxury of your double drive thru keeps me glued to my driver's seat.   Your fries.... oh... your fries.    When will I ever have the courage to leave you?  Never... I cry.... NEVER!  I will now dedicate Prince's 'I would die 4 U' reworded with 'I will die cuz of U'.

I am a McDonald's junkie.  For those that say it's not even a real burger...it's a burger, but nothing like you have ever had before!  McDonald's stands in a class of it's own for burgers.  You could NEVER recreate the taste of a double cheeseburger or a quarter pounder with cheese OR their fries at home.  Yes, BK AND JITB is good.  Yes, In N' Out is good...but they are different TYPES of burgers.  Now onto the review of this particular McD's.  I figured since I have emailed the company on numerous occasions on how good the service is here, I might as well put it up on Yelp.  I will go out of my way to go to this McDonald's because when the employees talk to you and smile, it feels sincere.  I like that, and I am sure these employees deal with quite a few jerks, at least they have on a couple of occasions when I have been there, and yet they are still friendly to each individual.  They don't take it out on the next customer.  I just love this McDonald's, the consistency of the food, freshness, and friendliness.  I do have one caveat, which almost made me give four stars, but that is my own selfishness.  This McDonald's says they serve breakfast until 10:45 am.  SO, I expect that when I show up at 10:38 am, I will still be served breakfast.  However, there seems to be a discrepancy in management and how they "feel".  Because on a couple of occasions they have (they actually said "she changed it today", which I took to mean the manager) decided to stop serving early.  Early, as in according to their posted time of 10:45 am.  That irks me.  Because I love Mc'Donald's breakfast the most, and when I have my taste buds all worked up for hashbrowns and an Egg McMuffin, trust me, fries and a cheeseburger don't cut it!  Other than that, I'd probably trade government secrets for their hashbrowns!  I LOVE MC'DONALD'S!!!!!  :)  P.S.  I miss the fried pies!  Especially the cherry!  I don't care how healthy it is or not, I know what I'm buying and eating!  Which brings me to another point...an Egg McMuffin is actually very healthy.  It is the perfect ratio of protein to fat to carbs for a meal.  :)  I take the top muffin off and smother it with pepper and ketchup.  What?  Does that negate it?  ;)

Came here for a quick bite after getting off late. Waited about 10 mins when there was not anyone else in the store. Ordinary service for addictively unhealthy food. Right by the 5 for driver convenience.

Quite possibly one of the slowest MCD units that I have encountered. From the time I walked in to the time I exited the facility, 25 minutes had elapsed, and it really wasn't all that busy (2pm). Also, the ice machine for customer use was either broken or empty, and there was a dirty rag on top of a spray cleaner bottle. I'm not expecting gourmet food, but at least be somewhat faster than a sit down restaurant, and cleaner than a dive bar.

I experienced horrible service in the drive-thru yesterday around 2:30pm. When I first pulled up there were a couple of cars lined up in both lanes, and it quickly backed up. For a drive-thru it was going really, really slow... by the time I reached the last window we had been sitting there for over 45 minutes. When I got my order, there was no ice in my drinks and fries were cold. My food tasted like it had been sitting for a while... like hours old! Gross! I was willing to forgive the long wait (I realize that sometimes, it just gets busy), but I was beyond irritated that the food was cold. I can't remember the last time a fast food place disappointed me so bad.... this MCD could really learn something about being fast, efficient & serving fresh food from their sister restaurant at Ben Holt. I will not be returning to this MCD.

It never fails. I think every single time that I have gone up north to go snowboarding in Tahoe I have visited a McDonald's. It's just a staple of snowboarding activities with my circle of friends.   In fact so much so that we ended up stopping at this one instead of the one in Truckee that I'm used to going to. It was clean, empty, and there is just nothing like watching the sunrise from behind the glass of the golden arches that just feels so downright American. Am I right?  That combined with their hazelnut iced coffee reminds me, I love you so much McDonald's. Please always super-size me no matter what the movie said.

Extremely slow and unprofessional service.  There was a crowd of people waiting around the ordering area which made me think the drive-thru was getting all the attention.  Staff seemed overwhelmed with the breakfast rush.  When the staff started arguing among themselves, decided to leave and go somewhere else.  Wow, glad I don't live here.

OMFG. 8 minutes in the drivethrough line  so far and they have no diet coke, which is the only thing I came for. There are 9 cars ahead of me and 6 hehind me, so no way out of the line. I'll be here another 8 to 10 minutes and leave with nothing. Worst McDonalds ever.

Seriously two out of three times this place has messed.  Today they earned a yelp review.  Wait 10 minutes in drive, wait five more in parking lot, then go inside to hear a chorus of don't ask me I was on break.. I just got here... oh have a nice day. Seriously save yourself the frustration.

My egg and sausage McMuffin had no egg! How does that even happen? How hard is your job? Sausage and English muffin were over cooked and dried out, same goes for the 3 hash browns we ordered. Disgusting! Our entire meal for 3 was ruined and what a waste of money!

Never go to this McDonald's on a Friday Night. It took 30 minutes to get through the drive through.  I ordered an artisan grilled chicken.  When I received my order, I looked in the bag and there was a box that said artisan grilled chicken. When I got home just a short five minute drive away, I open the box and It had a cold dried up fried chicken patty not the grill chicken I had hoped to eat that night. I won't be going back to this McDonald's anytime soon.

The worst McDonald's I've ever been to. Waited 20min in the drive thru only to be told to go to the parking lot and wait another 10min. Finally they come out... With half our order. I have to point out where is the rest and they go back inside and come out with the rest. After waiting 30min total for our food it ends up the fries and hash browns are soggy. It appears this McDonald's is run by children. Someone needs to hire an adult manager.

Service was very friendly here! Got some chicky chicky nug nugs which took awhile because they were frying them fresh. They're generous with the sauce here which is a rare attribute these days so god bless you.

The thing about chain fast food places is being able to compare everything from food, friendliness, cleanliness and overall service levels.  This one is friendly for sure, but tends to be dirty inside and the lines at peak times is usually twice as long as the others in the area.    I don't know and can't figure out why something tracked like wait times isn't improving over time? Seems local management isn't paying attention to quality of service.

DONT come here! Just dont. worst mcdonalds in the whole country west of the mississippi. ive been everywhere an NEVER seen a place this bad. food overcooked or undercooked, wait in drive thru for literally a half hour the sweet tea is always terrible and im one of those people that comes to mcdonalds just for the sweet tea. its rarely even drinkable.

Too bad I have to give even 1 star. This is the WORST McDonald's I've ever been to - and I've been to many. They are forever out of things. Two nights ago, after waiting to 10 minutes in line in drive up, I was told they were out of fries (how does a fast food chain run out of fries???) AND chocolate chip cookies (they are ALWAYS out of those), a week ago, they were out of ice tea.  And a couple of months ago, they were out of 'quarter pounder meat'!! Seriously??!! And to top it off, one Friday night last fall during High School football season (one of their busiest nights of the week I would assume) I was told that their computer was down, so drive through girl said she couldn't take my order. Apparently she didn't have a pen and paper, and couldn't do math. There obviously is NEVER an adult, or CAPABLE adult, in charge. It would be great if another fast food chain took it's place so we could have a decent, convenient place to go instead of having to go to Gardnerville. For now, Sonic and DQ will get my business.

Was on my way to the Reno airport and thought this would be quick and easy. There was only a few cars but it was about 8:50pm. It was taking longer than expected and I started to get worried. I finally got to the window and asked for hot fries. There were only young kids visible (high school age). The kid at the window told someone at the fry station to give me hot fries. He came back and said they just dropped and are hot. He then got called back towards the fry area where I could not see. After a few more minutes I got my order and left. I felt the fries to ensure they were hot as I have got cold hard fries here before. They were hot, but as I drove towards my destination I pulled some fries to eat on the way and they were saturated with salt. So bad I could not eat them. I feel the guys there thought they would be funny and pour so much salt they were inedible. I threw them away when I got to the Reno Airport. I will be talking to the GM this morning about this incident. No excuse. And where are some adults to make sure the kids just dont screw off?

Seriously the slowest "fast food" that I've ever been to. I just waited 35 minutes (no joke) with 6 cars in front of me. And they give you so much attitude when you FINALLY get to the window. If you're in a hurry don't even think about stopping here. It will set you back a good 30 minutes. Get your act together.

First of all I should mention that I am a McDonald's connoisseur.  I love McDonald's and even between fits of working out and eating healthy, I cannot imagine a world in which I am not eating McDonald's.  That said, this location is killing me.  I went inside today because the drive up line had ten cars and I knew it would be faster. I ordered two Number Twos (the two cheeseburger meal) and an al a carte cheeseburger and small fry.  The cost was over $18 which seemed pricey, but with the moving menu board I couldn't find my meal in time so I paid and began filling my drinks.  (I hate that they don't have Lemonade any longer as this limits my caffeine free choices even more).  The drink station was cluttered with straw wrappers, soiled lids (with two in the ice grate), and various other trash, liquids etc.  The ice dispenser on the right didn't work at all.    After getting my drinks I heard another customer say, "you don't have the cheeseburger meal?"  The cashier said, "not anymore because we added the cheeseburger to the dollar menu."  This made me pause because I had just ordered the cheeseburger meal... I focused on the menu screen and sure enough, the Number Two was now a quarter pounder meal.  There was no sign indicating something to the effect of, "some of your favorite menu items may have changed" and the cashier had said nothing to me.  After the cashier was done with her customer I explained to her that I didn't know that the Number Two was no longer two cheeseburgers, to which she replies, "yeah, we changed it last night."  I do feel as though if you are going to make a change to something that has been that way for 25 YEARS, maybe you mention to your customers that hey, did you want the cheeseburger meal or quarter pounders? Because what the hell?  The cashier was kind enough to supply a solution and refund me the quarter pounders, charge for the cheeseburgers, and we called it good.  But it does seem odd to me that they wouldn't mention a change like that.  The overall cleanliness of this store is subpar.  The employees no longer need to wear uniforms (I assume?) as they were dressed in all manner of casual clothes.  The wait times are getting longer (particularly at the drive thru).  I gave two stars because for one, the food tastes like McDonald's food.  The fries were hot, the cheeseburgers were good.  And two, they fixed the issue I had which I appreciated.  This McDonald's used to have the BEST customer service so it bums me out that it's not that way anymore.  And the cleanliness is truly a big issue.

Shit service!  garbage quality of food.  Screw up every order.  teenagers running the place with attitudes.  been living in Minden for 5 years and service and quality of food has always been horrible.  drive to carson if you really want McDonald's.  Minden McDonalds sucks Balls!  I thought since its a Franchise they would correct it.  Nope!  shit service, shit food.

If I'd wanted a medium cup of sugar and water with cream, I could've made that myself for free. Instead, I paid for mcd's yummy iced coffee. Yes, it's sugary, creamy goodness, but there IS coffee and, more importantly, a strong TASTE of coffee. Not this one, however. Granted, the nice lady remade it for me a few times, and acknowledged that yes, the color did look weaker than normal. (It was white, for goodness sakes!) She said they have a new brewing procedure and that could account for it; but after reading previous reviews, it sounds like following specific protocols as dictated by the franchise, is NOT a priority of management. Skip this location and hold out for whatever is down the road!

Had a family emergency and had to get a hold of my dad. He didn't pick up his cell.  I called Mc Donald's as that is where he is always at in the morning for coffee.  An employee, Desiree answered she was so nice and helpful.  Talked to my dad and was able to tell him the situation.  Thank you Desiree.
Order 4 chocolate milk shakes along with food. However the shakes had so much syrup in there it was by far the worst we have had. Fries tasted like they were fried in old oils.  Very disappointed.

It's the only McD in town, so you don't have a chose if you want McD. Every time I go here, they always mess up my order. It's made wrong or something is missing. I ordered 4 McRib one year. We went home and opened it up. All 4 McRib had only 1 bun. How did they miss the other side of the bun before putting it in the box? We called to complained. The manager said they'll mail us a coupon for our next visit. We never got it.

Walked in with some friends to get something to eat quick on my way up north.  Bad customer service.  Stood at the counter alone for a couple of minutes and was not acknowledged at all.  At least a "We'll be right with you" would have been acceptable form any of their employees that were there.  Not a friendly staff.
Best coffee ever! Great service. Very polite and friendly workers. The wifi is also excellent. This is my go too spot for a quick eat before or after fishing.

I'm not sure, but I think people have the location mistaken for another one.  This place is one of the smaller McD's I've been too and it's next to a Super Burrito.  My father in-law comes here at least 3 times a week and loves it because everyone knows him.  He took us there 3 times in 2 1/2 days!  I must say I was disappointed in this place.  First time we waited for more than 20 minutes for our food after we ordered.  Second time the coke machine was broken so no diet coke.  Third time the ice cream machine/shake machine was broken so no sundaes or shakes.  Service was very slow and the place was very cramped as you had people placing their order and waiting for their order in a 10 x 10 area.  My father in-law said they recently fired the manager and most of the staff and brought new people on and it's been a mess ever since.  I don't know what happened, but all I have to say I would never go back there again and I hope my father in-law decides to switch to another place to eat.

It's a McDonald's. Good spot if you are coming out of N. Lake Tahoe. This is a huge McD's with clean restrooms and a big play area. Good early morning spot that will keep you going until you hit Bishop.  -clean-

Drive through is slow as hell. However entertainment is provided watching people trying to back out of the drive through lane because they are tired of waiting.  Ran out of coffee... shorted me a hash brown ( I guess one out of two ain't bad)  people just standing around... looking at screens with blank faces,  like they have lost contact to Central Control...  Are the monkeys running the zoo or what
Only McDonald's to tell me that there out of chocolate chip cookies, and not make more of them.

During the winter months we come here once a week with several friends to let out little kids run off some energy - since we need out of the house and we can't go to the park. It is filthy! The play land is disgusting. Their socks are black by the time we are done playing and ready to put shoes back on. I had to crawl up in the play structure one day to get my son - the window peek troughs were so gross - covered with greasy finger prints. At one point - we ran a test to see if there ever clean it - my three yr old spilled milk inside the bottom of one of the climbing tubes - we wiped it up but not great - the dried milk sat there for TWO MONTHS! SOOO gross! It is obvious that they never clean the play land or the floors with clean water!
Yuck this place is just gross by far the worst McDonalds I have ate at. The place is so old and nasty it should be torn down. The food was also bad and my order was wrong. Won't be back.

It is beyond my comprehension how you can screw up a two item order. I stopped at the drive thru on my out of town. I ordered 2 plain hamburgers and 2 orders of chocolate chip cookies. It even said it on the stupid little order box. So tell me why I got the bag put it on my seat and got an overwhelming scent of French fries? I stopped to get gas opened the bag and low and behold there are fries that I did not order. Oh well I will eat a few. Big mistake they obviously were fried in old ass oil and tasted as such. No need for those. Get back on the road reach in the bag not only do I find there is one not two burgers but it is a double cheeseburger. I don't like plastic cheese and this is why I asked for a hamburger. So I paid for 2 burgers and 2 orders of cookies only to be ripped off and my order completely incorrect. I'm sure working at a fast food place must suck but really how can you fuck up an order that bad?
Holy crap we just ordered 100 nuggets and 25 mcdoubles and got out order in less than 5 min

When Genoa gets boring, we sometimes go to the movies and otherwise  go "Livin' la Vida Loca" in Minden. Micky D's is near the Ironwood 8 Cinema and is the convenient place to stop with the kids after the movies. And unless it's eggnog or shamrock shake time, I'd rather be somewhere else.

Just got back from McDonalds.....went through the drive thru and picked up a 3 piece chicken "select" value meal that had NO value to it what so ever. I sat down on my couch anticipating those amazing unhealthy French fries I reach my hand into the bag and grabbed a cold French fry which smelt like they were at least a day old! Just thinking maybe driving 5 min. Down the road might have chilled them....next one just as gross as the last one. I then try my chicken select pieces and still cold and as gross as my French fries. I then converse with my fiancé and came up with the problem is a combination of things like old French fries and BAD oil! I will never eat here again!! They ruined my craving! Oh I forgot to mention it was a Saturday evening and McDonalds should have been at its best.

I'm not entirely sure how much common sense is needed to work at a McDonald's, but it's clearly not much. I understand paying $8 for breakfast to feed 2 is a great bargain but I do not think I should have to sacrifice decent customer service in the process. First of all its not that difficult to make an item straight off of your own menu but apparently it is. The scrawny blonde "manager" was the least friendly employee I've ever encountered at a McDonald's, and not only did he screw up my order, he didn't seem to care that he did so. Tried to give me my bag that should've contained two sausage and egg mc muffins containing only one and when I happened to check before I left he said "oh yeah the other one is coming". Should that not have been told to me before I was about to walk out the door? And when he did deliver the second sand which, I got about 3 miles down the road before discovering it was missing an egg. Drove back, told him this and without any sort of apology or anything he simply held his hand out for me to put the sand which in and then proceeded to put the egg in it, and hand it back to me without so much as a word. Next time I'm driving through I would rather eat a bag of chips for breakfast from the local ampm than stop at this establishment again.

Business is always out of soda and different foods. Leads me to believe that they arent paying the bills. They have some good employees but a majority are rude even by fast food standards. Though I get a good giggle whenever I see the "If you do drugs dont apply here" signs.

Mmmm... Cold burgers and fries....Delish. In all seriousness, the cold burgers actually helped me kick my fast food addiction and drop 25 lbs! Thanks, West Sacramento McDonalds.  Customer service is always fine, I must admit. The staff is always friendly.

Unfortunately the reviews are true about their long wait time at the drive thru. I'm really not sure what's going on, but the last couple of times I've been in the drive thru, I have waited way longer than expected.   The food is okay though.
Who gives napkins that are drenched in who knows what?! One star only because a star is required. Step it up McD.

You've been screwing up my orders and making me wait half an hour in the drive-thru for years, literally, and I've put up with it. But how am I not going to give you a negative review after you give me raw hash browns, and when I tell you, you say "oh my god," throw them away, and then ignore me and my family after that?

‍ I guess I haven't learned my lesson! Check the order before you leave drive thru...I call this a sad meal, not a happy meal and it was to late to turn back around for the toy. Will not be coming to this McDonald's at all! It's the second time we get no toy! Thank god my husband caught it the first time. Shame on me for going again.
Amazing customer service. Wasn't expecting a manager of the place to be this good. Even offered every kid in this place a book and colored pencils. Very fast and polite. Deserves all 5 stars.

This place is a joke! Ordered 4 fries and 4 sundaes, 10 minutes later they started making the sundaes, all hot fudge because they didn't have any caramel. While making the sundaes the girl tells another worker that they are out of hot fudge. They certainly weren't going to do anything about that as my sundaes had a pathetic little blob of fudge in each one, when I picked one up and looked at her and said "so this is it?" She turned and said " yeah sorry" as she walked away. The only thing this place seems to do well is take your money. I will be happy to drive to one of the other two locations in town instead of going here. I probably would have got home quicker. Convenience does not make up for crappy service. Never again!

The last five times I have tried to go here in the past year they have even been closed early or they are open but the drive-through line never moves and I back up and drive away after waiting 5 to 10 minutes. That is all.

WORST DRIVE THROUGH EVER!  Not only that don't know about the products they offer, they will also charge you extra dollars if you are not careful! Just got off the drive through, there was a half-hour wait because there was no body at the drive through station taking orders. Plea plea were honking and getting frustrated. I finally got to place my order "egg and cheese muffin- no meat" but the person taking my order charged me $2 extra for cheese, when I asked why she responded that "I wanted cheese hence"....it already comes with cheese and I don't ask for any extra, in fact I asked to not add meat. Finally another employee stepped in and fixed the order but the process took 5 minutes for an order that would have taken just 1/2 minute.

This is the worst McDonald's ever.  They always forget something, get the wrong order, and they run out of ice, runout of every drink, they dining room is filthy and the kiosks is not user friendly. I wish this was a corporate instead of franchise. Shut this place down!

Wish I could rate this place with ZERO stars!!!   So sick of this place....but I keep going because it's the closest one to me. Went this location around 9:30 on Friday after the football game. I made my order WHICH INCLUDED two chocolate chip cookies and two apple pies. When I got home and realized it wasn't there I searched for the number (wasn't on the receipt). I called seven times, my son called another five. All we got was the fax number. I went back today to get my order. The manager had the nerve to one tell me that wasn't her receipt and for two tell me we should've called. I pulled out my phone showing her I tried calling and that all I kept getting was a fax number. She had attitude I gave it back. Then she had the nerve to say "I'll do it this time", I told her never mind and to give me my ice cream! So pissed. Worse customer service ever!! There's always so many negative things said on our West Sac discussion page on this particular McDonalds. Next time I'll make the drive to one of our other locations.  Sincerely dissatisfied!!

I agree, this place deserves zero stars. The managers are incompetent and lack professionalism. Drive-thru wait time is at least 10-15 minutes. Why does it take so long?? The car in front of me just ordered sundaes.   I see new kids working drive thru each time I visit this place. Does that tell you something? Employees are quitting at a high rate and the managers just don't know what they are doing. Who own's this Mcdonald's franchise restaurant?? Do they realize their restaurant serves cold food, drive thru wait times are ridiculous, and they pay for incompetent managers??  This place is a joke.
Slowest drive-thru EVER!  No excuse for not fixing this issue at some point.  It has been this slow for months and it's getting worse.  Someone needs to get it together!

Now I just go inside knowing on an average day I will wait just as long as I would in the drive thru and get a a free bonus: the chance to see at least one customer on the brink of violence caused directly by the staff and the amazing way they handle conflict. The manager gave one guy the silent treatment, looking like she was throwing her own temper tantrum, and I really thought I was about to see McNugget-based manslaughter.
Really really long wait at the drive through. Screwed up my order. Buns were stale. Makes me wish McDonald's would just go out of business and make room for something better. Just bad.

Holy hell this place is again an unmitigated disaster no Double Quarter Pounders Patty's as posted on the drive-thru window. What the hell else do these people sell its complete Insanity. All the while no shakes as of  11:34 a.m. this is all happening on a Friday On a Friday. U nbelievable. this place is a freaking disaster

If I could give this place 0 stars I would.  Where to begin... the incompetence of the staff is bewildering.  How difficult is it to remember to add French fries to a child's happy meal?!  I mean, seriously it doesn't take a rocket scientist to remember French fries.  The wait for the drive thru is like watching paint dry, it takes FOREVER!  20-30 minute wait for 6-7 cars in front of me is beyond excessive!  The staff has no idea of the new deals happening at McDonald's.  If you have a Facebook, like I'm sure most of their staff has, how do you miss the massive amounts of AD's that McDonald's advertises about their daily deals.  At least management should be educating their employees about them at the very least.  Seriously if you really have a craving for McDonald's, avoid this one at all costs. In fact try a local eatery, better food at probably a better price.

Waited a while in the drive thru for my food which okay I understand most employees seemed pretty young and probably new. I offered to wait in their parking lot for my food. When I got home I noticed something was weird about my egg mc muffin and it looked as if someone had already taken a bite of my food. Definitely wasn't going to take any chances and eat it.

Terrible service, just horrible wait times, received food cold numerous times definitely not recommending to anyone, or coming back, employees care less, dress code not enforced. The mcd on west cap has better reviews thats sad

You can't expect a lot about McDonald's, but you should expect a certain level of competence/service.  This location is pretty new, so everything inside looks nice and is usually fairly clean. There's lots of parking spots outside, which is also a plus. The menu screens are nice and easy to read. Unfortunately, that's the end of the positives.  The staff either gets little to no training, or turns over so quickly, that they are all "unqualified to work at a fast food restaurant". Wow, good help IS hard to find. Trying to use a coupon/discount at the registers is extremely challenging, and almost always requires a manager to help. But at least they spend the time to get it right.  The drive-thru, however, is a wasteland of terror and despair. You have better odds in Vegas, than you do of getting your order right. I say from experience (having about 50 check-ins so far) that 50-70% of the time- a) they will be out of something (no shakes, no espresso, tea machine being cleaned), b) they will ring the order up wrong, c) they will give you the wrong item, or d) no kidding, they give you the entirely wrong order.
This is the slowest McDonalds drive through...even if there's only 2 cars in front of you, expect to wait at least 30 minutes. Same experience every time! Long wait guaranteed!!!

The people here are nice enough and friendly. The issue is during lunch time they will put 10 people to do the drive thru and one person up who has to go back and forth between the front and the drive thru. One time I came here and it took 20 minutes and people were complaining! I really dont come inside because of this issue, I think they need more help or something.

Okay, really? So confused on how you could possibly be so slow!!! I am the only one at the counter and everyone was focused on the drive thru, 8 minutes passed with no acknowledgement. I'd be embarrassed if I owned this location and saw these reviews, get a clue and staff that care at least a little bit. Seriously, the food is sitting in drawers, just open it and put it on the bun

If I had the ability to give this s 0 star, I would because this place should be shut down. First of all, the service is the worst. The wait for food in the drive-thru is at least 20 min and over, and the employees were somehow dumbfounded by the sight of a soda machine because it took five minutes to get 2 sodas, and at the same time, me and my father were harassed by the other waiting people in the drive-thru. Second issue is the fact that half of the crap in there doesnt work most of the time. On several occasions, we were told that the soda maching, the smoothie machine, and the ice cream machine did not work. Honestly, the only McDonald's you should go to is the one on West Cap
This is the McDonald's that will convince you those workers do not deserve $15/an hour.

Kind of had a bad experience there at this place you would expect it to be a really awesome restaurant cuz of what her location is but I'm sure that is different I waited about 15 minutes and I was trying to eat in I got frustrated because I got tired of waiting I really don't know what's up with the employees they always look like they have some kind of problem with serving people I never complain about McDonald's before in my life I've been in there since I was a kid but this one really f****** sucked I am not happy I'm not satisfied I waited there for a while the girls see me like standing there and I wanted to order something and she went to do something else and was rude instead of saying I'll be with you in a minute or something like that at least paying attention to me so I'm just going to say I'm not going to eat there anymore I want to say f*** this place excuse my language

There is truly nothing redeeming about this location. Orders in the dining room take 20 minutes on average. The drive through line is no better. They constantly get your orders wrong. Oh, and they don't accept any coupons at this location. Curse my child for craving a dang Happy Meal every now and then... Ugh!

The West Sac McDonalds has the worse customer service. The wait time is horrible, be ready to wait 10-15 minutes in the drive thru. I can see why people are not coming to this location. The Manager has the worse customer service skills. She refused to refund an incorrect order and ring up my order correctly. When asked why, she said she has to keep refunds to a minimum, and refused to help me so I left. There were two other people complaining about service to her too. When I asked for her Manager's name she said I had to call corporate and the complaint would come back to her.  Wow!!  Trying to find the owners name so I can contact him/her.  I hope this type of service is unacceptable to him/her but I see so many complaints online so starting to wonder.

This place is soooo slow it has two drive thrus they can't ever hear you there seems to be a lot of staff for so many mess ups have had to go in multiple times to get something corrected or owed to me but it's the closest one around guess I'll have to stick with it up but pick it up please

This has got to be THE SLOWEST McDonald's ever. Every time i come there is a long wait, despite the large  number of employees working, not many people in line or many cars in the drive thru. They need a lesson in efficiency for sure. As i write this, I've been in the drive thru line for over twenty minutes, and there weren't many cars in front of me, maybe four or so. What gives??
This location had gone down hill quickly recently! Slow service, stale bread, old, dried up beef patties. What is going on here? Do not go there until they get their act together!

Ashley Ashley Ashley!!! WOW! Incredibly, outstanding, Super duper customer service!! She is the ONLY reason why I go to this particular location. She is simply amazing...for example earlier this morning like 5:30am to be exact. Before I had to start work she just went out her way for me and was very patient and woke me up from her powerful positive attitude and prepared me for my day....for that I thank you and the 5 stars are for you and you only.  Mc Perfect
Incompetent drive-thru staff. I can't count the times they messed up my order or ran out of items.

It is not only the drive in.  Went into the counter area only to be ignored although the only customer was a crew member who had finished her order but wouldn't clear the counter.  Finally left without ever being acknowledged.
The drive through is getting slower and slower.  Very disappointing.  I don't know if they are under staffed or incompetent

This is the worst McDonalds I have ever been to in my entire life!  The service in the drive through is horrible, they get the orders mixed up, and the service inside is even worse.  It's slow, the food is cold when they get the order correct.  They are not even friendly!

This is the worst McDonald's we ever went to. We were at the drive thru, the worker told us hold on, and he ended up taking orders from 2 cars on the other side, that came after us. Not only that, they forgot to give us the following from our order: sauces and apple slices from two of our happy meal orders, we had to ask for 1 more milk because they only gave us 1, they forgot to give us straws for our drinks, and they didn't give us any napkins.

The food is consistent but the drive through is the worst. No one wants to be that car that is asked a go ahead and park and will bring your order out to you. But at times your order or the kitchen maybe so delayed that doing so is expedient. This location doesn't seem to grasp that. Regardless of how complicated the order is or how long it'll take to get it out, they refuse to park the car.
This McDonald has the slowest drive thru i have ever been to. I guess I deserve it for eating crappy food lol

Nice people but extremely slow.  They don't have enough people working.  One same guy rind both 1st and 2nd Windows.  Sometimes you see some employees just standing and look around.  They need to work on their time and speed.

We are paying customers who don't drink soda. Family of 4. We asked for 4 waters and the store manager said she could only give us 2 because of the 2-water cups per car policy that they have (or she made up). I think it's irrational and highly unfounded. Legally restaurants are obliged to provide water when asked. Even Starbucks gives water EVEN when you do not buy a cup of coffee. They need to change their policy for the sake of human decency and for the non-soda drinkers.

Received RAW quarter pounder at the drive thru. Attempted to call the location to inform them they were serving RAW burgers. Listed number went to a fax machine. Contacted corporate to inform them of the RAW food and the inability to contact. They apologized, blah blah. A week later received a form letter from the store manager, apologizing. Under the circumstances, the least you could have done was to call and apologize for risking the health of my family. Not acceptable.

It's McDonald's, don't expect too much! Food comes out quick, service is okay, but I think that the people who work here are way more polite and friendly than what I've come to expect from Mcdonald's! I haven't had any issues with messed up orders but I also only go once in awhile for a soft serve cone. But they've never screwed that up so we're good for now!  The line to go to this one is too long though - wait time is insane, so just prepare for that!
How can you beat these deals from the dollar menu? Mc chicken add tomato, or mc double add onions. Definitely my go-to when you looking for a quick bite and affordable options

I went through to get a chocolate shake and what I got was literally chocolate milk with whipped cream on it. I thought it looked runny when I grabbed it from the drive through window and then once I drove away and took a sip - omg.  They should have either told me the machine wasn't working good or not serve them at all. Very disappointed.

I have no reason to give any less than 5 stars as my food was Mc Perfect and my service although brief (drive thru) was Mc Pleasant.   I had a sausage burrito, a sausage, egg, and cheese Mcgriddle, hash brown, and a caramel mocha frappe. All was hot, fresh tasting and not thrown at me. Except the frappe because it is a frozen drink and was cold as intended it was also not thrown at me nor almost spilled due to pushy clumsy hands like has happened before at other places, which is always a plus. I dealt with a young lady at window #1 and another one at window #2. They were polite, professional, and clean in appearance.
