The parking lot, drive thru lanes( they have 2 order takers and then merge into one lane) were clean, the building was pleasant looking to the eye and I was content with my choice over the Taco Bell next door. :-)  I recommend this Mc Donald's to anyone in the Southport area who has an eurge to Dah Dah Dah Dah Dah Dah.  That looks a lot better in my head. (The jingle) SmH

Love this Mc D's. We have been going here for a long time. It's a very busy store but the manager Ashley is awesome and her crew is awesome!! They always get my order right and as fast as they can, because you know there's a lot of picky eaters in this world!! Thanks Ashley & crew!!

They always, and yes I mean always, hand me drinks completely dripping with soda. Not just a drop or two but soda dripping on all sides of the cups. I ask for a napkin and wipe the cups off before I put them in my cupholder. I contacted corporate but this practice continues. I have yet to see an employee wipe off the cup before they hand it to me. Very frustrating.

If i could give this place 0 Stars I would. First of all the drive-thru takes forever this is a fast food place they need to speed up a bit more. Also some of the employees are very rude i work in a food place and even if im having a bad day I am still respectful to the customers this girl at McDonald's is very rude i always have a smile she does not ask how you're doing she just hand you your food and doesn't say anything at all i say thank you and she says nothing . Learn customer service better us customers are paying to put money in your pocket you can at least be a little nice even if you have to fake being nice.

I just waited for 30 minutes to get a Mcflurry, will never go back, also the employee was rude when I told him I had changed my mind because of the half hour wait, will make sure that neither I nor my friend give them any business
How is it possible to have a 30 minute wait at 12:16 in the morning.... there's internally no one here and they're taking so dang long for 2 large fries and a drink..
Always missing items you order and for being such a new restaurant the tables and floors are always dirty and sticky.
It was a pretty quick experience. The staff was very cheerful during my experience. McNuggets were on point and the fries were fresh. I recommend this fast food joint to anybody.

Worst Mcdonald EVER.....don't go here....let me explain my story and you will all agree these people are cruel. I work as a paramedic on an 911 ambulance so eating is always a challenge on the job. I ordered and paid for food at the McDonald's on Reed. We received a 911 call and I had to leave before getting my food. After completing our call we ended up in the southport area covering that half of the city (posting is strict with no freedom to move as we please in the city) so I go to this McDonald's on Lake Washington hoping to get some food since by now I am starving! They tell me they are not affiliated with the other McDonald's and will not honor my order. they said I would have to pay for food all over again. I understand they have a policy to follow but still come on....can you believe the lack of customer service?? Needless to say if this is how they treat their 911 providers who wants to go here....??

This place is always dirty. I have been here so many times with nobody in the dining room and all the workers are just standing around talking.   If it's always dirty in the dining room, it makes you think how dirty it is behind the counter.   Clean the dining room!!!
Long line, loud angry staff arguing in the kitchen, needs maintenance, the soda machine made Coca Cola go all over my hands.

Just had some fries again today. I gave it another shot and was totally disappointed. They are soggy and taste like old oil. I am completely done giving this place a chance. I will no longer give this location any of my money. I will let everyone I know how low quality this location is.  You need to hire some management that can whip those Teenagers into shape and teach them how to properly prepare the food .  Also the drive thru takes forever. Every time. Not just every now and then but every time.  I live in Southport and this location is so convenient as its so close to home, but I would rather visit any other of the 3 locations in west sac than ever go back to this location again.

Our family is in and out of this location. I tend to let little things go like having to constantly remind them that I asked for sauce for my son's Happy Meal. Or the inconsistent way they charge prices....sometimes chocolate milk in a Happy Meal is an up-charge, sometimes it's not. Orange juice is always an up-charge with your meal at breakfast, but sometimes it's a small and sometimes it's a medium. It depends on who's working that day. I generally refuse to eat inside as the soda fountain area always seems to be sticky and dirty. And there's something wrong and not quite right about ketchup that foams when you dispense it. And the female employees with the long, fake, manicured nails bother me...I work in an establishment that handles food and I know long nails of that nature are against Serve Safe requirements. And even look the other way as one of the managers openly grazes on pickles with bare hands off of the line...it's clearly visible to customers. My issue comes from yesterday when I bought a Sausage Egg McMuffin for breakfast. I get it home and sit down to rearrange the egg and top muffin that were slightly off. And what do I find? A hard piece in the egg. So I picked it out. Turns out to be a large piece of egg shell. While I appreciate they use real eggs (I mean who hasn't wondered once or twice?) I was shocked to find such a rather large piece of shell in my food. I understand small pieces every now and again and I admit I've found small pieces in my sandwiches before from here, but this was rather unappetizing. My dog had a nice breakfast though.

Probably one of the worst McDonalds I've ever been to.  A model of how to get very little done and take an extremely long time to do it even with way too many staff.  My son and I are eating lunch here right now.  Took 12 minutes for one happy meal and two cheese burgers.  Crazy!  I can see five employees just in the front alone and there are more in the back.  No one in line to order food.  Drive through only has a couple cars so it's not like it's a rush.  They are running around like it's the biggest sales rush ever! Did I mention dirty?  I'm constantly swatting flies just trying to survive sitting here while my son eats slowly.  Tables are filthy.  Soda machines have stuff spilled everywhere and not cleaned up.  Soda lids are empty for the drink size I ordered so I had to dig around.  If they aren't cleaning, and aren't taking orders, and aren't producing food in under 10 minutes, then what exactly are they doing?
They are always screwing up our orders. Never go through the drive through. It seems like the coke machine is ALWAYS broken.

Shame on the management at this location. I live nearby and the service is horrible (rude employees), always out of amenities in the dining area and the drive through almost always screws up the order. I've had to pull over and go in 9 out of 10 times. The wait is extremely long and the dining room is pretty much dirty all the time. I haven't been back for a while so I hope they get whatever problem they have straightened out.

Avoid this location. Im not a complainer as you will see from my Yelp reviews. But this location is the most inconsistent, unorganized, untrained McDonalds Ive ever been to. I had stopped after a long day to get 2 quarter pounder meals, simple enough. I was 3rd in the drive through, we had all waited about 7 minutes for the person in the front to get their order vs. having them pull to the front of the store to await their order. the person in front of me as well as my self had their food quickly meaning it has been sitting waiting for us for at least 5 minutes. The person at the drive through handed me the bag and stated, "heres your food" no thank you no review of the order. When I had gotten home we had realized the food was very cold, the burger was black from being over cooked and the bun was stale to the point of being hard and un edible. We both threw the food away knowing we weren't going to drive 10 minutes back to this location and put up with poor service again. I had taken the survey on line indicating they can keep their 2 for one deal I wanted a refund for the food I had to throw away, I had asked for a call back from the manager, this was 4 days ago. DO NOT waste your time or your money for rude service, no respect for your time or patronage. The food was so terrible I dont see how a location could be so inconsistent when they only have one menu to practice every day. I wish I could add an image of the blackened burgers and hard buns. Terrible experience with no follow up from the management as requested. Training and management is the worst Ive ever seen
Just got another meal from ya. It was bad taste was way off of other McD .the fries were almost raw. Come on you guys can do better than you have been doing.

This was probably the worst experience at a McDonalds I've had...which is saying a lot because it's McDonalds lol but my boyfriend just asked for a cheeseburger with no pickle and no mustard. Of course they messed it up so he very politely went up to the counter and asked for them to fix it. When the cashier brought the burger back, the person making the burgers said "Oh, is he being difficult?" He was being very polite and as far as I'm concerned, leaving stuff off a burger isn't difficult. On top of it, the managers yell at their employees in front of everyone. A good manager would pull you aside and tell you what to work on. They wouldn't shame you in front of everyone. They are very disrespectful to their employees and that alone is enough to make me never come back to this location again. I feel bad for these employees. This job is stressful enough.
Drive through took a little long, but my order was fresh and hot! There was a employee sweeping the lot as I drove off and told me to have a nice day! Thought that was sweet!

They do not take the coupons you get in the mail. The service here was very slow. We were standing at the counter to get something they forgot from our order, and the staff completely ignored us. The cashier was making food. they seem understaffed. The good was fine. Won't come back.
Fast food... They kinda have the food part down.  The fast... not so much. Slowest fast food in west sac by far.some sit down establishments are faster.22 min in drive thru. Ridiculous.

And fast food workers want increased wages?     I rarely go here and the reason is that every time they get my order wrong.   I order an egg mcmuffin, I get a sausage mcmuffin.  I order plain cheese burgers and they never get those right.  Really, is it that hard to get orders right?   They always forget my kids drink with their happy meals.  (You think that goes over well with twin 3 year olds?). There are two lanes for the drive through and it takes forever.   Seriously get your act together people!   The only thing good is the friendly service.

At 54 years old, I have dined at my fair share of McDonald's Restaurants. This particular McDonald s, being situated in an upper-middle class neighborhood, one would assume that both the quality of the food and service would be at the very least average,  This is by far is not the case! They often run out of apple pies, miss items ordered, and are rude on occasion.

Went through the drive thru to get two soft serve cones. When i ordered I said I wanted two kids cones. I pulled up and she gave me one that had almost nothing in it because it was melted. Then she came back with two mcflurrys with my other soft serve no where in sight. She got mad at me because she screwed up. She brought back another cone that was melted. I have had ordered kids cones here before and they were bigger but not to big. She got mad again and made them again. I said thank you can she said whatever. If she owned up to her mistake I would have been fine but that fact that she was overly rude is why I won't be going there

My vegetarian wife and I went thru the drive through.  she ordered an egg mcmuffin  with cheese. Employee says it's not on the menu, you have to order sausage mc muffin.  My wife said,ok give it to me without the meat.  Employee advise extra charge for cheese, making the sandwich cost more without the meat. We politely declined and left. .
Giving another star because it seems they have gotten a little better at getting the orders right, but still get it wrong more than other McDonalds. Keep on improving please:)

I go to this McDonald's on so often cause at near my boyfriends house. The service is pretty slow for a McDonald's. The staff here are pretty friendly for the most part. The food here to my surprise are fresh and unlike most McDonald's look like the picture.   The dinning area is a little dirty, the ketchup and soda fountains are usually a mess. They seem to cater to the drive thru more so if you want faster service perhaps you are better off waiting in the drive thru line. Oh, I forgot to mention that this McDonald's closes pretty early... They are not a 24hr so if you have late night munches this is not the place to go!

Usually I don't review Mc Donald's or of the like but this was hilarious.  They were out of ketsup in the dispenser so I asked for some at the counter, I was told they were out...even the packets!  Well when I cut the kids cheeseburger, ketsup came pouring out... there must have been 3/4 of a cup of ketsup.  The paper place mat had a coupon for the Harlem Globe Trotters, the event occurred a month prior.   Prime example of quantity not quality.... And it's a brand new location.  Very poor management.

Horrible customer service with very rude drive thru employees. My order is wrong 9 out of 10 times. When I tried to tell the manager he was very rude and angry. He tried to make it almost seem like it was my fault that his employees can't put together a order correctly. They also close down early for no reason at night way before closing time. I've driven up and seen employees sitting around while there business hours stated they were open. Is this what we are going to be paying $15 an hour for????

I was getting sick of the mediocre continental breakfast being offered at my hotel, so I ventured out to McD's as I was craving an egg mcmuffin.  This place is obviously new, as I went into the women's room to wash my hands and the stalls and walls inside was not scribbled with graffiti or names/initials. You know, I never got that, but I digress....  Anyways, there was a line in the drive thru, so stepping in resulting in getting my order in and meal quickly. Since I was surprise of the quick turnaround, I decided to eat my egg mcmuffin meal here. The mcmuffin was actually put together pefectly--it was perfectly stacked!! when the heck does that ever happen?!?!?! the hash brown was fresh off the fryer and the OJ I had with my meal rounded off the nice 15 minutes I had to eat my breakfast.  Their seats...are interesting, as nicely as I can put it. Not quite cushy, but it gets the job done. I picked a seat in front of their flatscreen TV.
The absolute slowest McDonalds ever.  I've been sitting in the drive thru line for 25 minutes and there were only 4 cars in front of me.  Still sitting here....

I don't think I can say enough bad stuff about McDonalds. Everytime I eat here I feel sick afterwards. I feel very lethargic and most of the time I get really bad heartburn. I don't even eat McDonald's anymore unless it's an emergency and I'm traveling and can't find anything else.

Probably the best service I have had at a McDonalds or any other fast food chain for that matter. Rosio took my order, complimented my daughter's eyes and gave her a cookie. Im really glad this is my local McDonalds...this will keep me coming back.

I have gone to this McDonald's on several occasions as it is 2 minutes from my home.  Even though I have had prior bad experiences, I chalked it up to the person that was working that particular day and hoped future visits would be better.  Fail.  1.  On one visit, my Big Mac was thrown together.  All of the meat, cheese, lettuce, sauce, pickles were on the top half of the sandwich.  There was nothing between the bottom two peices of bread.  It was like a cheeseburger with an extra peice of bread.  I called the manager, who was not apologetic at all and informed me that he normally watches as the sandwiches are made.  Really?  So you stand there, your entire shift and watch them make sandwiches.  GTFOH.  2.  On another visit, I received two spoiled yogurt parfaits.  Needless to say, my husband and I ended up spending time with the porcelain god.  3.  On multiple occasions, there has been so much salt on the fries that the fries were sparkling.  Also, the grease is old.  You can tell by the taste and darkness of the fries.  4.  On another visit, I was asked to hold in drive through.  I watched as another car came through, ordered, received their food and drove off.  I was still waiting.  I drove up to the window, where the cashier apologized even though he wasn't the one that asked me to hold.  It was a woman.  When I get to the next window, I see the woman that asked me to hold, she didnt acknowledge it or apologize or anything.  I have come to the conclusion that this place is a complete disaster.  After multiple visits, and being disappointed everytime, I have decided not to return.  This place will be out of business soon.  I would rather drive 5-10 mins further to get my food made properly with better customer service.  Another reviewer stated that this particular McDonald's is privately owned.  That explains a lot.

Found a Hair about 6 inches long, dirty blonde hair in my breakfast burrito, never again ruined my whole breakfast and my appetite. That was so convenient for our family to go in the drive thru for breakfast twice a week but no more. That's why one star
Horrible service. Never ask for ketchup or even give napkins. I wish they did better, when you go make sure you ask for napkins !

My God!   It takes some real talent to screw up a salad but this place managed to do it.   When one orders a BACON Ranch Salad and Crispy Buttermilk Chicken, one expects there might be BACON on the salad.   There was NONE...not even a small piece.  In addition, three of the four tomatoes were rotten and there was about a teaspoon of cheese.   $6 for this crap??   What made it even better is the workers are most likely related to a turtle (and they want $15 an hour?   I DON"T THINK SO.)   The visit before this, we waited for half an hour in the drive-through line at 10 pm at night.   REALLY??  We have numerous restaurants in this four block area.   I'll patronize them instead.

Worst Service at Mc Donald. They messed up my order and when I called to complain I was asked to either come back same day or a different day. Since I was head to work I told them I will stop by next day. When in next day I was told they never received a call from me.my name was not on there complain book. I call the cooperate office and they send me coupon and this particular location won't take it.
This is the best McDonald's I have ever been to the employees are also so nice & my food is always fresh , i would t go to any other McDonald's than this one ! Way to go you guys !!!!
Very bad service i would say... Staff are so rude... Nd half the time their soda machine is not working
Service was really bad for a brand new place. Needs improvement now! no napkins on a drive thru order....no straws.....lame...nuggets COLD!

We try to avoid this place if we can.  Unfortunately it is nearby so we do still come in once in awhile.  Tonight they were very under staffed and it took forever to order and to get our food.  There was one girl working the counter during dinner time.  The last time they screwed up our order and only filled the large smoothie I order 3/4 the way full.  When I questioned it 5he girl blamed it on the machine but did nothing about it.  Another time their drive through sign advertised a special.  They would not honor it and the manager said they forgot to take the special down.  Very poorly run place.  McDonald's corporate should be embarrased.

This is right by our house so it ends up getting a lot of our business after kids' activities and such, so I give it a lot of leeway because I'm too lazy to drive out of my way at 9 o'clock at night.  That said, tonight was RIDICULOUS and I won't be going back anytime soon.  Literally over 30 minutes from entering the drive through to when I pulled away from the food window.  Waited behind a bunch of cars which was why I figured things were slow, but no.  After 7 or 8 minutes I finally get to order.  They leave stuff off the order - easily fixable.  Pull up to the first window.  Wait.  Wait some more.  Wait.  Finally the car in front of me at the food window pulls away so I just pull all the way forward.  Drive through employee says: Were you the order with the frozen strawberry lemonade?  Nope, frozen regular lemonade.  I also say, Hey you might want to put a sign on the first window that nobody's going to be there and to pull forward.  He apologizes, but his name tag is handwritten - clearly he's new.  Five minutes later he comes back and says sorry the frozen lemonade machine is broken.  I say fine, give me a coke.  That takes a good 10 minutes because now the coke machine isn't working.  Someone comes to help him, but she clearly doesn't care much.  I considered just driving off since I had the food already, but I'm apparently a glutton for punishment so I stay.  So between the 8 minutes to order, the 18 minutes from order to payment, and the 10 minutes I waited at the food window, I was beyond livid by the time I left.  At least the order was right.
They don't accept manufacturers coupons. Are you kidding me? Get out of here with that bad attitude you rich bastard.

Don't come here. The wait alone makes you regret your decision.you can easily spend more than 10 minutes in the drive thru with only one car ahead of you and they only order a couple things. If you are trying to make it quick your better off going to another McDonald's

Do not eat here. My wife and I ordered two ice cream cones -- and the employee handed us two melted cones. We asked her to remake them and then we watched her dump the ice cream back in to the machine. Yes, they recycle their food. I can only imagine what they do with the meat or other products. I hope the health inspector sees this.

If I could give 0 or negative stars, I would. Never have I been so frustrated and upset that I have felt compelled to review a fast food establishment, but this is anything but fast. Granted, I didn't go into the store, I only went through the drive through, but this was the most inefficient place I've ever been too. With how long I waited, I could have entered a sit down restaurant, been seated, ordered, received my food, and paid before I even got to the drive through window! No sense of urgency at all, and the staff didn't even seem to care - they were chatting and hanging out. I'd rather drive across town to another McDonalds - it'd probably even be faster than waiting for this one!
Love the new location! The inside is clean & new. The drive thru has 2 ordering lines. Yay McD's! Quick tip: Tuesday 2/7, Buy one get one free Big Macs! Woo hoo!
Food was fine, employees were friendly, order was right as all this should be expected.  It took a ridiculous amount of time to get my food.  It's supposed to "fast" food. Keyword: FAST
Always looking for a good deal and love coupons! But this location doesn't take McDonalds coupons, it's privately owned??? Are they serious or just not in the mood?

I was looking for the hours it's open (not listed on the main McD website, or here - so annoying!) and I was surprized to see all the bad reviews. In my experience, this place is good - friends live nearby and I've been to this McD location about 10 times this summer. All 10 times there was nothing wrong with the food, my orders were correct, the fries and hash browns were super-fresh, like, just fried 45 seconds ago, the food was hot, the smoothies were cold, service was prompt, employees seemed nice / normal, napkins and straws were provided... Maybe the only people who bother to write a yelp review of a McDonalds drive thru are the people who are really angry, and that just leads to bad reviews? Because really, I've been there - it's a perfectly nice place. In fact, I think I'm going to hit it during the morning carpool today. My only problem with this place is that they don't post online to say what hours they are open!

Never again will I patron this "restaurant".  It is so close to home and convenient for my four active kids as we are constantly running to different activities five to six nights a week.  While I cook often, every once in a while it is nice to have a break and pick up food.  I have stopped here three times in the last two months (drive-thru) and each time either the wrong order was keyed in, items are missing, or the wrong items are placed in the bag.  Each time I learned to check the bag, but apparently that is not enough.  Tonight there was the right quantity in the bag, but one of the items was the wrong one (filet-o-fish for a burger???).  Usually it is my kids that get the raw deal so I am giving up my food so they can eat.  Really unfortunate that the most basic of customer service tasks cannot even be performed correctly.  As a customer service employee myself it is really, really disappointing and I will drive out of my way from now on to patron a different franchise.

This place sucks!  The people are more interested in talking to each other than serving customers.  I ordered a BLT chicken sandwich meal with no tomatoes. I got my order and it was just a piece of chicken, and a dab of mayo. I went to the counter and showed the cashier and told him I would like the lettuce and bacon please. He took the sandwich to the manager who then pointed him to the cook. The cashier then proceeded to open my sandwich WITH NO GLOVES ON and no washed hands and pick up the piece of chicken.   Some conversation was occurring which took a few minutes with my sandwich wide open getting cold.  What's so hard about slapping a piece of lettuce and bacon on it.  Soooo he finally just puts a piece of lettuce on it closes the box and puts it in the bin for pickup. I said no, it is not right, what about the bacon?? The manager then comes to me and says what did you order. I point to the #8 meal saying BLT crispy chicken with no tomatoes.  Sooo she goes to the cook and they have this lengthy conversation.  I got so mad standing there watching this go on I went and sat down.  A few minutes go by and then my sandwich is done. I got it COLD and with cheese on it which I didn't want!  What is so hard??? Then the soda machine was not working right, the mix was putting out mostly carbonated water. The manager was told this by other people as well and she just smiled at the guy and said ok.  WTF?  She never fixed it or offered to fill our drinks from the behind the counter dispenser.  REALLY, to the OWNER. Your business is going to FAIL if you don't get things fixed with your employees.  I won't be eating here again. Taco bell next door does a great job, they even smile and thank you for coming and get your order right on a regular basis!

I've never written a review before but felt compelled to do so as this is has had to be the worst experience,ever, I've experienced at a drive through anything! First, a female voice came through a speaker asking for our order but then would not respond only to let another car whom drove up after us in second lane,place their order and proceed ahead of us.She was not at the first window where we paid for our meal. At the second window, a female was there,asked what sauce our daughter wanted (was ketchup and ranch dsg),proceeded to hand us an overstuffed bag which burst all over the car sending our 2 orders of fries throughout the car.She says "do you need a new bag?",and I told her "yes and new fries".She takes her time,as cars back up, to then hand me a minature bag with 1 instead of 2 fries.Not even a sorry or even a quick kick in the butt.Just a smirk.We get home to discover that not only had she/they left out a McChicken (thus eliminating 1 persons "dinner"-if you want to call this food that), she had gotten the drink order incorrect also! Come on! This is not rocket science.Foolish me, I should have double checked the bags to ensure they had done their job correctly. My fault.I was annoyed and frustrated enough to call the phone number on my receipt,several times, where you can speak to the manager with complaints and or leave a message if your food order was incorrect. All my phone calls,amazingly enough,goes to a voice mail box that is too full to take any more messages. That was total validation for me that this place is a disgrace to the long standing name of McDonalds. No, it is not a health food restaraunt,but is a fun treat once in a blue moon for the kids for a job well done only to have service so utterly poor was a disgrace.I read a comment that all the West Sacramento McDonalds are privately owned and sounds like this behavior is acceptable if not tolerated. Well I'm sure "The Big Cheese" of McDonalds would be highly upset to see people treated this way and the food service industry be represented so awfully. There has to be a reportable way.

fair warning to everyone wanting breakfast...this location is will not open at 5:00am even though the signs on the door say 5:00am. today was the third time this year that i had to pull out of the drive thru at 5:25 or later. when you see the drive thru full of cars waiting and it is before 5:45am do not pull in or you will get trapped in a row of cars honking at the employees inside to take their orders....believe me; they do not care and they will just ignore you. if you don't leave they will shut off the drive thru lights and go hide in the back until they feel like opening. this time i was behind a man with his children and this man actually knocked on the drive thru window at two managers who were standing in the lobby drinking coffee. the man asked them when they would open and both of the managers shrugged their shoulders and walked away laughing. do not plan on getting anywhere with these people because they will proudly advise you that they run all of the west sacramento mcdonalds locations. you will get laughed at...i am done getting trapped in the drive thru between a dozen cars honking and knocking on the windows to get served. this is not worth the risk any longer..and just to update everyone; you cannot use mcdonalds coupons at any location in this whole city. the investor that owns these locations will not accept any coupons.

Basic McDs...wanted to use the restroom while we made a stop here...had to ask one of the employees to get access to the restroom which was interesting...more interesting was the guy who was waiting and snuck in after me...I guess this is a real problem here

If i can this place give zero stars it would be zero stars ! Visiting fam here in stockton kids wake up are hungry decided to get the kids and every one some food soo omg where to start! Quality is poor!! This location is the first ever worst location in my entire life, first of all, im used to San Jose and the breakfest sausage burritos are $1.80 here and in San Jose its only $1.00 my fault for not checking the price before ordering so for 20 burritos it was $36 i also ordered #5 sausage and egg bisquit combo with hot chocolate( upgrade charge $1.99) meal it self was $5.99 so my total was about $48 that came to a surprise because they said to come up to the window and they give my total, if i knew the cost before pulling up i would have changed the orders n got something else for $99cents. Cashier handed me my bag said my bisquit and hashbrowns at the bottom, on top was all the burritos... Ok well my hashbrown would have been smushed up IF I GOT IT!! But no NO HASHBROWN!! And to top it off my hot chocolate was not even hot chocolate it was just warmed MILK! Took the cap off and it was pure white! Not a drop of chocolate at all! I was so disappointed and angry, and when your Hangry your Angry as heck!! Now to the burritos that was flat as a pancake and half had no sausage at all! Even got the kids complaining and they eat anything!! Worst drive through experience ever, how can your workers be so incompetent? How hard is it to follow directions, ill give you guys the benefit of the doubt maybe your management didnt train you all properly, so that falls into management.. Get your shit together, no wonder you have such a low rating.. If i wasnt as calm as i am now, i would have been one of those worldstar viral videos of customers going crazy throwin shit.. Seriously get it together, and i hope my experience doesnt happen to you at some other places.. Cuz literally you guys fucked us over...

Real fu*king disappointed my fries where old and soggy I ask for bbq sauce can't even get that , orders no onions or mustard and nope can't even get that either my burger came bloody come on ! learn how to do your job! and y'all begin ass workers want higher pay y'all should get 5 and hour with how y'all work , only gave 1 star because I ordered 3 cookies I got 6 and they were hot and assuming fresh . I also posted a picture with this so find it I'm not lying about the bloody burger .

After many days of not going anywhere to eat, I decided I needed a couple of some fast food to get the rest of my errands done. I ordered two sausage egg muffins without cheese. That was my mistake because 5 and a half hours later I was sitting on the toilet. I didn't have any spoiled food in the past five days so I know it was my McD trip that did the revenge. Unless it was the diet coke I drank. Next time I'll do more research before ordering any more drive through poison. sjcehd.com/RestaurantIns… Public available history is a bummer.
If I could give a lower rating I would. My order was deleted and never delivered with no apology. Or refund.

This McDonald's has terrible customer service. I asked for extra sauce on my Big Mac, Emilia the Manager said it was extra charge which I did not care for, I wanted extra sauce due to the Big Mac being to dry. I asked Emilia, that I was waiting for another hamburger for a long time but yet had to pay an extra charge for the Bic Mac... She responded with a very rude attitude "I didn't know you were waiting for another hamburger when you asked for extra sauce!!!, I asked her not to give me that attitude and she replied with an arguing voice "I'm not giving you no attitude, I am just telling you!!!  I manage a Hotel and I know what customer service is, this lady was not polite and did not go above and beyond for her customers in fact the way she talked to me as a customer made me not wanting to come to this McDonald's ever again.  Also bathrooms are not kept clean...
Place sucks. Employees are rude. Never go here a waste of time and money!!! Don't even bother asking for sauce they'll lie and say it's in the bag when it's really not. Oh yeah and super ghetto.
Shame on you for paying with people's orders. I expect better service, my whole job comes here to eat. I waste my whole lunch hour, I thank you very much

Expect bad customer service if you are going at night and expect a long wait to get your food. This girl at the drive thru didn't say a word to us she just handed us our food...if people are going to work in the food industry they need to know that talking to customers is a huge part of their job.

This McDonald's is currently going under remodeling, so the only source of ordering is through the drive-thru. My friend and I decided to go here for lunch. Unfortunately we didn't have a vehicle so we just waited in the drive-thru line. It's our turn to order and they tell us we cannot order unless we have a vehicle. We were pissed because we had to walk all the way from school. Plus, they were only accepting cash. As a result of this tragedy we just concluded to dine in with their neighbor, Burger King.

This place is dirty. The servers hair is out. No hair nets. On person. Is out of uniform looks like he was at school all day. It smelled like they mio the floor with stale mop water. GMP was not acceptable. Server scratched their hair and didn't look to was their hands.

So baddddd! I bought 20 pieces chicken nuggets ! But when i opened , they just put 7pieces/per box!! Never come back here again! And also that makes the name of this company go down! It wasn't 1st time happened to us on others mc donald's franchises.
Very slow service, only one register open on Friday Evening. Bathroom was disgusting. Poor customer service. Won't ever go back.

I'm in line right now. I've been in line for about 30 minutes already waiting for a soda... Yes this is a 24-hour McDonald's but you're going to spend at least an hour here for one order. I thought this was fast food.
They forgot my daughters burger in her happy meal. I tried the new Mac Jr and my bun was stale! I try to stay away from McDonald's, they reminded me why.

Went here today - 7/31 @ 11:57 am - for the first and last time. Ordered lunches and an iced coffee with a touch of nonfat milk. Got the food and waited forever for the coffee. When we got it, it was pure white. We told the girl at the window we ordered a coffee and she insisted that's what she gave us. We went back and forth for awhile...an iced coffee shouldn't be as white as the receipt.  It should have some color. The girl at the window called another employee over who also insisted it was a coffee. They kept telling us to taste it. They wouldn't take it back until we tasted it. It was seriously disgusting. Like sugar/milk over ice and not a hint of coffee. It was handed back to them and one of the girls said, "I'll just make it the old way then." What? With coffee this time? We watched as she put it together at the window. With coffee. It ended up actually being coffee-colored. Left with the feeling these 2 girls were just playing games and getting a kick out of the fact one of us tried it so they'd take it back. Even if u aren't a coffee drinker, anyone could see a pure snow-white drink has zero coffee in it. Won't be returning.

This McDonald's is right off the Charter Way exit. Right next to Burger King and across from the Shell Gas Station.  I've been here here before and well the drive thru lines are always long even with 2 lanes. My mom doesn't like going to this location because well it use to look ghetto even though they remodeled and such. She also thinks it's not safe and such so everytime we want McDonald's we would stop at the one in tracy which is on the way home.  Meh.
I just bought a couple mc chickens and my sister found a light brown hair on her mc chicken we have dark black hair and she ate most of it ....
Great service and very  friendly. Great music and nice decor.   The food was great, just need permission to get in the bathroom. Too many bums, druggies, and homeless may it unsafe.
Cold fries, old taste in the Big Mac, and bums asking for money. Avoid this spot, the one on Wilson Way is so much better.

Heroin needles in the bushes? Check! More bums than the pigeons and stray cats? Check! Food from taco bell on the floor of the dinning area? Check! Cold breakfast and warm oj? Check! This has got to be one of the worst McDonald's out there. I know it's Stockton and all, but seriously this place can do a lot better. Don't give the bums anything, if you give one something the others flock to you and want something too. My advice, stay in the car and go through the drive through and split as fast and as far as you can.
Very nice workers. Fast and professional and clean.  Fresh coffee too and i especially like the new renovations. Give it a try its good for groups too
Very dissatisfied with drive-through service.  My order took forever, and when I did come it was wrong.
Completely packed, then they go and screw up the order. I'm standing here 5 minutes later it will be 3 minutes for your order to ne done .

I ate in the restaurant. My order came out quick, and exactly as I expected. Workers were diligent, and friendly enough. There's a lot of homeless people that loiter in the lobby, so you have to tell the cashier if you need to use the bathroom, and they buzz you in. I could see where that could be a problem, but the bathroom was immaculate.

Today I just ordered a Sweet Tea and the girl who took my order slammed my change into my hand and rolled her eyes at me. Today wasn't the only time I ended up having her take my order too and it makes me wonder how did she get hired.. Just stating my opinion. Need to be happy about where you work whether you like it or not.

How can they forget the go gurt for the happy meal when they ask you to choose from the go gurt or apple sauce. My nephew was so sad seeing that he didn't have a go gurt in his happy meal. Come on employees is called a happy meal for a reason. Very simple task how can you forgot that! Poor service!
The employees are always rude and the place always smell like crap.  They let homeless people in and its not a pretty sight while eating there

Went in for dinner but used the bathroom first since we drove up from Los Angeles CA and immediately told the bathroom was for paying customers only. So we left since they were rude! No stars and never again at this location.
Not the best but conveniently near the freeway.  Be careful there are always people loitering and someone always waiting and panhandling at the drive-thru.

Dear Hiring Manager; stop hiring girls you want to sleep with and find some that have at least an average IQ! What part of NO SUGAR in my Mc Coffee is so difficult to deliver; especially after asking me three times! Arghh!  With so many people Out of work, why not hire someone who isn't looking for their first job and may have some common sense?

I don't understand why this McDonalds is so substandard. Its a relatively busy area, lots of people coming off I 5, so really, why they get everything wrong is beyond me.  I've asked for a Sausage Mc Muffic without egg and every single time...there's the egg.  I once waited a half hour for two hash browns. Do not recommend.

I'm not going to hate on this establishment too much even though it contributes to high levels of obesity and promotes a plethora of unhealthy eating habits in my low-income community; all of whom already experience alarmingly low rates of healthy, organic foods and are continuously lured by $1 menus. Though because we are facing difficult economic times, purchasing from such a menu has been greatly understandable (and I can't hate on that).  But it is unfortunate that accessing healthy foods has been monetarily difficult and almost non-existent, especially in this part of town.  For more on such matters, look up "Food Justice."  Anyway, because I was either a) drunk, or b) tired from studying, I ate here.  Although they newly renovated, which makes this building one of the nicer establishments on this side of town (the truth!), and somehow makes everything inside seem "better,"  they still can't get my order right.    So don't come here.  Because not only do they mess up on your order (though their fries have been the best I've tried at any McD's...just sayin), but they clog your arteries and promote food inequity in your city!!!!!!!!

Okay, where do I begin? For one, the lobby is almost always dirty, foul smelling, and full of flies. Definitely could never eat inside. The employees are almost all your typical "this is my first job" McDonalds regulars. Which there's nothing wrong with as long as they take their job seriously. Unfortunately many of them don't.   I always despise coming to this location because besides my last visit they always mess up my order. Case in point. When the "New 1/4 pounders" cake out I really liked the habanero ranch one. So I go in to order one in a meal and get my food and drive home. I get home and open the box to realize they had given me a regular double 1/4 pounder. So I get back in my car and take it back with the receipt. They then replaced only the burger with a Double Habanero Ranch burger. Hey, a free extra patty and cheese, no complaints there (though they could've given me new fries as well). So i go home again and proceed to eat the burger and I almost threw up. The patties SQUISHED in my mouth as I chewed the first bite. GROSS! The insides of the patties were bright pink. I spit it out into the box and proceeded BACK to McDonalds again. This being my 3rd time at the store that night I was furious. I threw the bag onto the counter and demanded they refund my money. The manager then states that she would make the burger herself but i wasn't taking any more chances. Then as the manager processed the refund she tried to give me it I'm cash. I paid with a debit card, so that's how I want my money back. She then proceeded to try and argue with me about this. Finally she relented and reversed it on my card. Worst experience ever.   Not to mention that San Joaquin County McDonald's have become very greedy lately. 2 sauces for 10 nuggets, but 3 for 20?! To add creamer into an iced tea i have to be charger for an Iced Coffee thats $1.59 more?!  Even something as simple as getting my own straw isnt allowed. McDonalds has really went downhill, as impossible as thatmay sound .
They messed up on my drink. The drive thru took forever and was filled with trash. There are also homeless people knocking on car windows begging for food/money. Not going back to this McDonald.
We used the drive thru 2 times in the past month. Both times my order was not correct. French Fries are always hot and fresh.

I got 2 happy meals for my sons the lady ask me if I wanted a boy or girl toys and I said boy toys cuz its for my sons and I made a lil joke about how I didn't want my sons playin with girl toys and she asked its I wanted bbq sause and I said yeah I got back to my house and my kids ways like mommy whys u get us girl toys and no bbq sauce  lol I'm never goin back there
I agree with all the reviews.. This place is not the business. They stay giving wrong orders and have so many young teens who DO NOT know what they're doing...

I ordered at the speaker/menu board, paid at the first window. So far so good.  Come on, it's Mickey D's, how bad can they mess up, right? Ummm... got to the second window, and the girl said she needed to see my receipt "so they didn't mess up our food"???? OK gave her the receipt, and she handed my 11 year old a 1" high ice cream cone. He was peeved, but he's a good kid, so he didn't complain. Then she handed me my sundae...OVERFLOWING!!!!  5 stars for the random homeless guy in the parking lot who offered me some of his napkins... zero stars for the ice cream that SHOULD have been in my kids cone dripping all over my shirt, jeans, car, etc. Boo!!!

you always get screwed through this drive through...no matter how many times you give the order...they always mess it up...come on Southside...get with the program...I know this McD's has a high manager turnover...hhhhhuuuuuummmmm I wonder why...no one wants to take ownership for their mistakes...let alone correct your order

I come through here and a couple other locations nearby, I'd say this is probably the second worst McDonald's in West Sacramento. I don't make super complex orders. Cheeseburger, extra pickles. Everytime I check it's only two pickles and they're about room temp. Instead of making a fresh cheeseburger with more than the standard two pickles, they give me the premade leftover cheeseburgers and slap a special order sticker on it without even squeezing an extra pickle into it.   It's been proven to me that it's literally too complex to factor in between 1 and 0 modifications to a burger with, at most, 6 ingredients. This is either idiocy, laziness or apathy, and if any of those are the case, I'd also be concerned about the state of the sanitation and whether the people preparing food know they can't skip washing their hands by spitting on them and slapping a special order ticket on them.  If you're the type to do simple special orders, or expect fast food to be faster than browsing a grocery store, finding your preprepared foodstuff and waiting in line stay far far away. And stay away from the other one on westcap too. The amount of shirtless meth addicts fighting in their parking lot is shocking, and I think someone stole their golden arch.

30 minutes in the drive through. Asked about the wait and they said they have to take care of the people sitting inside first before they manage the drive through line.  I thought that made no sense at all but no wonder their drive through line was over 15 cars long. Efficiency is key and they don't have that here. Probably faster to go to a further McDonald's than wait here.  Just thought I'd share their process here in case you were in a rush and decided to stop by.
Worst McDonald's got my order wrong and I waited 30 minutes . When we pulled up to the window no one greeted us. The guy in front of us got tired of waiting and drove off.
This place is an absolute Shit Hole! Dirty as all get out. Slowest workers in the world. Tweakers galore! Yep won't be back to this dump!
Rude staff! Horrible service !!! Wait is so long . Gotta wait at the speaker for 5 minutes . Lady at the drive thru very unprofessional .

They suck they never have anything ever .they are always out of something and they can never take any coupons because they don't know how to use their machine and it's always a kid that doesn't know how to take an order or forgets to give you something they're out of everything they just told me they're out of pickles how are they out of pickles

Slowest McDonald's ever, even to get one fries I waited 7 minutes . I don't like coming but it's the closest one to my job. And when I got my fries they were cold. -_- I just looked at the lady and shook my head and drove off.
I spent 25 mins. in the drive thru...........................that says a lot about a business.

I've always been passing by this location for my morning cup of coffee.  And sometimes, for a sausage and egg mcmuffin when I need a morning breakfast.  And the staff are fast and efficient that I could be in and out of the place in five minutes...tops!  I won't say anything detrimental as the place is a fast food joint...it's as good as it gets...and it gets my commendation.  You want five-star service from a fast food place...you're barking up the wrong tree, buddy!  Be reasonable...  My only complaint is not in the store but outside.  Panhandlers greet you by the door every now and then...

McDonald's needs to send secret shoppers here regularly because it lacks quality and their standards. I've frequented the drive through and indoor dining several times. Each time was a long LONG wait. I recommend your orders be repeated and double checked before you leave. Frequently understaffed for their business needs or just poor overall management. The staff are friendly though and the dining area was clean. Pass this one by as there's another McDonald's down the street.

The worst! We watched our order fall off the screen. The manager filled it from our receipt then wadded it up and threw it away. There was one person in the dining area but no clean tables. The whole place looked sad and neglected. I won't go back and neither should you!

Took in a coupon that came in direct mail ... they would not honor it. Gave me the "have a nice day" after I questioned their refusal. Instead of trying to solve the issue they blamed their corporate office. Went to Subway ... they always support their advertising.  MM

This is probably the best McDonald's that I've ever gone to. The service was personal and friendly. They were a little on the slower side, but all of the food was fresh and great tasting. I would rather have fresh food than something a few minutes quicker and much worse. We even had someone bring us our food and make sure that we had enough sauces and napkins. Restaurant service at a fast food location. Good job.

I went into this McDonald's today about 4 PM and stood at the counter for 5 minutes waiting to order while two employees discussed football. One of them looked over at me and then continued on with the conversation ignoring me. I figured maybe they weren't the ones that were taking orders so I waited patiently. Another employee in a red shirt who I figured was a manager came up and put something under the counter and looked at me and walked away. When finally another customer got in line behind me one of the two employees who were discussing football which was way more important than helping customers finally came over to take my order. At that time I left without ordering and will never go back to this location again. Absolutely disrespectful staff.
Waited 30 min in line while cashier helping person in front of me kept leaving the customer to go screw around in the back while the other employees are working so slow in the back. I walked out...
Always slow no good customer service ..I went in and asked for cookies and said oven is broke but seen some on box but I need more sounds lime just didnt wanna cook them
Worst dam McDonalds  Literally 30min to get 4 ice coffees, they didn't apologize! Not a friendly or "fast" restaurant Never coming again & don't recommend this location to anyone!!

So I'm literally sitting here for ten minutes stuck between the first person and the last person. They haven't taken my order. Only told me to "hold on". It's bullshit. Especially when you back out and they're looking out the window laughing. Definitely won't be coming back.

This McDonald's has never messed up my order not once, unlike the one down the street on Westacre.  The crew working here seem to be an actual group and not dreading coming to work despite the slack they may get. If I'm in the mood for McDonald's or my son makes his demands for some then this is the one I drive my happy ass to. Now in the same parking lot as Raku sushi which means I instantly leave the drive way wishing my social life was more in tuned to my needs as a sushi lover and not a single father lol.
I hate this mcdonalds. Every single time I order in drive thru there is always a long wait before I even order and there is no one in line. Never had an easy smooth drive thru experience here.

Don't judge. On road trips, I always get the cheap gas at the Arco across the street, the Ikea is down the road, the gas station sells Powerball tickets, and if I need a clean bathroom stop and to score free wifi and to pump up my sugar with a $1 ice cream sundae, I'll be here in the corner being all nonjudgmental.  Having said that, I'm not so happy that there are pan handlers that parked themselves right by the front door and ask for money as I come in and out.

The order Intercom is ALWAYS broken. When I get to the window I almost ALWAYS repeat my order. I gave this particular Mc E D'z one more try and went inside and they told me in front of slough of people that my card doesn't work and was declined when I have a boat load of money. I never take the time out to review unless it's absolutely necessary. Please please review the workers and the TOTAl MANAGEMENT of this place. THUMBS DOWN

This is the worst McDonald's I have ever been to. You are basically abandoned at the register while a half dozen people scramble around doing anything but waiting on you. Complained about a fat Latino guy who ignored me to a woman who said she was the manager (Victoria) but he must have been a relative e because she never called me back even though she said she would. Slow, slow, slow and every order ill have something added or subtracted from what you ordered and if anyone actually says thank you or hello or goodbye, consider it a day to play the lottery. This is where they send the workers everyone complains about and lets them pretend to be managers or supervisors. AWFUL!!!!!!!!

Super slow.  Every time.  Slowest McDonald.   Not sure why they take so long for drive in.  You could be sitting in drive through for 10 minutes and no movement.   I see some employees roaming around inside but...

I go in to order a chocolate shake to go for my hubbie and the chocolate syrup  is way low so I give it back and the the server...it's barely even brown tone so he looks and sees the mix is all but gone so refill's it.  I guess to make a new one and refill the supply.  I ask him...may have the extra since he's just going to throw it out anyway and he says no.  I just wanted to give the extra milk shake to a homeless person outside.  He then tells me he needs to get the next person in line...I'm cool with that and patiently wait for him to fulfill their order and them ask again may have the shake that was going to be deposited into the trash anyway.  The whole time..no eye contact.  I ask him again and he says...yah if you want to pay for it..I said..well you're just going to throw it away...I'm all...well may I speak with the mgr then ?/??? and he says he's the mgr. Are you kidding me ????!!!!  Dude doesn't even have his little name tag on. Complete dick...hate's his job..probably isn't qualified for anything else but just blew me off.  Put the hometown, fast food that has been established and old as dirt in the pile of trash....that could have contributed the shake to me to give to one of the many homeless in West Sac but dude...just kept on with again no eye contact and a big NO, can't have any graciousness to the hot mess of cold, hungry homeless outside.So just another example of America  that hates to work, no customer service skills and ungrateful to even have a job.The turn over here at this location is over the top...this guy obviously has no people skills but he'll be there till he gets burned  out and continues in the meantime to invoke his crappy attitude on the public.  He's probably a complete dick to his teammates at work as well as the public that buy food here too..Do us all a favor the leave dick

Ok first off i have to say here in w.sac we have 4 mc donnalds and they are all lacking in one form or another. I dont expect 5star food from mcds. At this lication the service sucks and they cant ever get the order right. I always order the same thing. A mc double plain w xtra pickles only. Ive gotten all kinds of variations. And a large sweet tea with light ice. (today i got diet coke with hellA ice) Sometimes i come for ice cream (im lactose intolorant and i can eat their  without problems so its not real milk ) but the machine is usally broken.  PARKING;shared and not secure Customer service: SUCKS FOOD: poor quality Cleanliness: idk i dont usually go inside unless i have a problem.

Worst McDonald's. No customers inside and had to wait 20 mins in the drive thru after sitting at the intercom for at least 3 mins without any greeting or acknowledgement from the staff. No apologies for the wait. Terrible staff and the chicken tenders were old and dry. 0 stars.

This review is primarily based on the lack of food hygiene standards by one of the employees. The Waze app directed us past this McDonald's. It was a bit ghetto, but I've seen 'worser' (intentional typo to prove my street cred-or lack thereof)! We were tired from a long drive, and in dire need of some breakfast. After paying at the window, I saw one of the male employees dumping the hot coffee machine's filter into the trash. He then grabbed a new coffee pouch to refill the machine. Instead of tearing the pouch open like anyone else (knife, scissors, or bare hands), he bit down on the corner and ripped it open with his TEETH! This was probably an isolated training issue, but who really needs to be trained not to open food products with your teeth? Isn't that common sense?! He did this with no shame, no hesitation, and in clear view of the drive-thru customers. I was too tired and hungry to complain, especially since none of us ordered any coffee. I later reported this to the store manager. If you decide to get a meal here, you should probably get coffee elsewhere!

Worst McDoanld's ever. I'd give them zero stars if I could. The service sucked (20 minutes in the drive thru line). They had no ice cream which I was told when I ordered so I ordered a strawberry banana smoothie only to be told at the drive thru window that they are out of strawberry banana smoothies. So I got to wait 20 minutes for nothing. Total joke!

McDonald's is McDonald's, but this location is pretty bad. The only reason I go here is that my work is like 5 minutes away and I'm hopelessly addicted.   The Sweet Tea always tastes metallic.   The Drive Thru service is ridiculously slow. It takes 15 minutes to get an order out. Maybe they're training new people, but everytime I order something, they always ask me to wait for a few minutes before they figure out what I even ordered. I think going inside might be faster.
We stopped by the other day and we received pretty good service. This is a decent place to stop now as we have seen much improvement here with speed and quality.

To make a long story short...this was my second incident with this location....the first time i let it slide. This time I ordered a 20 pc nuggets. They were old and cold. I went back in to replace them for fresh ones...and the lady behind the counter dumped the old ones back into the pile...grabbed a new box and scooped the old ones back in! All this within plain view! After that... I demanded my money back. Avoid this place at all cost.
Literally in the drive thru for 8 minutes and it never moved.  I reversed,  left,  sat at the light in front of the building,  and when i finally passed it the line still hadn't moved. What a joke

Worst McDonald's ever a few weeks ago went for my grandkids and half the order was wrong then went on Saturday 12/31 there was two cars ahead of us we waited 10 minutes finally got to the window they handed us one coffe, 5 minutes later they came back and handed us an oj then 5 minutes later they asked us to pull up front and wait. We did not we got a refund and left this is the worst McDonald's in west Sacramento

I am never the one to leave a bad review or complain about someone, but this employee of yours really gave me a motive. Her name is ELIZABETH. I assume she is in a management position as she was wearing a slight different uniform as the other employees. It was a tan colored shirt with a scarf, maybe yellow, I am not sure. So after a longer than usual wait without being acknowledged she finally calls me, I did not make a fuss about the wait since I too have  worked in customer service industry, i understand. So I proceeded to make my order, I wanted a pick 2 for $5. A fish fillet and a Big Mac. Her response "we don't have Big Macs". I with a confused face asked "is this at this store only?" She said no we don't offer the Big Mac as the 2 for $5 , instead we have the quarter pounder. I proceeded to say "I have gotten it at other stores" her response "Go to another store" I cannot believe what she had said! It was the first time I had ever been felt offended at McDonald's. I would really hope you take this complaint into consideration, talk to her and let her no this is NOT the right way to speak to a costumer if you want them to return.
Always fast & friendly service. Stop here whenever I'm in west Sacramento. Having the Big Mac meal.

Very careless staff  I was just there and ordered large fries a coke and a apple pie pulled up at the first window which i found out wasn't the right one as this lady waved at me through the second but there were no signs i applogized the lady for that and paid for my order..i was waiting for my receipt but the lady didnt give me one and walked away i waited at the window until this guy finally noticed me and gave me my receipt..before i could even get a chance to ask for some ketchup he walked away and the receipt he gave me wasn't printed properly and waited again at the window for a little bit lost my patience and left....i have just noticed some other bad reviews for that particular McDonald's location but looks like the MANAGER or person watching over customer service of their employees does not give a DARN

None of the McDonald's in West Sacramento take the national McDonald's coupons that you get in the mail and none of these 3 locations honor the specials that you see on TV either. They just tell you, "sorry, we don't take any coupons or we don't have those specials." I've also noticed that their food prices are higher than at other McD's in Sac. Even the McDonald's in Davis take the coupons marked for Sac. and the greater Sac. region. Plus, with the exception of the McD's on Lake Washington Blvd. the other 2 are in very bad areas of town with a lot of scary folks hanging around outside. Absolutely not worth going to.

This is in specific reference to Breakfast All Day options.  I'm one of those people that have waited 30-some years for McDonald's to finally make breakfast available anytime -and it's disappointing to know that a sausage McMuffin is available for lunch at 1pm, but it isn't going to taste very good.   I've tried to give the benefit of the doubt by trying breakfast for lunch at least a half dozen times, now, since the Breakfast All Day campaign began; and it is not improving.  In the beginning, the staff was simply overwhelmed and couldn't keep up with the demand for breakfast items.  Now, the breakfast items taste as if they've been held in a warmer too long.  The McMuffin I ordered today -the edges were so burnt and tough that I ended up picking the edges off -ending up with nearly half the muffin.

Ordered two sundaes and they came out fine. I usually eat them until they start melting to a liquid then I don't eat it anymore because of the white milk taste. They had some flies flying around, and they were annoying as usual.

This is the one on West Capitol at the Harbor Blvd intersection across from the Goodwill shopping center. It's horrible.  I prefer the Reed exit McDonald's over this one, so it's been well over a year since my last, just as disappointing visit. This recent visit (February 2012) was the same signature disappointment; I don't know if the person ordering supplies just orders too many or if the crew cycling through supplies isn't doing it right or if this location for some franchising reason gets their supplies from a different vendor, but it's awful! The bun, every time I've come here, has been kind of gritty and stale. The meat's no prize either.  This is the grossest McDonald's I've ever been to in my entire life. No consistency with the rest of the chain - avoid this one.

If you want to get cussed out by the manager then this is the place to go. My husband went there a few days ago to buy dinner. He also had a coupon from the booklet they mail to try the new  Mc Bites. Well the cashier told him they don't accept coupons. So my husband asked to speak with the manager to see why. The manager looked over and said "We don't take those fu**ers!" So my husband paid and waited. While he was waiting he noticed the Manager talking smack about him to the other employees in Spanish and he was pointing at my husband too. (my husband knows Spanish ) So we will Never ever go to that one again!!
smells like hobo and does not take coupons. one of the worst i have been to.  makes the bakersfield mcdonalds look really classy.

McDONALD'S CHARGES $ 1.00 FOR A CUP OF CITY TAP WATER !  The counter person gave my wife a 6 ounce cup of water with her big mac and fries (I ordered a large smoothie).  I asked for a larger cup of water.  One dollar.  One dollar?  You must be kidding.  Nope.  Sorry.  Company policy.  The soda / pop dispenser didn't have water available, so no water refills.  Sorry.  Company policy.  This company policy is not only stupid (no more McDonald's for my wife and me), but it is also predatory, and in my opinion, immoral, if not unethical.  Congratulations to McDonald's for joining the big banks, airlines, and cell phone companies in The Great Let's Nickle And Dime Our Customers To Death Championships.  McDonald's deserves a minus ten stars.
tell the workers to wear hair nets when making salads...nothing worse than eating and finding a freak hair in your food...5/2815..at 11:20am

today is 3/15/2014 I was in a rush and against my better judgement I went to this location over the one on Reed Ave across from my job. I ordered  the sausage mcmuffin meal with a carmel frapp no whip extra carmel- and extra blended (meaning with no ice chips everytime i sip). I got to work the mcmuffin was burnt, black and extra cripsy- the hash brown was cold and taste like it was cooked in old fish grease. and to top it all off the carmel frapp was more than extra blended it was blended into a form of a soup- a clear soup that is. everytime i give them a try it fails- i end up spending $8 on breakfast that i took two bites out of. and lets talk about the horrible customer service at the drive- thru- the first time i went in january of this year i ordered a carmel frap extra blended with extra carmel - i got to the window to pay she handed me my frapp it had whip cream on it and ice chips the size of cushed ice- i handed it back to her and told her i wanted my money back after she didnt try to persuade me to get another one she gave my money back and as i was driving away she yell GOOD RIDDENS!!!

We'll haven't been the first to write a review in a long time, I feel honored even though it's just Micky D's.  Here goes nothing... This place is garbage.  Na just kidding, it's alright.  Basically went here (which is only every 4-6 months) because I had a coupon from a base ball game I watched in West Sac at a River Cats game.  I went here to use it, and I come to find out that the coupon is only good for Sacramento locations even though I received it in West Sac.  HOW RIDICULOUS!  I was like whatever I'll just pay for the thing I came for.  Then as I was eating my burger only came with one patty even though I ordered a double.  I explained the situation to the rep and she understood.  She then put her hand out for the burger and I said just make me another single and we'll call it good.  But instead she took the burger (not even eating) and through it away.  WHAT A WASTE.  Then they made me a new one with two patties.  I was like AH, WAY TO WASTE FOOD.  So that was my experience, can't wait until next time.  Yah!

Very nice staff... order was wrong  Just landed 11PM from Missouri, exhausted, lost my ATM card, THANKFULLY McDonalds takes Apple pay THANK YOU!!! Got back to the hotel and fries were missing, wrong drink... Didn't call the store, was far to tiered to be bothered. They were really nice I'm sure they would have fixed it, too late, too tiered.

I would give it 0 stars if I could. We go to this McDonalds a lot and we've came to realize the customer service absolutely SUCKS. Even the manager is ruuuude. They charged me $1 extra for sauce even though I had a 4 piece nuggets and large fry. We came again hoping it was just that person and ordered the limited time Sweet N Spicy Honey BBQ tenders and they were delicious! Then we came tonight and these were our tenders. ‍ Thanks for the no sauce tenders.

I unfortunately feed my daughter at least twice a week from McDonald's. The order is ALWAYS the same. Hamburger Happy meal, plain with only meat and bun, no French fries, double apples, and cup of water. The crazy people at this McDonald's, including the manager, Antonia tell me this is against company policy. In my daughter's NINE years of life, I've never been told differently.  I can't even fathom why this was an issue. Thankfully this is not our regular resturant so I won't hopefully deal with this again but really, shouldn't have even had an issue about it.

I would have given less then 1 star but that is my only choice for a yelp review.  This is going to be short and sweet.  This morning 8/1/2018 I stopped in to grab a Big Breakfast Platter and to my nightmare surprise I also got a dead smashed fly firmly attached to my sausage.  So I had to throw the whole thing out.  As for the resolve to this matter the manager offered to give me a new meal.  AS IF I WILL EVER return to this place again.

I'm at the drive through window for the second time I asked for a quarter pounder with tons of mustard,tons of lettuce,and tomatoes nothing else  They forgot the tomato skimped on the lettuce and mustard and had the nerve to charge extra ! They also put their nasty cheap cheese on it  They said sorry on my return trip in but no other compensation  I Remember The Old Days when every experience to Macdonald s was positive I'm not happy  I know to somewhere else next time

I don't live near but we made a trip to Ikea & of course they had crazy food court lines & my kids thought they were starving so we ended up at this McDonald's & so far out of all the McDonald's I've been to this is the SLOWEST unless you're in drive-thru! We had 3 PLAIN cheeseburger kids meals...and they looked at them like they were foreign & not sure what went in them! They served the 5 people behind me & I still waited....I though maybe they were waiting on fries but NOPE they were cold & over done. I guess if I was a rude person I would have made a stink about it but I don't because what's it going to change? Avoid this McDonald's....go to the In N Out Burger next door!

We ordered UberEats from this McDonald's and everything sucked. Usually we would order from Richards Blvd, but UberEats changed some things within the last few months. We called because we couldn't add MacSauce to our double cheeseburgers through the app and the employee that answered was rude! Our food was cold and not good. We will not order or go to this location ever again.
For any of you wanting a vanilla milkshake this is NOT the place. Worse yet...I did not recognize what this milkshake contained!! VERY unusual flavors/additives.

No wonder Carl's Jr is kicking your butt.  I just paid $6 for a quarter-pounder, which I remember from my youth as being a fairly substantial burger, but is now just a slightly larger cheeseburger.  It took 15 minutes to get through the drive through and I am now 'enjoying' the single saltiest burger patty I've ever run across in real life.  Yikes.

I ordered a sausage egg mcmuffin meal with a hazelnut iced coffee. I was drinking the iced coffee and spat out a piece of cloth that was in my drink. Absolutely disgusting I didn't even finish my meal because I was so disgusted. I don't know how that cloth got in there whether it was from wiping down the work area or what but this is unacceptable.

This is the worst mcdonalds ever, i gave it a few more chances one time my quarter pounder wasnt cooked through and was disgusting the patty was all broken into pieces the drinks didnt have any syrup and just last night my boyfriend went there and had the worst customer service he had a coupon and the cashier did not enter it in so we ended up paying for the whole thing and we brought it up to the manager and he said there was nothing he could do basically rushed him out of there and than received this

This is absolutely one of the worst McDonald's I have ever been to in my life. Don't be fooled by the location. Even though it is located in a nice shopping area, they are horrible. On two separate occasions they have gotten my order wrong. I will describe the most recent time: I ordered a coffee and asked for a little bit of ice to cool the coffee down. The girl filled the entire cup with ice making the coffee cold. I did not ask for an ice coffee and made it clear what I was asking for. Once that was fixed I asked for ketchup and she gave me three packages for five sandwiches. Lastly, I ordered two egg sausage muffins. They gave me eggs with ham instead of sausage. In addition to that, I found a hair in my sandwich.   Bottom line I will never come back here and I would advise others to do the same!

I'm only giving one star because I have to. My husband went through the drive thru, and ordered 6 sausage, egg, and cheese mcmuffins. They gave him 6 Mc griddles. I called to see what I could do, and the manager didn't speak any English. She had no idea what I was saying, or even if there was a problem. I do not recommend  here.

Dining in: April 27th.  Big Mac & fries were as expected okay to eat.  Tables in the dining area needed to be cleaned. Cashier said "what"? For each item I tried to order. Wait time to receive food was over 10 mins. I tried to eat my daughter's unfinished kid's meal cheeseburger to not waste food. I could not eat it, it was awful I spit it out. My husband tried too and he spit it out as well. I can only describe it as what I could guess what card board would taste like. Never returning here again. I will stick with Wendy's at least their burgers taste good.

I'm not going to lie. My secret junk food craving is McDonald's fries.  Thank god I actually live at least 30 minutes from the nearest McDonald's. However, the real reason I stop at this little intersection quite a bit is because I can do about 48 different things in one go to break up that long drive from Tahoe to the Bay area - get gas, use the bathroom, grab a snack. McDonald's also has clean bathrooms and even better, the free wifi I use so I don't burn up extra data to check weather updates, book a room, check on directions, etc.

Hamburgers and French fries should be pretty easy right? Unfortunately, that is not the case for this McDonald's team. They originally gave us the wrong order, did not believe us until the original receipt was provided (we did not leave the drive thru line), and then did not have French fries ready. We were asked to pull ahead and that someone would bring them out in 2 minutes, however, after 5 we had to go in after them. Disappointing to say the least.

This McDonald's franchise is the best I've been to. Great spot to stop on the road to Tahoe. The store is clean and well presented, the staff are friendly and cooperative with customers and each other, and the food was best quality McDonald's at it's best: crunchy fries and a delicious burger. From my experience, this was a great team and a great store.

Went too dine in today , mind you it was 100degrees outside.. Well it felt like a sauna in the lobby..I had to leave it was making my kids feel sick and uncomfortable because it was hot in there. They actually said the owner refuses to buy a,new ac unit. I'm going to have to look into calling the health dept. What if someone passes out in the back where the staff cooks. ?? Lawsuit waiting to happen.

Ordered: Sausauge egg mcmuffins Quality: fair Cost: average Service: fair Satisfy: No Would i go back: Not if i dont have to  There have been multiple occasions where I try to order the 2 sausage egg mcmuffins but on one of them, put the sausage patty on the side. Apparently this request is too difficult for the staff to comprehend and the order gets completely messed up almost every time. It has happened so many times that I stop complaining or stop ordering it completely. I know its just a fast food resturant but still, is it that hard to make a simple sandwich?
Its ok here. they have good customer service, but sometimes they give me like seriously cold food and it pisses me off!
