I gave them a star but really they deserve none. All we wanted were some shake Fries. Yesterday they gave us both packets of buffalo and ranch, but today they had none??? Did we get the last ones yesterday? because i don't think so. They also put two hash browns in one bag?!? What are you doing? And they were slow. I don't recommend going here.

Placed an ordered TO GO. The woman asked how many sugar and cream for the coffee so they can put on the tray. They not only forgot the coffee but the sugar and cream. Went in our car and realized my hamburger w/ no pickle isn't in the bag. I had orders that FIRST. Go back in and said my hamburger isn't in the bag. Manager goes to the cashier and pointed out that I didn't PAY for one. I told her to order me one while I go BACK to the car do get my wallet to pay for an order they forgot. I paid $1.08 AND I had to wait yet again. Placed to go things to do. Get it right people!!

Consistently the slowest drive through ever! There is a reason I do not ever come to this McDonald's I have now been sitting in the drive-through for 17 minutes! There are two parking places reserved for drive-through customers with large orders, orders that are going to take a lot of time why are these not utilized? I've been sitting here waiting for the first car to get their food. And once you're in the drive-through you are stuck!
All I ordered was a 6 peice nuggets and a frappe. I got 5 nuggets. Do they not know how to count?  I've worked at McDonald's before it's not hard to put 6 nuggets in a box.

1. Found a wadded up Halls wrapper on my food tray after I was done eating. 2. Restroom sink had toilet paper all over it. 3. Fluid everywhere  4. Emergency lights were hanging by their wires. 5. Stall door did not have a latch on it, and I walked in on a guy using it.

I gotta admit I'm not a fan of this corporation but one day I was running late and I stopped by this Mcdonald's on the way to work. I have to admit the food was the same as always but the customer service was incredible. Smiles! the kids working there actually had smiles on their faces and seemed happy. Great customer service and my order is always right. What can I say. I'm a sucker for great customer service.
Convenient stop on the way to Ikea to grab a Diet Coke and ice cream cone.

I'm Lovin' It! Yep, McDonalds has introduced yet another burger item to their menu worth acknowledging, recommending, & getting again...their Angus Third Pounders! LOCATION: Off Hwy I-80; Eastbound exit Reed Ave. Shopping center area w/ IKEA, In & Out Burger, Jack In The Box, & more. Located in shared parking lot w/ Shell's Gas Station. MICKEY D'S: 2 drive-thru options, large walk-in dinning restaurant, clean, & spacious. If you order something in drive-thru not ready by the time u drive to 2nd window, it's a "Can you please pull fwd & wait by the sign" vs "Could you please park over there". Staff welcoming w/ smiles, friendly & prompt =) McD BURGER TIME: Ok, so BF & I are on the road & need to recharge our body w/ some food. Perfect, we see the "golden arches" & take exit of freeway. We both have seen the ads for their New Angus Third Pounders, so decided why not. I got the Mushroom & Swiss while BF got Bacon & Cheese...I kid you not our burgers looked EXACTLY like their ad! yelp.com/biz_photos/UTtN… The better part of this story, they TASTED AS GOOD AS THEY LOOK! We don't believe in "driving while under the influence", but if your "influence" is enjoyin' one these babies...oh man, be careful like me, but enjoy it! So yes, we'd get McD's Angus burger again & recommend u give 'em a try! SCRUM-DIDLY-UMPTOUS!
On the go. Best Dollar Menu. Most of them are open 24hrs. Sweet.

They had cold fries so asked then to remake them but other than that it was your typical McDonald's. The interior is hella 90s though so not updated at all lol. The most important thing was that they were open on New Year's Eve and I loved that.

I pulled up to drive thru speaker. There was only one car at the drive thru window. The cashier said she would be right with me. Five cars pulled up to the second speaker and ordered and pulled ahead while I was still waiting. This is very poor customer service. Next time I will just pull ahead and order at the window. I cant just sit there and watch other customers order.

Did you know McD offers Chicken and waffles? Order it! It's actually a chicken patty on a McGriddle, it is sweet salty goodness rolled into one!! Also try another secret menu item, the Land, Sea and Air Burger! It has a beef patty, chicken patty and fillet o fish patty piled high on a bun! Get all your cravings with this all in one burger! Check it out!
My 7 year old says the nuggets were great!  Sad that they didn't have Root Beer though like other McDonald's.

even though this mcdonald's is fairly new, i have always felt that there was something dirty about it. sure enough, a few months ago, some friends and i were on a trip to sf and one of them wanted to stop at mcdonald's on the way. she bought an egg mcmuffin and found an unknown curly hair in it halfway into eating it. barf. thank God, i opted to get my breakfast from starbucks down the street.

Ok, I've heard bad things about McDonalds, but this one is cool. The workers are so nice, the food is good. The food is awesome, except the chicken nuggets. The first time I got them, it felt kinda hard. This deserves 4 stars.  I get why there is bad things about this restaurant! I guess the food is amazing!

I live in Riverbank and I would rather drive to Oakdale or Modesto for McDonalds. This place is SLOW. 20 min for a double cheeseburger and fries. I ordered in the drive thru and was told to pull through and wait out in the front of the store. I ended up going inside and asking for an estimate on the wait time after 15 min and the manager said "Nope" I asked for my money back and he begrudgingly gave it back to me.  There were 6-7 people working and nobody could explain why it was taking so long. The drive-thru was backed up into the street and the parking lot was a mess with people waiting for their orders.   Nobody knew what to do..or where to park and wait. What good is having a drive-thru when you are basically turned into a carry-out customer. It would have been more bearable with an explanation and some basic customer service. I will never eat at this McDonalds again. If I wanted to wait for 20 min I would have gone to a real restaurant.

My daughter was hungry after the Riverbank Parade last night, and she chose McDonalds, didn't think we would be sitting in the drive thru for 20 minutes. Seems that they don't know how to figure out there two drive thru ordering system. The cars finally moved after a long wait, I stopped at the 1st intercom and the car behind me stopped at the 2nd to order. They asked for the car behind me to order first, so than we just sat there for about 5 minutes while my 7 year old is like, are they gonna ask us for our order so we can move.. Still waiting, I finally say, I would like to order please, because who knows how long we would of been waiting there for them to figure out no one was coming to the window. Then when I got to the window they started reciting the order behind me's order. I said, no sorry not mine. Then paid for mine and moved on. Seems like this is a regular thing because the guy had at least 8 drinks waiting to be passed out. Pathetic, even for a McDonalds.

I have never seen a drive thru line so long. The speed at which they are serving the line is utterly unacceptable. I can count more than 15 cars in line and it's moving at a rate of less than 1 car every 2 minutes. Unbelievable!   I mean what can they really be doing in there? Seems like this overflow of customers should be the foremost priority. I would normally give up and go inside but I was more interested in reviewing their drive thru so here I am.   I took me more than 5 minutes just to get up to the screen to place my order. That's not ok. The person taking my order was stressed out too. They were in so much of a hurry that they forgot all the important pleasantries generally used when conversing with another human being. I truly felt rather unwelcome.   The food was just your average slopped together McDonald's so they didn't make up anything there. Bottom line, if you are looking for a quick on the go bite to eat try somewhere else. You will not find that here.  I literally spent 20 minutes in the drive thru. Unbelievable

Extremely slow service. Ridiculously slow. All I wanted was a coffee and it took 15 minutes, also I saw staff members now doing their job and just standing or talking to each other joking around around knowing that there was 4 people in line. The only reason it only took 15 minutes for me to get my coffee is because two customers in front of me got tired of waiting and left before ordering.

I am speechless. I went in today to get 2 egg & cheese biscuits WITHOUT bacon, which I continuously repeated. I also ordered hot cakes, hot hazelnut latte and 2 hash-browns. I pull up and my hazelnut latte is cold and tastes like coffee (not sweet) with whip cream trying to to cover up as a hazelnut latte like CNN covering the fake news. So I tell the girl in a polite manner and the manager steps in and ask me to pull forward because they ran out of milk? Like really? It's 8am how did you run put of milk already when the population of Riverbank is less than of the population of Amish county. Then I pull forward and I wait and wait ...and wait. Then I decided to go in, mind you I looked like Chewbacca since I had no plan getting out of my car. I go in and the other manager (trying to look all polite like Samantha from Sex and the City) asks me: "you're the one who was missing her Hot Cakes?" I'm like noooo it was the Latte. Then I go back to my car and sure enough, Hot Cakes were missing as well as my Latte. Pater noster give me patience. So I was really mad because this is not the first time that they make mistakes so I blame me for coming here and giving these people a chance. You guys, I'm gonna eat the bacon and if God punishes me since it's against my religion to eat bacon, McDonald's can take responsibility. I need to tag ACLU because McDonald's needs religious lessons that Muslims, Jews, and Catholics on lent don't eat bacon. I'm done coming here. If I come here then I'll come with a pig asking you guys to roast it for me, that's how adamant I am in my breakup with you guys. I have called the 1-800-complain and there was a chick who was eating and chewing and not listening to me. Wow. You are all fake news.

Worst McDonald's I've ever been to. The lady working the drive thru who took our money was unfriendly, and had no idea what she was doing. The food was absolutely horrible. This is the last time we'll be eating at this mcdonalds.

Worse service ever. They just can't seem to get it together. Lunch comes n you still have breakfast menu up with the comments "we don't turn it" Really, because what can I see to order. This is with the drive thru. They need some intervention on how to provide better service without the attitude. Cars are backed up n you just sit n wait instead of hvn them pull forward so others can get thru the line.

This isn't fast food.  It takes 15 plus minutes to go through the drive through and it's worse if you go inside.  This McDonalds is clearly understaffed, the employees are over worked and to top it off the prices are higher than other local McDonalds.  If you are driving through just go to the one in Oakdale.

*Update- waited 20 minutes for our food while everyone around me or ordered behind me & got their food before us. I had to go up & ask where our food was. They seemed bothered that I would ask. We had kids meals so not sure why people after us with same types of kids meals would get their food first. I know for a fact had I been in drive thru it wouldn't have taken that long. It's like they don't care about dine in customers! To top it off they didn't get the kids meals right! This McDonald's is horrible, the only thing going for them is the play zone. It's the only reason we keep going to this store.

I went through the drive thru, there were 2 cars in front of me (this was at 10:30am), I ordered a drink and a burger, by the time I got to the 1st window 22 minutes had past, I asked, because of the long wait time, was anything going to be done to the amount of the purchase, the girl at the window gave me attitude, then laughed about me having to wait . I left and went to Jack in The Box, across the street, was served within 2 minutes. I will never go to this location again!
Soda machine stops working. Paid for my drink and no refund offered. Last time at this worthless McDonald's.

Extremely SLOW SERVICE!! I've notice since there was a ownership change things are a little different there, employees are so unprofessional, service is horrible and let's not talk about the drive thru wait in line for over 15 minuets and once I get to the window I'm still told to wait at parking space cause my food is still cooking!! Seriously!! I understand things take time to cook but I also think it should not take over 20 minutes to cook a dam burger!! Definitely terrible service! Never seemed to happened when the old owner was in top of things btw the worker just came out to hand out my food and is now missing my drink!! And now I have to WAIT LONGER for her not paying attention.
horrile place the general manager is so rude started to yell at me and my sister very unrpofessional place very unhappy
Tonight is the last time i will eat here will  drive into modesto.  The girl working drive thru is the most ruddiest  person i have ever spoke to   get respect lil girl. Manager didnt care at all.

Had lunch yesterday and I couldn't believe how many flies were in the establishment. Other McDonalds I visit, don't have that many flies around. I mean I can understand a couple but there were more than 10 in the restaurant.  Also restaurant temp was not cool. Seems that there is always something wrong with this particular McDonalds. I keep hoping that our experience will be better but never fails to disappoint.
We have great and friendly service every time we come here. The kids play area is nice and clean, and they even offer sanitizing wipes. They also have a kid movie playing on the TV in the kid's area.
Indoor play area is wonderful for the little kids.Restaurant is very clean. Service was good. Food came out hot and tasty. Suggest cleaning playground area daily. Will be back soon!

Service is so horrible. There can be so many workers and still take over 15 minutes to get my food and I only order just a few items. It's pretty ridiculous. Most of them seem like they don't even care and they NEVER apologize for taking so long or offer anything for your time.

First time at this location and it was a terrible experience.  My chicken sandwiches took 15 minutes to get.  There were another 10-12 people waiting for their items.  Manager was unprofessional and rude.  I know it's minimum wage but I expect some type of customer service.  Steer clear of this location at all costs.  You have been warned.
Ordered a 20 piece nuggets for myself I asked for barbecue sauce when I got home there was absolutely no barbecue sauce in the bag

Went through the drive thru today.  I ordered a coffee, with my meal.  I sat there and watched the guy put his finger right inside my cup? He then hands it to the girl, and she puts her finger right inside the same cup?  WTH?   Yuck!  I paid for it, then threw it right into the garbage!  My tea tastes like water most time?  I'm DONE wasting my money at this location!  Last time I go here! If I could give zero stars they get it!  Unsanitary!!!!!!!!!!!

My food was good except my LARGE FRENCH FRIES there was only a quarter of the LARGE FRENCH FRIES if I would of ordered a SMALL FRENCH FRIES I would of had more FRIES what a joke I didn't want to go back because I was home already so I called and I spoke to the manager and I told her about it and she was questioning me if I ate the FRIES that was missing and she made it seem like I was trying to get something for free what a joke I was thinking of going there and give her $3 so she can buy her self a HAPPY MEAL I am never going there , ALWAYS CHECK YOU FOOD BEFORE YOU LEAVE THE PARKING LOT

So here we go again I'm serious no one should be buying food here they should be shut down and no one answered at the corporate office there was a fly in my frys so gross there was pieces of the flys body on my frys

Coming here is a pain in the ass. They screw up your orders, when I ask for ketchup they give me a pathetic amount. The fries are so damn salty and the lettuce is brown! Seriously? Get your act together!

This place sucks except for the fries and the soft serve.  I'm talking all mickey D's worldwide.  Except for in Hawaii where I got linguica and rice on the menu and I suppose other countries where the menu is better. If i could i would give half a star.

I came through and ordered my regular egg white delight meal and when I got to work it was wrong. I called and spoke to mcdonalds employee and they said come by when I could and they would remake my order. I came through this morning and the manager refused to correct this issue. Not okay. I will not be back.

Agree with another reviewer who said you get what you pay for. I totally agree. A few nights ago I went through the drive thru after work and ordered a mcchicken with cheese. However, when I got home, there was no chicken in my sandwich. Just bread, cheese, mayo, and lettuce. Really disappointed.

It's McDonalds, so really you can't complain to much ya know?  You get what you pay for and when it come to how long it takes using the drive thru, it's really is hit or miss.  But if you see that the line is going out of the parking lot and basically into the street, one would think to park and go inside ( probably take the same amount of time anyways) or drive on over to KFC, Jack in the box, Taco Bell , Carls Jr.  Still $1 buck for a large drink and under $4 for mini meal. All in all it's decent, a quick bite and still McDonald is the only fast food French fries I like.

This McDonald's  sucks! They mess the order up 9 out of 10 times. The workers their do not take their job seriously at all. And I wonder why? The managers are to blame. The managers do not lead by example. They are rude too. This place is a joke. I have wrote a complaint to the McDonalds corporate office...praying for a response. I think if new management would run this Mc donalds then this place could be a great Mc Donalds.
How can you legally sell a hamburger that's cold, and it was eaten there, not carry out. Should not the meat be a little warm to fight bacteria. What a waste!

How lovely is it to.come up to the window and have somebody sitting on the window ledge with their back facing you? Well, go through the drive thru and find out. This jack a$$ did not budge, just kept rotating on his butt and did not say a word. Pretty lame. Thats worse than a slap to the face.

Ordered 5 Frappes and they got 4 of them wrong. They made a big fuss of me trying to use legit 1$ off coupons I got from them. I had 3 coupons and it said, one per item. The lady in charge came over to address us to tell us no about the coupons then went in the back, came back and said we could use them. She (Nicole) was Visibly irritated and began setting down the food we ordered aggressively. This is when I realized the drinks were wrong. At this point I requested my money back. She wanted my husband to sign a receipt and when he refused she acted like the Mc Donald's Police and said, fine! I'll write down, refused to sign. LMAO We were still dealing with the manager,"Nicole" and she was so flustered that she gave us 4 extra dollars along with our coupons. Lol! The workers were horrible. They had zero customer service! As far as I see it, that extra money was for our inconvenience.

If you enjoy eating like shit and celebrating the praise of mediocrity, come here! Lord knows I love me some syrup infused breakfast sandwich with a large cup of sugar water. Get in my belly!!! Also, it's always the perfect solution to when you're in the mood to be treated like shit and get exactly what you didn't want. I give them two stars for the magical secret portal you enter through their mop closet. I highly recommend. That shit was a trip!!!

This mcdonalds is TERRIBLE for people with allergies! They don't work with you or substitute an item for people who are allergic to gluten. Unlike every other fast food place around here. Even though they HAVE gluten free subsitutes that cost way less then the gluten item. It's bad business and shows one more reason this mcdonalds has TERRIBLE customer service and it is loud and clear that it starts from the top! Come on mcdonalds. You can do better than that!

Don't even think about going in anytime near closing. The night managers regularly kick you out 30 minutes before close, to top it off they have to be the worst group of managers at any McDonalds anywhere.  It's been verified by numerous people that they are rude and get orders wrong.   WARNING : DO NOT ENTER THIS ESTABLISHMENT!!!!!!!!!!!!!
They have the worst customer service when it comes to the drive through. The only good thing about this Mc D's in their play yard for toddlers.

Drove through the drive thru last night around 8:45 because I had a late night craving for some yummy, hot fries. My friend and I each ordered a 6 piece chicken nugget meal with fries and a soda. We got our food quick and were on our way. Cool, right? Nope. Both the chicken nuggets AND the fries were lukewarm at best. We got such speedy service because they gave us old food! Ugh! There's nothing worst than cold fast food. If it wasn't raining so hard, I would have driven back and made them remake my food.   WORD OF ADVICE- check and make sure your food is hot before you leave (especially if you go through the drive thru) OR ask for fries with no salt. They automatically add salt to fries after they cook them so if you say no salt, they have to fry up a new batch.

Today when I went to the McDonald's in Riverbank on Patterson and Oakdale, I was given small sodas instead of larges with my large combo meals. Then the boy told me to pull around front to wait for my meals. I declined politely, but he told me I had to pull around if I wanted my food because there were customers behind me. I explained it was only one car, and I ordered and paid before he did, therefore I should receive my food before he did. I mean, it's fast food, not "fast for some people, but you have to wait" food. I'll also add that I didn't have any special requests that would make my food take longer, so I thought I was being pretty reasonable.  He said that the man behind me needed his food and I was rude for making him wait. When I told him I would stay put, he promptly told me to return my drinks for a refund. When I was refunded, I was given almost $2 less than I had paid. I pulled around and went inside to correct it. I had my receipt that proved my payment of $25.12 and also his refund receipt that proved he had given me back $23.54, so there was no way they could dispute what I was owed. Luckily, a (MUCH NICER) employee correct the refund and apologized. As I was leaving, I could hear her telling him he could not force refund a customer. I understand it was one employee, but I refuse to ever eat at a McDonald's location again if they continue to force customers to pull around to wait for their food. This is not the first time I've been told to pull around, and not the first time I've been given lip about not wanting to, but it will certainly be the last.

This location has the WORST service that I have ever encountered at a McDonald's. I live about 3 mins away drive time and have tried and tried to like the service here but, to no avail. I had to wait 20 min in the drive thru just to get a hot caramel sundae. Went to get hot fries got cold ones. One time I ordered a sunday with my friend in the drive thru and the manager came over and told the employee they were too large , threw them both in the trash and made the employee re make them right in front of us. Talk about rude and wasteful! Had to wait while ones that were too small were given to us. Once bad service ...ok. Twice bad service...I should have known better. Three times bad service... what am I thinking?? Four times bad service... Why do I keep doing this to myself?? I went today with my in laws because they invited me again after at least a year of not going because it has been so bad... Dbl qtr pounder came as a big mac. 20 piece mcnuggets came as 10. Crispy chicken wrap came as grilled. Absolutely ridiculous! Attitude came free when person who took the order said  "I know, I took the order." No "I'm sorry let me fix that" or "Let me make it right" She just came back to the table with the correct burger then, wait for it... then the correct nuggets. I will NOT recommend this location to ANYONE!!! Take heed of this warning now or you too will soon be posting on this website as well. Don't say you didn't know any better!-----Good Luck!

Horrible!!! Service sucks! Food there sucks!! Always cold and like leftover! Filthy dirty disgusting!! This McDonald's is NOT even an option for me anymore!!! Will starve before I ever go here again!! I should have stuck to eating at Unos!!! McDonald's......"Your F@#king Out!!!"

I use to work here.  Your gonna get someone who bytches and complains at some point.  And if the Noobs aren't doing there job, then ask for the manager.  Like people in general or what not or people's teens have not worked at a fast food restaurant.  So stop complaining and if you don't like it go to another one, then again.. Not every Mcdonalds, or any other fast food chain is perfect. .. and there is no such thing as PERFECT!!
filthy dirty play area for kids they can care less/odd! and usually those workers have kids of their own too, treat others how you would want to be treated.

This is the closest eating spot to my house. But you can never go wrong. Nuggets, fries, and a McDouble. Never ate inside always do drive thru. Lines are never long. Quick service. Never had an issue that's why it deserves 4 stars for a fast food spot, the only down fall is of courses the ice cream machine was down often. But then again.. that's like McDonalds thing.

Once again my order is wrong once I get home. I ordered the new mushroom swiss burger and even though  the tag says mushroom swiss, there are.no mushrooms and crispy onions instead, the wrong sodas AND ONCE AGAIN NO ONE IS ANSWERING THE PHONE.

I ordered 4 sausage mcmuffins and a large coke today around 3pm in the drive thru. What I received was enough for me to never come back. I got an iced tea not a Coke. Then when I opened the sausage mcmuffins they looked and tasted like they were left over from breakfast. Disgusting! I know its fast food but seriously 5 hour old breakfast sandwiches? Very disappointing.

If you love fries, DONT go here. This is the THIRD time I have gone here& ordered Medium Fries& they gave us half fries in each medium fries. I'd give them 1 star, but they have good customer service& this is the only McDonald's that hasn't forgotten any food products I have ordered.  EDIT: I changed it to 1 star because they forgot the pickles in both Double Cheeseburgers & DID NOT PUT lettuce in both McChickens. NEVER coming back.

When we went to a mc Donald's outside of sac and we ordered the egg mc muffins they gave us the special without the app on the phone!  So this morning I went to this one on Lathrop and ask for the same thing, egg mc muffin and asked if there was a special on it I was told yes  but you have to download the app in order for me to get that price.  So I just walked out.  I don't understand why one can do it but another can't or won't, that's just plan bullshit!  You know what they can do with that app, yes shove it up their asses!

If u have a special order, make sure u ck it before u leave the drive thru. My son is lactose intolerant, he order a filet o fish without cheese.... this is what they gave me.   Useless idiots working here.

Do not go to this location. So disorganized every time I go there. I guess I never learn my lesson.  This location struggles to keep up. The restaurant seems dirty every time I'm there. McDonald's seem to be putting focus on so many other things except the basics.

If I could give them zero stars I would last time I came they forgot my hash brown that I paid for I called them they said the next visit id receive my hash brown and a drink for the inconvenience won't be stopping here anymore they told me they didn't write my name down so they couldn't do anything about it coming from a person who manages two food establishments that isn't okay at all will not be returning

Well, it's a mcdonalds so not there's much else to really say. Everything pretty much tastes the same as any other McDonald's. Not my favorite fast food and definitely not one I would normally go to but since it's close to my job, I go here every so often. The service time is alright but I think the cleanliness is definitely below that of other McDonald's, hence the 2 star rating. The bathroom is pretty dirty and there's always flies in there. You could definitely just drive a little further to get some other fast food.
Food was good but the flies were horrible.  A lady sitting next to me had 3 flies on her. I can't believe I didn't notice the flies before I sat down.  Pretty gross.

Don't usually go to McDonald's and now I know why! Cold stale French fries after I specifically requested for them to be made fresh, still cold and stale!! Very annoying. To top that off the little blonde girl helping was so much more concerned with chatting and laughing with coworkers and less concerned with customers (every time she's helped me she's been this way) that I have genuinely gotten disappointed to see her be the one to help me.  Even though it's convenient not sure I will come here again even if it's just for tea   Update: definitely don't like to have to make fresh fries haha Sorry I don't want old stale fries  Night crew at this location has a crappy attitude

Their team members really need to step it up, how hard can it be to work in Mc Donald's. Everything was messy, starting with my order was wrong and the tables where so dirty I had to change my order to go.

This place used to be great when they first opened and so close to my house. But not sure what happened lately, wrong orders, cold food and this evening I had that late night craving. Ordered chocolate chip cookies and was given stale cookies that looked like they were in someone's lunch box...lol
This is the slowest McDonald's ever!! They made me wait over 10 min for one muffin. Plan on waiting forever if u come here.

I am completely livid. I waited in the drive thru 20 minutes stuck between several cars and couldn't get out. I finally started honking my horn and that's when they finally woke up and gave the gentleman in front of me his food. When I asked the young man, Santos who was at the window what the hold up was, he closed his window on me. Never have I been treated so disrespectfully at McDonald's. I told him I was complaining, he proceeded to give me a 510 number and said I can call him if I wanted to. I am now late for an appointment because I was trapped at a drive thru and they had absolutely no care in the world. It was absolutely ridiculous!!

I verified my order twice at the intercom and twice at the pay window they didn't know how or what to verify. Went back in and got the order corrected ... they didn't even bother to check for a price difference or a compensation for being horrible.  Fasted drive thru with no accuracy

"Lindsey" was incredibly rude to us. Our sandwiches were not what we ordered. I don't know how you mess up  a mcchicken, but apparently you can. Lindsey rushed us and was not at all polite taking out order. Go to another McDonald's, even food this cheap isn't worth your time here.

This has got to be the worst McDonalds I have ever eaten at. I have tried going three times since I moved into the area. Every time I waited in the drive-thru for no less than 20 min. My order was incorrect every time. I order a McDouble with no cheese and every time it has come with cheese.  The last two visits I checked the order before pulling away. Both times the cashier gave me a hard time for checking my order. When I pointed out the order was incorrect he acted like it was my fault and asked to see the receipt. I gave it back to him showing him it said no cheese and waited another 5 min to get my order back.  The fries are always ice cold and the drinks taste more like water then soda. If you live in the area drive the extra 2 miles and go to the one on Daniels.

Wow McDonald's literally almost every 1 star review on here talks about how rude your manager is. This woman should not even be working with the public let alone managing the place. She is ghetto trash and has no respect for your patrons. Are you really that hard up workers???

Im standing here as im writing this review, only because its taking forever to just get two artisan grilled effin chicken. I mean can I laugh and not write a post. Make it go ha ha ha ha. I'm being irrelevant

DC your a joke you must work for this nasty place, this  is the worst McDonald's i have ever been to in my life and the even bigger joke is that they have a full time janitor, after talking to some of there staff they said the manager doesn't buy them soap or cleaning supplies that's why it always smells ,if they keep there bathrooms like this just imagine where they cook your food hmmm this place needs to be shut down quick. Had a sweet tooth tonight at around 10pm so decided to hit up McDonald's. Ordered 1 fudge sundae, 1 more fudge sundae add strawberry, and 2 cookies.  Problem 1 - had to repeat order about 3 times at drive thru speaker/menu  Problem 2 - get to first window and the woman  asked me to remind her my order. I had to repeat it about 3 more times here.  Problem 3 - I already knew my ordered was gonna be "fudged" up. (You'll get the pun in a minute). I look down at my receipt and on the fudge sundae with the added strawberry syrup $.40 I also see xtra fudge $.40.   No problem I say to myself I'll just ask if they can put that extra fudge THAT I PAYED for on the other fudge sundae. I tap on the drive thru window before they make these difficult to craft sundaes and show him my receipt explaining the issue. Wow, the look I got from him, he didn't have a clue what I was asking. He then responded to me "That's just how the register rings it up, it's weird. Sorry" ...........  What a half ass explanation , he was just trying to shoo me away and not help at all. I know I know, I may sound petty to leave this extremely long negative review over .40 cents, but goddam that was annoying.   So in the end I didn't get any extra hot fudge, and to top it all off they were out of nuts. O'well enjoy the 1/5 stars.

The dining room is filthy and the soda machines and counter are sooooo sticky, couldn't even set soda down to put a lid on The employees are just standing around talking. Zero customers so they have the time to clean, but no cleaning and they want $15 an hour.....for what?

Went there to grab breakfast yesterday, ordered our meals and went to sit. All the tables were dirty, so we had to wipe it down ourselves. No big deal, wrong.  As we sat, noticed FLIES GALORE IN RESTAURANT. Landing on all the dirTy tables and OVER STUFFED TRASH BIN.  We told the cashier that they are out of covers for cups and tables needed to wipes down. Nothing was done. So everyone had to keep asking for covers for cups.  We finally received our food and everything was COLD.  We went to let them know our food was cold, and cashier took food somewhere in the back and bag was warm but was cold SMH! Like he just stuvk the bag in a microwave for 30 seconds.  WOW!  Waited on my large Caramel Machiato and got a small.  We were DONE at this point.  7 family members walked out with REFUNDS.  I have never experienced this at any McDonalds ever.  Lots of kids behind the register, I totally have to blame their trainers and management!
I'm happy there's a mc donald's around this area. Such a relief to have one close from home and work.

Horrible and rude service. Won't return. And, they have the nerve to charge for ranch to eat their shitty food with. Just came through & the order taker Zach was super nice & helpful. Even when we added something last minute at the window. He was just genuinely nice and since a lot of people in customer service nowadays arent it made my day :)
Currently in line at the drive thru for over 20mins. It's unreal how bad this place sucks lol

It is continually amazing to me that the employees, no matter the shift, are always talking loudly about their personal lives despite customers standing, waiting to place orders. Is there ever a smile? Pleasant greeting? Consistency in their methods? Oh! If your order is $5.75 and you hand them a $10 bill, don't suddenly whip out 3 quarters after the cash drawer opens because they won't know what to do.   The girl looked like a dear in the headlights. Automated order taking machines would have me leaving this store happier than dealing with this staff. If they know you from school or the neighborhood they are all smiles for sure though. I am in here at least once a day if not more. I think managers should get back to teaching minimum wage workers respect, manners, how to be pleasant ...you know...actual customer service. This will prepare their employees for better paying jobs whether they stay with Mcdonald's corporate or elsewhere.  Managers at this location are no better, or worse, btw. Judging by the two star rating here on yelp I am not the only one dissatisfied but management obviously does not care and is taking no steps to improve, probably because the dollars are still flowing.

So I'm sitting at the drive thru 10 minutes before close and even as I'm posting they are supposed to be open but manger told her to not take any more orders...strange why don't you change your hours then?

Honestly worse McDonald's in Manteca. I've been here a few times. Every time I come my fries are disgusting. It's obvious they sit there all day. This time I order a sweetened tea. Also of course my nuggets are cold.

When will they fix their specialty coffee machine?! It's been a while when all I want is a non-fat mocha! On a side note, I would go to Starbucks, except my Starbucks account got hacked last year when some jerk transferred 300$ to other Starbucks cards. I couldn't get through to Starbucks customer service to dispute the transactions (phone & email) so I am boycotting them! So, my only drive-thru fix is McDonalds, and they let me down too

My money was rejected for being "too old"! Not counterfeit or deteriorated, just "too old". I was given the explanation that they are getting a rash of fake money and this money was "too old" to take...  If I didn't live nearby and have a car full of hungry kids I would probably skip this McDonalds altogether.

Given the choice, I'd prefer to purchase a snack from within the Valero gas station store. This location is filthy, with flies all over. The staff is slow, unprofessional and rude. When asked if they would please wipe off a table so I could eat my food. After waiting longer than necessary, I asked for someone to clean the table myself. FINALLY, the manager came out and cleaned the table off. Unprofessional, shirt not tucked in and all. I spend more time shooing away flies than enjoying my meal. Oh, and the food. I waited for my hash browns for quite some time. They burned them, forgot about them, then brought them out after finally cooking them well. By then, I was finished with my meal and asked them to forget about the hash brown.   Maybe service will be better when I go again, IF I try again?!?! I don't know.

Worst Mcdonalds in the area,  possibly of all time.  I don't think they've ever got my order right.   The Valero gas station, or CVS pharmacy next door are probably better places to eat. If I could give lead than 1 star I would
Check your order I just got a red box and picked up some breakfast  no hash browns. My fault should have double checked. Not worth walking back.
This McDonald's has never, ever given me my correct order. Once I ordered a chicken sandwhich and had to return it because instead of a patty they put a chicken nugget on the bun.
I always have a pleasant experience, open and clean waiting area. Has clean restrooms and a gas station next door.  It's a typical fast food experience for me. Wifi is a plus.

This is the worst McDonalds I have EVER been too. The drive thru was crowded so decided to walk on Big Mistake. Iv never been to a McDonald's that made me wait in the drive thru for more that 15 minutes like this one. If you like to hear the manager be VERY MEAN TO THE WORKERS THAN GO enjoy your meal while everyone is getting chewed out and looks miserable working there I honest to god feel for these people she's the same manager the one from Walmart on main street McDonalds and she did the same s&$7 there nobody deserves to be treated that way I'm talking about the middle eastern lady she just nags but doesn't do crap poor workers to put up with a boss like that and get paid the wage they get as if they don't have enough issues that they get from rude customers

This McDonalds sucks. I mean, how long does a customer have to stand right in front of you before you acknowledge them? Apparently longer than 15 minutes. I wanted a diet coke..that's all. There's always one item or two missing in our order EVERY SINGLE TIME!!! Then the fries are always old and salty. The ice cream machine is always down. This time they forgot both the apple juice on our kid's happy meal, my kid's arent happy!

Can I give half a star?      My only complaint is that their ice cream machine is always "down" an hour or so before they close. It's not right I think they should keep that shit going till they close. Maybe they will get more business.
Got this from drive thru. The service was average and didn't had to wait too long for my order. Came home and saw hair on my food. Wasted time and gas. Di

Terrible service. Food was cold. They were laughing it up making fun of drive thru customers. Dinning room was dirty. I know fast food is fast food, but this is appalling. When my husband brought me a chicken ranch salad, I asked him if he took a bite of my salad. Oh, and when you call their number that's listed it sounds like a fax machine. So there is no way to bring this matter up except for yelping it.

This is probably the worst drive thru in America. I waited nearly 20 minutes in the drive thru line and when I arrived at the pickup window, prior to getting any service, the server walked away for over 5 minutes!!! Meanwhile, my order was sitting there long enough that by the time I got it, the fries and burger were cold. When I asked to speak to a manager, the server, the one who'd been gone for 5 minutes, said she was the manager! Incompetence at every level. The opposite of fast food.

Ugggh, McDonald's is not great food.  It's not even cheap food any longer.  It's just there.  I go to McDonald's generally when nothing else is available in a town.  This time, a friend had been bugging me to go.  This location was opened recently.  It should have all of the newest, finest equipment, and be clean, yes?  The windows were smeared so badly, it was like someone soaped the windows on Halloween.  When I went to get my iced tea, not only was it at the end, but there was tea all over the counter, apparently from all four of the dispensers.  The iced tea also had a slightly soapy taste.  The prices were reasonable but for a bit more, you could go to Chili's and get something with real taste.  You can find things on the menu with taste, but they're rare.  McDonald's now is about the Happy Meal generation and getting kids from 13-30 to stuff their faces while they remember their happiest moments of life here.  Cynical?  Yes, I am.  I'm not sure what the big deal was to create a new store.  They eliminated the Playland, giving Del Taco an edge.  At least, the service was friendly.
This location allways disapoints... dont know why i keep coming maybe because it convenient then releize it wasnt.

This location has HORRIBLE customer service WHY I go back is because it's normally for someone else.  ORDER always wrong and then they say you can come back and we'll replace it, that was the whole reason for going through the drive-through to be FAST and save time.  WHY would anyone waste time and gas to come back for THEIR ERROR! They OFFER NO remedy ever!!! They want you to ask for them to correct the mistake and then they want to argue!  McChickens wrapped so horrible that mayonnaise was on inside of the bag and 2 of 4 orders were just open.  I speak with the manager GINA that says sorry you can bring it back for a refund but I'm not replacing the order, I wrapped them and they were fine when you left here! Since she was the manager she says you can speak to the Asst. manager but I'm not replacing the order along with the drink she forgot to give me.  So I speak to the Asst. manager Isha she pretty much says the same thing and then says fine I'll put your name on the list to come back for the 2 sandwiches that were falling out of the paper and the soda.  AFTER arguing with me that I didn't pay for a soda ... I say I'm looking at the receipt, she says well I don't know what receipt you're looking at but I have that same order and there is no soda on it.  I say is there a number for the order on the receipt ... OHHHH Yes, ok right that was another order  Yes, I see the order ok your name is here to come back to get the soda you never got and to replace the 2 sandwiches.  I then ask for the corporate number as well ... she rudely and without care says I don't know I think it's on the receipt, look at the top or the bottom, I think it's somewhere there.  I ask is it an 888 number YEAH that should be it.  I say is it a voice mail or will someone answer (This is a manager NOW) I don't know I've never called it. I say Okay thank you!  Because about a year ago I had a problem with this location and I LOST it ... I think I cussed the manager at that time out for pretty much the same thing!  It is NOT worth me losing my cool but their callous behavior and rude service need to be addressed.  I'd have to say they are the WORST Fast food location here in town!

My sister and I just recently visited this location earlier this afternoon. We ordered two hot fudge sundaes, a well done fry and an ice water via the drive through. The service was not very kind at the first window and it took at least a full minute to complete the transaction, which in my experience is very peculiar for McDonald's.    Upon receiving our order we immediately noticed our sundaes were only 2/3 full with hardly a spot of fudge. We were going to let it go. Then when we returned home I opened the bag to have the fries. I was not happy. They were the opposite of well done, they were cold, mushy, and at least 20 minute old fries. This may be a pregnant lady being picky, but it seems the only thing they got right was the ice water.

Worst McDonald's ever. It took ten minutes to order my food and there was only one person in front of me in line. Took 15 minutes to get the food and it was cold. Tables were not cleaned at all in the 40 minutes I was here. There are no straws napkins or any condiments out for people to get you have to go to the counter and ask and there isn't a person readily available to ask. Finally when you get someone they act like you are an inconvenience.

Poor slow service, filthy floors, tables and bathrooms, cute and friendly counter girl but lacked intelligentsia, never been in a restaurant that had a time limited of 30 minutes. Check out the sign!!!!! Really
Worst customer service ever.....don't go!!!! I asked which one the tea?  Answer..... Don't know.... The tea is lighter

Stopped going to this location completely because of the fact that the local druggies like to "camp and bbq" at the side of their driveway. Didn't mind it until I witnessed the guy who own the cart start harrassing someone unprovoked. I wish the city could step up and help that shopping center clean them out.

First time dining at the "new " restaurant in Manteca. Homeless guys are camped out next door. I entered the restroom to find one homeless guy shaving his head in the sink. I asked to speak with manager because restroom was a mess and needed cleaning. Never spoke to her and she checked restroom and left. While dining the homeless men kept entering the dining room filling up on soda at least three times in the thirty minutes I was there. This is a blight and McDonald's needs to take action . First step is to replace management!!! NO LONGER GOLDEN!!!

Extremely slow drive thru. I arrived at 12:15, which in understand is lunch time. What I don't understand is the 5 minute wait to order, then the 12 minute wait to pay and get my food. By the time I got it, it was cold. There were periods of time the line didn't move for several minutes. While the girl that took the order and money was pleasant, they need to work on their efficiency and timing. I will be driving to Ripon instead of this location going forward.
slowest drive thru ever. Don't ever go to this drive thru unless you are willing to wait at least about 10 min to get your food. Ugh!
Very modern, probably remodeled in the last few years. Staff member wasn't very friendly, but besides that it's a great location. Nice seating area, free wifi. Right off of 99.
This McDonalds has a girl working the drive thru that is model hot. I've been a few times and they always hit the chain standards. It's very modern and has a two lane drive thru.

It's sad mcds used to be a nice place to stop no matter where you were. It's Sunday night.  Bathroom are filthy.  Trash cans over flowing all over the floor.  No tp. In the dinning room floor is super sticky  everywhere. Around soda  machine area dried soda marks everywhere.   Trash on the floor in dinning room also (straw wrapper, French fry wrappers).   Not short staffed either. I heard this is a new mcds too. So sad to me.   One star for the 1.00 iced teas. Super pricey other wise.

I saw this manager or supervisor throw a spatula looking thing towards another employee because she didn't hear him calling!! What in the world is that about!!? This isn't China! I believe his name is David cherry maybe, anyways please stay away from McDonald's in Manteca ca. I'm serious the employees are some what rude and the managers are lazy when the times I come in lol I'm sorry for all the negativity however I'm speaking the truth. One other thing the food is no longer cheap the dollar menu is gone and the food is waayyy over priced! Whats up with that?! Stay away!!!!!!

Only been there once, but it was terrible, and they had Fox News playing in the dining area.  Will not go back, especially since there's an In-N-Out across the street.  It should be telling that, late on a Friday night, In-N-Out is PACKED to overflowing and McDonald's is a ghost town.

I don't know what happened to McDonalds. Ever since they moved from across the street, and went to the 2 drive thrus, they can't seem to get the orders right or the money. This time at lunch time, my burger and fries were cold. GROSS

My family recently went here to order breakfast at night time. They told me that they don't cook eggs at night for the big breakfast and they only cook the meat and pancakes. I would not recommend going to this McDonalds and they should not advertise that they serve breakfast.

Stopped here on our way down the state. Just ordered a few coffees and burritos. Their frappe machine was down and so was their smoothie machine. They were out of orange juice and wouldn't give us a water cup because they had no ice. The lady at the register was very rude. The burritos were not rolled, just laid in the paper and put on the tray. My sister asked for no whipped cream on her mocha and they filled all the extra space in her cup with whipped cream. My dad asked for salsa with his burrito, didn't get it in the tray, so he went back up to the counter and was ignored for a few minutes. Until he finally reached over the counter to get it and the employees started yelling at him. Overall, this was a terrible experience. I would NOT recommend this place to anyone ever. I know fast food has low expectations, but for this one you shouldn't have any!
daleshka gutierrez works there and she gives the best service ever, ask for her !

My mother and I came thru the drive thru today twice, the first time we got food and drinks and the second time we just bought a Large sweet tea. My mother is anemic so spends a good part of the day eating ice.  Ice and water are supposed to be free at  ANY restaurant.  The kid at the first window was polite and quick but the lady at the second window had a big attitude.  My mother asked for the tea to be  served with light ice.  And then asked for two cups of ice for herself.  The employee gave my mom a dirty look and then said  "So you want LIGHT ice in your tea AND you want TWO Extra cups of ice."  "Yes."  "So you're getting THREE drinks for ONE?"  "No, my daughter's getting tea and I'm getting ice."  My mother then explained that she had anemia and that she eats ice, the employee rolled her eyes and handed over the tea and ice. My mother asked if she could speak to the manager,  and the window lady told her  " No. Well if that's what you want to drink..."  "Yes,  I want to speak to your manager about your attitude."  The assistant manager was called over and gave some bullshit excuse about how McDonald's is supposed to charge for cups of ice even though ice water is free because somehow McDonald's loses money giving out ice, all while the other employee is arguing she doesn't have an attitude and we're trying to get free drinks. Assistant manager said that she was going to let it slide this time but would charge us next time,  implying we did something wrong and she was going to be gracious and let us off easy.   What should have been a quick transaction turned into a 3 minute long argument all because the drive thru lady doesn't like to give customers cups of ice. We may have ordered one cup of tea in that visit but we are still paying customers and deserve to be treated as such.   It is California law that ice water must be free in restaurants, so how am I going to believe that excuse?

Not always (Fast Food) but hey, they never messed up my orders which is a big deal for me. Some places are just awful in getting your orders right or giving you what you paid for. This place is excellent in communicating to get your order right every time.

I get my meal to enjoy when I get home after work only to pick up the bag and discover the burger has leaked grease onto the upholstery in my vehicle. The patties are tossed on unevenly and the lower bun is oozing as if it was dunked in oil. So much oil it leaked through the box and bag.  Don't be salty when a machine that does the simple task correctly takes your job.

Trash can in parking lot overflowing and covered in flies. Inside is small for busy location but clean. Cashier didn't smile much and seemed irritated when I asked to change something on my order, she assumed the size of drink before I asked so she had to change it on her register. Shouldn't have been a big deal as I was the only one in line. Food came out quickly, they were bagging everything for take out even though most were dining in.   Food was hot, fries were fresh and right amount of salt. Filet of fish was good but sloppily made. Half of cheese was out of sandwich laying on the box and tarter sauce was all over outside of bun, doesn't show in pic as it was under cheese that was outside of bun. It was still good, just sloppy.

driving criss-cross through california and can't avoid the numerous mcdonald's stops..this location no different and finding fairly standard...testing out the signature crafted burgers...specifically, the bacon smokehouse....make a meal with soda and fries for $7.99 ($8.61 after tax)...at first glance, noticing the handsome shiny bun...sprinkling of battered and fried onions spilling off to the side with thick bacon pieces...taking a bite, and finding it sweet, smoky and savory as advertised...flavor is intense and too strong...beef is dry and lifeless...overall texture is lacking....stick to the classics...

I go through drive thru and order a large meal with a coke. I get home which 3 min away and i look in my bag and my frys were half way filled and cold. Plus i waited 10 min for those cold half filled frys. The staff should be less worried about chillin with there coworkers and more worried about there jobs.

It's hard to avoid stopping at a McDonald's on a road trip down the 99. Even if you aren't going there to eat, inevitable human functions like the need to pee or stretch will make you get off the highway, and there's a McDonald's off of seemingly every exit. The Ripon location is a common stopover for me when traveling between Fresno and Sacramento because of its placement on the journey.  Now, I could never rate a McDonald's above three stars. Even if the service is fantastic, which it rarely is, or the place is clean, which it rarely is, the food will never, ever change. Ripon justifies my highest three star rating because the handful of times I've been there, the food I've ordered has always been hot and served up quickly and the employees have been pretty nice despite some sometime crazy lines of hungry customers.   Oh, and they have a decent pisser for those looking to pee in the rare McDonald's bathroom that is actually stocked with all the basic amenities.

Four stars for McDonalds?? I don't do fast food often, but when we are on the road, a quick pull off the freeway always ends up at McDonalds.  :)  Well, we stopped here for breakfast on our way to Yosemite. For roughly $5, I got a coffee, a super muffin, and hash browns.  The coffee was very weak, reminded me of coffee on the plane.  I must say, the food was good for fast food, I had no complaints.   The location is clean & swift. The staff was friendly. What more can you ask for on a quick stop on the road? Oh yes: The Bathrooms. They were clean too.

This was probably the dirtiest McDonald's I have ever visited. It's on a busy intersection so a bit difficult to get to but that's understandable. The bathroom was absolutely filthy. The toilet I used had a broken toilet seat and overflowing female products disposal can so smelled bad as well My husband said the men's restroom was also very dirty with a plugged up sink. We got our food to go and glad we did because the ordering/eating areas also looked dirty.
I've never had any problems with this McDonalds the young girl named Chelsea has amazing guest service will definitely be back
Worst food and service!! Always lines and unhealthy  food!!! If you care about yourself then stop eating unhealthy food!!!

Staff is pretty pleasant except for one guy who looks like he hates his job. Orders are usually right..more right then wrong. Inside is always clean whenever I go in. There were a few days where they were only taking cash in the drive thru which kinda sucks when you don't realize it til you're already in the line and can't back up. I feel like the entrance/exit is kind of a tight squeeze and you can only turn one way back on the road..otherwise have to go around

I should have known something was up with the long drive=thru line but my kids were hungry.  After being locked in from behind, was informed they would only serve me if I had cash.  I'm a mom of 3 boys.  I never have cash.  So now I'm stuck in the drive-thru line with hungry kids and no food.  One unhappy mama tonight, McDonalds.

Normally, I never find anything good about McDonald's.  It's usually a three star company.  This is actually, the second time I've been to this location, and they are better than average.  You get all the food's ingredients.  You get helpful help, without an attitude.  Today, as with the previous experience, was good.  We only got drinks and needed a place to work on video clips.  Strangely, going to Sonic to work on the computer doesn't work well, because you're still cramped up in the car.  This McDonald's does not have a lot of space but it's sufficient.  Even when it's busy, as it was today, it was friendly.

I never thought I'd care to review a McDonalds. But this place is GREAT. I went in, and got my food SO FAST, I was seriously in shock how quick. And Robin, the lady who took my order was soooo sweet, and so happy. I watched her interaction with the people in their booths and while taking people's order and I can't imagine how many people come just to see her smiling face. It was so nice to see such great customer service.

Fantastic McDonald's! Stopped here on our road trip the staff was very friendly and helpful and the food was fantastic! I'm a fan of Mickey D's ever since my youth, The bathrooms were extremely clean which is a HUGE plus for me!! If you Gotta stop you better stop here!!

Stopped here on a road trip to use the restroom. The kids wanted some food so we got happy meals for them. I dropped my daughters nuggets on the floor and they were so sweet and gave me new nuggets for free.
Fast, accurate, and great customer service ! Employees were very talkative with customers and restaurant was overall clean .
Worst place ever! I found a tooth in my chicken! In my opinion you should not go there unless you make your own food
Decent branch in Ripon.  They seem to get it right more often than not, and the place is well maintained and clean.
Decent place and service as I was passing thru town, only complaint was the fries that looks like they were re-fried at least 3 times

OK, I swore not to review major fast food joints, I mean if u dont know what to expect from McDonald's of KFC or Burger King, then there's something wrong wit u....  I just want to complement them on the new coffee selections.  Their coffee is as good as Starbucks, and without the high price and false sense of superiority!  yay! The whole Mc Cafe theme thing is kinda cool.  Not really much else to say, but I would like to see them start doing a wider variety of cold coffee drinks.
Clean throughout.   Great Parking.   Easy access to and from Highway 99. Made my custom order with ease.

It's clean but several times they have messed up my order, i usually check after i get through the drive thru but do i really need to every time? Most of the time its missing cheese or bacon or they give me something completely different and i have called several times complaining bout my service.. They really need to hire other people who can handle simple orders.
Yeah, now I can have my Micky D's sausage bisquit and my starbucks coffee on my way to work. Terrific combination. Makes my day.
This is a good micky Ds they just screw up ur order or dont even give you your complete order half the time fries way to salty too other then ok

Clean & neat but, we left with order onto freeway and of course it as incorrect!  After pointing out the error to cashier at time of placement.  The cashier stated that he would have to order fixed......no problem.  When phoning back to inform the manager (Maria) of the error, she promptly offered us lunch that day.   We were unable to except  due to business travel for several days.   I requested coupons instead 10 days ago!!!!   Still no coupons !!  NOT happy!  Sad thing is that we are in the process of locating to Ripon but will NOT use this location.  (On trip to Bay Area yesterday, drove past Ripon McD's & made our purchase at the Tracy location instead~ with NO error's!

Never have a problem here.   Wish they'd bring back the Southern Style Chicken and Biscuit.  Usually I stick to the nuggets, tenders, fries, and soft serve.  I tried the double quarter pounder with cheese and it was alright. I still prefer In N Out, but McDonald's burger did have a lot of meat in it.

The worst service ever workers are rude to customers and have no clue on multitasking. I bet they can't chew gum while tying their shoe! I called one girl out on her rudeness and all she did was nod, definitely there just for mall money...customer service?? What's that???

Probably the worst customer service I have received. The manager was extremely rude and refused to read my order back to me after I ordered in the drive through. Once I received my receipt to check that everything was correct, which it wasn't because I was charged for things I didn't order, I was told they couldn't do anything about it. If I could give this place 0 stars I would.

My son is two years old and it was his first time getting a McDonalds hamburger. Well apparently in 2018 when you go through the drive through you can't just look in the bag to check everything is there before driving off.. you now have to actually open up the burgers to make sure there is a hamburger patty in it. All my hamburgers had no patties. This is just unacceptable and pure negligence. Whoever working that day needs to be fired.

The manager (Hispanic guy) was taking our order and was rude. No eye contact, speaking as if tired or irritated and didn't even ask if for here or to go! Maybe he's a mind reader .... maybe not because I wanted it "for here" but he automatically thought we wanted it to go or just didn't care cause he was having a crappy morning from what it looked like.   Even so, for a manager to have that type of attitude is a no go. He didn't even greet us with a "good morning" like how he did the blonde behind us when we were done ordering. Rude and needs more training obviously!

At the SECOND drive-thru window, my son and I were warmly greeted. The tall red-headed young man deserves a shout-out for his engagement-- I wish I knew his name.   He saw my son in the front-seat in his baseball uniform and asked him if he had just played a game. I gotta tell ya- that in itself was a REALLY BIG deal! My son (13) had a very rough game- and my son said, "I really appreciated that guy- he made me smile, I was really mad [about the game]."   So often we forget, it's not just about food- but service. I hope the young man, that went the extra mile, is recognized- beyond my canned survey. Kudos. Your service made a difference to this family.

I really don't even know why I ever came back, but my daughter wanted nuggets as a quick lunch for picnic so this was where we came as it is right by our house. I asked for fresh nuggets because the last few times they gave her stale nuggets that tasted at least a few hours old. So they park us, which I'm fine with and I understand, and then they come out with the bag and it's not even the complete order, and the fries are old. Not to mention they charged me for an extra drink which again, I was fine with because I knew they were busy and I didn't want to nit-pick. But to actually give a waiting customer fries that are stale and put them through all that hassle especially after overcharging me for what I ordered, is absurd. I know you shouldn't expect much from fast food places, but at the very least since we have to deal with the bad attitudes we should get food that doesn't taste days old.

I just went to mc Donald's for lunch. And inside there were flies everywhere. They were landing on my food and on me. I was watching everyone else in the room swatting at flora the whole time they were eating. I told one of the employees about the fly problem and how it was gross to have them on our food so much. And his answer was "well, we don't have a fly swatter" that was it. They were perfectly fine with the problem and had no intention of trying to make things cleaner for the patrons.

So, I want a bacon cheeseburger from McDonalds. This was 6:30 this morning. Of course McDonald's, who made their fortune selling hamburgers, won't sell one til 10:30.Gotta buy breakfast, except I don't want breakfast, I came here for the burgers. So 10:29 I'm in line to get a burger, waited over 5 minutes to get to a cashier. Order 2 bacon double cheeseburgers, and get told they aren't serving burgers yet. Even though it's now AFTER 10:30, closer to 10:40. WTF?! I'm so tired of this, McDonald's corp. I want a burger. I want a burger. I want a burger.  Piss on it, there's a Burger King down the street and they don't have dumb assed breakfast only hours.
Been here a few times. Was able to find parking. There are plenty of seating inside. Good place for family & friends. My go-to McDonalds, its right around the corner from my house.

Have a problem with food not fresh and hot! Same problem here as always! If we want fresh and hot food we have to go too the Oakdale road store off Senic Road and Oakdale Avenue store! The so called hot pies are never hot! Says on box caution hot! The cabinet isn't working and always the same problem. Warm at best and only if only out for awhile! 4:15 and we're given pies with time stamped 1:10pm time! Not wanting to come back here! A shame we live two blocks away from this store! Two miles too the other store!

These McDonalds in modesto CA, started charging for cheese on there double hamburgers and quarter pounders even if you dont want cheese. They still charge for it .  Rip offs. They have lost me and my families business for good.

This place absolutely sucks. Nearly every time I come here something is not working. Today they didn't have water? So you couldn't get a soda or orange juice because they say they need water for those machines. The owner needs to get his $h!t together.

Not only is my order ALWAYS wrong the few times I order here, but the service comes with an attitude. If you plan on being open until 1am on Saturday night I would expect that food be available. This location does not offer milk shakes or Mcflurry after 12:30 when they start cleaning the machines. If that's the case then close your damn restaurant at 12:30. Don't offer a limited menu to your customers.

This is a clean Macdonalds and service is pretty good.  Try not to eat here very often but sometimes you just get that craving for some French fries or for a breakfast sandwich.  Their coffee is actually pretty good and any size for a dollar you can't beat that.

Asked for no onions on a cheeseburger and they triple loaded it with onions. How hard is it to put no onions on something? It was a waste of money cause I'm allergic to onions and it wasn't even worth takin it back once I got home.
Terrible customer service. No one greets you or say hi or even hardly talks to you. The employees seem miserable. I've been coming here for awhile but I'm done with this location.

If you want very poor ghetto service come eat here. The drive thru staff completely hate their job and take it out on the customer who's simply ask ketchup and for a straw that they forgot to put in the bag. This little Ghetto gal continued to argue and say that she  put a straw in the bag even after I informed her twice that there is no straw in the bag.  STAFF: If you truly hate your job and you hate people obviously, PLEASE  go work spinning signs on a street corner somewhere that should equivalate to what you do there.  I informed this Adriana  " supervisor" ( notice in quotes)  about her staff arguing over a straw she simply blows you off and won't give you any other numbers to report service to her boss or district. Horrible horrible customer service!!  If you want to get a feel of the ghetto make sure you come through this McDonald's.

Had a great experience here, at the drive thru, it was so great that I downloaded the Yelp App and made an account just to write this review. Made me and my friends day, Ian gave great service and Victor got our meals just right (unusual at mcdonalds places). Haven't had such a memorable and fun experience ordering food in a long time, Ian was great, great people person.
Husband and i went to get Caramel macchiatos 7 dollars something spent later.They are both hella watery and basically milk . This location always messes up orders from my experience.

My kids wanted pancakes yesterday, so we drove over and got in line. Ordered 2 orders of 3 hotcakes, got them a toy each because Pets are out, and got me a McFrappe.They aren't the best, but much cheaper than Starbucks. So I get home and sip my drink, when something crunchy hits my tooth. I give it a tiny bite wondering what the heck is it. I spit it out, OMG, it's GLASS!!!! IN MY DRINK! I immediately call the "restaurant", no answer. Call again, no answer. 3rd time someone finally answers. He was shocked, and said "Do you want me to replace the drink?" Are you kidding me guy? I just found glass in my mouth. I said what I want, is for you to refund my entire order, clean the damn machine and make sure there is no more glass in it before you kill someone. He assured me he has no idea how it got in there, the machine is surrounded by plastic. I said OK it could be very very sharp plastic too. Not really sure. Either way, you need to drain and clean it and make sure. I doubt he did. I wrote to corporate as well. I'm sure I won't hear anything back from them. That was the last straw with them though. I should know better than to feed this garbage to my kids, and this just sealed their fate. Never again McDouches.  Edit to add, he did say he would give me my money back. So that's good. Just haven't made it down there yet. Watch, I will go in today and they will have no clue what I am talking about.

Wish these employees knew what guest service is really wish this location would train there employees properly I am a GM for a big box company and if my employee spoke to my guest like this all they would get is there last check and a good bye really disappointed but yet I guess expected from this location this is not the first offense will never return and will most definitely let everyone I know to not go to this location!!

Very SLOW in drive threw. Waited 20 minutes and was told they forgot to cook my food. When I complained I was asked if I wanted a refund. It was 30 minutes from when I pulled in line to when I got my happy meal and 10 piece chicken strips.

Went to this mc Donald's. Asked for a mc double with 10 piece mc nuggets. Opened the nuggets and there was cookies inside. Went back through the drive thru to tell em they messed up my order and where the mc nuggets at. They plugged it with the mc nuggets I originally ordered and also got the free cookies. Keep messing up and giving out free food! Thanks yo!

Disappointed with breakfast. They advertise breakfast served all day but can't serve biscuits. The manager said "only during breakfast time" wtf!? It's breakfast time all day!!! I will pass the word out to all. Don't get breakfast after 10am. You'll be forced to eat old ass muffins. Shame!! Go next door to chicken barn. Way better:)

One of the two teenagers who was doing some yard work for me, while we were shopping for urgently needed parts, begged me to drive in to this "restaurant" 'drive-thru' and get them a hamburger despite my fervent plea that they could do better -- and I foolishly thought that I could find a hamburger that might improve my dismal opinion of the offal they offer for food here.  I was terribly disappointed by the bad decision I made.  The only thing premium about the premium hamburger I was served was the price.  When I was a kid, I used to eat tiny hamburgers that came in small rectangles offered by a small hamburger chain in and around Washington, DC.  I don't recall the name of this restaurant chain (White Castle?) but the hamburgers were distinctively small -- but were positively delicious.  The hamburger I was served by McDonald's reminded me of those, not because it was delicious -- this was not -- but because of its size.  It was tiny.  McDonald's should call these Hamburger McBites.  Even worse yet, it was terrible.  There is probably better roadkill out there --- better smelling, more nutritious, and far less an insult to the senses.  There was a huge gob of cold mayonnaise on one side of the sandwich, about the size of a large banana slug, predominately on the OUTSIDE of the bun and a tiny, cute little crescent of something orangish-yellow that look suspiciously like it passed for a tomato(you could probably read through it -- the whole thing bearing absolutely no resemblance to the photos they have of the premium sandwich you're supposed to be offered.  I won't tell you what this smelled like.  Worse yet, the bun was actually soggy and the dark meat-substance that looked remarkably like a tiny rubber hamburger patty was actually cold to touch, and I made this observation not more than a minute after we left the drive-through serving line.  This is about the lowest of the low experiences I've had at McDonald's.  I was so insulted, I got out of my car, went into the "restaurant" and dropped this latest insult du jour on the register counter so that employees and customers could see for themselves what they were passing off on people as food.  Their WiFi wasn't working so I couldn't use it to express my indignation to McDonald's corporate headquarters, home of the original "We don't care: we don't have to" attitude that Mickey D's is now famous for.  Some officious little snot of a manager cloyingly asked me what I wanted to do about this insult I just was subjected to.  I'm not sure that suggesting they use it as they would a suppository would have shocked them to objectively see for themselves what an insult their 'food' has become.  I suggested that she put it in a biohazard disposal bag and bury it, loudly enough for everyone in the restaurant to hear.  (After all, they should be warned, too.)  It would have been a fitting end for what they are sneaking into bags and giving to their unsuspecting customers.

This McDonalds is literally the definition of incompetent and moronic.  I've worked fast food taking down orders AND making the food and i can tell you something right now... It is not rocket science to correctly make an order or correctly take down an order. It literally takes a special kind of stupid to mess up someones order EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. It's beyond pathetic. McDonalds already has a horrible reputation for being incompetent so why don't the owners do something about it??? Stop hiring idiots and start hiring people who can 1) READ 2)FOLLOW DIRECTIONS and 3) ASSEMBLE A BASIC FOOD ORDER. I'm extremely allergic to mustard, if i eat even a little bit i start throwing up, swelling up and stop breathing.  It's so pathetic that i can't eat my food without fearing for my life.

McDonalds has an annoying, cheap, corporate method of cost cutting involving making you beg like a dog for tiny portions of barbeque sauce, napkins, straws, water, or any other little thing you may want to better enjoy your meal.  Go to a Chic-Fil-A if you can, they have this long table full of everything you need to spruce up your meal, I was amazed when I saw it because I have been desensitized to this problem by my corporate masters.  The food?  You won't die (right away) if you eat it.
Ok... better now.  Service was good and quantity was fair. There was some follow up I think, plus they remodeled.  This one is a'ight.
Every time j go through the drive through they get my order right, sometimes they park me but the foods I McDs
