Like if we were some sort of weird people for ordering a protein McMuffin  it was very insulting and felt very discriminated and Juan ("manager") supposably him lol was unprofessional rude and sounded like he was lil kid with no customer service experience he definitely needs a lot more training and isn't qualified to be a manger or to even work in customer service cause he lacks in everything required. Screw up my order EVERY SINGLE time! When I go in (or go back after I've ALREADY driven home) they seem irritated at me... Your job is not difficult!

Went to this location and ordered a Double Quarter Pounder Meal Large, with a Diet Coke.  Came home and pulled out my fries.  Carton wasn't full.  Customer service was fine, but serving size is getting ridiculous.  I didn't get what I paid for.  This is becoming the norm for McDonald's everywhere.  This needs to get corrected right away, otherwise I will quit being a patron of this or any other McDonald's establishment.

The thing that is good about this McDonald's is that once they get to know you they can really crank out your order quickly as they know how you like it. Service is fast, friendly, efficient, and good for a McDonald's. One of the servers recommended that I download the McDonald's app, and boy were they right! You can save quite a bit of money if you frequent McDonald's including McCafe drinks for free! I mean it is McDonald's, so it's not gourmet food, when you're hungry and want to eat inexpensively McDonald's is a solid go-to place. The employees here always greet you with a smile.

I had extremely rude customer service. The drive through worker charged my debit card the wrong amount. When it was brought to their attention they tried to give me $3 of the $4 they owed back to me. The worker began to argue with me and I had to take out my calculator and show her that she was incorrect. At that point she gave me all change back. And again shorted me $.02 cents. I again brought it to her attention and 2 employees laughed and said "do you really want your 2 cents". I said yes that is what is owed to me. I told them i would be contacting corporate and they shut the window in my face and began laughing. Extremely unprofessional. Ordered 2 hash browns got 1 and it was over cooked. Then when I returned I got one that was pulled out too early. This is the only fast food place I go to. That always messes up on my orders. What's going on with this place?

I was just at this store and as I was driving up to park my car, a homeless person was walking up to the front door. He went inside I was right behind him. I intervened and told her he was my guest and was buying him food. She continued to kick him out of the store. She didn't care. If it where her choice he could go hungry.  I then waited for my number to be called. The manager then called my number, I walked up and she said, "oh this is yours" she placed the bag on the counter and walked away. Not even have a nice day or come again. This manager is a poor excuse for a person or example to her employees.

Very irritating employees. Every time I come Here I always ask for an extra order of sausage and egg to go with the big breakfast. They seem to never get my order right and all of them always come to have a terrible attitude.
I went through the drive through. They messed up my order. I went inside to have them fix it and they messed it up again, this time by giving me the wrong meat. Never going back there again.

Service was good ... asked for a sausage and egg McMuffin with bacon there was no egg! Thanks!!!! Wake up employees !!!! I know it's early in the morning but seriously!!!! Get ya shit together!

When did Mc Donalds become so cheap?  I have never got so little ice cream before and it was truly disturbing. I should have gone back thru and made them do it right. The price goes up and the amount I get is 1/2 less than before when the price was less.  I believe that this was nothing more than shoddy work by the staff that pays no attention to what they are doing. I have ordered these many times at several different locations and this has never happened before.  This is exactly why 15.00 an hr for these workers is a ridiculous thought. Believe me that when that happens the quality of service and product better be perfect or I and many other millions of people are going to be complaining loudly.

Me and my buddy didn't know it closed at 2AM.  But when we pull up at 1:58AM and you tell us order when we're ready and then shut everything off right in front of us.   Have the courtesy  to tell us to hurry or tell us you're closed.

Stopped to try the grand mac...the manager isnt friendly but affective...i asked if i could have ketchup and she scattered them on the counter between us...never looked me in the eye...rather than her effectiveness coming across as effective, it comes across like she feels the job is beneath her...abrupt, sharp, curt responses from order to end...dining room is clean...napkins are handed out sparingly from behind the counter...will i eat here again? Yes, one day but it was awkward to have someone with such little customer service.

I think that the staff is very professional and always works hard to keep the customer happy and wanting to come back. Everyone from the cute boy in the drive through or counter to the speedy men and women in the grill deserve a round of applause! I wish I could give more than 5 stars because they deserve it :)

I'm from Kentucky and found myself in Modesto for the summer. Occasionally, a gal needs a sweet tea in her life and guess what?!?! Californians don't have sweet tea! Do they even know what they are missing out on? And I am most certainly not talking about getting unsweet tea and adding sugar. Ugh. That is an abomination to sweet tea fans such as myself. Anyway, for $1.08, I can live out my sweet tea cravings in California without making it myself. Plus, it was fresh and served with a smile :)

These employees listen one ear and out the other and try to treat you like their service is fast and accurate. I literally went 3 times in one day, 1 the night before, third just to test them, and i ordered a simple mcchicken WITH cheese, literally screaming with cheese to the employee. What do they forget? Cheese. 3 fucking times. Dont go to this location. Theyre stupid beyond belief.

If I can I want to give 0 star. Bad attitude.  Old lady at the cashier go retire. Don't be racist. How come they still hire this kind of person to do the front desk with the attitude.  Just lower down your reputation.
Seriously??? This location ALWAYS forgets something in your drive through order! Definitely learning my lesson and not going to this location anymore! It wasn't even busy no excuse!

THIS IS A HORRIBLE LOCATION! I just went here late at night, was on my own personal phone on snapchat, recording myself and my roommate having a fine night, nothing to do with the workers at mcdonalds or anything. The male who may be the general manager there was VERY RUDE and told me "either you can stop recording us or I can give you a refund" that made no sense as how the phone that was recording was not facing the workers at mcdonalds. I proceeded to tell him that we were not recording them just ourselves and he held my drink away so I could not reach it. He was a young man, very rude and should be talked to because of the way he acted. I understand you are closing in 10 minutes but that is no reason to be rude. I think this is a very bad McDonald's and the night manager needs to be spoken to because I myself never do these reviews because I work in fast food so I do understand but the way he was rude was very uncalled for and unnecessary.

This place ALWAYS gets our order wrong. Usually try to avoid it, but was in a hurry this morning. Thankfully checked our order before driving off and sure enough, it was messed up. Then went inside and staff were questioning if it was wrong. Cook had attitude. The white tag taped on the sandwich clearly said "sausage egg mc muffin no cheese", yet the sandwich was a ham and cheese mcmuffin. Pretty hard to argue it was wrong. Our son ordered sausage egg mcgriddles and they forgot the egg, and they messed it up the second time they gave my order back.  I would not be writing this negative review if it was the first error because every one has a bad day. I'm writing it because I would be shocked to go there and they didn't mess up, AND because there WAS no apology or compensation even after the third time in one visit they messed up. Very disappointing, the owner needs to step up and get people trained well.

my boyfriend and I work at a pet store just down the street. We open together and work all day Monday so he made a quick run to here to get a latte for me and some breakfast items. When he came back he handed me my latte and it felt immensely light. BOY was this light! Whats the deal? I open it up its less then half full I got only two swallows out of this drink. I just paid for a latte and bought a cup that wasn't even filled half way. I looked at him and said "did you drink this?" he as adamant he didn't and he was in a hurry to come back he never thought to check it for me. Thanks mcdonalds for your bait and switch. I see what you did there, you took my money and didn't give me a full product...you didn't even give me half of one. I WILL NEVER visit this site again. we have no problem getting our breakfast on Mondays somewhere else. ~.~

The store is usually dirty: the serving counter is often smeared with something which is sticky or just looks awful.  The dining area is almost always littered with food and trash, and my late wife refused to eat at this facility as we observed several roaches on the floor.  We've complained to the on-duty manager a number of times about food quality: we've often found, getting a large order of fries, that the container is only partially filled and the fries were cold and limp.  We have circled back through the drive-through to complain about this a in numerous times was the poor quality of the food sold to us corrected to our satisfaction.  My wife, having been given a hamburger that was very dry and which appeared to have been prepared hours before -- the meat actually cold when we sat down to eat -- was so disappointed that she went back to the service counter and politely complained.  She was rudely rebuffed by the man who was apparently the store owner, who -- after my wife said that the food was inedible -- was very rude and (according to her) seemingly hostile to her as a caucasian.  My wife returned to the table in tears, at which point I became involved.  The owner refused to come out of his office and settle the matter man-to-man.  An indignant and embarrassed shift manager refused to get the owner so that I could confront the owner about his behavior, and ask him to directly, personally, and immediately apologize to my wife.  A large number of customers were football players at the school I volunteer with as a football coach, and every one of them stood up and left the restaurant, their meals uneaten, many of them witnessing the owner's undeserved tirade and rude behavior with which he subjected my wife, who is also a volunteer working for the football team: those players in line told the others what they observed of the manager's behavior.  The football team members, their girlfriends and family members, all left the restaurant when my wife insisted that we go elsewhere to dine.  Numerous members of the football team have cited examples of not only similar treatment (of apparent racism), but also complained of not being given the correct change back (in several cases, no receipt was given).  I have personally written three polite but direct letters in November 2011 to the store owner and in the two years since, have never received a response either from the store owner or from the McDonald's Corporation.  A number of families who witnessed the incident involving my wife have refused to step into another McDonald's store in the future.  One further incident at this store in November 2011 resulted in both my wife and I refusing ever to patronize any McDonald's restaurant ever again.  McDonald's has a severe public relations problem at this particular store.  One star is far too good for this restaurant.

One of the worst mcdonalds in the area. Make the extra 5 minute trip to visit the mcdonalds on briggsmore and Prescott. This location has my order wrong Just under half the time. Tonight, I called that my 4 item order would be wrong. I was correct. I do not think they can hear the the order because the speaker box is pointed directly at a busy intersection. I only go to this location when I'm in a good mood so I'm not that disappointed when I look into the bag.

This McDonalds is consistent........consistently horrible. I placed an order in the drive thru today for a chicken club sandwich. The person inside asked me if I wanted the chicken to be crispy or grilled; I responded crispy. Got home and they gave me a club "Hamburger"! Really.....?........Crispy or grilled? You guys consistently screw up orders. No wonder you are about to lose the burger war. Your customer service sucks and always has!

I would like to be amused at how bad McDonald's is in Manteca and Lathrop but it just doesn't make sense.  I asked for a "Double Cheese(burger) Meal", something I've been ordering for a while.  I expected 1) that the person behind the counter would enter this into the cash register or 2) she would tell me that there wasn't a meal.  She entered the "Double Combo" something that doesn't have a drink with it but I only learned about this when I got my food.  She didn't ask if I wanted a drink but she knew that it didn't have one.  The person who gave me my food asked if I wanted a water cup, and I probably growled that I didn't.  Seeing the receipt, I wondered why the price was so reasonable when any size drink could be had for $1.00.  It took a very, very long time for the food anyway.  The sandwich was fine, but around half of the fries were old.  If they were that busy in the drive-thru, how could the fries be old at all?  If you have to/want to save money, go to Jack in the Box in Manteca or Lathrop instead.

Has to be one of the worst McDonald's to go to....ordered my just because of the constant harassment by a few, not all of the workers. One in particular is the older short Asian worker. This place is absolutely disgusting. I never get McDonald's and the one time I do instantly made me regret it. Do not come to this McDonald's ever. I will never return to this location again. McDonald's I used to love, Now it's okay. I rarely go there, It's because McDonald's freaking kicked out a homeless man for EATING food HE PAId FOR!!!!! That is just disrespectful. If you reading this McDonald's, That's just rude, Disrespectful and ABSOLUTELY STUPID. Bye.

If I could rate this place with no stars,  I would. Went thru the drive thru. They asked me to pull around no big deal. What was a big deal was that after 20 minutes I was still waiting. Came in at 8:06 and didn't get my food until 8:27. What is worse is I was waiting with 4 other cars while cars in the drive Thur go past.

If you're looking for crap service, come here.  The guy making the burgers had to be told MULTIPLE times to use "fresh" patties. and he tried to question the manager. WTF?!  What are they serving normally thats different than "fresh".  Rude employees that pretend to be managers on the phone and giving fake names.  Oh, the list I could write, but I dont feel like wasting that much of my time on this place.  Drive a little farther to one of the other McDonalds in town.
Lady who took orders here had a hearing problem lol.... Had to shout and in the middle of taking my order she said, "ok pull forward".

Well I know why the ratings are low! Many! Many times I go here for a milk shake for some strange reason the machine is always broken! Yeah right! This McDonalds is horrible! Service matches the reviews they have been getting! ONE Star!

Every time I come here there under staffed or there cleaning out there machines that make there shakes hours before they close. I did a mobile order and was told there was no eta on when my food would be done defeats the purpose of mobile order.

Came to get breakfast and after noticing that I was not rang up correctly I asked if they could just ring me up for another orange juice so I could get to work in a timely fashion. This McDonalds is HORRIBLE. They are super slow. How does it take 10+min to get an order with 2 customers ahead?    Now I see why they got 2stars. Smh. Retrain ppl and hire a manager that can improve and fix all the negative reviews
Really? You won't make me a burger because lunch doesn't start until 10:30? It's 10:26. You are garbage sir and won't get anywhere with that kind of customer service.

What is going on here that they can't get a coffee correct that comes out of a MACHINE? Every single time I either get the WRONG coffee OR the right coffee but it doesn't taste right. When you ask for your food a certain way it should be made that way. Went there this morning at 10:00am ordered 2 sausage mcmuffins with no egg And yet again they managed to screw up my order. Horrible avoid this drive thru had to call on my phone to see what the holdup was they messed up someone's order so they had to re-cook they didn't have people pull around let them sit at the front of the line tell it was ready 25 minutes to get thru this wasn't the first time we have had problems in this drive thru...

This is BY FAR the absolute WORST McDonalds I have been to in my entire life yessss I said my entire life!!! Every single time I have went here I have left pissed off beyond words. Every single fricken time these hood rats screw up my order. I go for a coffee and the heffer tells me "we don't have that" WTF??? You don't have coffee? Umm ok I guess.. no Im sorry no reason behind It just simply "we don't have that". So I get 2 McChickens. My total was like 3 something I get my bag and go to drive off and see there's only 1 in the bag...these mofos...I then have to park and take my 3 year old out of the car to get my other McChicken and when I get in there I see a huge sign on the wall that says the damn McChickens are a buck now...so why the f did I get charged 3 something???I ask and the HR tells me oh we get confused because there are so many buttons. Dear Mcdonalds worker , How long could it possibly take to whip up some salty, fattening, "fast" food? Well if you're on your phone instead of working,  then my guess is,  quite a while! 20 minutes in the drive thru.  The fries were hot....only reason you get 1 star.  Sincerely,  Angry customer

Went for lunch today after my drs appt. food was horrible! Ordered large fries.. fries werent even filled up half way and they were cold. Happy meal.. i asked for bbq sauce, didnt include it in the bag. Ordered a mcdouble.. asked for no pickles and onions, it had pickles and onions even though the tag on the wrapper said the order right. Food was cold and no one enjoyed their food. I tried calling before i posted this but no one is picking up the phone. Its unbelievable. Will never go back.
Good service, average food  Ladies in front counter are supper nice Could do better cleaning of lobby Tables and benches dirty  Otherwise all good

Absolutely THE LONGEST wait in the drive thru at this location!!!! I have been to probably 50 different McDonalds in my life and I have never waited so long!!!! And it is not just once. It is ALL THE TIME!!! I timed it once, and the time it took me to get fro the speaker to order my food to the time to get to the window it was 13 minutes and then I sat for 8 minutes while sitting at the window waiting for my food. I will drive an extra 3 minutes, and go to the one on Daniels St. instead. That drive thru always moves very fast, and I am home in 10 minutes. This McDonald's is so dirty, every time you sit down to eat it's full of flys. All day breakfast is as joke everything is microwaved burnt my mouth trying to eat my food. I've always had a very long wait time here. The employees always seem nice and I got an apology today for the wait time. This time they didn't get my order correct. I was missing an order of fries but I wasn't charged so no biggie. Saved some calories lol. They gave me a crispy chicken sandwich instead of a grilled. Still not really a biggie for me. I figured I'd go back and switch it out. I came back in and they took the crispy one and just switched the meat out. That was odd to me. The sandwich was all messy and it's like they slathered on an extra amount of mayo. I'd even had one bite out of the wrong sandwich. To me that's gross. To bring something eaten back into the kitchen around everyone else's food being made. I even called them ahead so they could just remake it.
Really you gonna charge me $3.49 for three strips and when you compare the third strip to the previous two, it doesn't compare.
Great experience today with employees I've made them laugh their asses off!!! Good environment but everyone knows mc food there! This is staff experience only lol!!!!

Wasn't too busy walked in with my 2 year old daughter got to order right away a manager took my order he was nice and a few seconds later had a Carmel sundae in hand and we went to sit down about 5 mins later fresh fries  Overall it was good but some tables were not clean and that's to be expected since they are all busy trying to run the drive thru take orders in the front counter but could be taken care of sooner

Went to this McDonald's today to get me a breakfast & coffee, well my medium white choc mocha was half full and I paid $2.89 McDonald's employees please fill the coffee up all the way like Starbucks do. I want what I pay for...Judy Jones

The service here is mediocre at best. If you want cheap food and don't car about great or even decent service, go through the drive thru.   If you chance it by eating in the dining room, you'll be greeted by flies (likely from the tables never being cleaned off). Also, I had to ask for a table to be cleaned off because it was the only one accessible with my back injury. I'm with my four year old daughter, so I has to get a high hair, so I asked for that to be wiped down. No one showed up, so I used my wet wipes sanitizing wipes from my purse. Thank God for that! Some teenager with a face full of blemishes came out to wipe down tables. Mind you, my daughter and I were nearly done eating. His shirt was half tucked in, disheveled hair, and baggy pants. The towel he wiped the tables off with was brown! So gross! I'm shocked the flies didn't attract him and the towel.   I'm not sure what's caused this place to go downhill so much when I moved to the area a year ago. They had the sweetest elderly that dressed real sharp (clean, shirt tucked in, hair combed (in other words, how a McDonald's or otherwise restaurant employee should dress). She'd greet everyone, ensure the cleanliness of the dining room and keep it nice. I think it's a change in management. That's the only explanation to all of these things, and taking a cold burger to my seat in the dining area. Definitely my last visit. Hope we don't get sick!

Wouldn't have even given this McDonald's one star. Went through the drive thru just now and ordered a mcChicken with only pickles and cheese, no mayo and they gave me MAYO!! They didn't give me the cheese either. Also ordered fries and sweet tea I got unsweetened tea and fries that tasted like they've sat under the heat lamp for an hour! This explains why I haven't eaten McDonalds in a year, won't be back.
Just had my free sandwich from the McDonalds app. . I tend to go through the drive through but went inside today. This is by far the cleanest , friendliest Mc'Ds I have ever been too!
Great location,  great service, food took forever tho
Ordered 3 Oreo Mcflurrys and between the 3 of them I MAYBE got 1 out of it. Looks like the entire staff passed them around and ate half of each. Da-Da-Da-Da-Da not lovin' it.

Oldest McDonalds in town, remodeled after a lightning strike set it on fire.  Terrible interior, HORRIBLE slow service, cold, smashed food, and they've got Fox News playing in the dining area.    I will drive across town to the In-N-Out before i will go to this dump.  It never fails to disappoint.

Very dirty bathrooms and lobby and from the looks of it even the kitchen area!!! Wow I just can't believe it why are all these McDonald's in Manteca ca very dirty an crappy lol there's even a 80 yr old lady working their and all I saw her do is talk to older customers and even sit down with them while she was on the clock!! Again wow!! It was very busy she didn't even help with the cashier part. Her name is norma from the name tag I seen. McDonald's in Manteca is a disgrace to all fast food

Not sure why I ever bother coming to this McDonald's. They either take too long, screw up your order or the new one today " we don't have any ice cream" as the worker on break is sucking down a shake.  Wish I could give zero stars. Skip this one and take a drive to the other 3 in town

PROS: They updated the building/guts inside.  CONS: Everything else! Where do I begin?  [#1] This is the only McD I've ever gone to that refused to upgrade my Drink to a "Large" on my meal (ordered a #1, Big Mac meal, medium size) - the employee proceeded to tell me the already obvious quote, "Every drink's a dollar, so..." before she could finish I cut her off. I explained to her that this was the first time they've denied me, however, I would bite the bullet to avoid conflict. If every drink is a dollar, then what exactly are you trying to explain to me - are you trying to explain to me that you sound like a complete idiot, EVERY DRINK IS A DOLLAR, therefore it should be upgradable at no extra cost!  [#2] I've gone twice in 2-days & both times my french-fries have been nearly ice-cold, hard, & inedible. Which has already been mentioned by other Yelp! users here.  [#3] Service is slowwwwwwww (again, as mentioned by other Yelp! users) it's ridiculous! I've never been able to pull up to the drive-thru without being told "hold on please..." - every single time, regardless of how busy or non-busy it is! Furthermore, not only am I expected to hold every time, but I'm expected to hold for awhile apparently! Last time I went, I waited 3-minutes before my order was ready to be taken, literally... 3 entire minutes! According to McD documentary, they're suppose to have you ordered, served, & gone within 90-sec. - guess they missed the memo at this particular location!  Shall I even continue? Or, do you all get the point that's being made? AVOID THIS PLACE LIKE THE BLACK PLAGUE! You've been warned. Good luck!

Thank you McDonald's me and wife ordered diet sweet teas when kids ordered happy meals.  It the only thing me and wife had the same in the last two days and now we are both sick and pukeing.  Thanks dirty ass employees.

Used drive-thru, had Wallace on the speaker-- he is what every McDonalds employee should strive to be.. Very courteous, read our order back, we had several custom burger orders and they all came out correct and quickly. Wallace needs to be promoted to crew trainer for drive-thru at the very least. Will definitely visit this restaurant again. Reminds me of they way all McDonalds used to be..   Thank you for the awesome service.

This place is runned down and disgusting; there is no a/c which is needed since it's 99 degrees outside,  Flies everywhere because the door to the garbage can is broken,  there is a constant loud buzzing sound in the Playland and the customer service is the lowest of them all they should say welcome to filthy McDonald's, I hope they get shutdown by the health inspectors!!!!
Took half an hour to get my food and i was the only one in the drive thru. How do you microwave processed meat so slow?

Really?  What part do you think you could like?  The "meat shavings" that are soaked in ammonia to get rid of the food poisoning (reference 60 minutes)?  The lousy quality of their food?   Go ahead and put this sh*t in your body if that's what you want to do.  Worst place in town.  I hope the corporation goes belly up

I would give them zero stars I could. Today waited in the drive thru for ten minutes not in line at the order speaker, ordered hit to the window and asked I had cash because their system was down. Do you think they could have had someone standing out before you got into the drive thru to tell you their system was down? They did not care about my wasted time. I will avoid this McDonalds like the plague.  They have a new McDonalds in Manteca which is great so far. This happened on 09/287/12.

A few ppl and myself stood in line for a few mins and nobody even acknowledged any of us and no one was taking orders.  I asked the person who seems to be the manager if anyone is taking orders and he asked one person to and she snapped at him.  Anyone knows their job here?

This McDonald's is by far the worst ever! The French fries we got tonight were old and cold! The chx on my salad tasted like it was cooked yesterday not fresh at all..I will never go back to this place or location. I would give a zero but it doesn't give the option

I have had enough time to sit here for 15 minutes, get blocked in and now I still have yet to get served. The worst service I have ever had. How can you call yourself a fast food restaurant?  Stay away from this place

This place used to be the kick it spot back when I was a freshman and sophomore in high school. My friends and I would not eat lunch and save our lunch money to buy food here after school. This was pretty far from our school walking distance wise but it was so worth it. The $1 menu was seriously my best friend in highschool. This McDonald's is pretty big and would be better if there was a little play area for kids.
disgusting  like i dont get y people eat such a thing still
Egg McMuffin, hashbrown and a carmel mocha. Delicious.

It good food just like any other mc donalds but the late night service sucks (around 11 or so) the drive thru says its open 24 hours but 4 out of 5 times I went there they said that there close because their computers are down.everytime! They can't come up with something better. I think the people there are just lazy.

The worst McDonalds ever. Horrible service and horrible food.  How can this place be so bad?  It's the same food served all over the world, but they can't figure it out. Double check your order before you leave!

So we've already established that I'm not a morning person. Now take that into account and add the fact that I have serious short-timers today, and you get one agro-lady! I was too in a hurry to make coffee at home, and eat my lovely bowl of shredded mini wheats. Instead I opted for a quick run through McD's on my way into the office. Grrr! Not only did they take forever and a fricken day to make my order, but the muffin tasted gross and old. This is the 2nd time this place duped me! Last time they gave me someone else's order, and I drove away not realizing. (I know my mistake too). Damn you McD's for tempting the beast so early in the morning!!

If you are going to eat at McDonald's,  this one is one of the best.  The app in the app store isn't good, but the staff inside this place are friendly and they seem happy. They rarely get the food wrong,  and they are quick to correct it if it is wrong.  Never a freshness issue,  and the only complaint if there must be one. ... the fries aren't very full.... but who doesn't want more fries lol

Last month I ordered a coffee from the drive thru and instead of sugar the woman poured salt in it. Of course I didn't taste it until I was already down the road. I did call them and they didn't apologize or even offer to replace it.  Now yesterday I ordered a sausage McMuffin and the muffin was burned so bad it turned to black ash. And both times I was served by the same woman. I am now afraid to return as I don't know what will happen next!?
Unprofessional. Nobody there accepts responsibility for their actions, a lot of ass covering. Better off going somewhere else.

We chose this McDonald's today because they have a play place. The recently remodeled the play place, and its great. So many McDonald's have remodeled their play places and turned it into a bunch of video games and nothing to play on, but not this one. They play place was smaller than before, but it was great, my kids LOVED playing on it. This was probably the cleanest McDs I've seen in a long time. Play places always smell bad, but not this one, it didn't smell at all.  Our food was good, same as expected with McDs. My buttermilk chicken sandwich seemed a bit over cooked, but the flavor was good. They have a fun soda dispenser which allows you to choose from endless options and mix things.

I love coming here. I always get good customer service and always get asked if I need sauces or extra stuff. I prefer to drive a little extra to this McDonald's because I always have good experiences and my food is always hot! Their drive thru is fast too! Not like other places.

The person who took my order was rude and the food was not fresh and when I asked to replace two of the sandwiches because they were hard they didn't try to make it right except replace one of my sandwiches

Just as an FYI they aren't open until 1am, which is what's stated on here.. and they still answer the phone like they're still there. They're rude over the phone and it's not like I'm never going to go to McDonald's.. let's be real but this location needs a clean sweep of employees.
Newly remodeled and clean! Very roomy seating and the staff was so friendly. The food was typical McDonald's food but it was fresh. I love the super tall ceilings too.

This McDonald's is amazing. Great customer service and very speedy. My order is almost always right, and if they mess it up they are always happy and willing to make it right. Very friendly workers and the managers are amazing. Soran is always super nice and always greets me. I love it here. And the play place is perfect for all kids. Plus it helps that my girlfriend works there.

This McDonald's is generally very clean and for the most part well run by management.  Many of the employees do have an attitude but nothing I haven't experienced at most restaurants these days.  Customer service should come first at any establishment but sadly that just is not the case.  As to be expected in a low paying job environment, employee turnover is high.  The employees who do stay long term are generally friendly which is a plus.    The food here is typically better than other McDonald's I have dined at.  Ordering anything special at any McDonald's is a crap shoot but here they seem to get my order right more often than not.  Still the occasional order error does happen.  They remedy it quickly when I point the error out to them.  The kids play area was recently remodeled and seems to be a major hit.  It definitely attracts lots of families to come here.  The environment can get a bit noisy and unruly children are often left unattended by absentee parents.  If you have very small children, keep and eye on them or other children may not be so nice to them.  For some reason the homeless seem to flock to this location and loiter quite a bit.  Panhandling inside and outside can be problematic.  I am not sure what if anything management does to rectify this.

I had Bad experience 3 times I been there once I order the grand mac meal they only give me the burgers today 6/8/17 ordered a Mac flurry Oreo and small fries then gives me the total I was about to ask for a cone and a cheeseburger like really really bad customer service I been to so manny McDonald's this is the worst the should shut it off and leave the one on salida only i just moved 2 blocks away I'll never go there again rather drive to Mchenry ave I had bad experiences with this place so they lost a customer

Won't be going back.  Ordered dinner for hubby and 4-year-old daughter at around 7pm, put her to bed and went to bed myself.  Woke up at 1pm to the (very frightening) sound of my daughter letting out screams and cries, interrupted by heaving fits.  She is fine now that that poison is out of her system, but I'll be choosing a different location for her occasional treat from now on.

First of all I felt very rushed and uncomfortable during the ordering process, secondly the fries tasted weird and possibly dipped in 3 year old oil. As a frequent McDonald's customer I have a high expectation for the French fries since they're known as the worlds best. So I would appreciate a free meal.

This McDonald's is really hit and miss. Always clean friendly and usually prompt. Half the time the fries aren't very good, not sure if they're overlooked or fried twice leaving them practically inedible. Went through the drive thru tonight and when we got home; the buttermilk chicken sandwich  was dry and tough, the bun was also tough like it had been toasted and left out, the lettuce was so limp I was afraid it'd make me sick and the tomato was barely pink and crunchy, 2 cheeseburgers were thrown together and one the cheese was folded over in the sandwich, and then apple pie was not in the bag.
Fries overcooked and water glass was minuscule. It's McDonald's so I don't ask for much but I would avoid this one.

They removed the air hockey and replaced the play area. Play area for my kids resembles a cramped cage at a zoo. The slide is shorter and kids are using trays to slide down because there's too much friction.  It's chaotic.

I'm beyond upset with this McDonald's  ! 3 times they have messed up my order . 3 weeks ago I ordered  mcgriddle with egg and I get home  and there's no egg. Then today I order a bunch of food and I get home and they forgot a qr pounder with cheese. I call manager she tells me come back and get your sandwich.  So I have to bring all my food and receipt back there . She host through my food gives me a sandwich. I tell her this has happened 3 times in the last couple of months.  She does nothing to compensate me for my troubles.  She just says well I fixed it is gave you your sandwich.  So I get home and now my kids nuggets are ice cold and they refuse to eat them !!!! Wow what a waste of money.  They can not get it together.  I'm going to have to go somewhere else because I'm not dealing with this anymore.

How can employees not know what's on the menu?  I ordered at the drive thru and when I got to the window to pay, was told they can't complete my order. What a bummer. And then stuck in a drive thru with no food.
By far continuelly the worst McDonald's I have ever experienced. Order accuracy is always wrong, food temperature is never ideal and crew and management staff are beyond rude

McDonald's never got rid of the pink slime in their meat, they just posted that their food may be hazardous to your health, but go ahead keep feeding your children that pink slime!  The two stars is for their french fries and their Sundays...
I got my usual side salad and strawberry Sundae. It was great.  The customer service is great too.  The employees have the coolest personalities.

The layout of this McDonald's is beautiful. They have a big and clean dining room along with a big play place for kids. All the employees here are super nice. The restrooms here are clean all the time too. The food here is great too. Two thumbs up for this McDonald's location.
Kids play area smell like diapers and pee.  It was not pleasant to sit and eat and watch my kids play.  Had to leave right away.

This McDonald's is one of the only locations i can actually trust with cleanness and fresh food and they actually care about their customers. I've never had anything that didn't taste fresh, everything has been hot and ready to enjoy. This location is always clean inside. Love, love, love!
This is a new one! It has a big play place for the children. The food is really great. If u have kids who like to play in the play places this one or the one on salida blvd are the best.

i went there with friends late at night for an ice cream sundae. I was the only customer there and it took 5 minutes for someone to acknowledge me and take my $2 order.  that is too long for fast food. i would have been better off walking through the drive thru like a drug addict.

This Mc Donald's is the SH**! First of all- it's super clean (even the bathrooms). The Playland ROCKS! I wished that I was small enough to go in there! They have air hockey, free video games, a small basketball hoop, mazes, and slides for the wee ones. There are plenty of clean tables and booths to sit at. Perfect on a hot summer day!   I wish they had one like this in San Jose! All of the McDonald's Playlands that I have visited here are crawling with dirty ghetto snot nosed children and their tramp stamped moms spilling out of their Baby Phat spandex. This location is right around the corner from the in laws. Now we know where to take our little sprout when he gets bored and we have an excuse to eat McDonald's french fries!

If you have ankle-biters, this is the place to go.  I'm normally not a McD's fan, but occasionally I watch a friend's kid.  He loves this place- more specifically, the play area. It's indoors, which is a godsend on a rainy day.  They have (free) kid's video games, a place to climb, and air hockey (50 cents).  It's usually clean, and they haven't screwed up an order yet.

this mcdonalds has a huge play area was alittle dirty but i guess alot of kids play in their all day though everyone was really nice we were craving del taco next to this place stood at the register for no kidding 8 min cause of a mess up at the drive through at del taco know one said be with you shortly of even a word to us then we just walked to this mcdonalds and was treated like a king and queen really nice workers so far.

I had a problem with a couple quarter pounders and let them know about it. The next day the general manager called me, apologized to me and took care of the problem. I was totally satisfied. I was stunned with the awesome customer service and the pride for the brand McDonalds.  I will continue to do business and let others know how great this store is!  Thank You so much!!
0 ! No Ranch , no apple juice and no change.and a very bad actitud first and last one we eat here. I

I went this morning and the older woman perhaps manager got my order wrong. Or shall I say the app did not clarify my order enough well enough to say I wanted ice coffee .. she tried to make me feel stupid saying this is what you ordered. I'm sorry lady but I want ice coffee!! She seemed to be put put and was rude and said I owe her a dollar more for ice! Although I already paid for it on my app for the ice coffee price. She was rude and took my dollar like the deseprate rude person she was. Trust me this is not good customer service!!! Find better workers and if she is a manager seriously 86 her unprofessional rear end!!  Today is Oct 7 I was there at 9 am. So whoever was the older gal with no name badge on two thumbs down for you!!!

Honestly,  If I took over that McDonalds as Manager, we would have no less then 4 stars. So, if you are the owner and are reading this, call me and lets talk.  The workers are nice for most part, but all slow and always under staffed. Never see any manager out working with crew.   There was one other person in the restaurant when I arrived, ordered 2 simple cheeseburgers and it took 11 minutes to get.   I am not cutting down the employees, I am cutting down management for not managing his/her crew and out helping.   I ran 4 full service restaurants and I am truly saying I could double your profits in 4 months. Period.

Their located inside the Walmart, near the pharmacy I believe. The 1st time I came here, they were out of French fries AND didn't have money in their register. They had a sign that said, "Exact cash or card". Since I came in at 6pm, I was really disappointed. I would've understood if they ran out of French fries near closing, but seeing as how their inside a supermarket, they can easily get more frozen French fries.   The cashier was really friendly though and genuinely felt sorry for not having French fries nor change to hand out, so that made not so horrible.   Parking lot is always filled with shopping carts, even in parking spaces no where near the place to put the carts back.   Walmart cart pushers need to step up their A game.
I went today they did not have orange juice and hash browns for breakfast they said they had to go get the hash brown from the back but they did not want to go I expected more ‍

I went in after I was done doing my Christmas shopping and asked "do you have a McChicken?" The lady said "no, sorry we don't" okay that's fine I'll just have a number 2 then.. The next costumer comes in and asks for a mcChicken and the lady says "okay, can I get you anything else"   Meanwhile I'm standing right there while she says this.. I didn't say anything to her, but I should have! I'm so mad!
The worst. Dirty. Sloppy service. Burger drenched in catchup. Not eatable. The worst McDonald's I have ever been to. Will not return.

I shop at Walmart A LOT. At least twice a week. Every single time I decide to give this McDonald's another chance, I'm let down. It's so ridiculous. I never write reviews but terrible service encourages me to. Sooooooooo slow. I'm talking 10 min for large fries. Not an exaggeration. Not busy at all. Just literally stood for 10 min, waiting on fries. Are you kidding? I learned my lesson and decided that if I was going to eat there again, to try to order simple things so I can get my food faster. Nothing helps. Ordered a regular hamburger the next time and again, TEN minutes to get it! It was just me in there. Why are customers having to wait this long? Not to mention the employees themselves. CLEAN yourselves up! Stop wearing dirty clothes to work, looking like you just rolled out of bed. Put a smile on your face. Stop openly complaining about things in front of customers. This location needs a complete staff replacement.
Horrible service it was really dirty no tables cleaned up looks like they don't even mop

This McDonalds is a f****** joke, I was told to come back and go inside to get my order replaced, spent 30 mins outside just waiting to place my order, and then another 15 waiting after I paid to get a burnt cheeseburger and some nasty fries...and very rude Manager, and while waiting she was forgetting other people's items who were waiting in the inside line... I guess this why some people need to work at McDonald's....

Loser guy with glasses sucks got both orders wrong not even busy at all short Mexican girl talks to much and doesn't do work not professional  at all if she has a kid id work harder.  June 5th 2017 6:30pm

If a negative 5 star were to be available, I'd click it without hesitation. If your looking to be ignored and made to wait for anyone to even take your order... this is the place to get crappy service. Went in early morning for a cup of coffee and a oatmeal. super easy to make even a monkey could do it. The gal behind the counter was in her own world that didn't involve the guy standing on the other side waiting patiently. When slow poke Sally finally decided to have the courtesy to acknowledge my existence, she told me to hold on and wait for a sec. The insulting part of this experience was, she was sooooo concerned about getting an ice cold refreshment in the hands of a non paying Wal-Mart team member hanging out the customer dinning area to quench her thirst and making sure her taste buds had been satisfied to her liking. Over 10 minutes after arriving I still had no one even showing one ounce of concern to serve my needs. That was it!!!!!! I left without wasting another moment and walked over to Safeway for coffee at Starbucks. I'm sorry but as a paying customer whom contributes to a paycheck in Sally's hand each week, I deserve to be respected and shown common courtesy. Corporate at McDonalds... if your reading this review. either close this joke of a fast food restaurant or send in team members that understand the value of having a positive presence within a larger retail location. The quality of the food here sucks so bad I only order Items which have a less chance of being over cooked, over salted, and put together with such a sad presentation that the only way to consume this swill is through your rear end so your eyes and taste buds don't have a bad experience on the way in. If Manteca Wal-Mart happens to read this comment, please don't take my word for it, send in a secret shopper so they can share with you the wonderful fuzzy feelings they've experienced at your location.
Stood in line for over 15 min. Not even acknowledged. The manager looked over at me and said nothing. No order taken. No greeting. Nothing. I will never come here again.

Pretty standard as far as quality and speediness of the food. The employees there were really friendly considering they were slammed. It's also very nice that they are located in Walmart. Even though there is no drive-thru, there is plenty of parking. It's also nice to sit and eat some fries while the rest of your group romps through Walmart shopping.
Sooooo slow. The lady in front of me had to cancel and get her money back. I order only french fries and it took over 25 min. Not worth it. The employees are very slow, they look unhappy.
probably never going back due to disrespect from the window person  refusing to answer a question, i had to back out from the drive thru.

Glad they were open! After a weird experience at a different McDonald's my husband and I came here for a middle-of-the-night breakfast or snack. My order was taken efficiently, coupons accepted, paid quickly and considering it was at 3 in the morning the order was processed, complete with a latte in less than about 5 minutes. The food was good, fresh, as well as the coffee. The gal at the window was very friendly and even greeted my dog I had with me. Thanks for the good service.
Need quality control for sure!  The poor quality allowed out the door/drive thru is unacceptable!

I went through the drive through and ordered an egg and cheese biscuit.....every time I order this it's always something missing. Either the egg or the cheese. Hell next time I won't have the biscuit.

Ya'll. A mobile order, the mobile spots are in a weird location at the front near the street, not near the drive thru. Came out in 8 mins and brought a wrong happy meal. I ordered a 4 piece and a hamburger, 2 hamburger meals came out. She took the food back in and pretty sure brought the same box and just took out the burger and added the 4 piece. I give up.

I came to this location a few days ago, and I think it will be the last time, at least until they get new employees or new management. They are constantly handing me incorrect items, if not forgetting them. I ordered two Egg McMuffins, a side of hash browns, a small Coke, a medium double cheeseburger meal for my mother, and two hot fudge sundaes. After ordering, I was told to pull into the reserved space. When the guy handed me my food, I noticed they forgot to give me my sundaes, my fries, and gave me a large, not medium, iced tea! I had to go back into the restaurant, only to find my sundaes were sitting on the counter and had practically melted.   This isn't the only time these idiots fucked up my order. Last time, I ordered two Egg McMuffins, a side of hash browns, and a small Coke. Instead of my hash browns, they gave me a sauce packet! Last time I checked, "sauce packet" and "hash browns" are not phonetically similar.

My mom and I came through the drive they today and had planned on using two different mobile offer coupons. So we had asked to do two separate transactions. When we went to the second window we received the first order but not the second. Which was a large hazelnut cappuccino which was free. They asked if we paid. Which we had. The cashier even asked if we wanted a receipt. After receiving the drink, the worker proceeds to rudely tell us to next time do it on the same transaction. Which with multiple coupons is not allowed.

I think all Modesto and Turlock Mcdonald's are just cursed. Really, they all seem horrible. When I came here, I found out I had to wait for an employee to come unlock the bathroom door. I ordered my food, waited for it, and still, no unlocked bathroom. My entire trip here and they never opened it. Also, I don't know how you can mess up fries, but this place managed to. The oil they cooked it in tasted gross and that's all I tasted since it was so greasy. I'm not coming back.

Wow...what can I say here? I was running late this morning so I stopped for a sandwich and something to drink. I walked in and stood at the counter for a minute then the lady at the counter said, please use the kiosk. You are standing right here just take my order! I go over to the kiosk and there was another girl standing there and asked if I've used it. I told her no and she said ok and just stood there. She didn't try to help at all. I finally figure out my order (it would have taken less time to just take my order at the counter. I go wait by the counter for my food and drink, the lady comes up to me and said she didn't know how to make my drink. ITS ON THE MENU!!!!!!  I told her to ask someone. She rolled her eyes and walked away. While waiting, another gentleman walked in. He went to the counter and asked someone to take his order. They told him no, use the kiosk. He refused and the lady RUDELY took his order at the counter. Finally I got my drink and food. The drink was TERRIBLE by the way. I don't think I'll be back here. Terrible customer service.
I was charged twice for the same order using the mobile app.  Fellow customers beware of ordering using the mobile app.

Can't stand this McDonalds always parking people even for a $2 refund. Don't always get the order right. Don't know how to use a coupon correctly, and they're not friendly or apologize. You park me one more time and I'll sit in your drive-thru and run your time up. I've worked at McDonald's before and unless standards have went down, someone needs to retrain some crew and managers.

I have been coming to this location for months for the McCafe (buy 5 get 1 free). Received Terrible customer service today from a new employee. I did not get my free coffee. You just lost a good customer

I'm a bit irritaed.. I went on drive thru. placed my order.. (a meal. and a smoothie) I get to the window get the smoothie.. the bag with my meal. when I asked the curly headed kid where my drink was he said I didn't ask for 1... . this is the first time I get told the meal doesn't come w a drink. I tried to clear up to see if maybe they thought I wanted the smoothie. he rudely said no.. I told him he owed me a drink and he said nope unless I paid for it...i waa in a hurry didn't want to argue w the kid. so I left.  I tried calling shortly after to talk to the manager.  2 hrs later I'm still getting a message machine! I like some of the crew there but that kid was rude.. let's see how long it takes me  to get a hold if a live person... #extremelyannoyed

How hard is it to put the right food with the right order. I was charged for the #3,egg white delight meal, and drove all the way home to pull out from the bag a sausage mcmuffin with egg. Needless to say I drove back to get the correct thing. It's the point!!!!! In addition, I choose to walk in to settle this matter as I started to go thru drive in and we were sitting for 5 minutes and the line of cars weren't moving. When I walked in, several staff members were speaking Spanish amongst themselves, including the manager who was having difficulty understanding my situation while the counter staff girl was explaining.  The manager had to be told several times and it wasn't until the young lady spoke Spanish to her did she understand and approve the correction. By the way, it should have been simple because I brought the incorrect item back with the receipt.  I find this whole experience disturbing. I think that the young lady who will be making 15.00 an hr in a few years to put food in a bag should be able to do it correctly. This is not an educated position that requires a college. Personally, I could do a better job at a kiosk. After all, isn't this what we are doing at grocery stores right now when we check out ourselves
Ignorant people and meth heads hang out here. Not much help . When standing in line and a cashier just stares at you . Your like umm can you take my order now
Not impressed with sausage egg mcmuffin or the hash brown.  Last Time I do that.  Too much money for what I received.  Service was good and the place was clean.  Next time just a large drink and go

They had two homeless people outside when we went and my man didn't want to park and get out of the car with them there expecting them to ask for food and do who else knows what plus we had a child with us. Not a very good place to take your kids inside. I didn't taste the food here personally so I don't know how good it really is, but the line was all the way out past there parking lot. Lots of people most like there food.

I wish I could give a negative 5 star! This place is ridiculous as it does not serve fish filets or ice cream after midnight... Really??  what if I'm craving it? Never again will I come to this location!

I have to leave at least one star in order to leave a review . This place is the worst place to go in the early hours of the morning. I work graveyard shift and for being close I go there for lunch at 2 in the morning. I'm sorry but 30 minutes to make an single egg mcmuffin is outrageous. My lunch is 30 minutes and I'm always late to clock back in. And I'm the ONLY one in the damn drive thru!!! Seriously, not only do they take FOREVER they make the order wrong. Too many to count they forgot to give me fries, forgot to add sugar to my ice coffee, forgot my other egg mcmuffin when I order two and so on. One last thing that crossed my line by the time I get to the drive thru the cashier on duty will tell me that they are only accepting CASH ONLY!!! What fast food establishment has these random days accepting only cash when pretty much everyone pays with a debit card or a credit card. Not only having this issue with the cash but now I have to wait in the drive thru because there's cars in front and behind me so there's no way I could go else where. I'm NEVER coming back to this place again.

My boyfriend & I had the most irritating & unpleasant experience at this location tonight. The lady running drive through, (who I also thought to be the manager) gave the worst service. She was a rude, UGLY older woman who didn't look like she too care of herself & sounded like she would have rather killed herself than be working there. They were cooking FRESH food, yet still managed to get our order wrong & when we went back through to fix the issue, they made us pay again for certain items on the order since the cashier didn't give us a copy of our receipt. Get your s*** together! This is exactly why you people don't deserve to make $12 an hour. I'm a former waitress & can run circles around you while still earning minimum wage. But then again. What can I expect? It's just McDonald's.
I just bought a pie at 5:11pm on 10/23/15. It clearly says"enjoy by 2:58 pm on 10/23/15" Is this the type of food they're serving us? Old food?. It is disgusting.

I've never been to this McDonald's where I didn't have to pull around the corner and wait. Isn't it fast food? Why would I go through the drive thru if you make me have to wait. Might as well have went inside. Awful service. Cold food.

I came in to get a drink and watched as the manager chris told an employee to go into the back in his street clothes and then make faces and snide comments about that employee. As a paying customer I don't want to see employees treated badly. Especially for a manager his actions were unprofessional and uncalled for. I'm extremely disappointed.

My daughter and I came after a doctors appt around lunch time. It seemed pretty busy but I promised my daughter McDonalds if she did good at the doctors. We went inside and two registers were busy with customers already but as soon as I got in line a worker "Liz" jumped on the 3rd register to help me. I ordered the happy meal and as she was asking the questions on what drink, side and sauce she would look at my daughter and try to guess what my daughter wanted. That put a smile on my daughters face because she was always wrong. Our food came out within 5 minutes and it was hot. It wasn't food that had been sitting there. Also I seen a worker in the floor the entire time cleaning the tables and soda machine.

I have usually went through the drive thru,  a few nights ago decided to go in. After ordering, my kids and I went to the restroom. My poor little girl spotted a large cockroach on the floor crawling around and was to afraid to use the facilities.  So needless to say we had to get out of there.  I find it more than gross that those thing are just roaming around in there.  Even after all the remodeling and it wasn't one of those you see through out modesto outside. CLARK WE NEED YOU!!!! I have to give two stars for customer service because they are super.

Where do I start? Dining room looks okay, however, the bathroom is in terrible disarray, dirty, soap dispenser usually not on the wall where it should be, hand dryer does not work all that well. Soda dispenser area is always dirty with spilled soda everywhere, as though no one bothered to even wipe it once during the day. More than once have gotten pies that were beyond the "enjoy by" time stamp.

First of all remember its mcdonalds but it was 1am and 9 cars in front of me, still received my food in less than 5 min I was shocked. 2nd I got two bacon mcchickens, I find myself saying these are awesome for 2 bucks each. These bacon Mcchickens, apple pies and dollar drinks is the best thing about mcdonalds. I really dislike mcd but I have kids who love it shocker there!

I just want to start off by saying, good job. Really. It takes a LOT of determination to fail this hardcore. I've worked fast food and i understand it can be stressful and hectic, but when there is only 2 or 3 customers THIS SHOULD NOT HAPPEN. My friend and i went to McDonalds tonight and i got my usual McDouble ONLY ketchup and Onions, sprite, coke and a caramel sunday. The guy taking our order did it very well and did it correctly. We get our order and we pull forward, i take a bite of my burger and, of course, there is ketchup, onion, mustard and cheese. Mind you, I've been taking Tylenol all day and my tummy is feeling kind of sick because of it but mustard makes me instantly suuuper sick to my stomach. So i almost puke right there in the car. We go back thru the drive thru and my friend looks at me and says, "Literally every time we go to McDonalds they mess up your order, this time they almost made you puke. Give them hell." So as soon as the lady comes on the intercom i say "Do you guys not know how to read? I ordered a McDouble with ONLY KETCHUP AND ONIONS. Mustard makes me sick to my fucking stomach and i almost threw up because your cook doesn't know how to make a fucking burger. It isn't that difficult to READ and FOLLOW DIRECTIONS. Can you please give me another MCDOUBLE WITH ONLY KETCHUP AND ONIONS. The receipt taped to my fucking burger says ONLY KETCHUP ONLY ONIONS." She replies "pull to the next window." We get to the window where the sweet kid who took our first order was and i told him he did a good job and it wasn't his fault, but we did want another burger. We explained the burger for a 3rd time. He said I'm sorry about that and then just closes the window. So we pulled up to the next window, waited a bit and the lady hands me out another burger. I opened it up and instantly said "ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME????" at that point i leaned over to the driver window and handed it to her and said "does your cook not know how to read English? This burger has cheese, MUSTARD and pickles. I WANT A MCDOUBLE WITH KETCHUP AND ONIONS ONLY. I've worked fast food and i know it isnt that fucking difficult to make a fucking burger!!" That's TWICE now they messed it up. After three times they finally made the stupid burger correctly. I'm literally astounded, it isnt rocket science to read a screen and assemble a goddamn burger correctly.. What if i had been deathly allergic to pickles or mustard? I understand if they would have been jam packed with customers then yes, things get confusing, but when there is literally 2 or 4 customer at the store then you shouldn't have to try 3 times to correctly make a hamburger. This is pathetic, your company in general has such an awful thought about not being able to correctly make food. Why don't you try and change that?? Coming from a former fast food worker i understand all the challenges in that industry, i know full well what happens behind the counter. I know how to serve, take food order and make the food. It is not that difficult.
Remodeled and excellent!  It is by far the nicest McDonalds we have ever been to. Service is quick, and I feel like I can actually eat there without loosing my appetite.

So I often stop at the Pet Smart next to this McDonald's and then head over for a drink or snack and it seems silly to review a McDonald's but they are really friendly here. Granted I've got a little more than my fair share of fast food goofs here but every time I come they are so nice and everyone is smiling and pleasant. You can say "They get paid to do that, its their job" but trust me they don't get paid enough to be nice to a lot of the people they deal with. The idea that in retail, let alone fast food, they are always positive and happy when I visit makes it a nice place for me to come and I rarely ask them to fix the mistakes because they provide great customer service and I'd prefer to keep seeing them smile.
I went there this morning and was greeted by Maya she was all smiles friendly and fun . That is kind of person that will get me to come back ! Need more like her !

You can not go wrong with McDonalds breakfast.  This location was particularly nice.  They just remodeled and it was bumping in the AM.  It seems it's a senior hang out place.  Love that.  The coffee was particularly good today.  =)
I love this Mcdonalds.They always get my order right and I get it quick.I go here for my Mcdonalds fix
What can I say, its McDonald's. One star cause its cheap, an another cause I hate to admit their apple pies are bombastic!
